GR14hbhvil_u:397: vāyur vāti yatra na candramā bhāti yatra na nakṣatrāṇi bhānti yatra nāgnir dahati
GR14hbhvil_u:398: yatra na mṛtyuḥ praviśati yatra na duḥkhaṃ sadānandaṃ paramānandaṃ śāntaṃ śāśvataṃ

GR14hbhvil_u:523: ataeva hi viśvasya layaḥ svāhārṇake bhavet // Hbhv_1.171 //

GR14hbhvil_u:564: naitena sadṛśaḥ kaścid jagaty asmin caracare // Hbhv_1.187 //

GR14hbhvil_u:655: viṣṇu-bhaktyā viśeṣeṇa kiṃ na sidhyati bhūtale /

GR14hbhvil_u:692: yasyānukampayā śvāpi mahābdhiṃ santaret sukham // Hbhv_2.1 //

GR14hbhvil_u:895: utkārī caiva mṛtyuś ca makārākṣarajāḥ kalāḥ // Hbhv_2.71 //
GR14hbhvil_u:896: nivṛttiś ca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntis tathaiva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:897: indhikā dīpikā caiva recikā mocikā parā // Hbhv_2.72 //
GR14hbhvil_u:898: sūkṣmā sūkṣmāmṛtā jñānājñānā cāpy āyanī tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:899: vyāpinī vyoma-rūpā ca anantā nāda-sambhavāḥ // Hbhv_2.73 //
GR14hbhvil_u:901: nyāsaṃ kalānāṃ sarvāsāṃ kuryād ekaikaśaḥ kramāt /
GR14hbhvil_u:904: ṛcaḥ pañca yathā-sthānaṃ paṭhet tāś cārcayet kalāḥ // Hbhv_2.75 //
GR14hbhvil_u:905: haṃśaḥ śuciṣad ity ādau pratad viṣṇus tataḥ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:906: tryambakaṃ tat savitur viṣṇur yonim iti kramāt // Hbhv_2.76 //
GR14hbhvil_u:907: tac ca śaṅkhodakaṃ kumbhe mūla-mantreṇa nikṣipet /
GR14hbhvil_u:910: saṃveṣṭya vastra-yugmena tataḥ kumbhaṃ ca maṇḍayet // Hbhv_2.78 //
GR14hbhvil_u:912: tasminn āvāhya kalase paraṃ tejo yathā-vidhi /
GR14hbhvil_u:915: devatāṅge ṣaḍ-aṅgānāṃ nyāsaḥ syāt sakalī-kṛtiḥ // Hbhv_2.80 //
GR14hbhvil_u:918: evaṃ ca kumbhe taṃ sāṅgopāṅgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ prabhum /
GR14hbhvil_u:925: vikīrya sarṣapāṃs tatra gavyaiḥ samprokṣya pañcabhiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:926: madhye sampūjayed vāstu-puruṣaṃ dikṣu tat-patīn // Hbhv_2.85 //
GR14hbhvil_u:928: ullikhya cāsmin yony-ādi-sahitaṃ maṇḍalaṃ likhet // Hbhv_2.86 //
GR14hbhvil_u:930: nidhāya tatra puṣpādi-viṣṭaraṃ sādhu kalpayet // Hbhv_2.87 //
GR14hbhvil_u:934: reto-rūpaṃ vicintyāmuṃ kuṇḍaṃ tāreṇa cārcayet // Hbhv_2.89 //
GR14hbhvil_u:936: cit-piṅgaleti prajvālyopatiṣṭhed agnim ity amum // Hbhv_2.90 //
GR14hbhvil_u:937: jihvā nyasyet sapta tsminn apy aṅgeṣv aṅga-devatāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:938: ṣaṭsu ṣaṭ nyasya mūrtīś ca nyasyāṣṭābhyarcayec ca tāḥ // Hbhv_2.91 //
GR14hbhvil_u:940: hiraṇyā gaganā raktā tathā kṛṣṇā ca suprabhā /
GR14hbhvil_u:941: bahu-rūpāti-rūpā ca sapta jihvā vasor imāḥ // Hbhv_2.92 //
GR14hbhvil_u:944: dhūma-vyāpī sapta-jihvo dhanurdhara iti smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_2.93 //
GR14hbhvil_u:951: hutvā ca vyāhṛtīḥ paścāt trīn vārān juhuyāt punaḥ // Hbhv_2.95 //
GR14hbhvil_u:954: itthaṃ hi saṃskṛte vahnau pīṭham abhyarcya tatra ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:961: karṣa-mātraṃ ghṛtaṃ home śukti-mātraṃ payaḥ smṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:964: dadhi prasṛti-mātraṃ syāt lājāḥ syuḥ muṣṭi-saṃmitāḥ // Hbhv_2.101 //
GR14hbhvil_u:970: tad-dehe mātṛkāṃ sāṅgāṃ nyasyāthopadiśec ca tām // Hbhv_2.103 //
GR14hbhvil_u:974: guruṃ ca śiṣyo nidrāṇaṃ tāṃ śayīta japan vratī // Hbhv_2.105 //
GR14hbhvil_u:977: prātaḥ-kṛtyaṃ guruḥ kṛtvā kumbhaṃ cābhyarcya pūrvavat /
GR14hbhvil_u:978: hutvā dattvā baliṃ karmānyat kuryāt svārpaṇāvadhi // Hbhv_2.106 //
GR14hbhvil_u:980: tam cāmṛta-mayaṃ dhyātvā svasmiṃś cāgniṃ vilāpayet // Hbhv_2.107 //
GR14hbhvil_u:982: sarvā vibhāvya cid-rūpāḥ kumbhe saṃyojya pūjayet // Hbhv_2.108 //
GR14hbhvil_u:983: ato guruṃ gaṇeśaṃ ca viṣvaksenaṃ ca pūjayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:984: udvāsya kalasaṃ spṛṣṭvā śatam aṣṭottaraṃ japet // Hbhv_2.109 //
GR14hbhvil_u:986: śukla-vastraḥ suveśaḥ san viprān dravyeṇa toṣayet // Hbhv_2.110 //
GR14hbhvil_u:987: guruṃ ca bhagavad-dṛṣṭyā parikramya praṇamya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:988: dattvoktāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ tasmai sva-śarīraṃ samarpayet // Hbhv_2.111 //
GR14hbhvil_u:991: iyad eva hi sac-chiṣyaiḥ kartavyaṃ guru-niṣkṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:992: yad vai viśuddha-bhāvena sarvārthātmārpaṇaṃ gurau // Hbhv_2.112 //
GR14hbhvil_u:995: pīṭhe niveśya taṃ śiṣyaṃ kārayec choṣaṇādikam // Hbhv_2.113 //
GR14hbhvil_u:997: nyāsaṃ śiṣya-tanau kṛtvā pīṭha-mantreṇa pūjayet // Hbhv_2.114 //
GR14hbhvil_u:999: nidhāya kalasaṃ tasyāntike vādyādinā nayet // Hbhv_2.115 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1000: śrī-kṛṣṇam atha samprārthya guruḥ kumbhasya vāsasā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1001: nīrājya śiṣyaṃ tan-mūrdhni nyaset tat-pallavādikam // Hbhv_2.116 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1004: śiśoḥ śirasi vinyasya mātṛkāṃ manasā japet // Hbhv_2.117 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1005: tataḥ kumbhāmbhasā śiṣyaṃ prokṣya trir mūla-mantrataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1006: viprāśīr maṅgalodghoṣair abhiṣiñcen manūn paṭhan // Hbhv_2.118 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1010: vāsudevo jagannāthas tathā saṅkarṣaṇo vibhuḥ // Hbhv_2.119 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1011: pradyumnaś cāniruddhaś ca bhavantu vibhavāya te /
GR14hbhvil_u:1012: ākhaṇḍalo 'gnir bhagavān yamo vai nirṛtis tathā // Hbhv_2.120 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1013: varuṇaḥ pavanaś caiva dhanādhyakṣas tathā śivaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1014: brahmaṇā sahitā hy ete dik-pālāḥ pāntu vaḥ sadā // Hbhv_2.121 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1015: kīrtir lakṣmīr dhṛtir medhā puṣṭiḥ śraddhā kriyā gatiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1016: buddhir lajjā vapuḥ śāntir māyā nidrā ca bhāvanā // Hbhv_2.122 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1017: etās tvām abhiṣiñcantu rāhuḥ ketuś ca pūjitāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1019: ṛṣayo munayo gāvo deva-mātara eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1020: deva-patnyo dhruvā nāgā daityā apsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ // Hbhv_2.124 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1022: auṣadhāni ca ratnāni kālasyāvayavāś ca ye // Hbhv_2.125 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1023: saritaḥ sāgarāḥ śailās tīrthāni jaladā nadāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1027: gatvā bhaktyā guruṃ natvā guror āsīta dakṣiṇe // Hbhv_2.127 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1029: nivedya pāyasaṃ kṛṣṇe kuryāt puṣpāñjaliṃ tataḥ // Hbhv_2.128 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1032: nyasya pāṇi-talaṃ mūrdhni tasya karṇe ca dakṣiṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:1033: ṛṣy-ādi-yuktaṃ vidhavan mantraṃ vāra-trayaṃ vadet // Hbhv_2.130 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1034: dīrgha-mantraṃ ca śiṣyasya yāvad āgrahaṇaṃ paṭhet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1035: guru-daivata-mantraikyaṃ śiṣyas taṃ bhāvayan paṭhet // Hbhv_2.131 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1036: sākṣataṃ gurur ādāya vāri śiṣyasya dakṣiṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:1037: kare'rpayed vadan mantro 'yaṃ samo 'stv āvayor iti // Hbhv_2.132 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1038: svasmāj jyotirmayīṃ vidyāṃ gacchantīṃ bhāvayed guruḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1039: āgatāṃ bhāvayec chiṣyo dhanyo 'smīti viśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_2.133 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1041: nidadhyād akṣatān mūrdhni tasya yacchan śubhāśiṣam // Hbhv_2.134 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1042: guruṇā kṛpayā dattaṃ śiṣyaś cāvāpya taṃ manum /
GR14hbhvil_u:1043: aṣṭottara-śataṃ japtvā samayān śṛṇuyāt tataḥ // Hbhv_2.135 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1046: sva-mantro nopadeṣṭavyo vaktavyaś ca na saṃsadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1047: gopanīyaṃ tathā śāstraṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ śarīravat // Hbhv_2.136 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1049: pūjanaṃ ca yathā-śakti tān āpannāṃś ca pālayet // Hbhv_2.137 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1050: prāptam āyatanād viṣṇoḥ śirasāṃ praṇato vahet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1051: nikṣiped ambhasi tato na pated avanau yathā // Hbhv_2.138 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1054: yatra yatra parivādo mātsaryāc chrūyate guroḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1055: tatra tatra na vastavyaṃ niryāyāt saṃsmaran harim // Hbhv_2.140 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1056: yaiḥ kṛtā ca guror nindā vibhoḥ śāstrasya nārada /
GR14hbhvil_u:1057: nāpi taiḥ saha vastavyaṃ vaktavyaṃ vā kathañcana // Hbhv_2.141 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1058: pradakṣiṇe prayāṇe ca pradāne ca viśeṣataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1059: prabhāte ca pravāse ca sva-mantraṃ bahuśaḥ smaret // Hbhv_2.142 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1061: akasmād yadi jāyeta na khyātavyaṃ guror vinā // Hbhv_2.143 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1064: na bhakṣayen matsya-māṃsaṃ kūrma-śūkarakāṃs tathā // Hbhv_2.144 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1066: devāgāre na niṣṭhīvet kṣutaṃ cātra vivarjayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1067: na sopānatka-caraṇaḥ praviśed antaraṃ kvacit // Hbhv_2.145 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1068: ekādaśyāṃ na cāśnīyāt pakṣayor ubhayor api /
GR14hbhvil_u:1069: jāgaraṃ niśi kurvīta viśeṣāc cārcayed vibhum // Hbhv_2.146 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1071: gopayed devatām iṣṭāṃ gopayed gurum ātmanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1072: gopayec ca nijaṃ mantraṃ gopayen nija-mālikām // Hbhv_2.147 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1075: śiṣyeṇāṅgīkṛteṣv eva dīkṣā kaiścana manyate // Hbhv_2.148 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1078: niyamān vihitān varjyān śrāvayec ca catuḥśatam // Hbhv_2.149 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1080: nīrājanaṃ ca vādyena prātaḥ-snānaṃ vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_2.150 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1087: vidhinā tāntrikī sandhyā śikhā-bandho hi karmaṇi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1089: mahārājopacāraiś ca śaktyāṃ sampūjanaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_2.154 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1095: viṣṇor niveditānāṃ vai vastrādīnāṃ ca dhāraṇam // Hbhv_2.157 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1104: vrate niyamataḥ svāsthyaṃ santoṣo yena kena vai // Hbhv_2.161 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1108: gurāv īśvara-bhāvaś ca tulasī-saṅgrahaḥ sadā // Hbhv_2.163 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1109: śayanādy-upacāraś ca rāmādīnāṃ ca cintanam // Hbhv_2.164 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1110: sandhyayoḥ śayanaṃ naiva na śaucaṃ mṛttikāṃ vinā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1115: guroḥ purastāt pāṇḍityaṃ prauḍha-pāda-kriyā tathā // Hbhv_2.167 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1125: śaktau phalādi-bhuktiś ca śrāddhaṃ caikādaśī-dine // Hbhv_2.171 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1127: tatra viṣṇor divā-snānaṃ śrāddhaṃ hary-aniveditaiḥ // Hbhv_2.172 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1133: pūjā cāsaṃskṛtair dravyais tathā cañcala-cittataḥ // Hbhv_2.175 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1139: catuḥ-śataṃ vidhīn etān niṣedhān śrāvayed guruḥ // Hbhv_2.178 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1141: deva-pūjāṃ kārayitvā dakṣa-karṇe mantraṃ japet // Hbhv_2.179 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1143: tataś cotthāya pūrṇātmā daṇḍavat praṇamed gurum /
GR14hbhvil_u:1145: atha nyāsān guruḥ svasmin kṛtvāntar-yajanaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1146: sāṣṭaṃ sahasraṃ tan-mantraṃ sva-śakty-akṣataye japet // Hbhv_2.181 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1147: śiṣyaḥ kumbhādi tat sarvaṃ dravam anyac ca śaktitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1148: dattvābhyarcya guruṃ natvā viprān saṃpūjya bhojayet // Hbhv_2.182 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1150: tān anujñāpya gurvādīn bhuñjīta saha bandhubhiḥ // Hbhv_2.183 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1151: iti dīkṣā-vidhānena yo mantraṃ labhate guroḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1152: sa bhāgyavān cirañjīvī kṛta-kṛtyaś ca jāyate // Hbhv_2.184 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1154: evaṃ yaḥ kurute martyaḥ kare tasya vibhūtayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1155: ataḥ paraṃ mahā-bhāge nānyat karmāsti bhūtale /
GR14hbhvil_u:1158: dīkṣāyā likhyate divyo vidhiḥ paurāṇiko 'dhunā // Hbhv_2.186 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1163: alakṣmīvān aputras tu yo bhavet puruṣo bhuvi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1164: tasya sadyo bhavel lakṣmīr āyur vittaṃ sutāḥ sukham // Hbhv_2.188 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1165: dṛṣṭvā tu maṇḍale devi devaṃ devyā samanvitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1166: nārāyaṇaṃ paraṃ devaṃ yaḥ paśyati vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_2.189 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1169: kārttike māsi śuddhāyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1170: sarvāsu ca yajed devaṃ dvādaśīṣu vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_2.191 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1172: yaḥ paśyati hariṃ devaṃ pūjitaṃ guruṇā śubhe /
GR14hbhvil_u:1173: tasya sadyo bhavet tuṣṭiḥ pāpa-dhvaṃso 'py aśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_2.192 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1174: sa sāmānyo hi devānāṃ bhavatīti na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_2.193 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1179: saṃvatsaraṃ guror bhaktiṃ kuryur viṣṇāv ivācalām // Hbhv_2.195 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1180: saṃvatsaraṃ tataḥ pūrṇe guruṃ caiva prasādayet // Hbhv_2.196 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1182: icchāmas tv aihikīṃ lakṣmīṃ viśeṣeṇa tapodhana // Hbhv_2.197 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1183: evam abhyarthya medhāvī guruṃ viṣṇum ivāgrataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1184: abhyarcya tad-anujñāto daśamyāṃ kārttikasya tu // Hbhv_2.198 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1187: svapnān dṛṣṭvā guror agre śrāvayeta vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1188: tataḥ śubhāśubhaṃ tadvad ālapet paramo guruḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1189: ekādaśyām upoṣyātha snātvā devālayaṃ vrajet // Hbhv_2.200 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1190: guruś ca maṇḍalaṃ bhūmau kalptāyāṃ tu vartayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1191: lakṣaṇair vividhair bhūmiṃ lakṣayitvā vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_2.201 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1192: ṣoḍaśāraṃ likhec cakraṃ nava-nābham athāpi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1193: aṣṭa-patram atho vāpi likhitvā darśayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_2.202 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1196: nava-nābhaṃ yadā kuryān maṇḍalaṃ varṇakair budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1197: tadānīṃ pūrvato devam indram aindryāṃ tu pūjayet // Hbhv_2.204 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1199: yamaṃ tad anu yāmyāyāṃ nairṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ nyaset /
GR14hbhvil_u:1200: vāruṇyāṃ varuṇaṃ caiva vāyavyāṃ pavanaṃ yajet // Hbhv_2.205 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1203: adhaḥ-patre tathā viṣṇum arcayet parameśvaram // Hbhv_2.206 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1204: pūrva-patre balaṃ pūjya pradyumnaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1205: aniruddhaṃ tathā pūjya paścime cottare tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1207: aiśānyāṃ vinyasec chaṅkham āgneyyāṃ cakram eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1208: saumyāyāṃ tu gadā pūjyā vāyavyāṃ padmam eva ca // Hbhv_2.208 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1209: nairṛtyāṃ muṣalaṃ pūjyaṃ dakṣiṇe garuḍaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1210: vāmato vinyasel lakṣmīṃ devadevasya buddhimān // Hbhv_2.209 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1211: dhanuś caiva ca khaḍgaṃ ca devasya purato nyaset /
GR14hbhvil_u:1212: śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ caiva devasya purato 'rcayet // Hbhv_2.210 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1214: diṅ-maṇḍale ca vinyasya cāṣṭau kumbhān vidhānataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1215: vaiṣṇavaṃ kalasaṃ caiva navamaṃ tatra kalpayet // Hbhv_2.211 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1216: snāpayen mukti-kāmāṃs tu vaiṣṇavena ghaṭena tu /
GR14hbhvil_u:1217: śrī-kāmān snāpayet tadvad aindreṇātha ghaṭena tu // Hbhv_2.212 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1223: raudreṇa jñāna-hetus tu loka-pāla-ghaṭās tv ime // Hbhv_2.215 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1225: bhaved avyāhata-jñānaḥ śrīmāṃś ca puruṣaḥ sadā // Hbhv_2.216 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1226: kiṃ punar navabhiḥ snāto naraḥ pātaka-varjitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1227: jāyate viṣṇu-sadṛśaḥ sadyo rājāthavā punaḥ // Hbhv_2.217 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1229: pūjayet sva-sva-nāmnā tu ṣaḍ-bhinnena vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_2.218 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1230: evaṃ sampūjya devāṃs tu loka-pālān prasanna-dhīḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1231: paścāt parīkṣitān śiṣyān baddha-netrān praveśayet // Hbhv_2.219 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1233: somenāpy āyitān paścāc chrāvayen niyamān budhaḥ // Hbhv_2.220 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1234: na ninded abrāhmaṇān devān viṣṇuṃ brāhmaṇam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1235: rudram ādiyam agniṃ ca loka-pālān grahāṃs tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1236: vandeta vaiṣṇavaṃ cāpi puruṣaṃ pūrva-dīkṣitam // Hbhv_2.221 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1237: evaṃ tu samayān śrāvya paścād dhomaṃ tu kārayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1238: tattvāni śiṣya-deheṣu vinyasya ca viśodhayet // Hbhv_2.222 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1239: oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave sarva-rūpiṇe huṃ svāhā // Hbhv_2.223 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1241: garbhādhānādikāś caiva kriyāḥ sarvāś ca kārayet // Hbhv_2.224 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1243: tato 'panīya dṛg-bandhaṃ puraḥ śiṣyaṃ niveśya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1244: prāyaḥ pūrvokta-vidhinā mantraṃ tasmai gurur diśet // Hbhv_2.225 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1247: dāpayed gurave prājño madhyamo madhyamāṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1248: dāpayed itaro yugmaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ yathā-vidhi // Hbhv_2.227 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1249: evaṃ kṛte tu yat puṇyaṃ māhātmyaṃ jāyate dhare /
GR14hbhvil_u:1250: tad aśakyaṃ tu gaditum api varṣa-śatair api // Hbhv_2.228 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1251: dīkṣitātmā guror bhūtvā vārāhaṃ śṛṇuyād yadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1252: tena vedāḥ purāṇāni sarve mantrāḥ susaṅgrahāḥ // Hbhv_2.229 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1253: japtāḥ syuḥ puṣkare tīrthe prayāge sindhu-sāgare /
GR14hbhvil_u:1255: graheṇa viṣuve caiva yat phalaṃ japatāṃ bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1256: tat phalaṃ dviguṇaṃ tasya dīkṣito yaḥ śṛṇoti ca // Hbhv_2.231 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1257: devā api tapaḥ kṛtvā dhyāyanti ca vadanti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1258: kadā me bhārate varṣe janma syād bhūta-dhāriṇi // Hbhv_2.232 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1259: dīkṣitāś ca bhaviṣyāmo vārāhaṃ śṛṇumaḥ kadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1261: paśyāmaḥ paramaṃ sthānaṃ yad gatvā na punar bhavet // Hbhv_2.233 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1262: evaṃ jalpanti vibudhā manasā cintayanti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1263: vārāha-yāgaṃ kārttikyāṃ kadā drakṣyāmahe dhare // Hbhv_2.234 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1264: eṣa te vidhir uddiṣṭo mayā te bhūta-dhāriṇi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1265: deva-gandharva-yakṣāṇāṃ sarvathā durlabho hy asau // Hbhv_2.235 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1266: evaṃ yo vetti tattvena yaś ca paśyati maṇḍalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1267: yaś cemaṃ śṛṇuyād devi sarve muktā iti śrutiḥ // Hbhv_2.236 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1269: saṅkṣiptaś cātha dīkṣāyā vidhir eṣa vilikhyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:1270: mukhya-kalpe hy aśaktasya janasya syād dhitāya ca // Hbhv_2.237 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1277: rāja-dvārāc ca goṣṭhāc ca nadyāḥ kūlān mṛdaḥ smṛtāḥ // Hbhv_2.240 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1279: kṛṣṇam abhyarcya taṃ kumbhaṃ kuśa-kūrcena deśikaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1280: deya-mantreṇa sāṣṭaṃ tu sahasram abhimantrayet // Hbhv_2.241 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1281: tad-adbhiḥ pūrvavac chiṣyam abhiṣicya diśen manum /
GR14hbhvil_u:1282: śiṣyo 'rcayed guruṃ bhaktyā yathā-śakti dvijān api // Hbhv_2.242 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1284: atrāpy aśaktaḥ kaścic ced abjam abhyarcya sākṣatam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1285: tad-ambhasābhiṣicyāṣṭa vārān mūlena ke karam // Hbhv_2.243 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1286: nidhāyāmuṃ japet karṇe upadeśeṣv ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1292: agnāv ājyānvite bījaiḥ salilaiḥ kevalaiś ca vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1296: karmaṇā manasā vācā bhīte cābhayadaḥ sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1300: vīkṣayen medinīṃ sarvāṃ kiṃ punaś copasannatān // Hbhv_2.249 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1303: iha kīrtiṃ vadānyatvaṃ prajā-vṛddhiṃ dhanaṃ sukham /
GR14hbhvil_u:1304: vidyā-dānena labhate sāttviko nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_2.250 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1306: tathaiva sarva-dānānāṃ vidyā-dānaṃ paraṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_2.251 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1307: yāvac ca pātakaṃ tena kṛtaṃ janma-śatair api /
GR14hbhvil_u:1308: tat sarvaṃ nāśam āpnoti vidyā-dānena dehinām // Hbhv_2.252 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1309: vidyā-dānāt paraṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:1310: yena dattena cāpnoti śivaṃ parama-kāraṇam // Hbhv_2.253 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1321: labdhvā mantraṃ tu yo nityaṃ nārcayen mantra-devatām /
GR14hbhvil_u:1324: na kiñcit kasyacit sidhyet sad-ācāraṃ vinā yataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1325: tasmād avaśyaṃ sarvatra sad-ācāro hy apekṣyate // Hbhv_3.4 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1328: viṣṇur ārādhyate panthā nānyat tat-toṣa-kāraṇam // Hbhv_3.5 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1332: na hy ācāra-vihīnasya sukham atra paratra ca // Hbhv_3.6 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1334: bhavanti yaḥ sadācāraṃ samullaṅghya pravartate // Hbhv_3.7 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1340: kapālasthaṃ yathā toyaṃ śvadṛtau vā yathā payaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1342: ācāra-rahito rājan neha nāmutra nindati // Hbhv_3.9 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1347: sad-ācāravatā puṃsā jitau lokāv ubhāv api // Hbhv_3.11 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1349: teṣām ācaraṇaṃ yat tu sad-ācāraḥ sa ucyate // Hbhv_3.12 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1352: sālasyaṃ ca durannādaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bādhate'ntakaḥ // Hbhv_3.13 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1357: sādhūnāṃ ca yathā vṛttaṃ sa sad-ācāra iṣyate // Hbhv_3.15 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1358: tasmāt kuryāt sad-ācāraṃ ya icched gatim ātmanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1360: śraddadhāno 'nasūyaś ca sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_3.16 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1362: ācāra eva dharmasya mūlaṃ rājan kulasya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1363: ācārād vicyuto jantur na kulīno na dhārmikaḥ // Hbhv_3.17 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1366: ācārād vardhate hy āyur ācāro hanty alakṣaṇam // Hbhv_3.18 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1372: brāhme muhūrta utthāya kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti kīrtayan /
GR14hbhvil_u:1373: prakṣālya pāṇi-pādau ca danta-dhāvanam ācaret // Hbhv_3.20 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1374: ācamya vasanaṃ rātres tyaktvānyat paridhāya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1375: punar ācamane kuryāl lekhyena vidhināgrataḥ // Hbhv_3.21 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1376: athecchan paramāṃ śuddhiṃ mūrdhni dhyātvā guroḥ padau /
GR14hbhvil_u:1377: stutvā ca kīrtayan kṛṣṇaṃ smaraṃś caitad udīrayet // Hbhv_3.22 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1385: puruṣas tam ajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim // Hbhv_3.24 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1402: prātar namāmi manasā vacasā ca mūrdhnā
GR14hbhvil_u:1410: śloka-trayam idaṃ puṇyaṃ prātaḥ prātaḥ paṭhet tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1411: loka-traya-gurus tasmai dadyād ātma-padaṃ hariḥ // Hbhv_3.31 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1413: tad etal likhitaṃ kutra kutracid vyavahārataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1417: tathā ca skānde skandaṃ prati śrī-śivoktau-
GR14hbhvil_u:1421: śayanād utthito yas tu kīrtayen madhusūdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1422: kīrtanāt tasya pāpasya nāśam āyāty aśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_3.35 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1425: smaraṇasya tu māhātmyam adhunā likhyate kiyat // Hbhv_3.36 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1428: smartavyaḥ satataṃ viṣṇur vismartavyo na jātucit /
GR14hbhvil_u:1429: sarve vidhi-niṣedhāḥ syur etayor eva kiṅkarāḥ // Hbhv_3.37 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1431: sā hānis tan mahac chidraṃ sa mohaḥ sa ca vibhramaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1432: yan-muhūrtaṃ kṣaṇaṃ vāpi vāsudevo na cintyate // Hbhv_3.38 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1434: iyam eva parā hānir upasargo 'yam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1435: abhāgyaṃ paramaṃ caitad vāsudevaṃ na yat smaret // Hbhv_3.39 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1436: ye muhūrtāḥ kṣaṇā ye ca yāḥ kāṣṭhā ye nimeṣakāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1437: ṛte viṣṇu-smṛter yātās teṣu muṣṭo yamena saḥ // Hbhv_3.40 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1444: māntraṃ pārthivam āgneyaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1445: vāruṇaṃ mānasaṃ ceti snānaṃ sapta-vidhaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_3.42 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1446: śaṃ na āpas tu vai māntraṃ mṛd-ālambhaṃ tu pārthivam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1447: bhasmanā snānam āgneyaṃ snānaṃ gorajasānilam // Hbhv_3.43 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1448: ātape sati yā vṛṣṭir divyaṃ snānaṃ tad ucyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:1449: bahir nadyādiṣu snānaṃ vāruṇaṃ procyate budhaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1450: dhyānaṃ yan manasā viṣṇor mānasaṃ tat prakīrtanam // Hbhv_3.44 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1453: tulya-phalāni sarvāṇi syur ity āha parāśaraḥ // Hbhv_3.45 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1454: snānānāṃ mānasaṃ snānaṃ manv-ādyaiḥ paramaṃ smṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1455: kṛtena yena mucyante gṛhasthā api vai dvijāḥ // Hbhv_3.46 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1459: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gato 'pi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1460: yaḥ smaret puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ // Hbhv_3.47 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1462: tathāpi saṃsmaran viṣṇuṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ // Hbhv_3.48 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1465: yāni teṣām aśeṣāṇāṃ kṛṣṇānusmaraṇaṃ param // Hbhv_3.49 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1466: kṛte pāpe'nutāpo vai yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:1467: prāyaścittaṃ tu tasyaikaṃ hari-saṃsmaraṇaṃ param // Hbhv_3.50 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1470: prayāti vilayaṃ sadyaḥ sakṛd yatrānusaṃsmṛte // Hbhv_3.51 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1472: harir harati pāpāni duṣṭa-cittair api smṛtaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1473: anicchayāpi saṃspṛṣṭo dahaty eva hi pāvakaḥ // Hbhv_3.53 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1476: sa vai vimucyate sadyo yasya viṣṇu-paraṃ manaḥ // Hbhv_3.54 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1478: karmaṇā manasā vācā yaḥ kṛtaḥ pāpa-sañcayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1479: so 'py aśeṣaḥ kṣayaṃ yāti smṛtvā kṛṣṇāṅghra-paṅkajam // Hbhv_3.55 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1481: yama-mārgaṃ mahā-ghoraṃ narakāṃś ca yamaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1482: svapne'pi na naraḥ paśyed yaḥ smared garuḍadhvajam // Hbhv_3.56 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1486: na te yamaṃ pāśa-bhṛtaś ca tad-bhaṭān
GR14hbhvil_u:1491: śīrṇā yad ete na balaṃ mamaitat /
GR14hbhvil_u:1496: te sarve smaraṇād viṣṇor nāśam āyānty upadravāḥ // Hbhv_3.59 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1498: yasya smaraṇa-mātreṇa na moho na ca durgatiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1499: na rogo na ca duḥkhāni tam anantaṃ namāmy aham // Hbhv_3.60 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1502: yathā hemni sthito vahnir durvarṇaṃ hanti dhātu-jam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1503: evam ātma-gato viṣṇur yoginām aśubhāśayam // Hbhv_3.61 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1506: lābhas teṣāṃ jayas teṣāṃ kutas teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1513: nṝṇāṃ smṛte tat-phalam acyute ca // Hbhv_3.63 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1520: smaraṇād eva tad viṣṇoḥ sampūrṇaṃ syād iti śrutiḥ // Hbhv_3.65 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1524: phalaṃ viṣṇoḥ smṛti-samaṃ na jātu dvija-sattama // Hbhv_3.66 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1537: muktiṃ prayāti svargāptis tasya vighno 'numīyate // Hbhv_3.69 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1545: vimucyate namas tasmai viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave // Hbhv_3.71 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1548: bhaktyā tu parayā nūnaṃ yadaiva smarate harim // Hbhv_3.72 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1552: api pātaka-yuktasya prasannaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_3.73 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1556: ye saṃsmaranty aharahar niyataṃ narā bhuvi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1558: te yānti vaiṣṇava-padaṃ dhurvam avyayaṃ ca // Hbhv_3.74 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1560: smaranti ye sakṛd bhūtāḥ prasaṅgenāpi keśavam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1561: te vidhvastākhilāghaughā yanti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // Hbhv_3.75 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1563: śāṭhyenāpi narā nityaṃ ye smaranti janārdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1564: te 'pi yānti tanuṃ tyaktvā viṣṇulokam anāmayam // Hbhv_3.76 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1566: nirāśīr nirmamo yas tu viṣṇor dhyāna-paro bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1567: tat-padaṃ samavāpnoti yatra gatvā na śocati // Hbhv_3.77 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1570: ye tvāṃ trivikrama sadā hṛdi śīlayanti
GR14hbhvil_u:1573: te'pi spṛśanti tava kāntim acintya-rūpām // Hbhv_3.78 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1575: anta-kāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:1576: yaḥ prayāti sa mad-bhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_3.79 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1579: kiṃ nv artha-kāmān bhajato nāty-abhīṣṭān jagad-guruḥ // Hbhv_3.80 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1585: jīvitasya phalaṃ svādu niyataṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_3.82 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1588: janma-lābhaḥ paraḥ puṃsām ante nārāyaṇa-smṛtiḥ // Hbhv_3.83 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1590: taṃ naḥ samādiśopāyaṃ yena te caraṇābjayoḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1591: smṛtir yathā na viramed api saṃsaratām iha // Hbhv_3.84 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1596: dhyāyaṃś carāmy anugṛhāṇa yathā smṛtiḥ syāt // Hbhv_3.85 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1599: yo yiyāsati tat-pāraṃ sa hi caitanya-vañcitaḥ // Hbhv_3.86 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1600: tataḥ pādodakaṃ kiñcit prāk pītvā tulasī-dalaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1603: kiñcid vijñāpayan sarvasva-kṛtyāny arpayen namet // Hbhv_3.88 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1610: yad-utsavādikaṃ karma tat tvayā prerito hare /
GR14hbhvil_u:1611: kariṣyāmi tvayā jñeyam iti vijñāpanaṃ mama // Hbhv_3.90 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1612: prātaḥ prabodhito viṣṇo hṛṣīkeśena yat tvayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1613: yad yat kārayasīśāna tat karomi tavājñayā // Hbhv_3.91 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1622: jānāmi dharmaṃ na ca me pravṛttir
GR14hbhvil_u:1623: jānāmy adharmaṃ na ca me nivṛttiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1629: jagad-dhitāya kṛṣṇāya govindāya namo namaḥ // Hbhv_3.95 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1634: tam ajam amṛtam īśaṃ vāsudevaṃ nato 'smi // Hbhv_3.96 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1637: vedānta-vedibhir viṣṇuḥ procyate yo nato 'smi tam // Hbhv_3.97 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1638: evaṃ vijñāpayan dhyāyan kīrtayaṃś ca yathāvidhi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1641: āsīta prāṅ-mukho bhūtvā śuddha-sthāne śubhāsane // Hbhv_3.99 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1643: nirgatyācamya vidhivat praviśya ca punaḥ sudhīḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1644: āsane prāṅ-mukho bhūtvā vihite copaviśya vai // Hbhv_3.100 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1646: prāṇāyāmāṃś ca vidhivat kṛṣṇaṃ dhyāyet yathoditam // Hbhv_3.101 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1652: kartavyaṃ sajapaṃ dhyānaṃ nityam ārādhakena vai // Hbhv_3.103 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1654: japaṃ homaṃ tathā dhyānaṃ nityaṃ kurvīta sādhakaḥ // Hbhv_3.104 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1656: rātres tu paścime yāme muhūrtau brāhmya ucyate // Hbhv_3.105 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1659: lekhyo 'dhunā tu dhyānasya sa saṅkṣepeṇa likhyate // Hbhv_3.106 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1666: cintayaṃś cetasā kṛṣṇaṃ mukto bhavati saṃsṛteḥ // Hbhv_3.109 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1682: agrato 'trāpi saṃlekhyaṃ yad iṣṭaṃ tatra tad bhajet // Hbhv_3.115 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1685: prāṇāyāma-śatenaiva yat pāpaṃ naśyate nṝṇām // Hbhv_3.116 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1687: kṣaṇa-mātreṇa tat pāpaṃ harer dhyānāt praṇaśyati // Hbhv_3.117 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1692: dhyāyen nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ snānādiṣu ca karmasu /
GR14hbhvil_u:1693: prāyaścittaṃ hi sarvasya duṣkṛtasyeti niścitam // Hbhv_3.119 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1697: ghore kali-yuge prāpte viṣṇuṃ dhyāyan na sīdati // Hbhv_3.120 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1700: kintv asya bahubhis tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tasya bahubhir vrataiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1701: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇam ananya-dhīḥ // Hbhv_3.121 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1707: mātuḥ payodhara-rasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti // Hbhv_3.122 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1710: muhūrtam api yo dhyāyen nārāyaṇam atandritaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1711: so 'pi sad-gatim āpnoti kiṃ punas tat-parāyaṇaḥ // Hbhv_3.123 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1713: dhyāyanti puruṣaṃ divyam acyutaṃ ye smaranti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1714: labhante te'cyuta-sthānaṃ śrutir eṣā purātanī // Hbhv_3.124 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1720: tat-sāmyam āpur anurakta-dhiyāṃ punaḥ kim // Hbhv_3.125 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1723: bhajanty atha tvām ata eva sādhavo
GR14hbhvil_u:1726: nimittam anyad bhagavan na vidmahe // Hbhv_3.126 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1728: āloḍya sarva-śāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1729: idame eva suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā // Hbhv_3.127 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1732: dhyāyanti paramātmānaṃ tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ // Hbhv_3.128 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1734: smaraṇe yat tan māhātmyaṃ tad-dhyāne'py akhilaṃ viduḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1735: bhedaḥ kalpyeta sāmānya-viśeṣābhyāṃ tayoḥ kiyān // Hbhv_3.129 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1738: prabodhya stutibhiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nīrājyaṃ prārthayed idam // Hbhv_3.130 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1752: tṛṣitāḥ paśavo baddhāḥ kanyakā ca rajasvalā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1753: devatā ca sanirmālyā hanti puṇyaṃ purākṛtam // Hbhv_3.134 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1760: na tasya duḥkhaṃ na daridratā ca
GR14hbhvil_u:1763: prātas tu syān mahāśalyaṃ ghaṭikā-mātra-yogataḥ // Hbhv_3.137 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1765: aruṇodaya-velāyāṃ śalyaṃ tat kṣamate hariḥ // Hbhv_3.138 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1767: muhūrte samatikrānte pūrṇaṃ pātakam ucyate // Hbhv_3.139 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1771: prahare pūrṇatāṃ yāte prāyaścittaṃ tato na hi // Hbhv_3.141 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1773: atikrānte muhūrtārdhe sahasraṃ japam ācaret // Hbhv_3.142 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1774: pūrṇe muhūrte sañjāte sahasraṃ sārdham ucyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:1778: prahare samatikrānte prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // Hbhv_3.144 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1781: gaṇḍūṣāṇi jalair dattvā danta-kāṣṭhaṃ samarpayet // Hbhv_3.145 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1783: salilaṃ ca punar dadyād vāso 'pi mukha-mārjanam // Hbhv_3.146 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1785: tan-māhātmyaṃ ca tan-mukhya-prasaṅge lekhyam agrataḥ // Hbhv_3.147 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1789: jihvollekhanikāṃ dattvā virogas tv abhijāyate // Hbhv_3.148 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1791: mṛd-bhāga-dānād devasya bhūmim āpnoty anuttamām // Hbhv_3.149 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1794: prabhor nīrājanaṃ kuryān maṅgalākhyaṃ jagad-dhitam // Hbhv_3.150 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1795: nīrājanaṃ tv idaṃ sarvaiḥ kartavyaṃ śuci-vigrahaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1796: parama-śraddhayotthāya draṣṭavyaṃ ca sadā naraiḥ // Hbhv_3.151 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1797: strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ ca sarveṣām etat sarveṣṭa-pūrakam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1801: kīrtayan kṛṣṇa-nāmāni tīrthaṃ gacched anantaram // Hbhv_3.153 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1803: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1807: śrī-kṛṣṇānanta govinda saṅkarṣaṇa namo 'stu te // Hbhv_3.155 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1810: ācamya khāni saṃmārjya snānaṃ kuryāt yathocitam // Hbhv_3.156 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1813: tataḥ kalye samutthāya kuryān mūtraṃ nareśvara /
GR14hbhvil_u:1816: pādāv asecanocchiṣṭe prakṣipen na gṛhāṅgaṇe // Hbhv_3.158 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1818: guruṃ dvijādīṃś ca budho na meheta kadācana // Hbhv_3.159 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1819: na kṛṣṭe śasya-madhye vā go-vraje jana-saṃsadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1820: na vartmani na nady-ādi-tīrtheṣu puruṣarṣabha // Hbhv_3.160 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1821: nāpsu naivāmbhasas tīre na śmaśāne samācaret /
GR14hbhvil_u:1822: utsargaṃ vai purīṣasya mūtrasya ca visarjanam // Hbhv_3.161 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1824: kurvītānāpadi prājño mūtrotsargaṃ ca pārthiva // Hbhv_3.162 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1826: tiṣṭhen nāticiraṃ tatra naiva kiñcid udīrayet // Hbhv_3.163 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1829: antardhāpya mahīṃ kāṣṭhaiḥ patrair loṣṭrais tṛṇena vā // Hbhv_3.164 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1830: prāvṛtya tu śiraḥ kuryād vin-mūtrasya visarjanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1832: na deva-devālayor nāpām api kadācana // Hbhv_3.165 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1833: nadīṃ jyotīṃṣi vīkṣitvā na vāyv-agni-mukho 'pi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1834: prayādityaṃ pratyanalaṃ pratisomaṃ tathaiva ca // Hbhv_3.166 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1836: tataś cāvaśyakaṃ kartuṃ nairṛtīṃ diśam āśrayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1837: grāmād dhanuḥ-śataṃ gacchen nagarāc ca caturguṇam // Hbhv_3.167 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1839: vin-mūtre visṛjen maunī niśāyāṃ dakṣiṇā-mukhaḥ // Hbhv_3.168 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1840: nālokayed diśo bhāgān jyotiś cakraṃ nabho 'malam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1841: vāmena pāṇinā śiśnaṃ dhṛtvottiṣṭhet prayatnavān // Hbhv_3.169 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1843: na mūtraṃ go-vraje kuryān na valmīke na bhasmani /
GR14hbhvil_u:1844: na garteṣu sa-sattveṣu na tiṣṭhan na vrajann api // Hbhv_3.170 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1849: śaucāvaśiṣṭāṃ gehāc ca na dadyāl lepa-sambhavām // Hbhv_3.172 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1851: parityajen mṛdaś caitāḥ sakalāḥ śauca-sādhane // Hbhv_3.173 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1852: ekā liṅge gude tisras daśa vāma-kare nṛpa /
GR14hbhvil_u:1855: tisras tu pādayor deyāḥ śuddhi-kāmena nityaśaḥ // Hbhv_3.175 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1857: tisras tu mṛttikā deyāḥ kṛtvā tu nakha-śodhanam // Hbhv_3.176 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1859: guhye dadyān mṛdaṃ caikāṃ pāyau pañcāmbu-sāntarāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1860: daśa vāma-kare cāpi sapta pāṇi-dvaye mṛdaḥ // Hbhv_3.177 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1861: ekaikāṃ pādayor dadyāt tisraḥ pāṇyor mṛdaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1862: itthaṃ śaucaṃ gṛhī kuryād gandha-lepa-kṣayāvadhi // Hbhv_3.178 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1863: kramād dviguṇam etat tu brahmacaryādiṣu triṣu /
GR14hbhvil_u:1864: divā vihita-śaucāc ca rātrāv ardhaṃ samācaret // Hbhv_3.179 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1865: rujārdhaṃ ca tad-ardhaṃ ca pathi caurādi-pīḍite /
GR14hbhvil_u:1866: tad-ardha-yoṣitāṃ cāpi svāsthye nyūnaṃ na kārayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1869: mṛttikā tu samuddiṣṭā triparvī pūryate yayā // Hbhv_3.181 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1872: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tad-ardhaṃ parikīrtitā // Hbhv_3.182 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1875: ekā liṅge tu savye trir ubhayor mṛd-dvayaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_3.183 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1878: ācamya tu tataḥ śuddhaḥ smṛtvā viṣṇuṃ sanātanam // Hbhv_3.184 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1881: ācāmeta mṛdaṃ bhūyas tathā dadyāt samāhitaḥ // Hbhv_3.185 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1882: niṣpāditāṅghri-śaucas tu pāpāv abhyukṣya vai punaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1883: triḥ pibet salilaṃ tena tathā dviḥ parimārjayet // Hbhv_3.186 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1884: śīrṣaṇyāni tataḥ khāni mūrdhānaṃ ca mṛdā labhet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1885: bāhū nābhiṃ ca toyena hṛdayaṃ cāpi saṃspṛśet // Hbhv_3.187 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1887: prakṣālya hastau pādau ca triḥ pibed ambu vīkṣitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1888: saṃvṛttāṅguṣṭha-mūlena dviḥ pramṛjyāt tato mukham // Hbhv_3.188 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1889: saṃhatya tisṛbhiḥ pūrvam āsyam evam upaspṛśet /
GR14hbhvil_u:1890: aṅguṣṭhena pradeśinyā ghrāṇaṃ paścād anantaram // Hbhv_3.189 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1892: kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhayor nābhiṃ hṛdayaṃ tu talena vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:1893: sarvābhis tu śiraḥ paścād bāhū cāgreṇa saṃspṛśet // Hbhv_3.190 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1895: prāg āsya udagāsyo vā sūpaviṣṭaḥ śucau bhuvi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1903: yady ācamet srāvayitvā bhūmau baudhāyano 'bravīt // Hbhv_3.194 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1908: bhuktvā pītvā ca suptvā ca snātvā rathyopasarpaṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:1909: auṣṭhau vilomakau spṛṣṭvā vāso viparidhāya ca // Hbhv_3.196 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1912: catvaraṃ vā śmaśānaṃ vā samabhyasya dvijottamaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1913: sandhyor ubhayos tadvad ācānto 'py ācamet punaḥ // Hbhv_3.198 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1915: śiraḥ prāvṛtya kaṇṭhaṃ vā muktakaccha-śikho 'pi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1916: akṛtvā pādayoḥ śaucam ācānto 'py aśucir bhavet // Hbhv_3.199 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1917: sopānatkau jalastho vā noṣṇīṣī cācamed budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1918: na caiva varṣa-dhārābhir hastocchiṣṭe tathā budhaḥ // Hbhv_3.200 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1920: na pādukāsana-stho vā bahir jānur athāpi vā // Hbhv_3.201 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1922: triḥ-pāne keśavaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ mādhavam apy atha /
GR14hbhvil_u:1923: prakṣālane dvayoḥ pāṇyor govindaṃ viṣṇum apy ubhau // Hbhv_3.202 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1924: madhusūdanam ekaṃ ca mārjane'nyaṃ trivikramam // Hbhv_3.203 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1926: prakṣālane punaḥ pāṇyor hṛṣīkeśaṃ ca pādayoḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1927: padmanābhaṃ prokṣaṇe tu mūrdhno dāmodaraṃ tataḥ // Hbhv_3.205 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1928: vāsudevaṃ mukhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ pradyumnam ity ubhau /
GR14hbhvil_u:1930: adhokṣajaṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ ca karṇayor nābhito 'cyutam // Hbhv_3.206 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1931: janārdanaṃ ca hṛdaye upendraṃ mastake tataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1932: dakṣiṇe tu hariṃ bāhau vāme kṛṣṇaṃ yathāvidhi /
GR14hbhvil_u:1933: namo 'nantaṃ ca caturthy-antam ācāmet kramato japan // Hbhv_3.207 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1934: aśaktaḥ kevalam dakṣaṃ spṛśet karṇaṃ tathā ca vāk /
GR14hbhvil_u:1938: utthāya netraṃ prakṣālya śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1939: parijapya ca mantreṇa bhakṣayed danta-dhāvanam // Hbhv_3.209 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1941: āyur balaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajā paśu-vasūni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:1942: brahma prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvaṃ no dhehi vanaspate // Hbhv_3.210 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1946: ācānto 'py aśucir yasmād akṛtvā danta-dhāvanam // Hbhv_3.211 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1948: danta-kāṣṭham akhāditvā yas tu mām upasarpati /
GR14hbhvil_u:1949: sarva-kāla-kṛtaṃ karma tena caikena naśyati // Hbhv_3.212 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1955: ādye tithau navamyāṃ ca kṣaye candramasas tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:1956: ādity-vāre śaure ca varjayed danta-dhāvanam // Hbhv_3.214 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1959: dantānāṃ kāṣṭha-saṃyogo dahaty āsaptamaṃ kulam // Hbhv_3.215 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1962: dantānāṃ kāṣṭha-saṃyogo hanti sapta-kulāni vai // Hbhv_3.216 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1965: dantānāṃ kāṣṭha-saṃyogo hanti puṇyaṃ purā-kṛtam // Hbhv_3.217 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1967: dinaeṣv eteṣu kāṣṭhair hi dantānāṃ dhāvanasya tu /
GR14hbhvil_u:1968: niṣiddhatvāt tṛṇaiḥ kuryāt tathā kāṣṭhetaraiś ca tat // Hbhv_3.218 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1971: parṇair anyatra kāṣṭhaiś ca jīvollekhhaḥ sadaiva hi // Hbhv_3.219 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1973: alābhe ca niṣedhe vā kāṣṭhānāṃ danta-dhāvanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:1974: parṇādinā viśuddhena jihvollekhaḥ sadaiva hi // Hbhv_3.220 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1977: tṛṇa-parṇais tu tat kuryād amām ekādaśīṃ vinā // Hbhv_3.221 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1982: mukhe paryuṣite yasmād bhaved aśuci-bhāg naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1983: tataḥ kuryāt prayatnena śuddhy-arthaṃ danta-dhāvanam // Hbhv_3.225 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1988: sarva kaṇṭakinaḥ puṇyāḥ āyurdāḥ kṣīriṇaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:1992: varjayec ca prayatnena baṭaṃ vāśvattham eva ca // Hbhv_3.228 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1995: sa-tvacaṃ danta-kāṣṭhaṃ yat tad-agre na tu dhārayet // Hbhv_3.229 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1997: apāmārgaṃ ca bilvaṃ vā kara-vīraṃ viśeṣatah // Hbhv_3.230 //
GR14hbhvil_u:1999: parihṛtya dinaṃ pāpaṃ bhakṣayed vai vidhānavit // Hbhv_3.231 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2001: prakṣālya bhuktvā taj jahyāt śucau deśe samāhitaḥ // Hbhv_3.232 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2005: jihvollekhanikām vāpi kuryāc cāpākṛtiṃ śubhām // Hbhv_3.233 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2007: dantollekho vitastyā bhavati parimitād annam ity ādi-mantrāt
GR14hbhvil_u:2009: bhuktvā gaṇḍūṣa-ṣaṭkaṃ dvir api kuśam ṛte deśinīm aṅgulībhir
GR14hbhvil_u:2010: nandābhūtāṣṭa-parvaṇy api na khalu navamy-arka-saṅkrānti-pāte // Hbhv_3.234 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2013: smṛtvā praṇava-gāyatryau nibadhnīyāc chikhāṃ dvijaḥ // Hbhv_3.235 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2016: smṛtvoṅkāraṃ ca gāyatrīṃ nibadhnīyāc cikhāntataḥ // Hbhv_3.236 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2025: yathāhani tathā prātar nityaṃ snāyād anāturaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2027: sravat eva divā-rātrau prātaḥ-snānaṃ viśodhanam // Hbhv_3.239 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2030: yates tri-savanaṃ snānaṃ sakṛt tu brahmacāriṇaḥ // Hbhv_3.240 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2031: sarve cāpi sakṛt kuryur aśaktau codakaṃ vinā // Hbhv_3.241 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2033: aśiraskaṃ bhavet snānam aśaktau karmiṇāṃ sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2034: ārdreṇa vāsasā vāpi pāṇinā vāpi mārjanam // Hbhv_3.242 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2036: asnātas tu pumān nārho japādi-havanādiṣu // Hbhv_3.243 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2038: prātaḥ-snānaṃ vinā puṃsāṃ pāpitvaṃ karmasu smṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2039: home jape viśeṣeṇa tasmāt snānaṃ samācaret // Hbhv_3.244 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2044: snānaṃ vinā tu yo bhuṅkte malāśī sa sadā naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2047: asnāyī narakaṃ bhuṅkte puṃs-kīṭādiṣu jāyate // Hbhv_3.247 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2052: sparśaś ca gandhaś ca viśuddhatā ca
GR14hbhvil_u:2053: śrīḥ saukumāryaṃ pravarāś ca nāryaḥ // Hbhv_3.248 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2055: yāmyaṃ hi yātanā-duḥkhaṃ nitya-snāyī na paśyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:2056: nitya-snānena pūyante api pāpa-kṛto narāḥ // Hbhv_3.249 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2058: prātaḥ-snānena niṣpāpo naro na nirayaṃ vrajet // Hbhv_3.250 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2059: ye punaḥ srotasi snānam ācarantīha parvaṇi /
GR14hbhvil_u:2060: tenaiva narakaṃ yānti na jāyante kuyoniṣu // Hbhv_3.251 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2061: duḥsvapnā duṣṭa-cintāś ca bandhyā bhavanti sarvadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2062: prātaḥ-snānena śuddhānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ viśāṃ vara // Hbhv_3.252 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2064: snāne manaḥ-prasādaḥ syād devā abhimukhāḥ sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2065: saubhāgyaṃ śrīḥ sukhaṃ puṣṭiḥ puṇyaṃ vidyā yaśo dhṛtiḥ // Hbhv_3.253 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2070: prātaḥ-snānena pāpāni pūyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_3.255 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2072: prātaḥ-snānāt yataḥ śudhyet kāyo 'yaṃ malinaḥ sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2073: chidrito navabhiś chidraiḥ sravaty eva divā-niśam // Hbhv_3.256 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2076: prātaḥ prātas tu yat snānaṃ saṃjāte cāruṇodvaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:2078: prātaḥ-snānaṃ haret pāpam alakṣmīṃ glānim eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:2079: aśucitvaṃ ca duḥsvapnaṃ tuṣṭiṃ puṣṭiṃ prayacchati // Hbhv_3.259 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2083: yadyapy anyo 'nya-milite pṛthag jñeye tathāpy amū // Hbhv_3.261 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2085: atha tīrtha-gatas tatra dhauta-vastraṃ kuśāṃs tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2086: mṛttikāṃ ca taṭe nyasya snāyāt sva-sva-vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_3.262 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2088: kurvan na phalam āpnoti kṛtā cen niṣphalā bhavet // Hbhv_3.263 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2092: jagat-sraṣṭar jagan-mardin namāmi tvāṃ sureśvara // Hbhv_3.265 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2094: anyathā tat-phalasyārdhaṃ tīrtheśo harati svayam // Hbhv_3.266 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2095: natvātha tīrthaṃ snānārtham anujñāṃ prārthayed imām /
GR14hbhvil_u:2097: dehi viṣṇo mamānujñāṃ tava tīrtha-niṣevaṇe // Hbhv_3.267 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2099: vidhivan mṛdam ādāya tīrtha-toye praviśya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:2104: dhyātvā tan-nāma saṅkīrtya nimajjet puṇya-vāriṇi // Hbhv_3.270 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2106: kṛṣṇaṃ dhyāyan jale bhūyo nimajjya snānam ācaret // Hbhv_3.271 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2108: tatra dvādaśadhā toye nimajjya snānam ācaret // Hbhv_3.272 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2111: prasiddheṣu ca tīrtheṣu yady anyasyābhidhāṃ smaret /
GR14hbhvil_u:2112: snātakaṃ taṃ tu tat tīrtham abhiśapya kṣaṇād vrajet // Hbhv_3.273 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2117: evam uccārya tat-tīrthe pādau prakṣālya vāg yataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2118: smaran nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ snānaṃ kuryād vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_3.274 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2119: tīrthaṃ prakalpayed dhīmān mūla-mantram imaṃ paṭhan /
GR14hbhvil_u:2120: auṃ namo nārāyaṇāya mūla-mantra udāhṛtaḥ // Hbhv_3.275 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2121: darbha-pāṇis tu vidhivad ācāntaḥ praṇato bhuvi /
GR14hbhvil_u:2125: trāhi nas tvenasas tasmād ājanma-maraṇāntikāt // Hbhv_3.277 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2128: mūrdhni kṛtvā jalaṃ bhūpaś catur vā pañca sapta vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2129: snānaṃ kṛtvā mṛdā tadvad āmantrya tu vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_3.278 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2131: mṛttike hara me pāpaṃ yan mayā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam // Hbhv_3.279 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2133: namas te sarva-lokānāṃ prabhavāraṇi suvrate // Hbhv_3.280 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2136: viprāṇāṃ ca padāmbhodhiḥ kuryān mūrdhany abhiṣecanam // Hbhv_3.281 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2141: tasya bhāgīrathī-snānam ahany ahani jāyate // Hbhv_3.283 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2143: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni tāni tīrthāni sāgare /
GR14hbhvil_u:2144: sa-sāgarāṇi tīrthāni pāde viprasya dakṣiṇe // Hbhv_3.284 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2146: śaṅkhe vasanti sarvāṇi tīrthāni ca viśeṣataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2149: abhiṣekaṃ vidadhyāc ca pītvā tat kiṃcid agrataḥ // Hbhv_3.286 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2152: kṛtvā śaṅkhe bhrāmayaṃs triḥ prakṣipen nija-mūrdhani // Hbhv_3.287 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2154: prekṣepaṇaṃ prakurvīta brahmahā sa nigadyate // Hbhv_3.288 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2156: viruddham ācaran mohād brahmahā sa nigadyate // Hbhv_3.289 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2159: viṣṇoḥ pādodakaṃ pītvā śirasā dhārayāmy aham // Hbhv_3.290 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2167: gaṅgā godāvarī revā nadyo mukti-pradās tu yāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2170: tīrthaṃ yadi bhavet puṇyaṃ śālagrāma-śilodbhavam // Hbhv_3.294 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2172: yeṣāṃ dhautāni gātrāṇi hareḥ pādodakena vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:2173: ambarīṣa kule teṣāṃ dāso 'smi vaśagaḥ sadā // Hbhv_3.295 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2174: rājante tāni tāvac ca tīrthāni bhuvana-traye /
GR14hbhvil_u:2175: yāvan na prāpyate toyaṃ śālagrāmābhiṣekajam // Hbhv_3.296 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2177: gṛhe'pi vasatas tasya gaṅgā-snānaṃ dine dine /
GR14hbhvil_u:2180: yāni kāni ca tīrthāni brahmādyā devatās tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2185: sa vai cāvabhṛta-snātaḥ sa ca gaṅgā-jalāplutaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2186: viṣṇu-pādodakaṃ kṛtvā śaṅkheyaḥ snāti mānavaḥ // Hbhv_3.300 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2194: samudragāś ca pakṣasya māsasya saritāṃ patiḥ // Hbhv_3.302 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2204: tato jalāñjalīn kṣiptvā mūrdhni trīn kumbha-mudrayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2208: brahmādayo ye devās tān devān tarpayāmi /
GR14hbhvil_u:2216: vidhivat tilakaṃ kṛtvā punaś cācamya vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2217: vidhāya vaidikīṃ sandhyām athopāsīta tāntrikīm // Hbhv_3.308 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2221: prāṇāyāma-trayaṃ kṛtvā dhyāyet sandhyām iti śrutiḥ // Hbhv_3.309 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2223: brāhmaṇāḥ śāktikāḥ sarve na śaivā na ca vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2224: yata upāsate devīṃ gāyatrīṃ veda-mātaram // Hbhv_3.310 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2225: yā ca sandhyā jagat-sūtir māyātītā hi niṣkalā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2228: prāṅ-mukhaḥ satataṃ vipraḥ sandhyopāsanam ācaret // Hbhv_3.312 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2231: sāvitrīṃ vai japed vidvān prāṅ-mukhaḥ prayataḥ sthitaḥ // Hbhv_3.313 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2234: yad anyat kurute kiñcin na tasya phalam apnuyāt // Hbhv_3.314 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2236: vihāya sandhyā-praṇatiṃ sa yāti narakāyutam // Hbhv_3.315 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2238: upāsya vidhivat sandhyāṃ prāptāḥ pūrve parāṃ gatim // Hbhv_3.316 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2241: tarpayed vidhinā tasya tathivāvaraṇāni ca // Hbhv_3.317 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2243: haviṣāgnau jale puṣpair dhyānena hṛdaye harim /
GR14hbhvil_u:2244: arcanti sūrayo nityaṃ japena ravi-maṇḍale // Hbhv_3.318 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2246: sūrye cābhyarhaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ salile salilādibhiḥ // Hbhv_3.319 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2249: śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ tarpayāmīti triḥ samyak tarpayet kṛtī // Hbhv_3.320 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2251: kṛṣṇāya kāma-gāyatryā dadyād arghyam anantaram // Hbhv_3.321 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2256: dhīmahīti tathoktvātha tan no 'naṅgaḥ pracodayāt // Hbhv_3.322 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2259: kṣamasveti tam udvāsya dadyād arghyaṃ vivasvate // Hbhv_3.323 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2261: yo 'nyo manyeta so 'py atra tad-viśeṣāya likhyate // Hbhv_3.324 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2266: mastake netra-mantreṇa kuryāt samprokṣaṇaṃ tataḥ // Hbhv_3.326 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2268: adhaḥ kṣipet punaś caivam iti vāra-catuṣṭayam // Hbhv_3.327 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2272: arghyaṃ gopāla-gāyatryā kṛṣṇāya trir nivedayet // Hbhv_3.329 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2274: brūyād gopījanaṃ ṅe'ntaṃ vidmahe ity ataḥ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:2275: punar gopī-janaṃ tadvad dhīmahīti tataḥ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:2276: tan naḥ kṛṣṇa iti prānte prapūrvaṃ codayād iti // Hbhv_3.330 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2277: mūrdhni nyaset tad-aṅgāni lalāṭe netrayor dvayoḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2278: bhujayoḥ pādayoś caiva sarvāṅgeṣu tathā kramāt // Hbhv_3.331 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2280: pañcabhiś ca tirbhiś caiva pañcabhiś ca tribhiḥ punaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2281: caturbhiś ca caturbhiś ca kuryād aṅgāni varṇakiḥ // Hbhv_3.332 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2284: tat-sammukhotkṣipta-bhujo gāyatrīṃ tāṃ japet kṣaṇam // Hbhv_3.333 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2287: sañcintya pīṭha-mantreṇa tarpayec ca sakṛt sakṛt // Hbhv_3.334 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2288: tasmiṃś ca kṛṣṇam āvāhya sakalīkṛtya mānasān /
GR14hbhvil_u:2292: tataś ca mūla-mantreṇa vārān vai pañca-viṃśatim /
GR14hbhvil_u:2296: brahmāṇaṃ tarpayet pūrvaṃ viṣṇuṃ rudraṃ prajāpatīn /
GR14hbhvil_u:2297: devā yakṣās tathā nāgā gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ // Hbhv_3.338 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2298: krūrāḥ sarpāḥ suparṇāś ca taravo jambhakādayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2300: nirādhārāś ca ye jīvā pāpa-dharma-ratāś ca ye /
GR14hbhvil_u:2301: teṣām āpyāyanāyaitad dīyate salilaṃ mayā // Hbhv_3.340 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2302: kṛtopavīto devebhyo nivītī ca bhavet tataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2303: manuṣyāṃs tarpayed bhaktyā ṛṣi-putrān ṛṣīṃs tathā // Hbhv_3.341 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2304: sanakaś ca sanandaś ca tṛtīyaś ca sanātanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2305: kapilaś cāsuriś caiva voḍhuḥ pañca-śikhas tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2306: sarve te tṛptim āyāntu mad-dattenāmbunā sadā // Hbhv_3.342 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2308: pracetasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca bhṛguṃ nāradam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:2310: apasavyaṃ tataḥ kṛtvāsavyaṃ jānu ca bhūtale /
GR14hbhvil_u:2311: agniṣv āttās tathā saumyā bahiṣmantas tathoṣmapāḥ // Hbhv_3.344 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2317: vṛkodarāya citrāya citra-guptāya vai namaḥ // Hbhv_3.347 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2318: darbha-pāṇiḥ suprayataḥ pitṝn svān tarpayet tataḥ // Hbhv_3.348 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2320: santarpya vidhinā sarvān imaṃ mantram udīrayet // Hbhv_3.349 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2322: te tṛptim akhilāṃ yāntu ye cāsmat-toya-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ // Hbhv_3.350 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2328: evaṃ snātvā tataḥ paścād ācamya suvidhānataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2329: utthāya vāsasī śukle śuddhe tu paridhāya vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:2330: tatas tu tarpaṇaṃ kuryāt trailokyāpyāyanāya vai // Hbhv_3.352 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2332: niṣpīḍayitvā vastraṃ tu paścāt sandhyāṃ samācaret /
GR14hbhvil_u:2333: anyathā kurute yas tu snānaṃ tasyāphalaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_3.353 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2335: vastraṃ triguṇitaṃ yas tu niṣpīḍayati mūḍha-dhīḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2336: vṛthā snānaṃ bhavet tasya niṣpīḍayati cāmbuni // Hbhv_3.354 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2339: āpātam ācarec chaucaṃ bhāva-duṣṭo na śuddhi-bhāk // Hbhv_3.355 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2340: naktaṃ dinaṃ nimajjyāpsu kaivartāḥ kim u pāvanāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2341: śataśo 'pi tathā snātā na śuddhā bhāva-dūṣitāḥ // Hbhv_3.356 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2351: na svargam āpnoti phalaṃ na cānyat // Hbhv_3.358 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2353: yasya hastau ca pādau ca vāṅ manaś ca susaṃyatam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2354: vidyā-tapaś ca kīrtiś ca sa tīrtha-phalam āpnuyāt // Hbhv_3.359 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2356: hetu-niṣṭhaś ca pañcaite na tīrtha-phala-bhāginaḥ // Hbhv_3.360 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2363: nityāśuciḥ śucīndraḥ san sva-dharmaṃ vaktum arhati // Hbhv_4.1 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2367: jale devaṃ namaskṛtya tato gacched gṛhaṃ pumān /
GR14hbhvil_u:2368: pauruṣeṇa tu sūktena tato viṣṇuṃ samarcayet // Hbhv_4.3 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2371: kṛṣṇaṃ paśyan kīrtayaṃś ca dāsyenātmānam arpayet // Hbhv_4.4 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2372: śuddhaṃ gomayam ādāya tato mṛtsnāṃ jalaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2373: bhaktyā tat parito limped abhukṣec ca tad-aṅganam // Hbhv_4.5 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2381: gṛha-śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mahyaṃ dāsavad yad amāyayā // Hbhv_4.7 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2387: saṃmārjanaṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt puruṣaḥ keśavālaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:2388: rajas-tamobhyāṃ nirmuktaḥ sa bhaven nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.9 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2389: pāṃśūnāṃ yāvatāṃ rājan kuryāt saṃmārjanaṃ naraḥ
GR14hbhvil_u:2390: tāvanty abdāni sa sukhī nākam āsādya modate // Hbhv_4.10 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2395: śucir bhāgavataḥ śuddho hy aparādha-vivarjitaḥ // Hbhv_4.12 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2397: śāka-dvīpāt paribhraṣṭaḥ svarga-lokaṃ sa gacchati // Hbhv_4.13 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2398: nandanaṃ vanam āśritya modate cāpsaraiḥ saha /
GR14hbhvil_u:2400: sarva-saṅgāt parityajya mama lokaṃ tu gacchati // Hbhv_4.14 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2403: go-mayaṃ gṛhya vai bhūmiṃ mama veśmopalepayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:2404: yāvatas tu padāṃs tatra samantād upalepayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:2406: samīpe yadi vā dūre yaś cālayati gomayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2407: yāvat tasya padāgrāṇi tāvat svarge mahīyate // Hbhv_4.16 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2411: tasya dṛṣṭvānulepaṃ tu mama tuṣṭiḥ prajāyate // Hbhv_4.18 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2412: goś ca yasyāḥ purīṣeṇa kriyate bhūmi-lepanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2413: ekenaiva tu lepena go-yonyā vipramucyate // Hbhv_4.19 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2414: sthānopalepane bhūme salilaṃ yo dadāti me /
GR14hbhvil_u:2415: tasya puṇyaṃ mahā-bhāge śṛṇu tattvena niṣkalam // Hbhv_4.20 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2421: sarva-saṅgān parityajya mama lokaṃ ca gacchati // Hbhv_4.23 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2423: kṛtvopalepanaṃ viṣṇor naras tv āyatane sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2424: go-mayena śubhān lokān ayatnād eva gacchati // Hbhv_4.24 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2426: deva-rāmā-śataṃ nāke labhate satataṃ naraḥ // Hbhv_4.25 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2428: go-mayena mṛdā toyair yaḥ kuryād upalepanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2432: karoti bhavane viṣṇos tyājyaṃ teṣāṃ kula-trayam // Hbhv_4.27 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2435: abhyukṣaṇaṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt pānīyena surālaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:2436: sa śānta-tāpo bhavati nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Hbhv_4.28 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2437: abhyukṣaṇaṃ tu yaḥ kuryād deva-devājire naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2443: kuryāt sthānaṃ mahā-viṣṇoḥ sojjvalāṅgaṃ mudānvitaḥ // Hbhv_4.31 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2447: sarvaṃ tan-nāśam āpnoti maṇḍayitvā harer gṛham // Hbhv_4.32 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2448: aṇu-mātraṃ tu yaḥ kuryān maṇḍalaṃ keśavāgrataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2449: mṛdā dhātu-vikāraiś ca divi kalpa-śataṃ vaset // Hbhv_4.33 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2450: śālagrāma-śilāgre tu yaḥ kuryāt svastikaṃ śubham /
GR14hbhvil_u:2451: kārttike tu viśeṣeṇa punāty āsaptamaṃ kulam // Hbhv_4.34 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2452: maṇḍalaṃ kurute nityaṃ yā nārī keśavāgrataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2453: sapta-janmāni vaidhavyaṃ na prāpnoti kadācana // Hbhv_4.35 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2454: gṛhītvā go-mayaṃ yā tu maṇḍalaṃ keśavāgrataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2455: bhartur viyogaṃ nāpnoti santateś ca dhanasya ca // Hbhv_4.36 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2457: devasya kurute yas tu krīḍate bhuvana-traye // Hbhv_4.37 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2459: mṛdā dhātu-vikārair vā varṇakair gomayena vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2460: viṣṇu-loke'tha tatra rathaiḥ sa-spṛhaṃ vīkṣyate sukhī // Hbhv_4.38 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2463: viṣṇu-loke'tha tatrasthaiḥ sa-spṛhaṃ vīkṣyate sukhī // Hbhv_4.39 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2473: kṛṣṇaṃ dagdhair harid-yavair harit-pītair vimiśritam // Hbhv_4.42 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2476: vicitraṃ bhūṣayet tac ca bhagavad-bhaktimān naraḥ // Hbhv_4.43 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2478: dhvajam āropayed yas tu prāsādopari bhaktitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2479: tasya brahma-pade vāsaḥ krīḍate brahmaṇā saha // Hbhv_4.44 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2482: saṃpūjyate viriñcy-ādyaiḥ kim anyair bahu-bhāṣitaiḥ // Hbhv_4.45 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2484: paṭo dhvajasya viprendra yāvac calati vāyunā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2485: tāvanti pāpa-jālāni naśyanty eva na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.46 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2487: dhvajaṃ viṣṇu-gṛhe kṛtvā mucyate sarva-pātakaiḥ // Hbhv_4.47 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2491: evaṃ bṛhan-nāradīye khyātaṃ yac cānyad adbhutam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2495: kṛṣṇālayaṃ yaḥ kurute patākābhiś ca śobhitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2496: sadaiva tasya loke tu vāsas tasya na cānyataḥ // Hbhv_4.50 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2498: patākāṃ ca śubhāṃ dattvā tathā keśava-veśmani /
GR14hbhvil_u:2499: vāyu-lokam avāpnoti bahūn abda-gaṇān dvijaḥ // Hbhv_4.51 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2500: dodhūyate yathā sā tu vāyunā keśavālaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:2501: tathā tasyāpi sakalaṃ dehāt pāpaṃ vidhūyate // Hbhv_4.52 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2507: nandate cāpsaro-yuktaḥ svāgataṃ tasya deva-rāṭ // Hbhv_4.54 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2509: tatra tāmrādi-pātraṃ yat prabhor vastrādikaṃ ca yat /
GR14hbhvil_u:2510: pīṭhādikaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ yathoktaṃ ca viśodhayet // Hbhv_4.55 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2514: uṣṇāmbunā ca prakṣālya sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate // Hbhv_4.56 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2518: bhasmāmbubhiś ca kāmsyānāṃ śuddhiḥ plāvo dravasya ca // Hbhv_4.57 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2521: siddhārthakānāṃ kalkena tila-kalkena vā punaḥ // Hbhv_4.58 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2531: ity ayaṃ sarvato loke sadācāro virājate // Hbhv_4.62 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2537: kṣāreṇa śuddhiṃ kāṃsyasya lauhasya ca vinirdiśet // Hbhv_4.64 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2540: triḥ-sapta-mārjanāc chuddhir na tu kāṃsyasya tāpanam // Hbhv_4.65 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2543: āmiṣeṇa tu yal liptaṃ punar dāhena śudhyanti // Hbhv_4.66 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2546: prakṣeptavyāni tāny agnau yac ca yāvat sahed api // Hbhv_4.67 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2548: lohānāṃ dahanāc chuddhir bhasmanā gomayena vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2549: dahanāt khananād vāpi śailānām ambhasāpi vā // Hbhv_4.68 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2551: mṛṇ-mayānāṃ tu pātrāṇāṃ dahanāc chuddhir iṣyate // Hbhv_4.69 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2553: madyair mūtraiḥ purīṣair vā ṣṭhīvanaih pūyaśoṇitaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2554: saṃspṛṣṭaṃ naiva śuddhyeta punaḥpākena mṛn-mayam // Hbhv_4.70 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2556: saṃhatānāṃ tu pātrāṇāṃ yad ekam upahanyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:2560: tāntavaṃ malinaṃ pūrvam adbhiḥ kṣāraiś ca śodhayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:2561: aṃśubhiḥ śoṣayitvā vā vāyunā vā samāharet // Hbhv_4.72 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2565: dhānya-kalkaiḥ parṇa-kalkaiḥ rasaiś ca phala-balkalaiḥ // Hbhv_4.74 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2567: śodhayitvātape kiṃcit karair unmārjayen muhuḥ // Hbhv_4.75 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2568: paścāc ca vāriṇā prokṣya śucīty evam udāharet /
GR14hbhvil_u:2569: tāny apy atimalāktāni yathāvat pariśodhayet // Hbhv_4.76 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2574: kṛṣṇājinānāṃ vātaiś ca bālānāṃ mṛdbhir ambhasā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2578: go-bālaiḥ phala-pātrāṇām asthnāṃ syāc chṛṅgavat tathā // Hbhv_4.79 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2580: niryāsānāṃ guḍānāṃ ca lavaṇānāṃ tathaiva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:2582: prokṣaṇāt kathitā śuddhir ity āha bhagavān yamaḥ // Hbhv_4.80 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2584: adbhis tu prokṣaṇaṃ śaucaṃ bahūnāṃ dhānya-vāsasām /
GR14hbhvil_u:2585: prakṣālanena tv alpānām adbhiḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // Hbhv_4.81 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2588: prokṣaṇāt tṛṇa-kāṣṭhaṃ ca palālaṃ caiva śudhyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:2591: yāvan nāpaity amedhyāktād gandho lepaś ca tat-kṛtaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2592: tāvan mṛd-vāri cādeyaṃ sarvāsu dravyaśuddhiṣu // Hbhv_4.84 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2595: atiduṣṭasya tan-mātraṃ tyajec chittvā tu śuddhaye // Hbhv_4.85 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2600: āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ nāvaḥ panthās tṛṇāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:2608: bhāṇḍāni plāvayed adbhiḥ śāka-mūla-phalāni ca // Hbhv_4.89 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2612: tyaktvā tu dūṣitaṃ bhāgaṃ plāvyāny atha jalena tu // Hbhv_4.91 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2615: tan-mātram uddhṛtaṃ śudhyet kaṭhinaṃ tu payodadhi // Hbhv_4.92 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2616: avilīnaṃ tathā sarpir vilīnaṃ śrapaṇena tu /
GR14hbhvil_u:2617: ādhāra-doṣe tu nayet pātrāt pātrāntaraṃ dravam // Hbhv_4.93 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2618: ghṛtaṃ ca pāyasaṃ kṣīraṃ tathaikṣava-raso guḍaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2619: śūdra-bhāṇḍa-sthitaṃ takraṃ tathā madhu na duṣyati // Hbhv_4.94 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2621: ucchiṣṭena tu saṃspṛṣṭo dravya-hastaḥ kathaṃ cana /
GR14hbhvil_u:2622: anidhāyaiva tad dravyam ācāntaḥ śucitām iyāt // Hbhv_4.95 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2625: apekṣyā vaiṣṇavair jñeyās tat-tad-vistāraṇair alam // Hbhv_4.96 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2628: samāharet śrī-tulasīṃ puṣpādi ca yathoditam // Hbhv_4.97 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2630: snānaṃ kṛtvā tu ye kecit puṣpaṃ gṛhṇanti vai dvijāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2631: devatās tan na gṛhṇanti bhasmībhavati kāṣṭhavat // Hbhv_4.98 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2636: tat sarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ yāti pañcagavyena śudhyati // Hbhv_4.99 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2638: sva-gṛhe vācaran snānaṃ prakṣālyāṅghrī karau tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2639: ācamyāyamya ca prāṇān kṛta-nyāso hariṃ smaret // Hbhv_4.100 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2641: pūrṇe pātre samastāni tīrthāny āvāhayet kṛtī // Hbhv_4.101 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2643: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
GR14hbhvil_u:2644: narmade sindhu kāveri jale'smin sannidhiṃ kuru // Hbhv_4.102 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2649: nalinī nandinī sītā mālinī ca mahāpagā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2653: nandinīty eva te nāma vedeṣu nalinīti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:2654: dakṣā pṛthvī ca vihagā viśva-gāthā śiva-priyā // Hbhv_4.105 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2656: kṣemaṃkarī jāhnavī ca śāntā śānti-pradāyinī // Hbhv_4.106 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2657: athācamya guruṃ smṛtānujñāṃ prārthya ca pūrvavat /
GR14hbhvil_u:2658: kṛṣṇa-pādābjato gaṅgāṃ patantīṃ mūrdhni cintayet // Hbhv_4.107 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2671: tayā saṃkṣālayet sarvam antar-deha-gataṃ malam // Hbhv_4.112 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2673: idaṃ snānāntaraṃ māntrāt sahasram adhikaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_4.113 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2675: sakṛn nārāyaṇety ādi vacanaṃ tatra kīrtayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:2676: snāna-kāle tu tan-nāma saṃsmarec ca mahāprabhum // Hbhv_4.114 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2679: tasmān nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ snāna-kāle smared budhaḥ // Hbhv_4.115 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2682: tilais tailaiś ca saṃvarjya pratiṣiddha-dināni tu // Hbhv_4.116 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2686: tena santaḥ praśaṃsanti snānam uṣṇena vāriṇā // Hbhv_4.117 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2688: āpaḥ svayaṃ sadā pūtā vahni-taptā viśeṣataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2689: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu uṣṇāmbhaḥ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_4.118 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2692: śarīra-śuddhir vijñeyā na tu snāna-phalaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_4.119 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2696: kuryān naimittikaṃ snānaṃ śītādbhiḥ kāmyam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:2697: nityaṃ yādṛcchikaṃ caiva yathāruci samācaret // Hbhv_4.120 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2701: aspṛśya-sparśane caiva na snāyād uṣṇa-vāriṇā // Hbhv_4.121 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2703: paurṇamāsyāṃ tathā darśe yaḥ snāyād uṣṇa-vāriṇā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2704: sa gohatyā-kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ prāpnotīha na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.122 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2708: śrī-kāmaḥ sarvadā snānaṃ kurvītāmalakair naraḥ // Hbhv_4.123 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2709: saptamyāṃ na spṛśet tailaṃ nīlīvastraṃ na dhārayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:2710: na cāpy āmalakaṃ snāyān na kuryāt kalahaṃ naraḥ // Hbhv_4.124 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2712: amāṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ saptamīṃ ca navamīṃ ca trayodaśīm /
GR14hbhvil_u:2713: saṅkrāntau ravi-vāre ca snāna-mālakais tyajet // Hbhv_4.125 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2716: yaḥ snāyāt tasya hīyante tejaś cāyurdhanaṃ sutāḥ // Hbhv_4.126 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2719: sarva-kālaṃ tilaiḥ snānaṃ punar vyāso 'bravīn muniḥ // Hbhv_4.127 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2725: ṣaṣṭhyāṃ tailam anāyuṣyaṃ caturthīṣv api ca parvasu // Hbhv_4.129 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2727: daśamyāṃ tailam apṛṣṭvā yaḥ snāyād avicakṣaṇaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2728: catvāri tasya naśyanti āyuḥ prajñā yaśodhanam // Hbhv_4.130 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2729: mohāt pratipadaṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ kuhūṃ riktātithiṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2730: tailenābhyañjayed yas tu caturbhiḥ parihīyate // Hbhv_4.131 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2732: dvādaśyāṃ saptamīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ taila-sparśaṃ vivarjayet // Hbhv_4.132 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2734: saptamyāṃ na spṛśet tailaṃ navamyāṃ pratipady api /
GR14hbhvil_u:2735: aṣṭamyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃm amāvasyāṃ viśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_4.133 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2737: snāne vā yadi vāsnāne pakka-tailaṃ na duṣyati // Hbhv_4.134 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2741: athāṅgam alam uttārya snātvā vidhivad ācaret /
GR14hbhvil_u:2747: mārjayaty abhiṣeke tu tulasyā vaiṣṇavo naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2748: sarva-tīrtha-mayaṃ dehaṃ tat-kṣaṇāt dvija jāyate // Hbhv_4.138 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2750: mucyate sarva-pāpebhyo yadyapi brahmahā bhavet // Hbhv_4.139 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2754: yo vahec chirasā nityaṃ dhṛtā bhavati jāhnavī // Hbhv_4.141 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2759: śaṅkhe kṛtvā tu nikṣiptaṃ snānārthaṃ tāmra-bhājane /
GR14hbhvil_u:2766: adhautaṃ kāru-dhautaṃ vā paredyu-dhautam eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2767: kāṣāyaṃ malinaṃ vastraṃ kaupīnaṃ ca parityajet // Hbhv_4.145 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2768: na cārdram eva vasanaṃ paridadhyāt kadācana // Hbhv_4.146 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2769: nagno malina-vastraḥ syāt nagnaś cārdha-paṭas tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2770: nagno dviguṇa-vastraḥ syān nagno rakta-paṭas tathā // Hbhv_4.147 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2771: nagnaś ca syūta-vastraḥ syān nagnaḥ snigdha-paṭas tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2772: dvikaccho 'nuttarīyaś ca nagnaś cāvastra eva ca // Hbhv_4.148 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2773: śrautaṃ smārtaṃ tathā karma na nagnaś cintayed api /
GR14hbhvil_u:2774: mohāt kurvann adho gacchet tad bhaved āsuraṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_4.149 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2776: alaṅkṛtaḥ śucir maunī śrāddhādau ca jitendriyaḥ // Hbhv_4.150 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2778: eka-vastro na bhuñjīta na kuryād devanārcanam // Hbhv_4.151 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2780: śukla-vāso bhaven nityaṃ raktaṃ caiva vivarjayet // Hbhv_4.152 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2783: retaḥ-spṛṣṭaṃ śava-spṛṣṭam āvikaṃ naiva duṣyati // Hbhv_4.153 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2785: chinnaṃ vā sandhitaṃ dagdhm āvikaṃ na praduṣyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:2786: āvikena tu vastreṇa mānavaḥ śrāddham ācaret /
GR14hbhvil_u:2787: gayā-śrāddha-samaṃ proktaṃ pitṛbhyo dattam akṣayam // Hbhv_4.154 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2788: na kuryāt sandhitaṃ vastraṃ deva-karmaṇi bhūmipa /
GR14hbhvil_u:2789: na dagdhaṃ na ca vai chinnaṃ pārakyaṃ na tu dhārayet // Hbhv_4.155 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2790: kāka-viṣṭhā-samaṃ hy uktam avidhautaṃ ca yad bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:2791: rajakād āhṛtaṃ yac ca na tad vastraṃ bhavec chuci // Hbhv_4.156 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2792: kīṭa-spṛṣṭaṃ tu yad vastraṃ purīṣaṃ yena kāritam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2793: mūtraṃ vā maithunaṃ vāpi tad vastraṃ parivarjayet // Hbhv_4.157 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2794: āvikaṃ tu sadā vastraṃ pavitraṃ rāja-sattama /
GR14hbhvil_u:2798: agnir āvika-vastraṃ ca brahmaṇāś ca tathā kuśāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2799: caturṇāṃ na kṛto doṣo brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā // Hbhv_4.160 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2805: yatīnām āsanaṃ śuklaṃ kūrmākāraṃ tu kārayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:2806: anyeṣāṃ tu catuṣpādaṃ caturasraṃ tu kārayet // Hbhv_4.162 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2808: loha-baddhaṃ sadaivārkaṃ varjayed āsanaṃ budhaḥ // Hbhv_4.163 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2812: prauḍha-pādo na kurvīta svādhyāyaṃ caiva tarpaṇam // Hbhv_4.164 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2814: kṛtāvaskthiko yas tu prauḍha-pādaḥ sa ucyate // Hbhv_4.165 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2819: nirmālyena prasādena sarvāṇy aṅgāni mārjayet // Hbhv_4.167 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2829: vakṣaḥ-sthale mādhavaṃ tu govindaṃ kaṇṭha-kūpake // Hbhv_4.170 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2830: viṣṇuṃ ca dakṣiṇe kukṣau bāhau ca madhusūdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2831: trivikramaṃ kandhare tu vāmanaṃ vāma-pārśvake // Hbhv_4.171 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2832: śrīdharaṃ vāma-bāhau tu hṛṣīkeśaṃ tu kandhare /
GR14hbhvil_u:2833: pṛṣṭhe tu padmanābhaṃ ca kaṭyāṃ dāmodaraṃ nyaset // Hbhv_4.172 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2836: ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ lalāṭe tu sarveṣāṃ prathamaṃ smṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2840: nyaset kirīṭa-mantraṃ ca mūrdhni sarvārtha-siddhaye // Hbhv_4.175 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2850: mad-bhakto dhārayen nityam ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ bhayāpaham // Hbhv_4.177 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2852: yajño dānaṃ tapo homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛ-tarpaṇam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2853: vyarthaṃ bhavati tat sarvam ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ vinā kṛtam // Hbhv_4.178 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2855: ūrdhva-puṇḍrair vihīnas tu kiṃcit karma karoti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2856: iṣṭāpūrtādikaṃ sarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ syān na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.179 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2858: tat sarvaṃ rākṣasaṃ nityaṃ narakaṃ cādhigacchati // Hbhv_4.180 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2861: bhaṅktvā viṣṇu-gṛhaṃ puṇḍraṃ sa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam // Hbhv_4.181 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2863: yac charīraṃ manuṣyāṇām ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ vinā kṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:2864: draṣṭavyaṃ naiva tat tāvat śmaśāna-sadṛśaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_4.182 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2866: ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ mṛdā saumyaṃ lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:2867: sa cāṇḍālo 'pi śuddhātmā pūjya eva na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.183 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2869: tiryak-puṇḍraṃ na kurvīta samprāpte maraṇe'pi ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:2870: naivānyan nāma ca brūyāt pumān nārārāyaṇād ṛte // Hbhv_4.184 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2874: yasyordhva-puṇḍraṃ dṛśyeta lalāṭe no narasya hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:2875: tad-darśanaṃ na kartavyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sūryaṃ nirīkṣayet // Hbhv_4.186 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2878: anyeṣāṃ tu tri-puṇḍraṃ syād iti brahma-vido viduḥ // Hbhv_4.187 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2879: tripuṇḍraṃ yasya viprasya ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ na dṛśyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:2880: taṃ spṛṣṭvāpy athavā dṛṣṭvā sa-celaṃ snānam ācaret // Hbhv_4.188 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2882: kṛta-tri-puṇḍra-martyasya kriyā na prītaye hareḥ // Hbhv_4.189 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2888: ūrdhva-puṇḍro mṛdā śubhro lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:2889: caṇḍālo 'pi viśuddhātmā yāti braham sanātanam // Hbhv_4.191 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2890: ūrdhva-puṇḍre sthitā lakṣmīr ūrdhva-puṇḍre sthitaṃ yaśaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2891: ūrdhva-puṇḍre sthitā muktir ūrdhva-puṇḍre sthito hariḥ // Hbhv_4.192 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2893: ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ mudā saumyaṃ lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:2894: sa cāṇḍālo 'pi śuddhātmā pūjya eva na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.193 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2897: lakṣmyā sārdhaṃ samāsīno deva-devo janārdanaḥ // Hbhv_4.194 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2898: tasmād yasya śarīre tu ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ dhṛto bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:2899: tasya dehaṃ bhagavato vimalaṃ mandiraṃ śubham // Hbhv_4.195 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2901: vimāna-varam āruhya yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // Hbhv_4.196 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2905: ākalpa-koṭi-pitaras tasya tṛptā na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.198 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2906: ūrdhva-puṇḍra-dharo yas tu kuryāc chrāddhaṃ śubhānane /
GR14hbhvil_u:2909: ūrdhva-puṇḍra-dharaḥ kuryāt tasya puṇyam anantakam // Hbhv_4.200 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2911: aśucir vāpya nācāro manasā pāpam ācaran /
GR14hbhvil_u:2912: śucir eva bhaven nityam ūrdhva-puṇḍrāṅkito naraḥ // Hbhv_4.201 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2915: śvapāko 'pi vimānastho mama loke mahīyate // Hbhv_4.202 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2917: tadā viṃśat-kulaṃ tasya narakād uddharāmy ahaṃ // Hbhv_4.203 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2920: vīkṣyādarśe jale vāpi yo vidadhyāt prayatnataḥ /

GR14hbhvil_u:2923: navāṅgulaṃ madhyamaṃ syād aṣṭāṅgulam ataḥ param // Hbhv_4.205 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2924: etair aṅguli-bhedais tu kārayen na nakhaiḥ spṛśet // Hbhv_4.206 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2928: śyāmaṃ śānti-karaṃ proktaṃ raktaṃ vaśya-karaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:2929: śrī-karaṃ pītam ity āhuḥ śvetaṃ mokṣa-karaṃ śubham // Hbhv_4.208 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2930: vartulaṃ tiryag achidraṃ hrasvaṃ dīrghaṃ tataṃ tanum /

GR14hbhvil_u:2933: vigandham avasahyaṃ ca puṇḍram āhur anarthakam // Hbhv_4.210 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2935: nāsikāyās trayo bhāgā nāsā-mūlaṃ pracakṣyate // Hbhv_4.211 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2936: samārabhya bhruvor madhyam antarālaṃ prakalpayet // Hbhv_4.212 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2939: sa hi tatra sthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ śriyaṃ caiva vyapohati // Hbhv_4.213 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2940: acchidram ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ tu ye kurvanti dvijādhamāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2941: teṣāṃ lalāṭe satataṃ śunaḥ pādo na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.214 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2943: viprāṇāṃ satataṃ kāryaṃ strīṇāṃ ca śubha-darśane // Hbhv_4.215 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2946: madhye chidra-samāyuktaṃ tad vidyād harimandiram // Hbhv_4.216 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2947: vāma-pārśve sthito brahmā dakṣiṇe ca sadā-śivaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2948: madhye viṣṇuṃ vijānīyāt tasmān madhyaṃ na lepayet // Hbhv_4.217 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2950: adhṛtvā cordhva-puṇḍraṃ ca hareḥ pūjāṃ karoti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2951: tiryak-puṇḍra-dharo yas tu yajed devaṃ janārdanam // Hbhv_4.218 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2953: adhṛtvā śaṅkha-cakre ca cety ādinā doṣa uktaḥ // Hbhv_4.219 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2956: sa parasya priyo bhavati sa puṇyavān /
GR14hbhvil_u:2958: yo dhārayati sa muktibhāg bhavati // Hbhv_4.220 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2963: aṅguṣṭhaḥ puṣṭidaḥ proktas tarjanī mokṣa-dāyinī // Hbhv_4.221 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2967: sindhu-tīre ca valmīke hari-kṣetre viśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_4.222 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2969: puṇḍrāṇāṃ dhāraṇārthāya gṛhṇīyāt tatra mṛttikām // Hbhv_4.223 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2970: śrī-raṅge veṅkaṭādrau ca śrī-kūrme dvārake śubhe /
GR14hbhvil_u:2973: dhṛtvā puṇḍrāṇi cāṅgeṣu viṣṇu-sāyujyam āpnuyāt // Hbhv_4.225 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2975: yat tu divyaṃ hari-kṣetre tasyaiva mṛdam āharet // Hbhv_4.226 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2977: brahmaghno vātha go-ghno vā haitukaḥ sarva-pāpa-kṛt /
GR14hbhvil_u:2979: gopī-candana-khaṇḍaṃ tu yo dadātii hi vaiṣṇave /
GR14hbhvil_u:2980: kulam ekottaraṃ tena sambhavet tāritaṃ śatam // Hbhv_4.228 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2983: gopī-candana-liptāṅgo dṛṣṭaś cet tad aghaṃ kṛtaḥ // Hbhv_4.229 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2985: gṛhe'pi yasya pañcaite tasya pāpa-bhayaṃ kutaḥ // Hbhv_4.230 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2987: śrīkhaṇḍe kva sa āmodaḥ svarovarṇaḥ kva tādṛśaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:2988: tat pāvitryaṃ kva vai tīrthe śrī-gopī-candane yathā // Hbhv_4.231 //
GR14hbhvil_u:2998: prāpnoti tat karma-phalaṃ sadā kṣayam // Hbhv_4.233 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3000: nityaṃ dhārayate yadi dvija-pate rātrau divā sarvadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3001: yat puṇyaṃ kuru-jāṅgale ravi-grahe mādhyāṃ prayāge tathā
GR14hbhvil_u:3002: tat prāpnoti khagendra viṣṇu-sadane santiṣṭhate devavat // Hbhv_4.234 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3010: yamaṃ na paśyed yadi pāpa-saṃvṛtaḥ // Hbhv_4.236 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3015: grahā na pīḍanti na rakṣasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GR14hbhvil_u:3021: lalāṭe yaiḥ kṛtaṃ nityaṃ gopī-candana-puṇḍrakam // Hbhv_4.239 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3024: jvalad-indhanavat so 'pi tyājyo dūre prayatnataḥ // Hbhv_4.240 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3027: tatraiva vaiṣṇavaiḥ kāryam ūrdhva-puṇḍraṃ manoharam // Hbhv_4.241 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3029: tan-mṛdaṃ gṛhya yaiḥ puṇḍraṃ lalāṭe dhāritaṃ naraiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3030: pramāṇakaṃ kṛtaṃ tais tu mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // Hbhv_4.242 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3033: dehaṃ na spṛśati pāpaṃ kriyamāṇas tu nārada // Hbhv_4.243 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3036: tasyāvalokanāt pāpaṃ yāti varṣa-kṛtaṃ nṛṇām // Hbhv_4.244 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3039: tathaiva dhāryam evaṃ hi trividhaṃ tilakaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_4.245 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3040: tato nārāyaṇīṃ mudrāṃ dhārayet prītaye hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3045: samarcayed dhariṃ nityaṃ nānyathā pūjanaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_4.247 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3048: gardabhaṃ tu samāropya rājā rāṣṭrāt pravāsayet // Hbhv_4.248 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3054: rahitaḥ sarva-dharmebhyaḥ pracyuto narakaṃ vrajet // Hbhv_4.250 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3067: kṛṣṇāyudhāṅkitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sammānaṃ na karoti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3072: sa yāti viṣṇu-lokaṃ vai dāha-pralaya-varjitam // Hbhv_4.254 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3075: pāpa-koṭi-yuktasya tasya kiṃ kurute yamaḥ // Hbhv_4.255 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3076: śaṅkhoddhāre tu yat proktaṃ vasatāṃ varṣa-koṭibhiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3077: tat phalaṃ likhite śaṅkhe pratyahaṃ dakṣiṇe bhuje // Hbhv_4.256 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3079: śaṅkhopari kṛte padme tat phalaṃ samavāpnuyāt // Hbhv_4.257 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3080: vāme bhuje gadā yasya likhitā dṛśyate kalau /
GR14hbhvil_u:3081: gadādharo gayā-puṇyaṃ pratyahaṃ tasya yacchati // Hbhv_4.258 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3083: gadādhollikhite cakre tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇa-darśane // Hbhv_4.259 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3085: yaḥ punaḥ kali-kāle tu mat-purī-sambhavāṃ mṛdam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3086: matsya-kūrmādikāṃ cihnaṃ gṛhītvā kurute naraḥ // Hbhv_4.260 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3088: tasya me nāntaraṃ kiṃcit kartavyaṃ śreya icchatā // Hbhv_4.261 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3090: martyair martyo na vijñeyaḥ sa nūnaṃ māmakī tanūḥ // Hbhv_4.262 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3091: pāpaṃ sukṛta-rūpaṃ tu jāyate tasya dehinaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3092: mamāyudhāni tasyāṅge likhitāni kalau yuge // Hbhv_4.263 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3094: kūrmayāpi svakaṃ tejo nikṣiptaṃ tasya vigrahe // Hbhv_4.264 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3095: śaṅkhaṃ ca padmaṃ ca gadāṃ rathāṅgaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:3101: adṛśyaṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ śatrūṇāṃ rakṣasām api // Hbhv_4.266 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3103: nityaṃ tasya vased dehe yasya śaṅkhāṅkitā tanuḥ // Hbhv_4.267 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3104: gaṅgā gayā kurukṣetraṃ prayāgaṃ puṣkarādi ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:3105: nityaṃ tasya sadā tiṣṭhed yasya padāṅkitaṃ vapuḥ // Hbhv_4.268 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3108: savye kare gadādhastad rathāṅgaṃ tiṣṭhate yadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:3109: kṛṣṇena sahitaṃ tatra trailokyaṃ sa-carācaram // Hbhv_4.270 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3110: trayo 'gnayas trayo devā viṣṇos trīṇi padāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:3111: nivasanti sadā yasya yasya dehe sudarśanam // Hbhv_4.271 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3114: ūrdhva-lokādhikārī ca sa jñeyas tridaśāṃ patiḥ // Hbhv_4.272 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3115: kṛṣṇa-mudrā-prayuktas tu daivaṃ pitryaṃ karoti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3116: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ pratyahaṃ cākṣayaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_4.273 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3117: pīḍayanti na tatraiva grahā ṛkṣāṇi rāśayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3118: aṣṭākṣarāṅkitā mudrā yasya dhātumayī kare // Hbhv_4.274 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3121: prayāgādiṣu tīrtheṣu sa gatvā kiṃ kariṣyati // Hbhv_4.275 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3123: tadā tasya jagat-svāmī tuṣṭo harati pātakam // Hbhv_4.276 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3124: bhavate yasya dehe tu aho-rātraṃ dine dine /
GR14hbhvil_u:3127: kurute puṇya-karmāṇi meru-tulyāni tāni vai // Hbhv_4.278 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3128: śaṅkhādināṅkito bhaktyā śrāddhaṃ yaḥ kurute dvija /
GR14hbhvil_u:3129: vidhi-hīnaṃ tu sampūrṇaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tu gayā-samam // Hbhv_4.279 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3130: yathāgnir dahate kāṣṭhaṃ vāyunā prerito bhṛśam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3131: tathā dahyanti pāpāni dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇāyudhāni vai // Hbhv_4.280 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3135: dhatte bhāgavato yas tu kalikāle viśeṣataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3136: prahlādasya samo kṣeyo nānyathā kala-vallabha // Hbhv_4.282 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3138: śaṅkhāṅkita-tanur vipro bhuṅkte yasya ca veśmani /
GR14hbhvil_u:3139: tad-annaṃ svayam aśnāti pitṛbhiḥ saha keśavaḥ // Hbhv_4.283 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3140: kṛṣṇāyudhāṅkito yas tu śmaśāne mriyate yadi /

GR14hbhvil_u:3142: kṛṣṇāyudhaiḥ kalau nityaṃ maṇḍitaṃ yasya vigraham /
GR14hbhvil_u:3144: yaḥ karoti hareḥ pūjāṃ kṛṣṇa-śastrāṅkito naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3146: kṛtvā kāṣṭha-mayaṃ bimbaṃ kṛṣṇa-śastrais tu cihnitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3147: yo hy aṅkayati cātmānaṃ tat-samo nāsti vaiṣṇavaḥ // Hbhv_4.287 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3149: na lipyate kali-kṛtaiḥ kṛṣṇa-śastrāṅkito naraḥ // Hbhv_4.288 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3153: dhṛtā nārāyaṇī mudrā prahlādena purā kṛte /
GR14hbhvil_u:3154: vibhīṣaṇena balinā dhruveṇa ca śukena ca // Hbhv_4.290 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3157: ārādhya keśavāt prāptaṃ samīhita-phalaṃ mahat // Hbhv_4.291 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3160: śaṅkha-padmādi-cakraṃ vā tasya dehe vased dhariḥ // Hbhv_4.292 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3165: āyudhāni ca viprasya mat-samaḥ sa ca vaiṣṇavaḥ // Hbhv_4.294 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3167: yasya nārāyaṇī mudrā dehe śaṅkhādi cihnitā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3169: praveśo nāsti pāpasya kavacaṃ tasya vaiṣṇavam // Hbhv_4.295 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3175: cakraṃ ca dakṣiṇe bāhau śaṅkhaṃ vāme'pi dakṣiṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:3176: gadāṃ vāme gadādhastāt punaś cakraṃ ca dhārayet // Hbhv_4.297 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3177: śaṅkhopari tathā padmaṃ punaḥ padmaṃ ca dakṣiṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:3178: khaḍgaṃ vakṣasi cāpaṃ ca sa-śaraṃ śīrṣṇi dhārayet // Hbhv_4.298 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3179: iti pañcāyudhāny ādau dhārayed vaiṣṇavo janaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3180: matsyaṃ ca dakṣiṇe haste kūrmaṃ vāma-kare tathā // Hbhv_4.299 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3182: dakṣiṇe tu bhuje vipro vibhṛṣād vai sudarśanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3183: matsyaṃ padmaṃ cāpare'tha śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ gadās tathā // Hbhv_4.300 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3187: bhaktyā nijeṣṭa-devasya dhārayel lakṣaṇāny api // Hbhv_4.302 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3188: cakra-śaṅkhau ca dhāryate saṃmiśrāv eva kaiścana // Hbhv_4.303 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3190: dhārayec chayanādau tu taptāni kila tāni hi // Hbhv_4.304 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3193: cakraṃ syād dakṣiṇāvartaṃ śaṅkhaṃ ca śrī-hareḥ smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_4.305 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3198: padmākṣais tulasī-kāṣṭhaiḥ phalair dhātryāś ca nirmitāḥ // Hbhv_4.307 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3200: mastake karṇayor bāhvoḥ karayoś ca yathā-ruci // Hbhv_4.308 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3204: mālāṃ paścāt svayaṃ dhatte sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ // Hbhv_4.309 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3206: mālāṃ dhatte svayaṃ mūḍhaḥ sa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam // Hbhv_4.310 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3208: gāyatryā cāṣta kṛtvā vai mantritāṃ dhūpayec ca tām /
GR14hbhvil_u:3209: vidhivat parayā bhaktyā sadyo-jātena pūjayet // Hbhv_4.311 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3211: bibharmi tvām ahaṃ kaṇṭhe kuru māṃ kṛṣṇa-vallabham // Hbhv_4.312 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3212: yathā tvaṃ vallabhā viṣṇor nityaṃ viṣṇu-jana-priyā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3213: tathā māṃ kuru deveśi nityaṃ viṣṇu-jana-priyam // Hbhv_4.313 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3214: dāne lā-dhātur uddiṣṭo lāsi māṃ hari-vallabhe /
GR14hbhvil_u:3215: bhaktebhyaś ca samastebhyas tena mālā nigadyase // Hbhv_4.314 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3217: dhārayed vaiṣṇavo yo vai sa gacched vaiṣṇavaṃ padam // Hbhv_4.315 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3219: dhātrī-phala-kṛtāṃ mālāṃ kaṇṭhasthāṃ yo vahen na hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:3220: vaiṣṇavo na sa vijñeyo viṣṇu-pūjā-rato yadi // Hbhv_4.316 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3222: dhārayanti na ye mālāṃ haitukāḥ pāpa-buddhayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3223: narakān na nivartante dagdhāḥ kopāgninā hareḥ // Hbhv_4.317 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3230: yad yat karoti tat sarvam ananta-phaladaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_4.319 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3235: te vaiṣṇavā bhuvanam āśu pavitrayanti // Hbhv_4.320 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3237: bhuja-yugam api cihnair aṅkitaṃ yasya viṣṇoḥ
GR14hbhvil_u:3239: ṛjutaram api puṇḍraṃ mastake yasya kaṇṭhe
GR14hbhvil_u:3242: tulasī-kāṣṭha-mālāṃ ca kaṇṭha-sthāṃ vahate tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3243: apy aśauco 'py anācāro mām evaiti na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.322 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3246: dṛśyate yasya dehe tu sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ // Hbhv_4.323 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3247: tulasī-dalajāṃ mālāṃ kaṇṭhasthāṃ vahate tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3248: viṣṇūttīrṇā viśeṣeṇa sa namasyo divaukasām // Hbhv_4.324 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3250: dadāti pāpināṃ muktiṃ kiṃ punar viṣṇu-sevinām // Hbhv_4.325 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3252: yaḥ punas tulasī-mālāṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhe janārdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3253: pūjayet puṇyam āpnoti pratipuṣpaṃ gavāyutam // Hbhv_4.326 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3254: yāval luṭhati kaṇṭha-sthā dhātrī-mālā narasya hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:3255: tāvat tasya śarīre tu prītyā luṭhati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_4.327 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3256: spṛśec ca yāni lomāni dhātrī-mālā kalau nṛṇām /
GR14hbhvil_u:3258: yāvad dināni vahate dhātrī-mālāṃ kalau naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3261: vahate kaṇṭha-deśe tu kalpa-koṭi-ṃ divaṃ vaset // Hbhv_4.330 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3263: tulasī-dalajāṃ mālāṃ kṛṣṇottīrṇā vahet tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3264: patre patre'śvamedhānāṃ daśānāṃ labhate phalam // Hbhv_4.331 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3266: phalaṃ yacchati daitāriḥ pratyahaṃ dvārakodbhavam // Hbhv_4.332 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3268: vahate yo naro bhaktyā tasya vai nāsti pātakam // Hbhv_4.333 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3271: prāyaścittaṃ na tasyāsti nāśaucaṃ tasya vigrahe // Hbhv_4.334 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3273: bāhvoḥ kare ca martyasya dehe tasya sadā hariḥ // Hbhv_4.335 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3275: pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca kṛtaṃ koṭi-guṇaṃ kalau // Hbhv_4.336 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3277: dṛṣṭvā naśyanti dūreṇa vātoddhūtaṃ yathā dalam // Hbhv_4.337 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3279: duḥsvapnaṃ durnimittaṃ ca na bhayaṃ śastrajaṃ kvacit // Hbhv_4.338 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3284: pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca vaiṣṇavais tu samaṃ matam // Hbhv_4.340 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3286: gṛhe tv eka-guṇā sandhyā goṣṭhe daśa-guṇā smṛtā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3289: pūjayiṣyaṃs tataḥ kṛṣṇam ādau sannihitaṃ gurum /
GR14hbhvil_u:3290: praṇamya pūjayed bhaktyā dattvā kiṃcid upāayanam // Hbhv_4.342 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3292: rikta-pāṇir na paśyeta rājānaṃ bhiṣajaṃ gurum /
GR14hbhvil_u:3293: nopāyana-karaḥ putraṃ śiṣyaṃ bhṛtyaṃ nirīkṣayet // Hbhv_4.343 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3295: prathamaṃ tu guruṃ pūjya tataś caiva mamārcanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3296: kurvan siddhim avāpnoti hy anyathā niṣphalaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_4.344 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3298: gurau sannihite yas tu pūjayed anyam agrataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3299: sa durgatim avāpnoti pūjanaṃ tasya niṣphalam // Hbhv_4.345 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3301: yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ yathā deve tathā gurau /
GR14hbhvil_u:3302: tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ // Hbhv_4.346 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3311: martyāsad-dhīḥ śrutaṃ tasya sarvaṃ kuñjara-śaucavat // Hbhv_4.349 //
