GR14hbhvil_u:3314: yan no 'tītya vrajed viṣṇuṃ śiṣyo bhaktyā gurau dhruvan // Hbhv_4.350 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3316: ajño bhavati vai bālaḥ pitā bhavati mantradaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3317: ajñaṃ hi bālam ity āhuḥ pitety eva tu mantradam // Hbhv_4.351 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3319: gurur brahmā gurur viṣṇur gurur devo maheśvaraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3320: gurur eva paraṃ brahma tasmāt sampūjayet sadā // Hbhv_4.352 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3322: yo mantraḥ sa guruḥ sākṣāt yo guruḥ sa hariḥ smṛtaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3323: gurur yasya bhavet tuṣṭas tasya tuṣṭo hariḥ svayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3324: guroḥ samāsane naiva na caivoccāsane vaset // Hbhv_4.353 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3327: abhedenārcayet yas tu sa mukti-phalam āpnuyāt // Hbhv_4.354 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3330: tasmād dharmāt paro dharmaḥ pavitraṃ naiva vidyate // Hbhv_4.355 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3332: etat sarvaṃ gurau bhaktyā puruṣo hy añjasā jayet // Hbhv_4.356 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3335: bhavanty atithayo loke brahmaṇas te viśāṃ vara // Hbhv_4.357 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3337: bhaktir yathā harau me'sti tadvan niṣṭhā gurau yadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:3338: mamāsti tena satyena svaṃ darśayatu me hariḥ // Hbhv_4.358 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3340: avidyo vā sa-vidyo vā gurur eva janārdanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3341: mārgastho vāpy amārga-stho gurur eva sadā gatiḥ // Hbhv_4.359 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3343: harau ruṣṭe gurus trātā gurau ruṣṭe na kaścana /
GR14hbhvil_u:3344: tasmāt sarva-prayatnena gurum eva prasādayet // Hbhv_4.360 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3346: api ghnantaḥ śapanto vā viruddhā api ye krudhāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3347: guravaḥ pūjanīyās te gṛhaṃ natvā nayeta tān // Hbhv_4.361 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3348: tat ślāghyaṃ janma dhanyaṃ tat dinaṃ puṇyātha naḍikā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3349: yasyāṃ guruṃ praṇamate samupāsya tu bhaktitaḥ // Hbhv_4.362 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3351: tān mṛtān api kravyādāḥ kṛtaghnān nopabhuñjate // Hbhv_4.363 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3353: gurur yena parityaktas tena tyaktaḥ purā hariḥ // Hbhv_4.364 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3355: pratipadya guruṃ yas tu mohād vipratipadyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:3356: sa kalpa-koṭiṃ narake pacyate puruṣādhamaḥ // Hbhv_4.365 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3359: punaś ca vidhinā samyag grāhayed vaiṣṇavād guroḥ // Hbhv_4.366 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3361: ye gurv-ājñāṃ na kurvanti pāpiṣṭhāḥ puruṣādhamāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3363: yaiḥ śiṣyaiḥ śaśvad ārādhyā guravo hy avamānitāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3365: adhikṣipya guruṃ mohāt paruṣaṃ pravadanti ye /
GR14hbhvil_u:3366: śūkaratvaṃ bhavaty eva teṣāṃ janma-śateṣv api // Hbhv_4.369 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3368: teṣāṃ ca yāvat sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ syān na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_4.370 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3369: ataḥ prāg gurum abhyarcya kṛṣṇa-bhāvena buddhimān /
GR14hbhvil_u:3370: try-avarān asamān kuryāt praṇāmān daṇḍa-pātavat // Hbhv_4.371 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3373: savyena savyaḥ spraṣṭavyo dakṣiṇena tu dakṣiṇaḥ // Hbhv_4.372 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3376: prāk saṃskṛtaṃ harer gehaṃ pravekṣyan pāduke tyajet // Hbhv_4.373 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3379: jape bhojana-kāle ca pāduke parivarjayet // Hbhv_4.374 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3382: prakṣālya hastau pādau ca dvi-rācamanam ācaret // Hbhv_4.375 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3385: kurvīta samyag ācamya tadvad eva bhuji-kriyām // Hbhv_4.376 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3400: vidhy-anukramo vā sa evārṇavas tam ** HbhvC_5.1 **
GR14hbhvil_u:3403: sanātanaḥ: aṣṭādaśākṣara-mantreṇa yo 'rcā-vidhiḥ pūjā-prakāraḥ sa likhyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:3407: gūḍho 'pi krama-dīpikayā śrī-keśavācārya-viracitayā īkṣitaḥ darśitaḥ san /
GR14hbhvil_u:3408: ataḥ krama-dīpikoktānusāreṇa lekhya iti bhāvaḥ ** HbhvC_5.2 **
GR14hbhvil_u:3410: sadaiva pūjyo 'to lekhyaḥ prāya āgamiko vidhiḥ // Hbhv_5.3 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3413: dvāpare tu purāṇoktaḥ kalāv āgama-sambhavaḥ // Hbhv_5.4 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3415: teṣām āgama-mārgeṇa śuddhir na śrauta-vartmanā // Hbhv_5.5 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3416: sanātanaḥ: teṣām āgama-mārgeṇa śrauta-vartmanety anena tair api āgamika-vidhinaiva pūjā kāryeti bhāvaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3417: tathā caikādaśa-skandhe [BhP 11.5.61] nānā-tantra-vidhānena kalāv api tathā śṛṇu iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:3418: tatra śrīdhara-svāmi-pādāḥ-nānā-tantra-vidhāneneti kalau tantra-mārgasya prādhānyaṃ darśayati iti ** HbhvC_5.3-5 **
GR14hbhvil_u:3421: gandha-puṣpair arcayet tān yathā-sthānaṃ yathā-kramam // Hbhv_5.6 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3423: praṇavādi-caturthy-antaṃ deva-nāma namo 'ntakam ity agre lekhyatvād atraivaṃ prayogaḥ-śrī-kṛṣṇa-dvāra-devatābhyo namaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3424: anena mantreṇa pādyārdhyādikaṃ dattvā gandhādibhiḥ punar viśeṣeṇa pūjayed ity arthaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3425: evam agre'pi sa-parivārebhyaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-pārṣadebhyo namaḥ ity ādi prayogo draṣṭavyaḥ ** HbhvC_5.6 **
GR14hbhvil_u:3427: tad-agre garuḍaṃ dvārasyordhve dvāra-śriyaṃ yajet // Hbhv_5.7 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3429: dvāre ca dakṣiṇe dhātṛ-vidhātārau ca paścime // Hbhv_5.8 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3430: jayaṃ ca vijayaṃ caiva balaṃ prabalam uttare /
GR14hbhvil_u:3431: dvandva-śastv evam abhyarcya dehalyāṃ vāstu-puruṣam // Hbhv_5.9 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3432: sanātanaḥ: evaṃ sāmānyena sarveṣām eva pūjā-vidhir likhitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3433: idānīṃ yathā-sthānaṃ yathā-kramam iti yal likhitaṃ,
GR14hbhvil_u:3434: tad eva vivicya likhati-dvārāgra iti dvārābhyām /
GR14hbhvil_u:3435: tatrāpy ādau dvārasyāgre yat bhū-rūpaṃ pīṭhaṃ,
GR14hbhvil_u:3438: yadyapi dvāra-śriyo 'rcanaṃ prabalārcanānantaram eva krama-dīpikāyām uktam,
GR14hbhvil_u:3439: tathāpi iṣṭveti kṭvā-pratyayena caṇḍādi-pūjātaḥ pūrva-kāla eveti bodhitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3441: kiṃ ca, dvandva ity agre likhanāt,
GR14hbhvil_u:3442: caṇḍa-pracaṇḍābhyāṃ namaḥ ity evaṃ yugmatvena prayogo jñeyaḥ ** HbhvC_5.7-9 **
GR14hbhvil_u:3444: tat-pārśvayoḥ śaṅkha-nidhiṃ tathā padma-nidhiṃ yajet // Hbhv_5.10 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3445: sanātanaḥ: dvārasyāntaḥ abhyantare tat-pārśva-dvaye tayor gaṅgā-yamunayoḥ pārśva-dvaye ** HbhvC_5.10 **
GR14hbhvil_u:3447: vāṇīṃ vāyavya aiśāne kṣetrapālaṃ tathārcayet // Hbhv_5.11 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3453: jayaḥ sa-vijayaḥ paścād balaḥ prabala uttare //
GR14hbhvil_u:3454: ūrdhve dvāra-śriyaṃ ceṣṭvā dvāry etān yugmaśo 'rcayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:3456: dvārāntaḥ-pārśvayor arcyā gaṅgā ca yamunā nadī /
GR14hbhvil_u:3457: koṇeṣu vighnaṃ durgāṃ ca vāṇīṃ kṣetre samarcayet //
GR14hbhvil_u:3460: aspṛṣṭvā praviśed veśma nyasyan prāg dakṣiṇaṃ padam // Hbhv_5.12 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3461: sanātanaḥ: vāmāṃ sva-vāma-bhāga-vartinīṃ dvāra-śākhāṃ āśrayan īṣat spṛṣad nijāṅgāni saṃkocya dehalīm aspṛṣṭvā na laṅghayitvety arthaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3464: veśma śrī-bhagavan-mandiraṃ harer gehaṃ pravekṣyann iti pūrva-likhanāt /
GR14hbhvil_u:3465: praviśet tan-madhyaṃ śanaiḥ pūjako gacchet ** HbhvC_5.12 **
GR14hbhvil_u:3467: kiṃcit spṛśan vāma-śākhāṃ dehalīṃ laṅghayan guruḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3468: aṅgaṃ saṅkocayann antaḥ praviśed dakṣiṇāṅghriṇā // Hbhv_5.13 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3473: na bhūyaḥ praviśan mātuḥ kukṣi-kārā-gṛhaṃ sudhīḥ // Hbhv_5.14 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3476: āsanastho yajet tāṃs tān anyatra bhagavad-gṛhāt // Hbhv_5.15 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3481: atha kṛṣṇāgratas tiṣṭhan kṛtvā dig-bandhanaṃ kṣipet /
GR14hbhvil_u:3485: tasminn upaviśet padmāsanena svastikena vā // Hbhv_5.18 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3486: tatra kṛṣṇārcakaḥ prāyo divase prāṅ-mukho bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:3487: udaṅmukho rajanyāṃ tu sthira-mūrtiś ca sammukhaḥ // Hbhv_5.19 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3489: āsīnaḥ prāg udag-vārcet sthirāyāntv atha sammukhaḥ // Hbhv_5.20 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3493: pṛthvi tvayā dhṛtā lokā devi tvaṃ viṣṇunā dhṛtā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3494: tvaṃ ca dhāraya māṃ nityaṃ pavitraṃ kuru cāsanam // Hbhv_5.22 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3499: kṛṣṇājinaṃ kambalaṃ vā nānyad āsanam iṣyate // Hbhv_5.23 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3502: vastrājinaṃ kambalaṃ vā kalpayed āsanaṃ mṛdu // Hbhv_5.24 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3510: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3516: svasya vāmāgrataḥ śaṅkhaṃ sādhāraṃ sthāpayed budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3517: tatraivārdhyādi-pātrāṇi nyasyec ca dvāri bhāgaśaḥ // Hbhv_5.29 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3519: vāme ca sthāpayet pārśve kalasaṃ pūrṇam ambhasā // Hbhv_5.30 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3520: dakṣiṇe ghṛta-dīpaṃ ca taila-dīpaṃ ca vāmataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3522: kara-prakṣālanārthaṃ ca pātram ekaṃ sva-pṛṣṭhataḥ // Hbhv_5.31 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3528: yathā-śobhaṃ yathā-lābhaṃ tathā pātrāṇi kārayet // Hbhv_5.33 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3531: arghyaṃ dattvā tathā raupyeṇāyu-rājyaṃ śubhaṃ bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:3534: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ kāṃsyaṃ yena dīyate bhājanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3535: tān sarvān samparityajya tāmraṃ tu mama rocate // Hbhv_5.35 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3536: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ yo maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3537: viśuddhānāṃ śuciṃ caiva tāmraṃ saṃsāra-mokṣaṇam // Hbhv_5.36 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3539: sadā tāmreṇa kartavyam evaṃ bhūmi mama priyam // Hbhv_5.37 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3544: śaṅkhe kṛtvā tu pānīyaṃ sa-puṣpaṃ salilākṣatam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3545: arghyaṃ dadāti devasyety evaṃ skānde'bhidhānataḥ // Hbhv_5.39 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3551: nyased arcana-kāle tu kṛṣṇasyātīva vallabham // Hbhv_5.41 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3554: sanīraṃ ca sa-karpūraṃ kumbhaṃ kṛṣṇāya yo nyaset /
GR14hbhvil_u:3555: kalpaṃ tasya na pāpekṣāṃ kurvanti prapitāmahāḥ // Hbhv_5.42 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3559: kecic cātra jalādīni dravyāṇy aṣṭau vadanti hi // Hbhv_5.43 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3562: yavāḥ siddhārthakāś caivam arghyo 'ṣṭāṅgaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Hbhv_5.44 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3563: pādya-pātre ca kamalaṃ dūrvā śyāmākam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:3564: nikṣiped viṣṇu-patrīṃ cety evaṃ dravya-catuṣṭayam // Hbhv_5.45 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3566: jātī-phalaṃ lavaṅgaṃ ca kakkolam api nikṣipet // Hbhv_5.46 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3567: madhuparkīya-pātre ca gavyaṃ dadhi payo ghṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3568: madhu-khaṇḍam apīty evaṃ nikṣiped dravya-pañcakam // Hbhv_5.47 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3569: kecit trīṇy eva pātre'smin dravyāṇīcchanti sādhavaḥ // Hbhv_5.48 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3571: ghṛtaṃ dadhi tathā kṣaudraṃ madhuparko vidhīyate // Hbhv_5.49 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3574: madhunas tu alābhe tu guḍena saha miśrayet // Hbhv_5.50 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3575: ghṛtasyālābhe suśroṇi lājaiś ca saha miśrayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:3576: tathā dadhno 'py alābhe tu kṣīreṇa saha miśrayet // Hbhv_5.51 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3578: nāradas tv āha vimalenodakenaiva pūryate // Hbhv_5.52 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3580: kuryāc ca teṣāṃ pātrāṇāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ cakra-mudrayā // Hbhv_5.53 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3582: paṭhen maṅgala-śāntiṃ tāṃ yārcane sammatā satām // Hbhv_5.54 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3593: paṭhan, oṃ śāntiḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-pāda-padmārādhaneṣu śāntir bhavatu //
GR14hbhvil_u:3596: apasarpantu te bhūtā ye bhūtā bhuvi saṃsthitāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3597: ye bhūtā vighna-kartāras te naśyantu śivājñayā // Hbhv_5.57 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3599: ghātais tribhir budho vighnān bhaumān sarvān nivārayet // Hbhv_5.58 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3603: tataḥ kṛtāñjalir vāme śrī-guruṃ paramaṃ gurum /
GR14hbhvil_u:3605: gaṇeśaṃ dakṣiṇe bhāge durgām agre'tha pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3606: kṣetrapālaṃ named bhaktyā madhye cātmeṣṭa-daivatam // Hbhv_5.61 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3607: tataś cāstreṇa saṃśodhya karau kurvīta tena hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:3608: tāla-trayaṃ diśāṃ bandham agni-prākāram eva ca // Hbhv_5.62 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3613: bhavanti niṣphalāḥ sarvā yathā-vidhy apy aniṣṭhitāḥ // Hbhv_5.64 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3617: pṛthivyādīni tattvāni tasmin līnāni bhāvayet // Hbhv_5.65 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3623: vātsalyād dhṛd-gataṃ kṛṣṇaṃ yaṣṭuṃ hṛt punar ānayet // Hbhv_5.68 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3626: vahninā hṛdaya-sthena dahet tac ca kalevaram // Hbhv_5.69 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3634: tatas tasmāt samākṛṣya praṇavena tu mantravit /
GR14hbhvil_u:3635: tat tejo hṛdaye nyasya cintayed viṣṇum avyayam // Hbhv_5.72 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3636: kiṃ vā cintana-mātreṇa bhūta-śuddhiṃ vidhāya tām /
GR14hbhvil_u:3640: catuḥṣaṣṭhyā bhavet kumbha evaṃ syāt prāṇa-saṃyamaḥ // Hbhv_5.74 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3642: pūrayitvā vidhānena sva-śaktyā kumbhake sthitaḥ // Hbhv_5.75 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3643: tatra praṇavam abhyasyan bījaṃ vā mantram ūrdhvagam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3644: ṛṣy-ādi-smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā kuryād dhyānam atandritaḥ // Hbhv_5.76 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3651: rudras tu recake brahmā pūrake dhyeya-devatā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3652: śrī-viṣṇuḥ kumbhake jñeyo dhyāna-sthānaṃ guror mukhāt // Hbhv_5.78 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3657: caturbhujaṃ mahātmānaṃ kumbhakena tu cintayet // Hbhv_5.80 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3659: śuddha-sphaṭika-saṅkāśaṃ kuryād vai nirmalaṃ budhaḥ // Hbhv_5.81 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3662: kṛṣṇaḥ priya-janopetaś cintanīyo hi sarvataḥ // Hbhv_5.82 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3666: api duṣkṛta-karmāṇas tair eva hata-kilbiṣāḥ // Hbhv_5.83 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3667: divase divase vaiśya prāṇāyāmās tu ṣoḍaśa /
GR14hbhvil_u:3668: api brahma-haṇaṃ sākṣāt punanty ahar-ahaḥ kṛtāḥ // Hbhv_5.84 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3669: tapāṃsi yāni tapyante vratāni niyamāś ca ye /
GR14hbhvil_u:3670: go-sahasra-pradānaṃ ca prāṇāyāmas tu tat-samaḥ // Hbhv_5.85 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3671: ambu-binduṃ yaḥ kuśāgreṇa māse māse naraḥ pibet /
GR14hbhvil_u:3672: saṃvatsara-śataṃ sāgraṃ prāṇāyāmas tu tat-samaḥ // Hbhv_5.86 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3673: pātakaṃ tu mahad yac ca tathā kṣudropapātakam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3674: prāṇāyāmaiḥ kṣaṇāt sarvaṃ bhasmasāt kurute naraḥ // Hbhv_5.87 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3676: nyāsān vinā japaṃ prāhur āsuraṃ viphalaṃ budhāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3677: ato yathā-sampradāyaṃ nyāsān kuryād yathā-vidhi // Hbhv_5.88 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3680: śiro-vaktra-hṛd-ādau ca nyasya tad-dhyānam ācaret // Hbhv_5.89 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3684: mudrām akṣa-guṇaṃ sudhāḍhya-kalasaṃ vidyāṃ ca hastāmbujair
GR14hbhvil_u:3685: bibhrāṇāṃ viśada-prabhāṃ tri-nayanāṃ vāg-devatām āśraye // Hbhv_5.90 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3687: lalāṭādiṣu cāṅgeṣu nyased vidvān yathā-kramam // Hbhv_5.91 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3696: nyased bhūyo 'pi tān vidvān evaṃ vāra-catuṣṭayam // Hbhv_5.94 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3704: kīrtyādibhiḥ śaktibhiś ca nyaset tān pūrvavat kramāt // Hbhv_5.97 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3705: nyasec caturthīn atyantā mūrtīḥ śaktīś ca yādibhiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3706: sapta-dhātūn prāṇa-jīvau krodham apy ātmane'ntakān // Hbhv_5.98 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3713: prathamaṃ keśavo nārāyaṇaḥ paścāc ca mādhavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3714: govindaś ca tathā viṣṇur madhusūdana eva ca // Hbhv_5.100 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3715: trivikramo vāmano 'tha śrīdharaś ca tataḥ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:3716: ṛṣīkeśaḥ padmanābhas tato dāmodaras tathā // Hbhv_5.101 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3718: cakrī gadī tathā śārṅgī khaḍgī śaṅkhī halī tathā // Hbhv_5.102 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3719: muṣalī ca tathā śūlī pāśī caivāṅkuśī tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3720: mukundo nandajaś caiva tathā nandī naras tathā // Hbhv_5.103 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3721: narakajid dhariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ satyaḥ sātvata eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:3722: tataḥ śauris tathā śūras tataḥ paścāj janārdanaḥ // Hbhv_5.104 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3724: balo balānujo bālo vṛṣaghno vṛṣa eva ca // Hbhv_5.105 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3725: haṃso varāho vimalo nṛsiṃhaś ceti mūrtayaḥ // Hbhv_5.106 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3727: kīrtiḥ kāntis tuṣṭi-puṣṭī dhṛtiḥ śāntiḥ kriyā dayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3728: medhā harṣā tathā śraddhā lajjā lakṣmīḥ sarasvatī // Hbhv_5.107 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3729: prītī ratir jayā durgā prabhā satyā ca caṇḍikā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3730: vāṇī vilāsinī caiva vijayā virajā tathā // Hbhv_5.108 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3731: viśvā ca vinadā caiva sunandā ca smṛtis tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3732: ṛddhiḥ samṛddhiḥ śuddhiś ca buddhir mūrtir natiḥ kṣamā // Hbhv_5.109 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3733: ramomā kledinī klinnā vasudā vasudhā parā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3734: parāyaṇā ca sūkṣmā ca sandhyā prajñā prabhā niśā // Hbhv_5.110 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3742: saubhāgyaiś ciram upabṛṃhito bhavet saḥ // Hbhv_5.113 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3745: acyutatvaṃ dadāty eva satyaṃ satyaṃna saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_5.114 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3747: yaś ca kuryād imaṃ nyāsaṃ lakṣmī-bīja-puraḥsaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:3748: bhaktiṃ muktiṃ ca bhuktiṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca labhate'cirāt // Hbhv_5.115 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3753: punar ante haritāṃ vrajaty asau // Hbhv_5.116 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3756: namaḥ parāyeti pūrvam ātmane nama ity anu // Hbhv_5.117 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3758: nyāsenānena loko hi bhavet pūjādhikāravān // Hbhv_5.118 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3760: hṛdaye maty ahaṅkāra-manāṃsīti trayaṃ tataḥ // Hbhv_5.119 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3761: śabdaṃ sparśaṃ tato rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ ca mastake /
GR14hbhvil_u:3762: mukhe hṛdi ca guhye ca pādayoś ca yathā-kramam // Hbhv_5.120 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3763: śrotraṃ tvacaṃ dṛśaṃ jihvāṃ ghrāṇaṃ sva-sva-pade tataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3766: vadane hṛdaye liṅge pādayoś ca yathā-kramam // Hbhv_5.122 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3769: varṇaiḥ saha sarephaiś ca kramān nyaset sa-bindukaiḥ // Hbhv_5.123 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3771: ya-kāreṇa mukhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ nyaset pumanvitam // Hbhv_5.124 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3774: nārāyaṇaṃ ca sarvāḍhyaṃ la-kāreṇaiva pādayoḥ // Hbhv_5.125 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3779: tattva-nyāsam iti prāhur nyāsa-tattva-vido budhāḥ // Hbhv_5.127 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3780: yaḥ kuryāt tattva-vinyāsaṃ sa pūto bhavati dhruvam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3782: yataḥ sa eva tattvāni sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitam // Hbhv_5.128 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3784: prāṇāyāmāṃs tataḥ kuryān mūla-mantraṃ japan kramāt /
GR14hbhvil_u:3785: vārau dvau caturaḥ ṣaṭ ca reca-pūraka-kumbhakaḥ // Hbhv_5.129 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3786: athavā recakādīṃs tān kuryād vārāṃs tu ṣoḍaśa /
GR14hbhvil_u:3787: dvātriṃśac ca catuḥṣaṣṭhiṃ kāma-bījaṃ japan kramāt // Hbhv_5.130 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3793: sanātanaḥ: tad eva krama-dīpikoktyā saṃvādayan tatraiva kiṃcid viśeṣaṃ ca darśayati-recayed iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:3807: tatra teṣu prāṇāyāmeṣu purvaṃ recakādiṣu saṅkhyoktā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3808: atra ca prāṇāyāmeṣv iti bhedaḥ ** HbhvC_5.131 **
GR14hbhvil_u:3814: paripūyate sa khalu māsato 'ṃ haṃsaḥ // Hbhv_5.132 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3815: sanātanaḥ: japasya purata ādau parataḥ ante ca iti prāṇāyāmeṣu kālaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3817: yo jano dinaśaḥ pratyahaṃ ṣoḍaśa-prāṇāyāmān ācaret,
GR14hbhvil_u:3818: sa māsataḥ māsenaikena aṃhasaḥ pāpāt paripūyate śuddho bhavatīti sāmānyataḥ phalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3819: paraṃ ca sarvaṃ purvaṃ likhitam eva ** HbhvC_5.132 **
GR14hbhvil_u:3823: ādhāra-śaktiṃ prakṛtiṃ kūrmānantau ca tatra tu /
GR14hbhvil_u:3824: pṛthivīṃ kṣīra-sindhuṃ ca śvetadvīpaṃ ca bhāsvaram // Hbhv_5.134 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3828: trike'jñānam avairāgyam anaiśvaryaṃ ca pārśvayoḥ // Hbhv_5.136 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3830: maṇḍalāni kramād varṇaiḥ praṇavāṃśaiḥ sa-bindukaiḥ // Hbhv_5.137 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3831: sattva rajas tamaś cātmāntarātmānau ca tatra hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:3834: tasyāṣṭa-dikṣu madhye'pi nava-śaktīś ca dik-kramāt // Hbhv_5.139 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3837: prahvī satyā tatheśānānugrahā navam smṛtā // Hbhv_5.140 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3845: sa yatra kṣīrābdhiḥ sravati surabhībhyaś ca sumahān
GR14hbhvil_u:3846: nimeṣārdhākhyo vā vrajati na hi yatrāpi samayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3847: bhaje śvetadvīpaṃ tam aham iha golokam iti yaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:3848: vidantas te santaḥ kṣitiviralacārāḥ katipaye // Hbhv_5.143 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3850: evaṃ hṛdayaṃ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvānvitaś ca bhūtātmā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3851: ṅe'ntāḥ sa-vāsudevāḥ sarvātma-yutaṃ ca saṃyogaṃ // Hbhv_5.144 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3852: yogāvadhaś ca padmaṃ pīṭhāt ṅe-yuto natiś cānte /
GR14hbhvil_u:3856: tataś ca bhagavān iti viṣṇur iti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:3858: ete trayaḥ sa-vāsudevā vāsudeva-sahitāḥ pratyekaṃ ṅe'ntāś caturthy-antāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3859: tataś ca sarvātmanā yutaṃ saṃyogaṃ sarvātma-saṃyogam iti napuṃsakatvam ārṣam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3860: tataś ca yogasyāvadhau ante padmaṃ yoga-padmam iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:3863: evaṃ oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave sarva-bhūtātmane vāsudevāya sarvātma-saṃyoga-yoga-padma-pīṭhātmane nama iti siddham /
GR14hbhvil_u:3865: namo bhagavate brūyād viṣṇave ca padaṃ vadet /
GR14hbhvil_u:3871: oṃ namaḥ padam ābhāṣya tathā bhagavate-padam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3872: vāsudevāya ity uktvā sarvātmeti padaṃ tathā //
GR14hbhvil_u:3873: saṃyoga-yogety uktvā ca tathā pīṭhātmane padam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3885: ṛṣir nārada ity ukto gāyatrī-cchanda ucyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:3887: bījaṃ manmatha-saṃjñaṃ tu priyā śaktir havir bhujaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3891: catuś caturbhir varṇaiś ca catvāry aṅgāni kalpayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:3892: dvābhyām astrākhyam aṅgaṃ ca tasyety aṅgāni pañca vai // Hbhv_5.149 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3893: nyasyec ca vyāpakatvena tāny aṅgāni kara-dvaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:3894: tāny aṅgulīṣu pañcātha kecid varṇān svarān api // Hbhv_5.150 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3900: namo 'ntaṃ hṛdayaṃ cāṅgaiḥ śiraḥ svāhānvitaṃ śikhām /
GR14hbhvil_u:3901: vaṣaḍ-yutaṃ ca kavacaṃ huṃ-yug-astraṃ ca phaḍ-yutam // Hbhv_5.152 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3902: nyasyanti punar aṅguṣṭhau tarjanyau madhyame tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:3903: anāmike kaniṣṭhe ca kramād aṅgaiś ca pañcabhiḥ // Hbhv_5.153 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3905: nyasyanti yugapat sarvāṇy aṅgais taiḥ pañcabhiḥ kramāt // Hbhv_5.154 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3907: hṛdayādiṣu caiteṣāṃ pañcaikaṃ dikṣu ca kramāt // Hbhv_5.155 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3909: varrṇenaikena hṛdayaṃ tirbhir eva śiro matam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3910: caturbhiś ca śikhā proktā tathaiva kavacaṃ matam /
GR14hbhvil_u:3911: netraṃ tathā caturvarṇair astraṃ dvābhyāṃ tathā matam // Hbhv_5.156 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3913: tataś cāpādam ākeśān nyased dorbhyām imaṃ manum /
GR14hbhvil_u:3914: vārāṃs trīn vyāpakatvena nyasec ca praṇavaṃ sakṛt // Hbhv_5.157 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3917: dante lalāṭe bhrū-madhye karṇayor netrayor dvayoḥ // Hbhv_5.158 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3918: nāsayor vadane kaṇṭhe hṛdi nābhau kaṭi-dvaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:3919: guhye jānu-dvaye caikaṃ nyased ekaṃ ca pādayoḥ // Hbhv_5.159 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3923: tāraṃ śirasi vinyasya pañca mantra-padāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:3924: nyasen netra-dvaye vaktre hṛd-guhyāṅghriṣu ca kramāt // Hbhv_5.161 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3925: dehe ca vyāpakatvena nyaset tāny akhile punaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3926: kecit tāni namo 'ntāni nyasyanty ādyākṣaraiḥ saha // Hbhv_5.162 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3928: guhyād galān mastakāc ca vyāpayya caraṇāvadhi // Hbhv_5.163 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3932: ṛṣy-ādīn sapta-bhāgāṃś ca nyased asya manoḥ kramāt /
GR14hbhvil_u:3933: mūrdhāsya-hṛtsu kucayoḥ punar hṛdi punar hṛdi // Hbhv_5.165 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3936: śrī-vatsākhyāṃ kaustubhākhyāṃ blivākhyāṃ ca manoramām // Hbhv_5.166 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3937: itthaṃ naysta-śarīraḥ san kṛtvā dig-bandhanaṃ punaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:3944: smarec chiśiritaṃ śivaṃ sita-matis tu vṛndāvanam // Hbhv_5.168 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3945: athānantaraṃ sita-matiḥ śuddha-manāḥ san vṛndāvanaṃ cintayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:3947: kīdṛśaiḥ ? prakaṭam udbhaṭaṃ saurabhaṃ yasya tac ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:3950: sac ca uttamaṃ yat prasūnaṃ puṣpaṃ nava-pallavaṃ ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:3954: prakaṭa-saurabhākulita-matta-bhṛṅgollasad iti pāṭhas tu sugama eva /
GR14hbhvil_u:3956: praphullābhir nava-mañjarībhir lalitā manoharā yā vallaryaḥ agra-śākhā latā vā,
GR14hbhvil_u:3971: tad-antar api kalpakāṅghripam udañcitaṃ cintayet // Hbhv_5.171 //
GR14hbhvil_u:3975: smaret punar atandrito vigata-ṣaṭ-taraṅgāṃ budhaḥ // Hbhv_5.172 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4072: skhalitasya skhalana-yuktasya lalitasya ca pādāmbhojasya mandābhighātena īṣad bhū-bhāgaa-prahāreṇa kvaṇitaḥ kṛta-śabdo maṇi-mayo yas tulākoṭir
GR14hbhvil_u:4073: tenākulaṃ śabda-vyāptam āśānāṃ diśāṃ mukhaṃ yābhyas tāsām /
GR14hbhvil_u:4074: kuḍmalat mukulāyamānaṃ pakṣmalaṃ ca utkṛṣṭa-pakṣma-yuktam akṣi-dvaya-sarasi-ruhaṃ yāsām ** HbhvC_5.196 **
GR14hbhvil_u:4079: drāghiṣṭho 'tidīrghaḥ śvāsana-samīraṇaḥ śvāsa-vāyus tena abhitāpaḥ santāpas tena pramlānī-bhavan aruṇoṣṭha-pallavo yāsām ** HbhvC_5.197 **
GR14hbhvil_u:4085: praṇayād unmade udgata-made akṣiṇī eva madhu-kṛn-mālā bhramara-paṅktiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4087: śrī-locanayor itas tato bahudhā nipatanena sarvato darśanān mālety uktam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4088: kīdṛśīm ? tāsāṃ yan mugdhaṃ manoharam ānana-paṅkajaṃ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4089: tasmāt pravigalito mādhvī-rasasya makarandasya āsvādana- śīlām /
GR14hbhvil_u:4096: śreṣṭhasya pañcama-puruṣārtha-rūpāyā bhakteś ca vāñchāyāḥ pradānāṃ devādīnāṃ dhyānam
GR14hbhvil_u:4104: dṛḍhā dharme vāñchā yasya tam ** HbhvC_5.200 **
GR14hbhvil_u:4112: mukhyāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ urvaśy-ādyā apsarasaś ca smaret ** HbhvC_5.201 **
GR14hbhvil_u:4117: tasya śrī-kṛṣṇasya pāda-paṅka-jagatāṃ tad-viṣayiṇīm ity arthaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4118: ujjhitataro nitarāṃ parityakto 'nyasmin bhakti-vyatirikte samaste saṅga āsaktir yena tam ** HbhvC_5.202 **
GR14hbhvil_u:4123: ata eva amuṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ mahatyākhyayā kacchapikayā svakīya-vīṇayā prīṇayantam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4124: kābhiḥ ? nānā-vidhaḥ ṣaṭ-triṃśad-bhedātmako yaḥ śruti-gaṇo nāda-samūhas tenānvitā ye sapta rāgāḥ niṣādādi-svarā meghanāda-vasantādi-rāgā vā,
GR14hbhvil_u:4125: teṣu vā grāma-trayī tatra grāmāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ samāhāras tasyāṃ gatāḥ prāptā yā manoharā mūrchanās tābhiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4129: ata eva munīndraṃ muni-gaṇa-śreṣṭhaṃ dhātṛ-sutaṃ śrī-nāradaṃ nabhasi samyak cintayet ** HbhvC_5.203 **
GR14hbhvil_u:4143: veṇuṃ gṛhītvā hastābhyāṃ mukhe saṃyojya saṃsthitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4144: gāyantaṃ divya-gānaiś ca goṣṭha-madhya-gataṃ harim // Hbhv_5.210 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4148: tasya kaustubhasya dhāmnā tejasā vilasantībhir muktābhir ācchannena saṃveṣṭitena hāreṇa upaśobhitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4151: sa-candrābhis tārābhir ānandaṃ sukha-karaṃ yad vimalam ambaraṃ vyoma tat sadṛśam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4155: svargād iva paribhraṣṭānāṃ parama-sundarīṇām ity arthaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4158: mohanaṃ sarva-gopīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ ca gavām api /
GR14hbhvil_u:4159: lelihyamānaṃ vatsaiś ca dhenubhiś ca samantataḥ // Hbhv_5.212 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4161: surāsura-manuṣyaiś ca sthāvaraiḥ pannagair api // Hbhv_5.213 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4165: dakṣeṇa śaunakātribhyāṃ siddhena kapilena ca // Hbhv_5.215 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4167: anyair api ca saṃyuktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dhyāyed aharniśam // Hbhv_5.216 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4174: asau anirvacanīya-māhātmyaḥ śrī-devakī-nandano devo naḥ asmān avyāt rakṣatu /
GR14hbhvil_u:4175: kalāyasya tat-puṣpasyeva dyutiḥ śyāmā kāntir yasya saḥ ** HbhvC_5.217 **
GR14hbhvil_u:4177: dhyātvaivaṃ bhagavantaṃ taṃ samprārthya ca yathā-sukham /
GR14hbhvil_u:4178: ādau sampūjayet sarvair upacāraiś ca mānasaiḥ // Hbhv_5.218 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4179: lekhyā ye bahir arcayām upacārā vibhāgaśaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4180: te sarve'py antar-arcāyāṃ kalpanīyā yathā-ruci // Hbhv_5.219 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4186: athopacārair bāhyaiś ca svātmany eva sthitaṃ prabhum /
GR14hbhvil_u:4187: pūjayan sthāpayed ādau śaṅkhaṃ sat-sampradāyataḥ // Hbhv_5.221 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4190: tatāstra-kṣālitaṃ śaṅkhaṃ sādhāraṃ sthāpayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_5.222 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4192: vyutkrāntair mātṛkārṇais taṃ śiro 'ntaiḥ kena pūrayet // Hbhv_5.223 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4199: kuryān nyāsaṃ jale mūla-mantrāṅgānāṃ tato diśaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4202: ācchādya saṃspṛśan śaṅkhaṃ japen mūlaṃ tato 'ṣṭaśaḥ // Hbhv_5.228 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4203: taj jalaṃ prokṣaṇī-pātre kiṃcit kṣiptvā trir ukṣayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:4207: mudraiṣā gālinī proktā śaṅkhasyopari cālitā // Hbhv_5.230 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4209: punar āpūrya kṛṣṇāgre nyased ācārataḥ satām // Hbhv_5.231 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4211: gurūn mūrdhni gaṇeśaṃ ca mūlādhāre'bhipūjya tam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4214: tato japan kāma-bījaṃ tri-sthāna-sthaṃ paraṃ mahaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4217: vicintya pañcāṅgādīni nyasyet tasmin yathātmani // Hbhv_5.234 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4218: kuryur bhagavati prādurbhūte kṛṣṇe ca vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4219: tat-tan-nyāsān abhedāya manor bhagavatā saha // Hbhv_5.235 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4221: mantrārṇaiḥ svara-haṃsādyair bhūṣaṇeṣu prabhoḥ kramāt // Hbhv_5.236 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4223: tasmin pīṭhe tam āsīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ vibhāvayan /
GR14hbhvil_u:4224: āsanādyais tu puṣpāntair yathā-vidhy arcayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_5.237 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4225: tato mukhe'rcayed veṇuṃ vanamālāṃ ca vakṣasi /
GR14hbhvil_u:4226: dakṣastanordhve śrīvatsaṃ savye tatraiva kaustubham // Hbhv_5.238 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4230: dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ ca naivedyaṃ mukha-vāsādi cārpayet // Hbhv_5.240 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4231: gītādibhiś ca santoṣya kṛṣṇam asmai tato 'khilam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4232: aśakto bahir arcāyām arpayej japam ācaret // Hbhv_5.241 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4236: ekasya dhyāna-yogasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm // Hbhv_5.242 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4240: stotrair vā arhaṇābhir vā kim u dhyānena kathyate // Hbhv_5.243 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4245: yaś caivaṃ parayā bhaktyā sakṛt kuryān mahāmate /
GR14hbhvil_u:4246: kramoditena vidhinā tasya tuṣyāmy ahaṃ mune // Hbhv_5.245 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4247: smaraṇa-dhyānayoḥ pūrvaṃ māhātmyaṃ likhitaṃ ca yat /
GR14hbhvil_u:4250: antaḥ-pūjāṃ vidhāyādāv ārabheta bahis tataḥ // Hbhv_5.247 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4253: samyag ārādhanaṃ kṛtvā bāhya-pūjāṃ samācaret // Hbhv_5.248 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4255: anujñāṃ dehi bhagavan bahir yoge mama prabho /
GR14hbhvil_u:4256: śrī-kṛṣṇam ity anujñāpya bahiḥ pūjāṃ samācaret // Hbhv_5.249 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4257: tatra tv anekaśaḥ santi pūjā-sthānāni tatra ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:4262: hareḥ pūjā tu kartavyā kevale bhūtale na tu // Hbhv_5.251 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4264: sūryo 'gnir brāhmaṇā gāvo vaiṣṇavaḥ khaṃ maruj jalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4265: bhūr ātmā sarva-bhūtāni bhadra pūjā-padāni me // Hbhv_5.252 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4266: sūrye tu vidyayā trayyā haviṣāgnau yajeta mām /
GR14hbhvil_u:4267: ātithyena tu viprāgrye goṣv aṅga yavasādinā // Hbhv_5.253 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4269: vāyau mukhya-dhiyā toye dravyais toya-puraḥ-saraiḥ // Hbhv_5.254 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4271: kṣetra-jñaṃ sarva-bhūteṣu samatvena yajeta mām // Hbhv_5.255 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4273: yuktaṃ catur-bhujaṃ śāntaṃ dhyāyann arcet samāhitaḥ // Hbhv_5.256 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4276: śailī dārumayī lauhī lepyā lekhyā ca saikatī /
GR14hbhvil_u:4279: udvāsāvāhane na staḥ sthirāyām uddhavārcane // Hbhv_5.258 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4280: asthirāyāṃ vikalpaḥ syāt sthaṇḍile tu bhaved dvayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4281: snapanaṃ tv avilepyāyām anyatra parimārjanam // Hbhv_5.259 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4287: caturmūrtiḥ paraṃ proktaṃ ekaiko bhidyate tridhā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4290: vāmopari gadā yasya cakraṃ cādho vyavasthitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4291: ādi-mūrtes tu bhedo 'yaṃ keśaveti parkīrtyate // Hbhv_5.262 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4292: adharottara-bhāvena kṛtam etat tu yatra vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:4293: nārāyaṇākhyā sā mūrtiḥ sthāpitā bhukti-muktidā // Hbhv_5.263 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4295: dakṣiṇordhve gadā yasya cakraṃ cādho vyavasthitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4296: ādimūrtes tu bhedo 'yaṃ mādhaveti prakīrtyate // Hbhv_5.264 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4300: dakṣiṇopari padmaṃ tu gadā cādho vyavasthitā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4301: saṅkarṣaṇasya bhedo 'yaṃ viṣṇur ity abhiśabdyate // Hbhv_5.266 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4302: dakṣiṇopari śaṅkhaṃ ca cakraṃ cādhaḥ pradarśyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:4303: vāmopari tathā padmaṃ gadā cādhaḥ pradarśyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:4309: ūrdhvaṃ dakṣiṇataś cakram adhaḥ padmaṃ vyavasthitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4310: padmā padma-karā vāme pārśve yasya vyavasthitā // Hbhv_5.271 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4311: sthito vāpy upaviṣṭo vā sānurāgo vilāsavān /
GR14hbhvil_u:4312: pradyumnasya hi bhedo 'yaṃ śrīdhareti prakīrtyate // Hbhv_5.272 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4314: vāmordhve nalinaṃ yasya adhaḥ śaṅkhaṃ virājate /
GR14hbhvil_u:4318: padmanābheti sā mūrtiḥ sthāpitā mokṣa-dāyinī // Hbhv_5.274 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4321: aniruddhasya bhedo 'yaṃ dāmodara iti smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_5.275 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4322: eteṣāṃ tu striyau kārye padma-vīṇādhare śubhe // Hbhv_5.276 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4327: padmaṃ śaṅkhaṃ tathā cakraṃ gadāṃ vahati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_5.277 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4328: śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ gadāṃ cakraṃ dhatte nārāyaṇaḥ sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4329: gadāṃ cakraṃ tathā śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ vahati mādhavaḥ // Hbhv_5.278 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4330: cakraṃ padmaṃ tathā śaṅkhaṃ gadāṃ ca puruṣottamaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4331: padmaṃ kaumodakīṃ śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ dhatte'py adhokṣajaḥ // Hbhv_5.279 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4333: cakraṃ gadāṃ padma-śaṅkhau govindo dharate bhujaiḥ // Hbhv_5.280 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4334: gadāṃ padmaṃ tathā śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ viṣṇur bibharti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4335: cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ tathā padmaṃ gadāṃ ca madhusūdanaḥ // Hbhv_5.281 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4336: gadāṃ sarojaṃ cakraṃ ca śaṅkhaṃ dhatte'cyutaḥ sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4337: śaṅkhaṃ kaumodakīṃ cakram upendraḥ padmam udvahet // Hbhv_5.282 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4339: padmaṃ kaumodakīṃ cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ dhatte trivikramaḥ // Hbhv_5.283 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4340: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ vāmano vahate sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4341: padmaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ śaṅkhaṃ śrīdharo vahate bhujaiḥ // Hbhv_5.284 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4342: cakraṃ padmaṃ gadāṃ śaṅkhaṃ narasiṃho bibharti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4343: padmaṃ sudarśanaṃ śaṅkhaṃ gadāṃ dhatte janārdanaḥ // Hbhv_5.285 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4345: hṛṣīkeśo gadāṃ cakraṃ padmaṃ śaṅkhaṃ ca dhārayet // Hbhv_5.286 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4346: padmanābho vahet śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4347: padmaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ śaṅkhaṃ dhatte dāmodaraḥ sadā // Hbhv_5.287 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4348: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ sarojaṃ ca gadāṃ vahati yo hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4349: śaṅkhaṃ kaumodakīṃ padmaṃ cakraṃ viṣṇur bibharti yaḥ // Hbhv_5.288 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4350: etāś ca mūrtayo jñeyā dakṣiṇādhaḥ-kara-kramāt // Hbhv_5.289 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4353: vistareṇa na śaknoti bṛhaspatir api dvijāḥ // Hbhv_5.290 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4356: prākaṭyād akhilāṅgānāṃ śrī-mūrtiṃ bahu manyate // Hbhv_5.291 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4358: śālagrāmātmake rūpe niyamo naiva vidyate // Hbhv_5.292 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4360: sevyā dhyānānurūpaiś ca mūrtiḥ kṛṣṇasya daivataiḥ // Hbhv_5.293 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4364: vidhir na likhituṃ yogyaḥ sa tu lekhiṣyate'grataḥ // Hbhv_5.295 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4367: gaṇḍakyāś caiva deśe ca śālagrāma-sthalaṃ mahat /
GR14hbhvil_u:4368: pāṣāṇaṃ tad-bhavaṃ yat tat śālagrāmam iti smṛtam // Hbhv_5.296 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4370: snigdhā kṛṣṇā pāṇḍarā vā pītā nīlā tathaiva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:4371: vakrā rukṣā ca raktā ca mahā-sthūlā tv alāñchitā // Hbhv_5.297 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4374: baddha-cakrāthavā kācid bhagna-cakrā tv adhomukhī // Hbhv_5.298 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4377: snigdhā siddhi-karī mantre kṛṣṇā kīrtiṃ dadāti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:4380: rakṣā codvegadā nityaṃ vakrā dāridrya-dāyikā // Hbhv_5.300 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4381: sthūlā nihati caivāyur niṣphalā tu alāñchitā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4384: baddha-cakrāthavā yā syād bhagna-cakrā tv adho-mukhī /
GR14hbhvil_u:4385: pūjayed yaḥ pramādena duḥkham eva labheta saḥ // Hbhv_5.303 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4388: vikārāvartanābhiś ca nārasiṃhī tathaiva ca // Hbhv_5.304 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4389: kapilā vibhramāvartā rekhāvartā ca yā śilā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4390: duḥkhadā sā tu vijñeyā sukhadā na kadācana // Hbhv_5.305 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4391: snigdhā śyāmā tathā muktāmāyā vā sama-cakrikā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4392: ghoṇi-mūrtir anantākhyā gambhīrā sampuṭā tathā // Hbhv_5.306 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4395: pūjanīyā prayatnena śilā caitādṛśī śubhā // Hbhv_5.307 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4396: iṣṭā tu yasya yā mūrtiḥ sa tāṃ yatnena pūjayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:4397: pūjite phalam āpnoti iha-loke paratra ca // Hbhv_5.308 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4401: śālagrāma-samudbhūtaṃ śailaṃ doṣāvahaṃ na hi // Hbhv_5.309 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4403: khaṇḍitaṃ truṭitaṃ bhagnaṃ śālagrāme na doṣa-bhāk /
GR14hbhvil_u:4404: iṣṭā tu yasya yā mūrtiḥ sa tāṃ yatnena pūjayet // Hbhv_5.310 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4406: cakraṃ vā kevalaṃ tatra padmena saha saṃyutam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4407: kevalā vanamālā vā harir lakṣmyā saha sthitaḥ // Hbhv_5.311 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4409: mukhyābhāve tv amukhyā hi pūjyā ity ucyate paraiḥ // Hbhv_5.312 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4415: vāsudevaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ śuklābhaś cātiśobhanaḥ // Hbhv_5.314 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4416: dve cakre eka-lagne tu pūrva-bhāgas tu puṣkalaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4418: pradyumnaḥ sūkṣma-cakras tu pīta-dīptis tathaiva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:4419: śuṣiraṃ chidra-bahulaṃ dīrghākāraṃ tu tad bhavet // Hbhv_5.316 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4421: rekhā-trayaṃ tu tad dvāri pṛṣṭhaṃ padmena lāñchitam // Hbhv_5.317 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4422: saubhāgyaṃ keśavo dadyāt catuṣkoṇo bhavet tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4423: śyāmaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ vidyān nābhi-cakraṃ tathonnatam // Hbhv_5.318 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4425: ūrdhvaṃ mukhaṃ vijānīyāt dvāre ca hari-rūpiṇam // Hbhv_5.319 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4426: kāmadaṃ mokṣadaṃ caiva arthadaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4429: kṛṣṇa-varṇas tathā viṣṇuḥ sthūle cakre suśobhanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4430: bramacaryeṇa pūjyo 'sāv anyathā vighnado bhavet // Hbhv_5.321 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4433: brahmacaryādhikārī syān nānyathā pūjanaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_5.322 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4435: brahmacaryeṇa pūjyaḥ syād anyathā sarva-vighnadaḥ // Hbhv_5.323 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4437: dvāropari tathā rekhā padmākārā suśobhanā // Hbhv_5.324 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4438: sphuṭitaṃ viṣamaṃ cakraṃ nārasiṃhaṃ tu kāpilam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4439: sampūjya muktim āpnoti saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet // Hbhv_5.325 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4441: yasya dīrghaṃ mukhaṃ pūrva-kathitair lakṣaṇair yutam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4442: rekhāś ca keśarākārā nārasiṃho mato hi saḥ // Hbhv_5.326 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4444: vārāhaṃ śakti-liṅge ca cakre ca viṣame smṛte /
GR14hbhvil_u:4448: vārāha iti sa prokto bhukti-mukti-phala-pradaḥ // Hbhv_5.328 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4451: matsyākhyā sā śilā jñeyā bhukti-mukti-phala-pradā // Hbhv_5.329 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4453: matsya-rūpaṃ tu deveśaṃ dīrghākāraṃ tu yad bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:4457: haritaṃ varṇam ādhatte kaustubhena ca cihnitaḥ // Hbhv_5.331 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4459: kūrmākārā ca cakrāṅkā śilā kūrmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Hbhv_5.332 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4467: hāyagrīvā yathā lambā rekhāṅkā yā śilā bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:4468: tathāsau syād dhayagrīvaḥ pūjito jñānado bhavet // Hbhv_5.335 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4470: aśvākṛti mukhaṃ yasya sākṣamālaṃ śiras tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4471: padmākṛtir bhaved vāpi hayaśīrṣas tv asau mataḥ // Hbhv_5.336 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4473: vaikuṇṭham maṇi-varṇābhaṃ cakram ekaṃ tathā dhvajam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4474: dvāropari tathā rekhā padmākārā suśobhanā // Hbhv_5.337 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4475: śrīdharas tu tathā devaś cihnito vanamālayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4480: vāmanākhyo bhaved devo hrasvo yaḥ syān mahā-dyutiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4481: ūrdhva-cakras tv adhaś cakraḥ so 'bhīṣṭārtha-prado 'rcitaḥ // Hbhv_5.340 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4484: vāma-pārśve gadā-cakre rekhe caiva tu dakṣiṇe // Hbhv_5.341 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4486: cakrākāreṇa paṅktiḥ sā yatra rekhā-mayī bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:4487: sa sudarśana ity evaṃ khyātaḥ pūjā-phala-pradaḥ // Hbhv_5.342 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4489: dāmodaras tathā sthūlo madhye cakraṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4490: dūrvābhaṃ dvāra-saṅkīrṇaṃ pītā rekhā tathaiva ca // Hbhv_5.343 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4492: upary-adhaś ca cakre dve nātidīrghaṃ mukhe bilam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4493: cakre ca rekhā lambaikā sa ca dāmodaraḥ smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_5.344 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4495: sthūlo dāmodaro jñeyaḥ sūkṣma-randhro bhavet tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4496: cakre ca madhya-deśa-sthe pūjitaḥ sukhadaḥ sadā // Hbhv_5.345 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4498: anantaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ sarva-pūjā-phala-pradaḥ // Hbhv_5.346 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4501: anantaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ sarva-pūjā-phala-pradaḥ // Hbhv_5.347 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4504: yasya yogeśvaro nāma brahma-hatyāṃ vyapohati // Hbhv_5.348 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4506: tulasyā pūjayen nityaṃ daridras tv īśvaro bhavet // Hbhv_5.349 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4511: tam arcya labhate svargaṃ viṣayāṃś ca samīhitām // Hbhv_5.351 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4512: vāma-pārśve same cakre kṛṣṇa-varṇaḥ sa bindukaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4515: vāma-pārśve tathā cakre rekhā caiva tu dakṣiṇe // Hbhv_5.353 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4517: yā śilā kṛṣṇa-saṃjñā sā dhana-dhānya-sukha-pradā // Hbhv_5.354 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4519: bahubhir janmabhiḥ puṇyair yadi kṛṣṇa-śilāṃ labhet /
GR14hbhvil_u:4520: goṣpadena tu cihnena janus tena samāpyate // Hbhv_5.355 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4522: dve cakre madhya-deśe tu sā śilā tu caturmukhā // Hbhv_5.356 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4524: vajra-kīṭodbhavā rekhāḥ paṅktībhūtāś ca yatra vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:4527: padmākāre ca paṅktī dve madhye lambā ca rekhikā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4528: garuḍaḥ sa tu vijñeyaś catuś cakro janārdanaḥ // Hbhv_5.358 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4532: yāś ca tāsv api sūkṣmāḥ syus tāḥ praśasta-karāḥ smṛtāḥ // Hbhv_5.360 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4534: yathā yathā śilā sūkṣmā mahat puṇyaṃ tathā tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4535: tasmāt tāṃ pūjayen nityaṃ dharma-kāmārtha-siddhaye // Hbhv_5.361 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4536: tatrāpy āmalakī-tulyā sūkṣmā cātīva yā bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:4537: tasyām eva sadā brahman śriyā saha vasāmy aham // Hbhv_5.362 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4540: kiṃ punar yajanaṃ tatra hari-sānnidhya-kārakam // Hbhv_5.363 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4544: yad āmananti vedāntā brahma nirguṇam acyutam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4547: yathā tathā harir vyāpī śālagrāme prakāśate // Hbhv_5.366 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4549: śālagrāmārcakā vaiśya naiva yānti yamālayam // Hbhv_5.367 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4550: na tathā ramate lakṣmyāṃ na tathā nija-mandire /
GR14hbhvil_u:4551: śālagrām-śilā-cakre yathā sa ramate sadā // Hbhv_5.368 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4552: agnihotraṃ hutaṃ tena dattā pṛthvī sa-sāgarā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4554: kāmaiḥ krodhaiḥ pralobhaiś ca vyāpto yo 'tra narādhamaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4555: so 'pi yāti harer lokaṃ śālagrāma-śilārcanāt // Hbhv_5.370 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4556: yaḥ pūjayati govindaṃ śālagrāme sadā naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4557: āhūta-samplavaṃ yāvat na sa pracyavate divaḥ // Hbhv_5.371 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4558: vinā tīrthair vinā dānair vinā yajñair vinā matim /
GR14hbhvil_u:4559: muktiṃ yāti naro vaiśya śālagrāma-śilārcanāt // Hbhv_5.372 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4561: na yāti vaiśya pāpo 'pi śālagrāme'cyutārcakaḥ // Hbhv_5.373 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4563: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma satyaṃ satyaṃ mayoditam // Hbhv_5.374 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4564: naivedyair vividhaiḥ puṣpair dhūpair dīpair vilepanaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4566: kurute mānavo yas tu kalau bhakti-parāyaṇaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4568: liṅgais tu koṭibhir dṛṣṭair yat phalaṃ pūjitais tu taiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4569: śālagrāma-śilāyāṃ tu ekenāpīha tat phalam // Hbhv_5.377 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4571: tatra devāsurā yakṣā bhuvanāni caturdaśa // Hbhv_5.378 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4572: śālagrāma-śilāyāṃ tu yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurute naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4573: pitaras tasya tiṣṭhanti tṛptāḥ kalpa-śataṃ divi // Hbhv_5.379 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4575: yatra dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvaṃ koṭi-guṇaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_5.380 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4577: kīkaṭo 'pi mṛto yāti vaikuṇṭha-bhavanaṃ nara // Hbhv_5.381 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4579: bhū-cakraṃ tena dattaṃ syāt sa-śaila-vana-kānanam // Hbhv_5.382 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4582: mayā saha mahāsena līnaṃ tiṣṭhati sarvadā // Hbhv_5.383 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4583: dṛṣā praṇamitā yena snāpitā pūjitā tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4584: yajña-koṭi-samaṃ puṇyaṃ gavāṃ koṭi-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_5.384 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4588: smṛtaṃ saṅkīrtitaṃ dhyātaṃ pūjitaṃ ca namaskṛtam // Hbhv_5.386 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4590: siṃhaṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā yānti vane mṛga-gaṇā bhayāt // Hbhv_5.387 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4592: pāpāni vilayaṃ yānti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā // Hbhv_5.388 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4594: bhaktyā vā yadi vā'bhaktyā kṛtvā muktim avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_5.389 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4596: yaḥ kathāṃ kurute viṣṇoḥ śālagrāma-śilāgrataḥ // Hbhv_5.390 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4598: kurute mānavo yas tu kalau bhakti-parāyaṇaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4601: bhayaṃ naiva kariṣyanti mad-bhaktā ye narā bhuvi // Hbhv_5.392 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4603: vāsudevaṃ na te jñeyā mad-bhaktāḥ pāpino hi te // Hbhv_5.393 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4604: śālagrāma-śilāyāṃ tu sadā putra vasāmy aham /
GR14hbhvil_u:4605: dattaṃ devena tuṣṭena sva-sthānaṃ mama bhaktitaḥ // Hbhv_5.394 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4606: padma-koṭi-sahasrais tu pūjite mayi yat phalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4608: pūjito æhaṃ na tair martyair namito 'haṃ na tair naraiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4609: na kṛtaṃ martya-loke yaiḥ śālagrāma-śilārcanam // Hbhv_5.396 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4614: anarhaṃ mama naivedyaṃ patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ jalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4616: yo hi māheśvaro bhūtvā vaiṣṇava-liṅgam uttamam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4617: dveṣṭi vai yāti narakaṃ yāvad indrāś caturdaśa // Hbhv_5.400 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4619: muktiṃ prayānti manujā nūnaṃ sāṅkhyena varjitāḥ // Hbhv_5.401 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4620: mal-liṅgaiḥ koṭibhir dṛṣṭair yat phalaṃ pūjitais tu taiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4621: śālagrāma-śilāyāṃ tu ekenāpi hi tad bhavet // Hbhv_5.402 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4622: tasmād bhaktyā ca mad-bhaktaiḥ prīty-arthe mama putraka /
GR14hbhvil_u:4625: tatra devāsurā yakṣā bhuvanāni caturdaśa // Hbhv_5.404 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4627: vasanti pitaras tasya na saṅkhyā tatra vidyate // Hbhv_5.405 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4628: pramāṇam asti sarvasya sukṛtasya hi putraka /
GR14hbhvil_u:4631: viprāya viṣṇu-bhaktāya teneṣṭaṃ bahubhiḥ makhaiḥ // Hbhv_5.407 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4634: prāpyate na vinā puṇyaiḥ kali-kāle viśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_5.408 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4635: sa dhanyaḥ puruṣo loke saphalaṃ tasya jīvitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4636: śālagrāma-śilā śuddhā gṛhe yasya ca pūjitā // Hbhv_5.409 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4638: yaḥ kuryān mānavo bhaktyā puṣpe puṣpe'śvamedha-bhāk // Hbhv_5.410 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4640: bhaktyā vā yadi vābhaktyā yaḥ karoti sa puṇya-bhāk // Hbhv_5.411 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4641: dveṣeṇāpi ca lobhena dambhena kapaṭena vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4642: śālagrāmodbhavaṃ devaṃ dṛṣṭvā pāpāt pramucyate // Hbhv_5.412 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4644: śālagrāma-śilāṃ spṛṣṭvā sadya eva śucir bhavet // Hbhv_5.413 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4645: tila-prastha-śataṃ bhaktyā yo dadāti dine dine /
GR14hbhvil_u:4647: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ mūlaṃ toyaṃ dūrvākṣataṃ suta /
GR14hbhvil_u:4650: cakra-pūjām avāpnoti samyak śāstroditaṃ phalam // Hbhv_5.416 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4652: skandhe kṛtvā tu yo 'dhvānaṃ vahate śaila-nāyakam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4653: tenoḍhaṃ tu bhavet sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sa-carācaram // Hbhv_5.417 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4654: brahma-hatyādikaṃ pāpaṃ yat kiñcit kurute naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4655: tat sarvaṃ nirdahaty āśu śālagrāma-śilārcanam // Hbhv_5.418 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4656: na pūjanaṃ na mantrāś ca na japo na ca bhāvanā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4657: na stutir nopacāraś ca śālagrāma-śilārcane // Hbhv_5.419 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4659: tatra dānaṃ ca homaś ca sarvaṃ koṭi-guṇaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_5.420 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4660: śālagrāma-śilāyāṃ tu yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurute naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4661: pitaras tasya tiṣṭhanti tṛptāḥ kalpa-śataṃ divi // Hbhv_5.421 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4663: kīkaṭo 'pi mṛto yāti vaikuṇṭha-bhuvanaṃ naraḥ // Hbhv_5.422 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4666: bhū-cakraṃ tena dattaṃ syāt sa-śaila-vana-kānanam // Hbhv_5.423 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4670: yajñāś ca medhā hy api puṇya-śailāś
GR14hbhvil_u:4673: śālagrāma-śilāyāṃ tu yair naraiḥ pūjito hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4674: saṃśodhya teṣāṃ pāpāni muktaye buddhito bhavet // Hbhv_5.425 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4675: kārttike mathurāyāṃ tu sārūpyaṃ diśate hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4677: kṛṣṇaḥ samuddharet tasya pitṝn etān svalokatām // Hbhv_5.426 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4682: yataḥ sannihitas tatra bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ // Hbhv_5.428 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4683: śālagrāma-śilās tāś ca yadi dvādaśa pūjitāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4684: śataṃ vā pūjitaṃ bhaktyā tadā syād adhikaṃ phalam // Hbhv_5.429 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4688: vidhivat pūjitā yena tasya puṇyaṃ vadāmi te // Hbhv_5.430 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4690: yat syād dvādaśa-kāleṣu dinenaikena tad bhavet // Hbhv_5.431 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4692: uṣitvā sa harer loke cakravartīha jāyate // Hbhv_5.432 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4695: arcayed vaiṣṇavo nityaṃ tasya puṇyaṃ nibodha me // Hbhv_5.433 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4697: kāśī-vāse yugāny aṣṭau dinenaikena tad bhavet // Hbhv_5.434 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4698: kiṃ punar bahunā yas tu pujayed vaiṣṇavo naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4699: na hi brahmādayo devāḥ saṃkhyāṃ kurvanti puṇyataḥ // Hbhv_5.435 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4703: vikretā cānumantā ca yaḥ parīkṣām udīrayet // Hbhv_5.436 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4704: sarve te narakaṃ yānti yāvad āhūta-samplavam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4705: ataḥ saṃvarjayed vipra cakrasya kraya-vikrayam // Hbhv_5.437 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4709: mahā-pūjāṃ tu kṛtvādau pūjayet tāṃ tato budhaḥ // Hbhv_5.438 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4715: hṛdi sūrye jale vātha pratimā-sthaṇḍileṣu ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:4716: samabhyarcya hariṃ yānti narās te vaiṣṇavaṃ padam // Hbhv_5.440 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4720: sarva-puṇya-pradaṃ vaiśya sarveṣām api muktidam // Hbhv_5.442 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4722: pūjā ca vihitā tasya pratimāyāṃ nṛpātmaja /
GR14hbhvil_u:4723: śailī dārumayī lauhī lepyā lekhyā ca saikatā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4724: manomayī maṇimayī śrī-mūrtir aṣṭadhā smṛtā // Hbhv_5.443 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4726: nityaṃ saṃnihitas tatra vāsudevo jagad-guruḥ // Hbhv_5.444 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4728: suvarṇārcā na ratnārcā na śilārcā surottama /
GR14hbhvil_u:4729: śālagrāma-śilāyāṃ tu sarvadā vasate hariḥ // Hbhv_5.445 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4731: hatyāṃ hanti yad-aṅghri-saṅga-tulasī steyaṃ ca toyaṃ pade
GR14hbhvil_u:4736: ūrmīn gaṇayituṃ śakyaḥ śrī-caitanyāśrito 'pi kaḥ // Hbhv_5.447 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4740: sa caṇḍālādi-viṣṭhāyām ākalpaṃ jāyate kṛmiḥ // Hbhv_5.448 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4743: na matir jāyate yasya śālagrāma-śilārcane // Hbhv_5.449 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4746: dvijaiḥ strībhiś ca śūdraiś ca pūjyo bhagavataḥ paraiḥ // Hbhv_5.450 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4751: striyo vā yadi vā śūdrā brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyādayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4752: pūjayitvā śilā-cakraṃ labhante śāśvataṃ padam // Hbhv_5.452 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4754: ato niṣedhakaṃ yad yad vacanaṃ śrūyate sphuṭam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4755: avaiṣṇava-paraṃ tat tad vijñeyaṃ tattva-darśibhiḥ // Hbhv_5.453 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4757: brāhmaṇasyaiva pūjyo 'haṃ śucer apy aśucer api /
GR14hbhvil_u:4760: brāhmaṇī-gamanāc caiva śūdraś caṇḍālatām iyāt // Hbhv_5.455 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4766: ayācakaḥ pradātā syāt kṛṣiṃ vṛtty-artham ācaret /
GR14hbhvil_u:4767: purāṇaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ śālagrāmaṃ ca pūjayet //
GR14hbhvil_u:4769: evaṃ mahā-purāṇānāṃ vacanaiḥ saha-brāhmaṇasyaiva pūjyo 'ham iti vacanasya virodhān mātsarya-paraiḥ smārtaiḥ kaiścit kalpitam iti mantavyam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4770: yadi ca yuktyā siddhaṃ sa-mūlaṃ syāt tarhi cāvaiṣṇaviḥ śūdrais tādṛśībhiś ca strībhis tat-pūjā na kartavyā,
GR14hbhvil_u:4771: yathā-vidhi gṛhīta-viṣṇu-dīkṣākaiś ca taiḥ kartvyeti vyavasthāpanīyam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4772: yataḥ śūdreṣv antyajeṣv api madhye ye vaiṣṇavās te śūdrādayo na kilocyante /
GR14hbhvil_u:4774: śvapaco 'pi mahīpāla viṣṇor bhakto dvijodhikaḥ iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:4776: na śūdrā bhagavad-bhaktaṃ niṣādaṃ śvapacaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4777: vīkṣate jāti-sāmānyāt sa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam //
GR14hbhvil_u:4780: na śūdrā bhagavad-bhaktās te tu bhāgavatā narāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4781: sarva-varṇeṣu te śūdrā ye na bhaktā janārdane //
GR14hbhvil_u:4783: etad-ādikaṃ cāgre vaiṣṇava-māhātmye vistareṇa vyaktaṃ bhāvi /
GR14hbhvil_u:4784: kiṃ ca, bhagavad-dīkṣā-prabhāvena śūdrādīnām api vipra-sāmyaṃ siddham eva /
GR14hbhvil_u:4785: tathā ca tatra-yathā kāñcanatāṃ yāti ity ādi /
GR14hbhvil_u:4791: kutaḥ punas te bhagavan nu darśanāt //
GR14hbhvil_u:4793: savanāya yajanāya kalpate yogyo bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4794: ata eva vipraiḥ saha vaiṣṇavānām ekatraiva gaṇanā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4796: tīrthāny aśvattha-taravo gāvo viprās tathā svayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4797: mad-bhaktāś ceti vijñeyāḥ pañca te tanavo mama //
GR14hbhvil_u:4809: atra śrī-svāmi-pādānāṃ ṭīkā-mahatyaś ca tā ṛddhayaś ca tābhir yad-rāja-kulasya tejas tat tasmāt sakāśād dvijānāṃ viprāṇāṃ kule ajito devatā-pūjyo yeṣāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ,
GR14hbhvil_u:4813: samṛddhibhir vināpi svayam eva titikṣādibhir dedīpyamāna iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:4815: tasmin dadhe damam ahaṃ tava vīra-patni
GR14hbhvil_u:4822: tasminn ahaṃ brāhmaṇa-kulād anyatra anyasmin muraripu-dāsād itaratra ca damaṃ dadhe,
GR14hbhvil_u:4824: īdṛśāni ca vacanāni śrī-bhāgavatādau bahūny eva santi /
GR14hbhvil_u:4825: itthaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha sāmyam eva sidhyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:4826: kiṃ ca-viprād dviṣaḍ-guṇa-yutāt [BhP 7.9.10] ity ādi-vacanair vaiṣṇava-brāhmaṇebhyo nīca-jāti-jātānām api vaiṣṇavānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ nirdiśyatetarām
GR14hbhvil_u:4827: ata evoktaṃ śrī-bhagavatā śrī-hayagrīveṇa śrī-hayaśīrṣa-pañcarātre śrī-puruṣottama-pratiṣṭhānte-
GR14hbhvil_u:4831: ato yuktam eva likhita sarvair bhagavataḥ paraiḥ pūjya iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:4832: tathā ca brahma-vaivarte priyavratopākhyāne dharma-vyādhasyāpi śrī-śālagrāma-śilā-pūjanam uktam-
GR14hbhvil_u:4833: tataḥ sa vismitaḥ śrutvā dharma-vyādhasya tad-vacaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4834: tasthau sa ca samānīya darśayāmāsa tav ubhau //
GR14hbhvil_u:4838: atrācāraś ca-satāṃ madhya-deśe'smin viśeṣato dakṣiṇa-deśe ca mahattamānāṃ śrī-vaiṣṇavānāṃ pramāṇam iti dik /
GR14hbhvil_u:4839: evaṃ śrī-bhāgavata-pāṭhaādāv apy adhikāro vaiṣṇavānāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4840: yato vidhi-niṣedhā bhagavad-bhaktānāṃ na bhavantīti devarṣi-bhūtāpta-nṝṇāṃ pitṝṇām [BhP 11.5.41] ity ādi-vacanaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4841: tathā karma-parityāgādināpi na kaścid doṣo ghaṭata iti tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta [BhP 11.20.9] iti,
GR14hbhvil_u:4842: yadā yasyānugṛhṇāti bhagavān [BhP 4.29.46] ity ādi vacanaiś ca vyaktaṃ bodhitam evāsti /
GR14hbhvil_u:4843: etat sarvam agre śrī-vaiṣṇava-māhātmye vistareṇa vyaktaṃ bhāvi ** HbhvC_5.454-455 **
GR14hbhvil_u:4844: śvādatvam atra śva-bhakṣaka-jāti-viśeṣatvam eva śvānam attīti nirukter vartamāna-prayogāt kravyādavat tac-chīlatva-prāpteḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4846: rūḍhir yogam apaharatīti nyāyena ca tad virudhyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:4849: tataś cāsya bhagavan-nāma-śravaṇādy-ekatarāt sadya eva savana-yogyatā-pratikūla-durjātitva-prārambhaka-prārabdha-pāpa-nāśaḥ pratipadyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:4850: uddhavaṃ prati bhagavatā ca - tasmāt bhaktiḥ punāti man-niṣṭhā śvapākān api sambhavāt [BhP 11.14.20] iti kaimutyārtham eva proktam ity āyāti
GR14hbhvil_u:4853: brāhmaṇa-kumārāṇāṃ śaukre janmani yogyatve saty api sāvitra-daiksya-janmāpekṣāvat /
GR14hbhvil_u:4854: sāvitrādi-janmani tu sad-ācāra-prāpter iti savane pravṛttir na yujyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:4855: tasmāt pūjyatva-mātre tātparyam ity abhipretya ṭīkā-kṛdbhir apy uktam anena pūjyatvaṃ lakṣyata iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:4856: tathāpi jāti-doṣa-haratvena prārabdha-hāritvaṃ tu vyaktam evāyātam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4861: ubhayoḥ saṅgamo yatra muktis tatra na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_5.457 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4864: tiṣṭhate muni-śārdūla vardhante tatra sampadaḥ // Hbhv_5.458 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4867: dvāravatyāḥ śilā-yuktāḥ sa vaikuṇṭhe mahīyate // Hbhv_5.459 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4871: tribhis trivikramo nāma caturbhiś ca janārdanaḥ // Hbhv_5.460 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4872: pañcabhir vāsudevas tu ṣaḍbhiḥ pradyumna ucyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:4873: saptabhir baladevas tu aṣṭabhiḥ puruṣottamaḥ // Hbhv_5.461 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4879: ye kecic caiva pāṣāṇā viṣṇu-cakreṇa mudritāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4882: sudarśanādyās tu śilāḥ pūjitāḥ sarva-kāmadāḥ // Hbhv_5.464 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4884: bhaktyā vā yadi vābhaktyā cakrāṅkaṃ pūjayen naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4885: api cet sudurācāro mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_5.465 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4887: etad vai cakra-tīrthaṃ tu yac chilā cakra-cihnitā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4888: muktidā pāpināṃ loke mleccha-deśe'pi pūjitā // Hbhv_5.466 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4894: ebhiś cācyuta-rūpo 'sau phalam aindraṃ prayacchati // Hbhv_5.468 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4897: ṣaḍbhiḥ pradyumna evāsau lakṣmīṃ kāntiṃ dadāti saḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4900: nava-cakro nṛsiṃhas tu phalaṃ yacchaty anuttamam // Hbhv_5.471 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4903: nirvāṇaṃ dvādaśātmāsau saukhyadaś ca supūjitaḥ // Hbhv_5.473 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4906: kṛṣṇa mṛtyu-prado nityaṃ dhūmraś caiva bhayāvahaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4907: asvāsthyaṃ karburo dadyān nīlas tu dhana-hānidaḥ // Hbhv_5.474 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4909: pāṇḍaras tu mahad duḥkhaṃ bhagno bhāryā-viyogadaḥ // Hbhv_5.475 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4911: dadāti śukla-varṇaś ca tasmād enaṃ samarcayet // Hbhv_5.476 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4913: kṛṣṇā mṛtyu-pradā nityaṃ kapilā ca bhayāvahā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4914: rogārtiṃ karburā dadyāt pītā vitta-vināśinī // Hbhv_5.477 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4916: sac-chidrā ca trikoṇā ca tathā viṣama-cakrikā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4917: ardha-candrākṛtir yā ca pūjyās tā na bhavanti hi // Hbhv_5.478 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4919: sukhadā sama-cakrā tu dvādaśī cottamā śubhā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4920: vartulā caturasrā ca narāṇāṃ ca sukha-pradā // Hbhv_5.479 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4921: trikoṇā viṣamā caiva chidrā bhagnā tathaiva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:4922: ardha-candrākṛtir yā tu pūjārhā na bhavet tu sā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4923: phalaṃ notpadyate tatra pūjitāyāṃ kadācana // Hbhv_5.480 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4932: svayaṃ vyaktāḥ sthāpanāś ca mūrtayo dvividhā matāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4933: svayaṃ vyaktāḥ svayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sthāpanās tu pratiṣṭhayā // Hbhv_6.2 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4936: sthāpanaṃ ca svayaṃ vyaktaṃ dvividhaṃ tat prakīrtitam // Hbhv_6.3 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4939: tat sthāpanaṃ iti proktaṃ svayaṃ vyaktaṃ hi me śṛṇu /
GR14hbhvil_u:4940: yasmin sannihito viṣṇuḥ svam eva nṝṇāṃ bhuvi // Hbhv_6.5 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4941: pāṣāṇadārvor ātmeśaḥ svayaṃ vyaktaṃ hi tat smṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:4943: yathāvidhi pratiṣṭhāpya sthāpitāṃ mūrtim arcayet // Hbhv_6.6 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4945: naikaṃ sva-vaṃśaṃ tu naras tārayaty akhilaṃ jagat /
GR14hbhvil_u:4950: praksālayet tad anyāṃ tu mūla-mantreṇa mārjayet // Hbhv_6.8 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4953: śuddhir ekā dvitīyā tu syād avyagratayāpi ca // Hbhv_6.9 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4954: sthāna-śuddhis tathā dravya-śuddhiś ca likhitā purā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4958: mala-snānaṃ tataḥ kuryāt pātre devaṃ nidhāya ca // Hbhv_6.11 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4965: evaṃ ṣaṭ śuddhayaḥ puṇyāḥ sampradāyānusārataḥ // Hbhv_6.13 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4970: pūjā-yantraṃ samuddhṛtya pīṭhārcāṃ tatra sādhayet // Hbhv_6.15 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4972: nāradādīn pūrva-siddhān yajed anyāṃś ca vaiṣṇavān // Hbhv_6.16 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4973: dakṣiṇe cārcayed durgāṃ gaṇeśaṃ ca sarasvatīm /
GR14hbhvil_u:4975: madhye ādhāra-śakty-ādīn dharmādīṃś ca vidikṣv atha /
GR14hbhvil_u:4976: adharmādīṃś catur-dikṣv anantādīn madhyataḥ punaḥ // Hbhv_6.18 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4978: tathā tad-upariṣṭhāc ca pīṭha-mantraṃ yathoditam // Hbhv_6.19 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4982: nijeṣṭa-deva-mūrteś ca param aikyaṃ vibhāvayet // Hbhv_6.21 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4985: bhūmai nihita-pādaḥ san kuryād āvāhanādikam // Hbhv_6.22 //
GR14hbhvil_u:4989: udvāsāvāhane na staḥ sthāvare vai yathā tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:4991: śālagrāme tu bhagavān āvirbhūto yathā hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:4992: na tathānyatra sūryādau vaikuṇṭhe'pi ca sarvagaḥ // Hbhv_6.25 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5014: śaṅkha-cakrādikāś cātha mudrā vidvān pradarśayet // Hbhv_6.33 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5017: aṅga-nyāsaṃ ca devasya kṛtvā mudrāḥ pradarśayet // Hbhv_6.34 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5023: paramīkaraṇaṃ cānyā prāg aṣṭau darśayed imāḥ // Hbhv_6.36 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5024: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ muṣalaṃ śārṅgam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:5025: khaḍgaṃ pāśāṅkuśī tadvad vainateyaṃ tathaiva ca // Hbhv_6.37 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5027: vanamālāṃ tathā mantrī darśayet kṛṣṇa-pūjane // Hbhv_6.38 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5029: ity etāś ca punaḥ saptadaśa mudrāḥ pradarśayet // Hbhv_6.39 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5030: ganda-digdhau karau kṛtvā mudrāḥ sarvatra yojayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:5031: yo 'nyathā kurute mūḍho na siddhaḥ phalabhāg bhavet // Hbhv_6.40 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5035: yo vai mām arcayen nityaṃ mohayet sa sureśvaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:5036: drāpayed api viprendra tataḥ prārthitam āpnuyat // Hbhv_6.41 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5038: mano-vāṇī-dehair yad iha ca purā vāpi vihitaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:5039: tvamatyā matyā vā tad akhilam asau duṣkṛti-cayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5040: imāṃ mudrāṃ jānan kṣapayati naras taṃ sura-gaṇā
GR14hbhvil_u:5041: namanty asyādhīnā bhavati satataṃ sarva-janatā // Hbhv_6.42 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5044: dattvāsanārthaṃ puspaṃ ca svāgataṃ vidhinācaret // Hbhv_6.43 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5046: prasiddhāḥ padma-svasty-ādyā vidvān ṣoḍaśasu kramāt // Hbhv_6.44 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5048: madhuparkaṃ punaś cācamanīyaṃ ca vidhir yathā // Hbhv_6.45 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5053: naivedyaṃ punar ācāmaṃ natvā stutvā visarjayet // Hbhv_6.47 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5055: ādau puṣpāñjaliṃ dattvā pādārcanam ataḥ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:5056: pādyam arghaṃ tv ācamanaṃ madhuparkaṃ yathoditam // Hbhv_6.48 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5058: abhiṣekāṅga-vastraṃ ca dattvā nīrājayed dharim // Hbhv_6.49 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5060: śrī-mūrtau tu śirasy arghyaṃ dadyāt pādyaṃ ca pādayoḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5061: mukhe cācamanīyaṃ trir madhuparkaṃ ca tatra hi // Hbhv_6.50 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5062: sarveṣv apy upacāreṣu pādyādiṣu pṛthak pṛthak /
GR14hbhvil_u:5063: ādau puṣpāñjaliṃ kecid icchanti bhagavat-parāḥ // Hbhv_6.51 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5070: godāna-phalam āpnoti tathā pādya-prado naraḥ // Hbhv_6.53 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5075: naras tv ācamanīyasya dātā bhavati nirmalaḥ // Hbhv_6.55 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5076: madhuparkasya dānena paraṃ padam ihāśnute // Hbhv_6.56 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5079: brahman sa yāti paramaṃ sthānam etan na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_6.57 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5082: mahā-vidyādinā taṃ ca snāna-sthānaṃ tato nayet // Hbhv_6.58 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5084: nivedya darśayen mudrām amṛtīkaraṇīṃ budhaḥ // Hbhv_6.59 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5086: snāna-pātre nijābhīṣṭāṃ calāṃ śrī-mūrtim eva vā // Hbhv_6.60 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5090: phalam āpnoti pūjāyāḥ pratyahaṃ śatvārṣikam // Hbhv_6.61 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5094: varṣāyutaṃ bhavet pītaḥ keśavaḥ priyayā saha // Hbhv_6.63 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5095: ye paśyanti sakṛd bhaktyā padma-patropari sthitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5096: bhaktyā padmālayā-kāntaṃ tair āptaṃ durlabha-phalam // Hbhv_6.64 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5100: tatra tu prathamaṃ bhaktyā vidadhīta sugandhibhiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5101: divyais tailādibhir dravyair abhyaṅgaṃ śrī-hareḥ śanaiḥ // Hbhv_6.66 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5104: mālatī-jātim ādāya sugandhānāṃ tu vā punaḥ // Hbhv_6.67 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5106: ye snāpayanti deveśam utsave vai harer dine // Hbhv_6.68 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5108: yaḥ punaḥ puṣpa-tailena divyauṣadhi-yutena hi // Hbhv_6.69 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5109: abhyaṅgaṃ kurute viṣṇor madhye kṣiptvā tu kuṅkumam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5111: prītyā bibharti svotsaṅge manvantara-śataṃ hariḥ // Hbhv_6.70 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5114: keśavāya naro dattvā gandharvaiḥ saha modate // Hbhv_6.71 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5117: dadhnā ghṛtena madhunā khaṇḍena ca pṛthak pṛthak // Hbhv_6.72 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5118: pañcāmṛtādyaiḥ snapanaṃ sadā necchanti tat priyāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5119: kintu taiḥ kāla-deśādi-viśeṣe kārayanti tat // Hbhv_6.73 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5122: devānāṃ pratimā yatra ghṛtābhyaṅgas tato bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:5123: palāni tasya deyāni śraddhayā pañcaviṃśatiḥ // Hbhv_6.74 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5125: dve sahasre palānāṃ tu mahā-snāne ca saṅkhyayā // Hbhv_6.75 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5126: dātavye yena sarvāsu dikṣu niryāti tad-ghṛtam // Hbhv_6.76 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5128: dugdhādāv api saṅkhyeyam evaṃ jñeyā manīṣibhiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5131: pañca-kṛṣṇalako māṣas te suvarṇas tu ṣoḍaśa /
GR14hbhvil_u:5132: suvarṇānāṃ ca catvāraḥ palam ity abhidhīyate // Hbhv_6.78 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5135: snānārthaṃ surabhī-kṣīraṃ mahiṣyādyās tu kutsitāḥ // Hbhv_6.79 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5138: kṣīreṇa snapanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kṣīrābhodhi-pradaṃ tathā // Hbhv_6.80 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5140: gavāṃ śatasya viprebhyaḥ samyag-dattasya yat phalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5141: ghṛta-prasthena tad viṣṇor labhet snānān na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_6.81 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5143: ghṛtodakena saṃyuktā pratimā snāpitā kila // Hbhv_6.82 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5146: jñānato 'jñānato vāpi yat pāpaṃ kurute naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5149: tān lokān puruṣā yānti kṣīra-snapanakā hareḥ // Hbhv_6.85 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5151: dvādaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ ca gavyena havisā hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5156: payasā yas tu deveśaṃ snāpayed garuḍa-dhvajam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5158: snāpya dadhnā sakṛd viṣṇuṃ nirmalaṃ priya-darśanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5162: yaḥ karoti harer arcāṃ madhunā snāpitāṃ naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5163: agni-loke sa moditvā punar viṣṇu-pure vaset // Hbhv_6.91 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5168: tenāśva-medhajaṃ puṇyaṃ bindunā bindunā smṛtam // Hbhv_6.93 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5169: kṣīrād daśa-guṇaṃ dadhnā ghṛtaṃ tasmād daśottaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:5170: ghṛtād daśa-guṇaṃ kṣaudraṃ khaṇḍaṃ tasmād daśottaram // Hbhv_6.94 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5171: puṣpodakaṃ ca gandhodaṃ vardhate ca daśottaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:5172: mantrodakaṃ ca darbhodaṃ tathaiva nṛpa-sattama // Hbhv_6.95 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5174: tathaiva tīrtha-nīraṃ ca phalaṃ yacchati bhūmipa // Hbhv_6.96 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5176: phalam āpnoti tat proktaṃ niṣkāmo muktim āpnuyāt // Hbhv_6.97 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5179: tailasya snapanaṃ dattvā sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate // Hbhv_6.98 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5182: snāna-kāle tu kṛṣṇasya aguruṃ dahate tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5183: praviṣṭo nāsikā-randhraṃ pāpaṃ janmāyutaṃ dahet // Hbhv_6.99 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5185: devasya kārayed dravyair upayuktyair anantaram // Hbhv_6.100 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5189: prakṣālya deva-deveśaṃ vāruṇaṃ lokam āpnuyāt // Hbhv_6.101 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5194: nivedya deva-devāya gandharvaiḥ saha modate // Hbhv_6.103 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5198: yadīcchet paramāṃ siddhiṃ mama karma-parāyaṇaḥ // Hbhv_6.104 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5205: dattvā go-bāla-jaṃ kūrcaṃ sarvāṃs tāpān vyapohati /
GR14hbhvil_u:5206: dattvā cāmarakaṃ kūrcaṃ śriyam āpnoty anuttamam // Hbhv_6.106 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5212: salilaiḥ snāpayen mantrair nityadā vibhave sati // Hbhv_6.108 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5216: palānāṃ dve sahasre tu mahā-snānaṃ prakīrtitam // Hbhv_6.109 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5218: na naktodaka-puṣpādyair arcanaṃ snānam arhati // Hbhv_6.110 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5220: na naktaṃ gṛhītodakena daiva-karma kuryāt // Hbhv_6.111 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5229: narasiṃha-puraṃ prāpya modate kālam akṣayam // Hbhv_6.114 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5231: snāpya toyena bhaktyā tu narasiṃhaṃ narādhipa /
GR14hbhvil_u:5234: canddra-loke sa moditvā paścād viṣṇu-puraṃ vaset // Hbhv_6.116 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5245: brahma-lokam avāpnoti yāvad indrāś caturdaśa // Hbhv_6.120 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5248: pūjayanti ca bhāvena dhanyās te bhuvi mānavāḥ // Hbhv_6.121/
GR14hbhvil_u:5251: yaṃ yaṃ prārthayate kāmaṃ taṃ taṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_6.122 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5253: snānam abhyarcanaṃ yas tu kurute keśave sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5254: tasya puṇyasya yā saṅkhyā nāsti sā jñāne gocarā // Hbhv_6.123 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5256: snānārthaṃ devadevasya yas tu gandhaṃ prayacchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:5257: bhavanti vaśagās tasya nāryaḥ sarvatra sarvadā // Hbhv_6.124 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5259: dattvā mṛgamada-snānaṃ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_6.125 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5261: dattvā jātī-phalaṃ mukhyaṃ saphalāṃ vindati kriyām // Hbhv_6.126 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5263: murā māsī vacā kuṣṭhaṃ śaileyaṃ rajanī-dvayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5264: śaṭī campaka-mustaṃ ca sarvauṣadhi-gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_6.127 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5271: śaṅke tīrthodakaṃ kṛtvā yaḥ snāpayati mādhavam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5272: dvādaśyāṃ bindu-mātreṇa kulānāṃ tārayec chatam // Hbhv_6.130 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5274: yaḥ snāpayati dharmātmā yajñāyuta-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_6.131 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5275: anya-go-sambhavaṃ kṣīraṃ śaṅkhe kṛtvā tu nārada /
GR14hbhvil_u:5276: yaḥ snāpayati deveśaṃ rājasūya-phalaṃ labheet // Hbhv_6.132 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5277: śaṅkhe kṛtvā ca pānīyaṃ sākṣataṃ kusumānvitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5278: snāpayed devadeveśaṃ hanyāt pāpaṃ cirārjitam // Hbhv_6.133 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5280: yaḥ kṛtvā snāpayed devaṃ mama loke vasec ciram // Hbhv_6.134 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5281: kṣiptvā gandhodakaṃ śaṅkhe yaḥ snāpayati keśavam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5284: gāṅgeyaṃ ca bhavet sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ śaṅkhe kali-priya // Hbhv_6.136 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5286: śaṅkhe tiṣṭhanti viprendra tasmāt śaṅkhaṃ sadārcayet // Hbhv_6.137 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5287: śaṅkhe kṛtvā tu pānīyaṃ sa-puṣpaṃ satilākṣatam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5289: arghyaṃ dattvā tu śaṅkhena yaḥ karoti pradakṣiṇam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5291: darśanenāpi śaṅkhasya kiṃ punaḥ sparśane kṛte /
GR14hbhvil_u:5292: vilayaṃ yānti pāpāni himaṃ sūryodaye yathā // Hbhv_6.140 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5294: śaṅkham udvahate yas tu śvetadvīpe vasec ciram // Hbhv_6.141 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5295: natvā śaṅkhaṃ kare dhṛtvā mantreṇānena vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5296: yaḥ snāpayati govindaṃ tasya puṇyam anantakam // Hbhv_6.142 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5298: tvaṃ purā sāgarotpanno viṣṇunā vidhṛtaḥ kare /
GR14hbhvil_u:5299: mānitaḥ sarva-devaiś ca pāñcajanya namo 'stu te // Hbhv_6.143 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5303: tava nādena pātāle pāñcajanya namo 'stu te // Hbhv_6.145 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5306: udake nābhimātre tu yaḥ kuryād abhiṣecanam // Hbhv_6.146 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5307: prāk srotasi ca nadyāṃ vai naras tv ekāgra-mānasaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5308: yāvaj jīva-kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tat-kṣaṇād eva naśyati // Hbhv_6.147 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5311: tasya janma-kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tat-kṣaṇād eva naśyati // Hbhv_6.148 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5315: nālikāyāṃ svabhāvena yadi chidraṃ bhaven nahi // Hbhv_6.150 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5318: yato bhagavato viṣṇos tat sadā paramaṃ priyam // Hbhv_6.151 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5322: jaya-dhvaniṃ tato mantramātaḥ svāhety udīrya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:5323: abhyarcya vādayan ghaṇṭāṃ dhūpaṃ nīcaiḥ pradāpayet // Hbhv_6.153 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5325: na tayā ca vinā kuryāt pūjanaṃ siddhi-lālasaḥ // Hbhv_6.154 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5329: purato vāsudevasya tasya puṇya-phalaṃ śṛṇu // Hbhv_6.155 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5335: yaḥ snāpayati govindaṃ jīvan-mukto bhaved dhi saḥ // Hbhv_6.158 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5336: vāditrāṇām abhāve tu pūjā-kāle hi sarvadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5337: ghaṇṭā-śabdo naraiḥ kāryaḥ sarva-vādya-mayī yataḥ // Hbhv_6.159 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5339: tasmāt sarva-prayatnena ghaṇṭā-nādaṃ tu kārayet // Hbhv_6.160 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5341: ghaṇṭā-nādena deveśaḥ prīto bhavati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_6.161 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5344: prahlāda tvat-samo nāsti mad-bhakto bhuvana-traye // Hbhv_6.162 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5345: mama nāmāṅkitā ghaṇṭā purato mama tiṣṭhati /
GR14hbhvil_u:5346: arcitā vaiṣṇava-gṛhe tatra māṃ viddhi daityaja // Hbhv_6.163 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5348: mamāgre sthāpayed yas tu dehe tasya vasāmy aham // Hbhv_6.164 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5349: yas tu vādayate ghaṇṭā vainateyena cihnitām /
GR14hbhvil_u:5350: dhūpe nīrājanae snāne pūjā-kāle vilepane // Hbhv_6.165 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5351: mamāgre pratyahaṃ vatsa pratyekaṃ labhate phalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5354: ghaṇṭā-nādena tusṭo 'haṃ prayacchāmi svakaṃ padam // Hbhv_6.167 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5356: vādanāt kurute nāśaṃ janma-mṛtyu-bhayasya ca // Hbhv_6.168 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5358: prītiṃ karoti daityendra lakṣmīṃ prāpya yathādhanaḥ // Hbhv_6.169 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5359: dṛṣṭvāmṛtaṃ yathā devāḥ prītiṃ kurvanty aharniśam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5360: suparṇe ca tathā prītiṃ ghaṇṭā-śikhara-saṃsthite // Hbhv_6.170 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5362: madīyārcana-kāle tu phalaṃ koṭy-aindavaṃ kalau // Hbhv_6.171 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5364: ghaṇṭā-daṇḍasya śikhare sa-cakraṃ sthāpayet tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5365: garuḍaṃ vai priyaṃ viṣṇoḥ sthāpitaṃ bhuvana-trayam // Hbhv_6.172 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5366: sa-cakra- ghaṇṭā-nādaṃ tu mṛtyu-kāle śṛṇoti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5368: sarve doṣāḥ pralīyante ghaṇṭā-nāde kṛte harau /
GR14hbhvil_u:5369: devatānāṃ munīndrāṇāṃ pitṝṇām utsavo bhavet // Hbhv_6.174 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5371: ghaṇṭā-nādena bhaktānāṃ prasādaṃ kurute hariḥ // Hbhv_6.175 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5372: gṛhe yasmin bhaven nityaṃ ghaṇṭā nāgāri-saṃyutā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5373: na sarpāṇāṃ bhayaṃ tatra nāgni-vidyut-samudbhavam // Hbhv_6.176 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5374: yasya ghaṇṭā gṛhe nāsti śaṅkhaś ca purato hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5375: kathaṃ bhāgavataṃ nāma gīyate tasya dehinaḥ // Hbhv_6.177 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5378: saṅgṛhyā vaiṣṇavair yatnāc cakreṇopari maṇḍitā // Hbhv_6.178 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5380: gītaṃ nṛtyaṃ purāṇādi-paṭhanaṃ ca praśasyate // Hbhv_6.179 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5383: snāna-kāle tu kṛṣṇasya śaṅkhādīnāṃ tu vādanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5384: kurute brahma-loke tu vasate brahma-vāsaram // Hbhv_6.180 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5385: snāna-kāle tu samprāpte kṛṣṇasyāgre tu nartanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5386: gītaṃ caiva punāty atra ṛcoktaṃ vadanena hi // Hbhv_6.181 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5389: arcanaṃ vāsudevasya sa-nṛtyaṃ mokṣadaṃ nṝṇām // Hbhv_6.182 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5390: gītaṃ vādyaṃ ca nṛtyaṃ ca tathā pustaka-vācanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5391: pūjā-kāle tu kṛṣṇasya sarvadā keśava-priyam // Hbhv_6.183 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5393: pūjā-kāle tv idaṃ putra sarvadā prīti-dāyakam // Hbhv_6.184/
GR14hbhvil_u:5395: stava-rājaṃ mini-śreṣṭha gajendrasya ca mokṣaṇam // Hbhv_6.185 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5401: snāna-kāle tu kṛṣṇasya jaya-śabdaṃ karoti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5404: nottāna-śāyī bhavati mātur aṅke nareśvara // Hbhv_6.189 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5411: viyogam āpnoti naraḥ sarvānarthair na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_6.191 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5413: viṣṇor nāma-sahasraṃ tu pūjā-kāle paṭhanti ye /
GR14hbhvil_u:5414: vedānāṃ caiva puṇyānāṃ phalam āpnoti mānavaḥ // Hbhv_6.192 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5416: paṭhitena phalaṃ proktaṃ na tat kratu-śatair api // Hbhv_6.193 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5417: mantra-hīnaṃ kriyā-hīnaṃ yat kṛtaṃ pūjanaṃ hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5421: nāmnāṃ sahasraṃ viṣṇos tu prajahāti mahā-rujam // Hbhv_6.195 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5423: vilayaṃ yānti vai nūnam anya-pāpe tu kā kathā // Hbhv_6.196 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5425: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya viṣṇor nāma-sahasrakam // Hbhv_6.197 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5427: adhītās tena vai vedāḥ surāḥ sarva-samarcitāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5428: nāmnāṃ sahasraṃ yo 'dhīte muktis tasya kare sthitā // Hbhv_6.198 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5430: paṭhen nāma-sahasras tu durgandhaṃ na sa paśyati // Hbhv_6.199 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5431: muktvā nāma-sahasras tu nānyo dharmo 'sti kaścana /
GR14hbhvil_u:5432: kalau prāpte guḍākeśa satyam etan mayeritam // Hbhv_6.200 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5433: yajñair dānais tapabhiś ca stavaiḥ prītir na me'rjuna /
GR14hbhvil_u:5434: santuṣṭis tu na cānyena vinā nāma-sahasrakam // Hbhv_6.201 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5435: stavaṃ nāma-sahasrākhyaṃ ye na jānanti vai kalau /
GR14hbhvil_u:5436: bhramanti te narī̀a loke sarva-dharma-bahiṣkṛtāḥ // Hbhv_6.202 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5438: pūjyate mama sānnidhye pūjāṃ gṛhṇāmi tasya vai // Hbhv_6.203 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5439: yasmin nāma-sahasraṃ me gṛhe tiṣṭhati sarvadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5440: likhitaṃ pāṇḍava-śreṣṭha tatra no viśate kaliḥ // Hbhv_6.204 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5441: tasmāt tvam api kaunteya mad-bhakto man-manā bhava /
GR14hbhvil_u:5442: paṭhan nāma-sahasraṃ me sarvān kāmān avāpsyasi // Hbhv_6.205 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5444: tato nāma-sahasraṃ me prāptaṃ loka-hitaṃ param // Hbhv_6.206 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5445: nāradena tataḥ pūrvaṃ prāptaṃ ca parameṣṭhinaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5451: dattaṃ bhavānyai rudreṇa nāmnāṃ me hi sahasrakam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5452: viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu mayā te parikīrtitam // Hbhv_6.210 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5454: sadyaḥ prīti-karaṃ puṇyaṃ surāṇām amṛtaṃ yathā // Hbhv_6.211 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5459: aparādha-sahasreṇa na sa lipyet kadācana // Hbhv_6.213 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5462: gītā sugītā kartavyā kim anyaiḥ śāstra-vistaraiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5463: yā svayaṃ padma-nābhasya mukha-padmād viniḥsṛtā // Hbhv_6.214 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5465: sarva-dharma-mayī yasmāt tasmād etāṃ samabhyaset // Hbhv_6.215 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5466: śālagrāma-śilāgre tu gītādhyāyaṃ paṭhet tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5468: hatvā hatvā jagat sarvaṃ muṣitvā sa-carācaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:5469: pāpair na lipyate caiva gītādhyāyī kathañcana // Hbhv_6.217 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5470: teneṣṭaṃ kratubhiḥ sarvair dattaṃ tena gavāyutam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5471: gītām abhyasyatā nityaṃ tenāptaṃ padam avyayam // Hbhv_6.218 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5472: gītādhyāyaṃ paṭhed yas tu ślokaṃ ślokārdham eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5473: bhava-pāpa-vinirmukto yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // Hbhv_6.219 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5474: yo nityaṃ viśva-rūpākhyam adhyāyaṃ paṭhati dvijaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5475: vibhūtiṃ deva-devasya tasya puṇyaṃ vadāmy aham // Hbhv_6.220 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5476: vedair adhītair yat puṇyaṃ setihāsaiḥ purātanaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5477: ślokenaikena tat puṇyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_6.221 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5479: viśva-rūpaṃ sadādhyāyaṃ vibhūtiṃ ca paṭhet tu yaḥ // Hbhv_6.222 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5480: ahany ahani yo martyo gītādhyāyaṃ paṭhet tu vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:5481: dvātriṃśad-aparādhāṃs tu kṣamate tasya keśavaḥ // Hbhv_6.223 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5483: dine dine ca yajate hariṃ cātra na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_6.224 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5484: caturṇām eva vedānāṃ sāram uddhṛtya viṣṇunā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5487: gītā-gaṅgodakaṃ pītvā punar janma na vidyate // Hbhv_6.226 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5488: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ cāpīcchatā sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5489: śrotavyā paṭhanīyā ca gītā kṛṣṇa-mukhodgatā // Hbhv_6.227 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5490: yo naraḥ paṭhate nityaṃ gītā-śāstraṃ dine dine /
GR14hbhvil_u:5491: vimuktaḥ sarva-pāpebhyo yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // Hbhv_6.228 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5494: vicārayanti ye śāstraṃ vedābhyāsa-ratāś ca ye /
GR14hbhvil_u:5495: purāṇaṃ saṃhitāṃ ye ca śrāvayanti paṭhanti ca // Hbhv_6.229 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5496: vyākurvanti smṛtiṃ ye ca ye dharma-pratibodhakāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5497: vedānteṣu niṣaṇṇā ye tair iyaṃ jagatī dhṛtā // Hbhv_6.230 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5499: gacchanti brahmaṇo lokaṃ yatra moho na vidyate // Hbhv_6.231 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5503: vedārthād adhikaṃ manye purāṇārthaṃ ca bhāmini /
GR14hbhvil_u:5504: purāṇam anyathā kṛtvā tiryag-yonim avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_6.233 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5507: tair arjitāni puṇyāni kṣayaṃ yānti dvijottamāḥ // Hbhv_6.234 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5509: pravadanty artha-vādatvaṃ ye te naraka-bhājanāḥ // Hbhv_6.235 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5511: śrotavyāni bhaktyā tenaiva purāṇāni na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_6.236 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5512: purārjitāni pāpāni naśam āyānti tasya vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:5513: purāṇa-śravaṇe buddhis tasyaiva bhavati dhruvam // Hbhv_6.237 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5519: śanaiḥ saṃmārjya gātrāṇi divye vastre samarpayet // Hbhv_6.239 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5521: ke'py atra kañcukosṇīṣādy-ambarāṇy arpayanti ca // Hbhv_6.240 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5525: alaṅkurvīta sa-prema mad-bhakto māṃ yathocitam // Hbhv_6.242 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5527: vāsobhiḥ pūjayed viṣṇuṃ yny evātma-priyāṇi tu /
GR14hbhvil_u:5528: tathānyaiś ca śubhiar divyair arcayec ca dukūlaiḥ // Hbhv_6.243 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5529: vāsāṃsi ca vicitrāṇi sāravanti śucīni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:5530: dhūpitāni harer dadyāt vikeśāni navāni ca // Hbhv_6.244/ //
GR14hbhvil_u:5532: bhogānantaram eveti bahūnāṃ sammataṃ satām // Hbhv_6.245 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5536: tasya lakṣārjitasyāpi bhavet pāpasya mārjanam // Hbhv_6.246 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5540: soma-loke vasitvā tu viṣṇu-loke mahīyate // Hbhv_6.247 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5543: rūpavanti harer dattvā sadaśāni navāni ca // Hbhv_6.248 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5544: yāvad vastrasya tantunā parimāṇaṃ bhavaty atha /
GR14hbhvil_u:5548: kārpāsikaṃ vastra-yugaṃ yaḥ pradadyāj janārdane // Hbhv_6.250 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5552: sūkṣmatā ca yathā viprās tathā proktaṃ phalaṃ mahat // Hbhv_6.252 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5559: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi sumṛdūni laghūni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:5560: yaḥ prayacchati devāya so 'śvamedha-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_6.255 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5561: rāṅkavā mṛga-lomyāś ca kadalyāś ca tathā śubhā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5562: yo dadyād deva-devāya so 'śvamedha-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_6.256 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5564: dattvā vāsāṃsi śubhrāṇi rājasūya-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_6.257 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5568: manvantarāṇi vasate tantu-saṃkhyaṃ harer gṛhe // Hbhv_6.258 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5571: nīlī-raktaṃ tathā jīrṇaṃ vastram anya-dhṛtaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5572: deva-devāya yo dadyāt sa tu pāpair hi yujyate // Hbhv_6.259 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5575: āvike paṭṭa-vastre ca nīlī-rāgo na duṣyati // Hbhv_6.260 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5578: upavītaṃ samārpyātha tan-mudrāṃ ca pradarśayet // Hbhv_6.261 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5580: trivṛt śuklaṃ ca pītaṃ ca paṭṭa-sūtrādi-nirmitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5581: yajñopavītaṃ govinde dattvā vedāntago bhavet // Hbhv_6.262 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5584: bhaved vidvāṃś caturvedī śuddha-dhīr nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_6.263 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5587: nirmāya bhāle kṛṣṇasya dadyād ācamanaṃ tataḥ // Hbhv_6.264 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5589: tato devāya divyāni bhūṣaṇāni nivedya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:5590: paridhāpya yathā-yuktaṃ tan-mudrāṃ ca pradarśayet // Hbhv_6.265 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5594: sva-śaktyā bhūṣaṇaṃ dattvā agniṣṭoma-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_6.266 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5597: indrasya bhavane tiṣṭhed yāvad āhūta-samplavam // Hbhv_6.267 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5598: tasmād ābharaṇaṃ devi dātavyaṃ viṣṇave sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5599: nārāyaṇo bhavet prīto bhaktyā paramayā mubhe // Hbhv_6.268 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5601: alaṅkāraṃ tu yo dadyād viprāyātha surāya vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5603: jātaḥ pṛthivyāṃ kāena bhaved dvīpa-patir nṛpaḥ // Hbhv_6.269 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5606: aśvamedham avāpnoti saubhāgyaṃ cāpi vindati // Hbhv_6.270 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5617: praśāsti nihatāmitro nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Hbhv_6.276 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5618: saubhāgyaṃ mahad āpnoti kiṅkiṇīṃ pradadad dhareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5623: nāryaś ca vaśagās tasya bhavati dvija-puṅgavāḥ // Hbhv_6.279 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5624: dattvā pratisarān mukhyān na bhūtair abhibhūyate // Hbhv_6.280 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5627: pratirūpa-kṛtaṃ dattvā kṣipraṃ puṣṭyā prayujyate // Hbhv_6.281 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5633: mukuṭaiḥ kaṭakādyaiś ca yo viṣṇuṃ pūjayen naraḥ // Hbhv_6.283 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5635: indra-loke vased dhīmān yāvad indraś caturdaśa // Hbhv_6.284 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5638: ratnair muktāviśeṣeṇa ahany ahani vāsava // Hbhv_6.285 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5640: vāso bhavati devendra kathitaṃ brahmaṇā mama // Hbhv_6.286 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5642: sakṛd bhaktyā kalau śakra punāty āsaptamaṃ kulam // Hbhv_6.287 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5654: kastūrikāyā dvau bhāgau catvāraś candanasya tu /
GR14hbhvil_u:5655: kuṅkumasya trayaś caikaḥ śaśinaḥ syāc catuḥsamam // Hbhv_6.292 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5656: karpūraṃ candanaṃ darpaḥ kuṅkumaṃ ca catuḥsama /
GR14hbhvil_u:5657: sarvaṃ gandham iti proktaṃ samasta-sura-vallabham // Hbhv_6.293 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5659: karpūraṃ kuṅkumaś caiva varaṃ tagaram eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:5660: rasyaṃ ca candanaṃ caiva aguruṃ guggulaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5661: etair vilepanaṃ dadyāt śubhaṃ cāru vicakṣaṇaḥ // Hbhv_6.294 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5664: tathānyaiś ca śubhair dravyair arcayej jagatī-patim // Hbhv_6.295 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5669: gandhebhyaś candanaṃ puṇyaṃ candanād agurur varaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5670: kṛṣṇāgurus tataḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kuṅkumaṃ tu tato 'dhikam // Hbhv_6.297 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5676: śukenoktaṃ purāṇe ca tathā tulasi-candanam // Hbhv_6.299 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5682: vilepayanti deveśaṃ śaṅkhe kṛtvā tu candanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5683: paramātmā parāṃ prītiṃ karoti śatvārṣikīm // Hbhv_6.301 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5686: vilepayanti yo nityaṃ labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam // Hbhv_6.302 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5689: vilipya bhaktyā rājendra kalpa-koṭiṃ vased divi // Hbhv_6.303 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5692: anulipto harir bhaktyā varān bhogān prayacchati // Hbhv_6.304 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5693: kāleyakaṃ turuṣkaṃ ca rakta-candanam uttamam // Hbhv_6.305 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5694: nṛṇāṃ bhavanti dattāni puṇyāni puruṣottama // Hbhv_6.306 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5697: śārīrair mānasair duḥkhais tathaiva ca vimucyate // Hbhv_6.307 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5699: saubhāgyam uttamaṃ loke tathā prāpnoti mānavaḥ // Hbhv_6.308 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5701: śārīrair mānasair duḥkhais tathaiva ca vimucyate // Hbhv_6.309 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5702: dattvā mṛgamadaṃ mukhyaṃ yaśasā ca virājate /
GR14hbhvil_u:5705: saubhāgyam atulaṃ loke balaṃ prāpnoti cottamam // Hbhv_6.311 //
