GR14hbhvil_u:5710: aśvamedhasya mukhyasya phalaṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam // Hbhv_6.313 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5712: pārthivādyāni yāvanti paramāṇūni tatra vai // Hbhv_6.314 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5713: tāvad abdāni lokeṣu kāmacārī bhavaty asau /
GR14hbhvil_u:5717: gandharvatvaṃ dhruvaṃ tasya saubhāgyaṃ tathottamam // Hbhv_6.317 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5721: yugāni vasate svarge hy anantāni narottama // Hbhv_6.318 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5723: yo 'rcayen mālatī-puṣpair na bhūya-stanapo bhavet // Hbhv_6.319 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5725: nirdahet pātakaṃ sarvaṃ pūrva-janma-śataiḥ kṛtam // Hbhv_6.320 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5727: pitṝṇāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa sadābhīṣṭaṃ harer yathā // Hbhv_6.321 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5729: bhavate yasya dehe tu harir bhūtvā hariṃ vrajet // Hbhv_6.322 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5730: tāvan malaya-jaṃ viṣṇor bhāti kṛṣṇāgurur nṛpa /
GR14hbhvil_u:5731: yāvan na dṛśyate puṇyaṃ tulasī-kāṣṭha-candanam // Hbhv_6.323 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5733: yāvan na dīyate viṣṇos tulasī-kāṣṭha-candanam // Hbhv_6.324 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5735: dhundhumāra na vai martyāḥ punar āyānti te bhuvi // Hbhv_6.325 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5736: yo hi bhāgavato bhūtvā kalau tulasī-candanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5737: nārpayati sadā viṣṇor na sa bhāgavato naraḥ // Hbhv_6.326 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5739: na tena sadṛśo loke vaiṣṇavo vidyate bhuvi /
GR14hbhvil_u:5742: vilipya bhaktito viṣṇuṃ ramate sannidhau hareḥ // Hbhv_6.328/ //
GR14hbhvil_u:5744: yaḥ kuryād viṣṇu-toṣāya kapilāgo-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_6.329 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5748: teṣāṃ sa kurute tṛptiṃ śrāddhe vai śatavārṣikīm // Hbhv_6.331 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5753: mandire vasate yasya tasya puṇya-phalaṃ śṛṇu // Hbhv_6.333 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5755: tat tulyaṃ jāyate puṇyaṃ prasādāc cakra-pāṇinaḥ // Hbhv_6.334 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5758: yathā kiñcit sugandhitvāc candanaṃ deva-dārujam // Hbhv_6.335 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5760: harer malayajaṃ śreṣṭham abhāve devadārujam // Hbhv_6.336 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5764: uśīraṃ citta-vibhraṃśam anye kuryur upadravam // Hbhv_6.337 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5766: padmakādi na dātavyam aihikaṃ hīcchatā sukham /
GR14hbhvil_u:5767: mukhyālābhe tu tat sarvaṃ dātavyaṃ bhagavat-paraiḥ // Hbhv_6.338 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5769: vidvān vicitrair vyajanaiś cāmarair api vījanam // Hbhv_6.339 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5773: vāyu-lokam avāpnoti puruṣas tena karmaṇā // Hbhv_6.340 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5774: cāmarair vījayed yas tu devadevaṃ janārdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5778: tat-kule yama-loke tu śamate nārako daraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5779: vāyu-lokān mahīpāla na cyutir vidyate punaḥ // Hbhv_6.343 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5782: uṣṇa-kāle tv idaṃ jñeyaṃ yat santaḥ pauṣa-māghayoḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5783: śītalatvān malayajam api naivārpayanti hi // Hbhv_6.345 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5795: tataś ca dhūpam utsṛjya nīcais tan-mudrayārpayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:5796: kṛṣṇaṃ saṅkīrtayan ghaṇṭam vāma-hastena vādayan // Hbhv_8.2 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5799: nīrājaneṣu sarveṣu viṣṇor nāmāni kīrtayet // Hbhv_8.3 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5801: tathā maṅgala-ghoṣaṃ ca jagad-bījasya ca stutim // Hbhv_8.4 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5804: dhūpa-sthānaṃ samabhyarcya tarjanyā vāmayā hareḥ // Hbhv_8.5 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5811: śaṅkho jāti-phalaṃ śrīśe dhūpāni syuḥ priyāṇi vai // Hbhv_8.7 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5816: tathaiva śubha-gandhā ye dhūpas te jagataḥ pateḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5821: vinā mṛgamadaṃ dhūpe jīva-jātaṃ vivarjayet // Hbhv_8.11 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5823: na yakṣa-dhūpaṃ vitaren madhavaya kadacana // Hbhv_8.12 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5825: na sallakijaṃ na tṛṇam na śalka-rasa-sambhrtaṃ dhūpam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5830: dhūpaṃ dadāti rajendra narasiṃhasya bhaktimān // Hbhv_8.14 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5835: ye kṛṣṇa-guruṇā kṛṣṇaṃ dhūpayanti kalau narāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5836: sa-karpūreṇa rājendra kṛṣṇa-tulyā bhavanti te // Hbhv_8.16 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5838: dhūpayitvā naro yāti padaṃ tasya sadā-śivaṃ // Hbhv_8.17 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5840: dattvā nityaṃ harer bhaktyā kulānāṃ tārayec chatam // Hbhv_8.18 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5843: dhūpaṃ turuṣkakaṃ dattvā vahnistoma-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_8.19 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5844: dattvā tu kṛtrimaṃ mukhyaṃ sarva-kāmān avāpnuyāt /
GR14hbhvil_u:5847: vasante guggulaṃ dattvā vahnistomaṃ avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_8.21 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5849: turuṣkasya pradānena pravṛṣy uttamatāṃ labhet // Hbhv_8.22 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5853: padam uttamaṃ āpnoti dhūpa-daḥ puṣṭim aśnute /
GR14hbhvil_u:5855: tathāivordhva-gato nityaṃ dhūpa-dānād bhaven naraḥ // Hbhv_8.25 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5858: śata-kratu-samaṃ puṇyaṃ go 'yutaṃ labhate phalaṃ // Hbhv_8.26 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5861: dhūpa-śeṣaṃ tato bhaktyā svayaṃ seveta vaiṣṇavaḥ // Hbhv_8.27 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5862: tathā ca brāhme ambarisaṃ prati gautama-praśne --
GR14hbhvil_u:5863: dhūpa-śeṣaṃ tu kṛṣṇasya bhaktyā bhajasi bhūpate /
GR14hbhvil_u:5864: kṛtvā cārātrikaṃ viṣṇoḥ sva-mūrdhnā vandase nṛpa // Hbhv_8.28 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5867: dhūpayed vaiṣṇavo yas tu sa mukto narakārṇavat // Hbhv_8.29 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5871: karoti nirmalaṃ dehaṃ dhūpa-śeṣas tathā hareḥ // Hbhv_8.30 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5872: na bhayaṃ vidyate tasya bhaumaṃ divyaṃ rāsātalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5874: nāpado vipadas tasya bhavanti khalu dehinaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5875: harer dattāvaśeṣena dhūpayed yas tanuṃ sadā // Hbhv_8.32 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5876: nāsaukhyaṃ na bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ nādhijaṃ naiva rogajam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5877: yaḥ sevayed dhūpa-śeṣaṃ viṣṇor adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ // Hbhv_8.33 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5878: krūra-sattva-bhayaṃ naiva na ca caura-bhayaṃ kvacit /
GR14hbhvil_u:5879: sevayitvā harer dhūpaṃ nirmālyaṃ padayor jalam // Hbhv_8.34 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5881: āghrāṇaṃ yad dharer dattaṃ dhūpocchiṣṭasya sarvataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5885: sarvaṃ anye'pi vindanti tac cāgre vyatiṃ eṣyati // Hbhv_8.36 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5887: tathaiṭa dīpam utsṛjya prāgvad ghaṇṭaṃ ca vādayan /
GR14hbhvil_u:5894: dīpaṃ prajvalayet śaktau karpūrena ghṛtena vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5900: ghṛtena dīpo dātavyo rājan tailena vā punaḥ // Hbhv_8.41 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5902: haviṣā prathamaḥ kalpo dvitīyaś cauṣadhorasaiḥ // Hbhv_8.42 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5905: vasā-majjādibhir dīpo na tu deyaḥ kadācana // Hbhv_8.43 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5907: vasā-majjāsthi-niryāsair na kāryaḥ puṣṭiṃ icchata // Hbhv_8.44 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5911: dīpa-vṛkṣaś ca kartavyas taijāsādyaiś ca bhairava /
GR14hbhvil_u:5912: vṛkṣeṣu dīpo dātavyo na tu bhūmau kadācana // Hbhv_8.46 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5916: aśvamedhaṃ avāpnoti kulaṃ caiva samuddharet // Hbhv_8.47 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5918: yo dadāti mahī-pāla kṛṣṇasyāgre tu dīpakam /
GR14hbhvil_u:5919: pātakaṃ tu samutsṛjya jyotī-rūpaṃ labhet phalam // Hbhv_8.48 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5921: dīpaṃ dadāti yo devi mad-bhaktyā tu vyavasthitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5922: nātrāndhatvaṃ bhavet tasya sapta-janmani sundari // Hbhv_8.49 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5923: yas tu dadyāt pradīpaṃ me sarvataḥ sraddhayānvitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5926: dattaṃ sva-jyotiṣe jyotir yad vistārayati prabhām /
GR14hbhvil_u:5927: tadvad dharyati saj-jyotir dātuḥ pāpatamo 'pahaṃ // Hbhv_8.51 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5929: ghṛtena vātha tailena dīpaṃ prajvalayen naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5930: viṣṇave vidhivad bhaktyā tasya puṇya-phalaṃ śṛṇu // Hbhv_8.52 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5934: ca tulasī-pavakenaiva dīpaṃ yaḥ kurute hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5937: paścād dīpaṃ ca taṃ bhaktyā mūrdhnā vandeta vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5938: dhūpasyevekṣaṇāt tasya labhante'nye'pi tat phalam // Hbhv_8.55 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5939: kecic cānena dīpena śrī-mūrter mūrdhni vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5945: avadhūpyābhyarcya vādyair mūrdhni nīrājayet prabhum // Hbhv_8.58 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5947: ata eveṣyate tasya karābhyāṃ vandanaṃ ca taiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5948: nāma cārātrikety ādi vartyo 'pi bahulāḥ samāḥ // Hbhv_8.59 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5950: dīpa-dānasya māhātmyaṃ kārttikīyaṃ ca tad vinā // Hbhv_8.60 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5953: dīpa-dānāt paraṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:5955: atīva bhrājate lakṣmyā divam āsādya sarvataḥ // Hbhv_8.61 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5956: dīpa-mālāṃ prayacchanti ye narāḥ śārṅgiṇo gṛhe /
GR14hbhvil_u:5957: bhavanti te candra-samāḥ svargam āsādya mānavāḥ // Hbhv_8.62 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5959: keśavālayam āsādya loke bhāti sa śakravat // Hbhv_8.63 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5961: tathā nityojjvalo loke nākapṛṣṭhe virājate // Hbhv_8.64 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5962: sa-dīpe ca yathā dese cakṣūṃsi phalavanti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:5963: tathā dīpasya dataro bhavanti sa-phalekṣanaḥ // Hbhv_8.65 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5964: ekādaśyāṃ ca dvādaśyāṃ prati-pakṣaṃ tu yo naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5965: dīpaṃ dadāti kṛṣṇāya tasya puṇya-phalaṃ śṛṇu // Hbhv_8.66 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5969: virogaḥ subhagaś caiva dattvā bhavati mānavaḥ // Hbhv_8.68 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5971: kiṃ punar vāsudevasyānantasya tu mahātmanaḥ // Hbhv_8.69 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5974: ūrdhvaṃ yathā dīpa-śikhā dātā cordhva-gatis tathā // Hbhv_8.70 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5979: tenāpi mama duṣkarma nihśeṣaṃ kṣayam agatam // Hbhv_8.72 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5981: vilīyate sva-haste tu sva-tantre sati dīpakaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5982: mahā-phalo viṣṇu-gṛhe na datto narakāya saḥ // Hbhv_8.73 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5987: kartavyaṃ bhakti-bhāvena sarva-dānādhikaś ca yat // Hbhv_8.75 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5994: kṛṣṇa-pakṣe viśeṣeṇa tatrāpi sa viśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_8.77 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5995: amāvasyā ca nirdiṣṭā dvādaśī ca mahāphalā /
GR14hbhvil_u:5996: aśva-yujyām atītāyāṃ kṛṣṇa-pakṣaś ca yo bhavet // Hbhv_8.78 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5997: amāvasyā tadā puṇyā dvādaśī ca viśeṣataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:5998: devasya dakṣiṇe pārśve deyā taila-tulā nṛpa // Hbhv_8.79 //
GR14hbhvil_u:5999: palāṣṭaka-yutāṃ rājan vartti tatra ca dāpayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:6000: vāsasā tu samagreṇa sopavāso jitendriyaḥ // Hbhv_8.80 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6002: svar-lokaṃ su-ciraṃ bhuktvā jāyate bhū-tale yadā // Hbhv_8.81 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6004: rāṣṭre ca jāyate svasmin deśe ca nagare tathā // Hbhv_8.82 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6005: kule ca rāja-śārdūla tatra syād dīpavat-prabhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6006: pratyujjvalaś ca bhavati yuddheṣu kalaheṣu ca // Hbhv_8.83 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6007: khyātiṃ yāti tathā loke sad-guṇānāṃ ca sad-guṇaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6008: ekam apy atha yo dadyād abhīṣṭatamayor dvayoḥ // Hbhv_8.84 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6009: manuṣye sarvam āpnoti yad uktaṃ te mahānagha /
GR14hbhvil_u:6010: svarge tathātvam āpnoti bhoga-kāle tu yādava // Hbhv_8.85 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6011: samānyasya tu dīpasya rājan dānaṃ mahāphalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6012: kiṃ punar mahato dīpasyātreyatta na vidyate // Hbhv_8.86 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6014: śoṇaṃ vādarakaṃ vastraṃ jīrṇaṃ malinam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6015: upabhuktaṃ na vā dadyāt varttikārthaṃ kadācana // Hbhv_8.87 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6017: svayam anyena vā dattaṃ dīpān na śrī-harer haret /
GR14hbhvil_u:6018: nirvāpayen na hiṃsāc ca śubhaṃ icchan kadācana // Hbhv_8.88 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6021: dattvā dīpo na hartavyas tena karma vijānatā /
GR14hbhvil_u:6022: nirvāpanaṃ ca dīpasya hiṃsanaṃ ca vigarhitam // Hbhv_8.89 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6023: yaḥ kuryād dhiṃsanaṃ tena karmaṇā puṣpitekṣaṇaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6024: dīpa-hartā bhaved andhaḥ kaṇo nirvāṇa-kṛd bhavet // Hbhv_8.90 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6027: dyutodyotaya govinda-gehād dīpaḥ purā hṛtaḥ // Hbhv_8.91 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6031: tasmād āyātane viṣṇor dadyād dīpān dvijottama /
GR14hbhvil_u:6032: tāmś ca dattvā na hiṃseta na ca taila-viyojitān // Hbhv_8.93 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6033: kurvīta dīpa-hantā ca mūko 'ndho jāyate mṛtaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6034: andhe tamasi duṣpare narake pacyate kila // Hbhv_8.94 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6037: dīpa-vṛkṣaś ca kartavyas taijāsādyaiś ca bhairava /
GR14hbhvil_u:6038: vṛkṣeṣu dīpo dātavyo na tu bhūmau kadācana // Hbhv_8.95 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6040: dattvā puṣpāñjaliṃ pīṭhaṃ padyam ācamanaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:6041: kṛtvā pātreṣu kṛṣṇāyārpayed bhojyaṃ yathā-vidhi // Hbhv_8.96 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6045: tena saṃśoṣya tad-doṣam agni-bījaṃ ca dakṣiṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:6046: dhyātvā kara-tale'nyat tat pṛṣṭhe saṃyojya darśyate // Hbhv_8.98 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6050: tad-utthayā nivedyaṃ tat siced amṛta-dhārayā // Hbhv_8.100 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6052: sarvaṃ vicintya saṃspṛśya mūlaṃ vārāṣṭakaṃ japet // Hbhv_8.101 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6054: tac ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca sampūjya gṛhitvā kusumāñjalim // Hbhv_8.102 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6055: śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ prārthya tad-vaktrāt tejo dhyātvā vinirgatam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6056: saṃyojya ca nivedyaitat patraṃ vāmena saṃspṛśan // Hbhv_8.103 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6058: svāhāntaṃ mūlam uccārya taj-jalaṃ visṛjed bhuvi // Hbhv_8.104 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6060: patrāḍhyaṃ tasya mantreṇa bhaktyā bhāgavate'rpayet // Hbhv_8.105 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6062: nivedayami bhavate jusanedaṃ havir hare // Hbhv_8.106 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6069: tataḥ spṛśamś ca karayor aṅguṣṭhābhyām anāmike /
GR14hbhvil_u:6070: pradarśayen nivedyasya mudrāṃ tasya manuṃ japan // Hbhv_8.109 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6076: nivedyasya manutvena svābhīṣṭaṃ manum eva te /
GR14hbhvil_u:6077: ekāntino japantas tu grāsa-mudrāṃ vitanvate // Hbhv_8.111 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6078: na ca dhyāyante te kṛṣṇa-vaktrāt tejo-vinirgamam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6082: lehyaṃ peyaṃ su-cūṣyaṃ sitam amṛta-phalaṃ ghārikādyaṃ sukhādyam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6087: nīrājanaiś ca haraye dadyād dīpāsanaṃ budhaḥ // Hbhv_8.114 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6091: hairaṇyaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ kaṃsyaṃ mṛn-mayam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6092: palāśaṃ padma-patraṃ ca pātraṃ viṣṇor ati-priyam // Hbhv_8.115 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6094: patrāṇāṃ tu pradānena narakaṃ ca na gacchati // Hbhv_8.116 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6099: vasv-aṅgula-vihīnaṃ tu na pātraṃ kārayet kvacit // Hbhv_8.117 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6103: saṃyāva-dadhi-sūpāmś ca naivedyaṃ sati kalpayet // Hbhv_8.118 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6105: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāti-priyam ātmanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6106: tat tan nivedayen mahyaṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate // Hbhv_8.119 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6111: naivedyaṃ kalpayed viṣṇos tad-abhāve ca pāyasaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:6115: tila-mudgādayo māṣā vrīhayaś ca priyā hareḥ // Hbhv_8.122 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6118: niṣpaṇṇaṃ sva-gṛhe yad vā śraddhayā kalpayed dhareḥ // Hbhv_8.123 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6120: puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ tathā dīpaṃ naivedyaṃ su-manoharam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6123: phalāni caiva pakvāni nāgaraṅgādikāni ca // Hbhv_8.125 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6124: anyāni vidhinā dattvā bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6125: evam ādini dāpayed bhaktito nrpa // Hbhv_8.126 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6127: yas tu bhāgavato devi annād yena tu prīṇayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:6128: prīṇitas tiṣṭhate'sau vā bahu-janmāni mādhavi // Hbhv_8.127 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6130: mantreṇa me pradīyeta na kiṃcid api saṃspṛśet // Hbhv_8.128 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6132: kharjurāmś cāsanāmś caiva mānavāmś ca parūṣakān // Hbhv_8.129 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6134: paippalaṃ kaṇṭakīyaṃ ca tumburuṃ ca priyaṅgukam // Hbhv_8.130 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6136: drākṣāṃ ca dāḍimaṃ caiva piṇḍa-kharjūram eva ca // Hbhv_8.131 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6137: sauvīraṃ kelikaṃ caiva tathā śubha-phalāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6138: piṇḍāraka-phalaṃ caiva punnāga-phalam eva ca // Hbhv_8.132 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6140: kumudasya phalaṃ caiva vaheḍaka-phalaṃ tathā // Hbhv_8.133 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6141: ajaṃ karkoṭakaṃ caiva tathā tala-phalāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6142: kadambaḥ kaumudaṃ caiva dvi-vidhaṃ sthala-kañjayoḥ // Hbhv_8.134 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6144: madhu-kaṇḍeti vikhyātaṃ māhiṣaṃ kaṇḍam eva ca // Hbhv_8.135 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6146: mṛṇālaṃ pauṣkaraṃ caiva śālūkasya phalaṃ tathā // Hbhv_8.136 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6147: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ kāṇḍa-mūla-phalāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6148: etāni copayojyāni ye mayā parikalpitāḥ // Hbhv_8.137 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6149: mūlakasya tataḥ śākam ciñca-śākaṃ tathaiva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6150: śākaṃ caiva kalāyasya sarṣapasya tathaiva ca // Hbhv_8.138 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6151: vaṃsakasya tu śākaṃ ca śākam eva kalambikam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6152: ārdrakasya ca śākaṃ vai pālaṅkaṃ śākam eva ca // Hbhv_8.139 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6154: śuka-maṇḍala-patraṃ ca dvāv eva taru-vānakau // Hbhv_8.140 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6155: carasya caiva śākaṃ ca madhu-koḍḍumbaraṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:6156: ete cānye ca bahavah śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6157: karmaṇyāś caiva sarve vai ye mayā parikīrtitāḥ // Hbhv_8.141 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6158: vrīhīṇāṃ ca pravakṣyāmi upayogāmś ca mādhavi /
GR14hbhvil_u:6159: eka-cittaṃ samādhāya tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu sundari // Hbhv_8.142 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6163: yavāś ca dvi-vidhā jñeyāḥ karmaṇyā mama sundari // Hbhv_8.144 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6164: karmaṇyāś caiva mudgāś ca tilāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ kulatthakāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6167: pratigṛhṇāmy ahaṃ hy etān sarvān bhāgavatān priyān // Hbhv_8.146 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6169: ye mayaivopayojyāni gavyaṃ dadhi payo ghṛtam // Hbhv_8.147 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6172: naivedyaṃ deva-devāya yāvakaṃ pāyasaṃ tathā // Hbhv_8.148 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6174: phalānām apy abhāve tu tṛṇa-gulmauṣadhīr api // Hbhv_8.149 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6175: auṣadhīnām alābhe tu toyaṃ ca vinivedayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:6176: tad-alābhe tu sarvatra mānasaṃ pravaraṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_8.150 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6179: kalpāntaṃ viṣṇu-loke tu vasanti pitṛbhiḥ saha // Hbhv_8.151 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6182: nābhakṣyaṃ naivedyārthe bhakṣyesv apy ajā-mahiṣī-kṣīraṃ pañca-nakhā matsyāś ca // Hbhv_8.152 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6187: māhiṣaṃ cāvikaṃ cājam ayajñīyam udāhṛtam // Hbhv_8.154 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6189: māhiṣaṃ varjayen mahyaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ yadi // Hbhv_8.155 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6191: abhakṣyaṃ capy ahṛdyaṃ ca naivedyaṃ na nivedayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:6192: keśa-kīṭāvapannaṃ ca tathā cāvihitaṃ ca yat // Hbhv_8.156 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6194: uḍḍumbaraṃ kapitthaṃ ca tathā danta-śaṭhaṃ ca yat /
GR14hbhvil_u:6195: evam ādīni devāya na deyāni kadācana // Hbhv_8.157 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6199: palāṇḍuṃ laśunaṃ śuklam niryāsaṃ caiva varjayet // Hbhv_8.158 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6200: gṛñjanaṃ kiṃśukaṃ caiva kukuṇḍaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6201: uḍumbaram alābuṃ ca jagdhvā patati vai dvijaḥ // Hbhv_8.159 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6205: na bhakṣayati vṛntākaṃ tasya dūrataro hariḥ // Hbhv_8.161 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6207: dorbhyāṃ pādbhyāṃ ca jānubhyām urasā śirasā dṛśā /
GR14hbhvil_u:6208: manasā vacasā ceti praṇāmo 'ṣṭāṅga īritaḥ // Hbhv_8. 162 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6209: jānubhyām caiva bāhubhyāṃ śirasā vacasā dhiyā /
GR14hbhvil_u:6210: pañcāṅgakaḥ praṇāmaḥ syāt pūjāsu pravarāv imau // Hbhv_8. 163 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6212: yatra madyaṃ tathā māṃsam tathā vṛntāka-mūlake /
GR14hbhvil_u:6213: nivedayen naiva tatra harer aikāntikī ratiḥ // Hbhv_8.164 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6217: kalpāntaṃ tat-pitṝṇaṃ tu tṛptir bhavati śāśvatī // Hbhv_8.165 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6218: phalāni yacchate yo vai suhṛdyāni nareśvara /
GR14hbhvil_u:6219: kalpāntaṃ jāyate tasya sa-phalaṃ ca manorathaḥ // Hbhv_8.166 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6222: nivedya narasiṃhāya yāvakaṃ pāyasaṃ tathā // Hbhv_8.167 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6224: viṣṇu-loke mahā-bhogan bhuñjānas te sa-vaiṣṇavāḥ // Hbhv_8.168 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6226: anna-das tṛptim āpnoti svarga-lokaṃ ca gacchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:6230: odanaṃ vyajanopetam dattvā svargam avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_8.170 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6231: paramānnaṃ tathā dattvā tṛptim āpnoti śaśvatim /
GR14hbhvil_u:6232: viṣṇu-lokam avāpnoti kulam uddharate tathā // Hbhv_8.171 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6236: ikṣūṇāṃ ca pradānena paraṃ saubhāgyam aśnute // Hbhv_8.173 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6237: ratnānāṃ caiva bhāgī syāt svarga-lokaṃ ca gacchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:6241: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti kṣaudraṃ yaś ca prayacchati // Hbhv_8.176 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6245: vaidalānāṃ ca bhakṣyāṇāṃ dānāt kāmān avāpnuyāt /
GR14hbhvil_u:6247: modakānāṃ pradānena kāmān āpnoty abhīpsitān // Hbhv_8.179 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6251: bala-varṇam avāpnoti cūṣyāṇāṃ ca nivedane // Hbhv_8.181 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6255: mukhyaṃ caiva śaktūnāṃ vahniṣṭomam avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_8.183 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6257: dattvā haritakaṃ caiva tad eva phalam āpnuyāt // Hbhv_8.184 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6258: dattvā śākāni ramyāṇi viśokas tv abhijāyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:6259: dattvā ca vyajanārthāya tathopakaraṇāni ca // Hbhv_8.185 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6263: trapuṣer vārukaṃ dattvā puṇḍarīka-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_8.187 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6265: parūṣakaṃ tathābhraṃ ca panasaṃ nārikelakam // Hbhv_8.188 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6266: bhavyaṃ mocaṃ tathā cocam kharjūram atha dāḍimam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6270: evam ādīni divyani yaḥ phalāni prayacchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:6271: tathā kandāni mukhyāni deva-devāya bhaktitaḥ // Hbhv_8.191 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6273: prāpnoti phalam ārogyam mṛdvīkānāṃ nivedakaḥ // Hbhv_8.192 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6274: rasān mukhyān avāpnoti saubhāgyam api cottamam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6275: āmrair abhyarcya deveśam aśvamedha-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_8.193 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6279: yatna-pakvam api grāhyaṃ kadalī-phalam uttamam // Hbhv_8.194 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6282: pratibhojayati śrīśas tad-dātṝn sva-sukhaṃ drutam iti // Hbhv_8.195 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6283: tataḥ prāgvad vicitrāṇi panakāny uttamāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6284: su-gandhi śītalaṃ svacchaṃ jalam apy arpayet tataḥ // Hbhv_8.196 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6296: tatra pāna-pradā yānti yatra rāmā guṇānvitāḥ // Hbhv_8.200 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6298: itthaṃ samarpya naivedyam dattvā javanikaṃ tataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6299: bahir-bhūya yathā-sakti japaṃ sandhyānam ācaret // Hbhv_8.201 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6304: bhuṅkte pātre kanaka-ghaṭite ṣaḍ-rasaṃ śrī-rameśaḥ // Hbhv_8.202 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6310: homāśaktau tu kurvīta japaṃ tasya catur-guṇam // Hbhv_8.204 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6312: puraścarana-homasyāśaktau hi sa vidhir mataḥ // Hbhv_8.205 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6313: pūrvaṃ dīkṣā-vidhau homa-vidhiś ca likhitaḥ kiyān /
GR14hbhvil_u:6314: tad-vistāraś ca vijñeyas tat-tac-chāstrāt tad-icchubhiḥ // Hbhv_8.206 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6315: samāptiṃ bhojane dhyātvā dattvā gaṇḍūṣikaṃ jalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6316: amṛtāpidhānam asi svāhety uccārayet sudhīḥ // Hbhv_8.207 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6318: naikantī tejasaḥ kuryān niṣkrāntiṃ iva saṅkramam // Hbhv_8.208 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6324: pādodakaṃ prasādaṃ ca liṅge caṇḍeśvarāya ca // Hbhv_8.210 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6329: ity uktvā śrī-harer vāme tīrtha-klinnaṃ samarpayet // Hbhv_8.212 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6330: sataṃsaṃ vā sahasrāṃśam anyathā niṣphalaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_8.213 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6331: paścāc ca balir ity ādi ślokāv uccārya vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6335: prahlādaś cāmbarīṣaś ca vasur vāyu-sutaḥ sivaḥ // Hbhv_8.215 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6337: śrī-kṛṣṇasya prasādo 'yaṃ sarve gṛhṇantu vaiṣṇavāḥ // Hbhv_8.216 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6343: puṣpākṣatair vimiśreṇa baliṃ yas tu prayacchati // Hbhv_8.218 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6345: śāntiṃ tasya prayacchanti śriyam ārogyam eva ca // Hbhv_8.219 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6347: upalipya tato bhūmiṃ punar gāṇḍūṣikaṃ jalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6348: dadyāt trir agre kṛṣṇasya tato 'smai danta-sodhanam // Hbhv_8.220 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6349: punar ācamanaṃ dattvā śrī-pāṇyoḥ śrī-mukhasya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6350: mārjanāyāṃśukaṃ dattvā sarvāṇy aṅgāni mārjayet // Hbhv_8.221 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6352: padyam ācamanīyaṃ ca pūrvavat punar arpayet // Hbhv_8.222 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6354: karpūrady-āsya-vāsaṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ tulasīm api // Hbhv_8.223 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6360: saubhāgyam atulaṃ loke tathā rūpam anuttamam // Hbhv_8.225 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6363: kṛṣṇāya yacchati prītyā tasya tuṣṭo hariḥ sadā // Hbhv_8.226 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6365: divyaṃ gandhaṃ punar dattvā yatheṣṭam anulepanaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6366: divyair vicitraiḥ śrī-kṛṣṇam bhakti-cchedena lepayet // Hbhv_8.227 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6370: lalāṭe hṛdaye kukṣau kaṇṭhe bahvoś ca pārśvayoḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6382: dattvā bhavati rājaiva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Hbhv_8.233 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6385: mucyate ca tathā pāpaiḥ svarga-lokaṃ ca gacchati // Hbhv_8.234 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6391: prārthyate so 'maraiḥ sarvaiḥ krīḍate pitṛbhiḥ saha // Hbhv_8.236 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6393: rājā bhavati loke'smin chatraṃ dattvā dvijottamaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6394: nāpnoti ripujaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṅgrāme ripu-jid bhayet // Hbhv_8.237 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6396: yatheṣṭaṃ tena lokeṣu vicaraty amara-prabhaḥ // Hbhv_8.238 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6399: lokeṣu dhvaja-bhūtaḥ syād dattvā viṣṇor varaṃ dhvajam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6400: śakra-lokam avāpnoti bahūn abda-gaṇān naraḥ // Hbhv_8.239 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6403: keśavāya dvija-śreṣṭhaḥ sarva-loke mahīyate iti // Hbhv_8.240 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6405: tad atrāpy akhilaṃ jñeyaṃ tatrātratyaṃ idaṃ tathā // Hbhv_8.241 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6407: viṣṇor dhvaje tu sauvarṇam daṇḍaṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6408: patākā cāpi pītā syād garuḍasya samīpa-gā // Hbhv_8.242 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6415: paraṃ nirvṛtim āpnoti yatra tatrābhijāyate // Hbhv_8.244 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6418: dattvā tad-bandhanaṃ mukhyam agny-ādheya-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_8.245 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6420: patad-grahaṃ tathā dattvā śubhadas tv abhijāyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:6423: mārjayitvā tathā taṃ ca śubhagas tv abhijāyate // Hbhv_8.247 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6425: tad evākṣayam āpnoti svarga-lokaṃ sa gacchati // Hbhv_8.248 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6426: kiṃ ca, vāmana-purāṇe śrī-baliṃ prati śrī-prahlādoktau-
GR14hbhvil_u:6428: bali-dānāni dīyante akṣayāni vidur budhaḥ // Hbhv_8.249 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6430: pūrvokta daśa śaṅkhādyā mudrāḥ sandarśayet // Hbhv_8.250 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6433: tato vicitrair lalitaiḥ kāritair vā svayaṃ kṛtaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6434: gītair vādyaiś ca nṛtyaiś ca śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ paritoṣayet // Hbhv_8.251 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6437: na ca tiryag vrajet tatra taiḥ sahāntarayan prabhum // Hbhv_8.252 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6439: nṛtyantaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ harsād āsīno yas tu paśyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:6440: khañjo bhavati rājendra so 'yaṃ janmani janmani // Hbhv_8.253 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6442: nṛtyatāṃ gāyatāṃ madhye bhaktānāṃ keśavasya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6443: tān ṛte yas tiro yāti tiryag-yoniṃ sa gacchati // Hbhv_8.254 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6448: yaḥ kārayati viṣṇos tu sandhyāyāṃ mandire naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6452: svargāt svargam anuprāpya viṣṇu-loke mahīyate // Hbhv_8.256 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6454: gītaṃ vādyaṃ ca nṛtyaṃ ca nāṭyaṃ viṣṇu-kathāṃ mune /
GR14hbhvil_u:6455: yaḥ karoti sa puṇyātmā trailokyopari saṃsthitaḥ // Hbhv_8.257 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6458: gītāni gāyaty athavā tat-phalaṃ śṛṇu bhū-pate // Hbhv_8.258 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6460: prāpnoty aṣṭa-kulair yuktas tataḥ syān mokṣa-bhāṅ naraḥ // Hbhv_8.259 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6462: viṣṇu-kṣetre tu yo vidvān kārayed bhakti-saṃyutaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6463: gana-nṛtyādikaṃ caiva viṣṇv-ākhyaṃ ca kathāṃ tathā // Hbhv_8.260 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6464: jātiṃ smṛtiṃ ca medhāṃ ca tathaiva paramāṃ sthitim /
GR14hbhvil_u:6465: prāpnoti viṣṇu-sālokyaṃ satyam etan nārādhipa // Hbhv_8.261 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6467: visṛjya lajjāṃ yo 'dhīte gāyate nṛtyate'pi ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:6470: bhārate nṛtya-gīte tu kuryāt svābhāvike'pi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:6471: svābhāvikena bhagavān prīṇātīty āha śaunakaḥ // Hbhv_8.263 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6473: viṣṇor gītaṃ ca nṛtyaṃ ca naṭānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6477: na jīvanāya yuñjīta vipro pāpa-bhiyā kvacit // Hbhv_8.265 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6479: saṃsiddhair aviśeṣena jñeyā sā hari-vasare // Hbhv_8.266 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6481: keśavāgre nṛtya-gītaṃ na karoti harer dine /
GR14hbhvil_u:6482: vahninā kiṃ na dagdho 'sau gataḥ kiṃ na rasātalaṃ // Hbhv_8.267 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6485: kṛṣṇaṃ santoṣayed yas tu su-gītair madhura-svanaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6486: sarva-veda-phalaṃ tasya jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_8.268 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6489: havih-koṭi-samaṃ geyaṃ geyaṃ geya-samaṃ viduḥ // Hbhv_8.269 //

GR14hbhvil_u:6521: ahuta iva me sighram darśanaṃ yāti cetasi // Hbhv_8.280 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6524: mṛṣā giras tā hy asatīr asat-kathā
GR14hbhvil_u:6526: tad eva satyaṃ tad uhaiva maṅgalaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:6528: tad eva ramyaṃ ruciraṃ navaṃ navaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:6533: dattvā ca gītaṃ dharma-jñā gandharvaiḥ saha modate /
GR14hbhvil_u:6534: svayaṃ gītena sampūjya tasyaivānucaro bhavet // Hbhv_8.283 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6536: nāhaṃ vasāmi vaikuṇṭhe na yogi-hṛdayeṣu vā /

GR14hbhvil_u:6539: tena prītiṃ parāṃ yāmi na tathā mat-pūjanāt // Hbhv_8.285 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6542: kārikāyām ataḥ proktaṃ vipro gītai ramed iti // Hbhv_8.286 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6546: sa nirdahati pāpāni janmāntara-śateṣv api // Hbhv_8.287 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6549: padbhyāṃ bhūmer diśo 'kṣibhyāṃ dorbhyāṃ vāmaṅgalaṃ divaḥ // Hbhv_8.288 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6551: yaś ca nṛtyati suśroṇi purāṇoktaṃ samāsataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6553: puṣkara-dvīpam āsādya modate vai yadṛcchayā // Hbhv_8.289 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6555: phalam āpnoti suśroṇi mama karma-parāyaṇaḥ // Hbhv_8.290 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6558: svayaṃ nṛtyena sampūjya tasyaivānucaro bhavet // Hbhv_8.291 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6566: vādyaṃ dattvā tathā viprah śakra-lokam avāpnuyāt /

GR14hbhvil_u:6586: kṛṣṇasya vasate loke sapta kalpāni mānavāḥ // Hbhv_8.301 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6588: mantra-hīnaṃ kriyā-hīnam yat kṛtaṃ pūjanaṃ hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6589: sarvaṃ sampūrṇatām eti kṛte nīrājane śive // Hbhv_8.302 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6592: tamo-vikāraṃ jayati jite tasmimś ca ko bhavaḥ // Hbhv_8.303 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6595: dahaty āloka-mātreṇa viṣṇoḥ sārātrikaṃ mukhaṃ // Hbhv_8.304 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6597: yac ca dīpasya māhātmyaṃ pūrvaṃ likhitam asti tat /
GR14hbhvil_u:6599: ataḥ sādaram utthāya mahā-nīrājanaṃ tv idam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6600: draṣṭavyaṃ dīpavat sarvair vandyam ārātrikaṃ ca yat // Hbhv_8.306 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6602: dhūpaṃ cārātrikaṃ paśyet karābhyāṃ ca pravandate /

GR14hbhvil_u:6605: nīrājanaṃ ca yaḥ paśyed deva-devasya cakriṇaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6606: sapta janmāni vipraḥ syād ante ca paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_8.308 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6612: te sarve pāpa-nirmuktā vimāneśā yuga-dvayam // Hbhv_8.310 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6614: yat phalaṃ labhate rājan śṛṇuṣva gadato mama // Hbhv_8.311 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6616: gīyamānaś ca gandharvair viṣṇunā saha modate // Hbhv_8.312 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6618: saṃprīṇayanti deveśaṃ teṣāṃ puṇya-phalaṃ śṛṇu // Hbhv_8.313 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6624: tri bhrāmayitvā kurvīta punar nīrājanaṃ prabhoḥ // Hbhv_8.315 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6627: śaṅkhe kṛtvā tu pānīyaṃ bhrāmitaṃ keśavopari /

GR14hbhvil_u:6631: kecid icchanti kecic ca darpaṇārpaṇataḥ param // Hbhv_8.317 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6633: punar ācamanaṃ dadyāt karodvartanam eva ca /

GR14hbhvil_u:6639: ācamanaṃ ca tāmbūlam candanaiḥ kara-mārjanam // Hbhv_8.320 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6641: nīrājanaṃ punaḥ kāryaṃ karpūraṃ vibhave sati // Hbhv_8.321 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6644: ataḥ saṃśamayitvaiva punaḥ pūjanam ācaret // Hbhv_8.322 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6646: tatraiva kṛtvā pūjādikaṃ sarvaṃ jvalantaṃ kṛṣṇa-mūrdhani /
GR14hbhvil_u:6649: kecin nīrājanat paścād icchanti praṇatiṃ tataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6650: pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ stotraṃ gīta-nṛtyādikaṃ tataḥ // Hbhv_8.324 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6652: pravartante prabhor bhaktau bhaktyā sarvaṃ hi śobhanam // Hbhv_8.325 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6654: vicitrair madhuraiḥ stotraih stutiṃ kurvīta bhaktimān // Hbhv_8.326 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6660: ārambhe ca stuter etam ślokaṃ stuti-paraḥ paṭhet /
GR14hbhvil_u:6661: satyāṃ tasyāṃ samāptau ca ślokaṃ saṅkīrtayed imam // Hbhv_8.328 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6663: vag-yajñenārcito devaḥ prīyatāṃ me janārdanaḥ // Hbhv_8.329 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6666: viśveśvarāya viśvāya govindāya namo namaḥ // Hbhv_8.330 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6668: kṛṣṇāya gopīnāthāya govindāya namo namaṃ // Hbhv_8.331 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6678: namaḥ praṇata-pālāya śrī-kṛṣṇāya namo namaḥ // Hbhv_8.336 //

GR14hbhvil_u:6684: ādhivyādhibhujaṅgena daṣṭaṃ mām uddhara prabho // Hbhv_8.339 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6686: saṃsārasāgare magnaṃ mām uddhara jagad guro // Hbhv_8.340 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6688: govinda paramānanda māṃ samuddhara mādhava // Hbhv_8.341 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6700: tāntrikāṇi ca śāstrāṇi stotrāṇy abhinavāny api // Hbhv_8.344 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6703: stavaṃ brāhmaṇa-śārdūlas tasmāt kāmān avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_8.345 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6706: sarva-deveṣu yat puṇyaṃ sarva-deveṣu yat phalam /

GR14hbhvil_u:6710: tathā toṣam avāpnoti yathā stotrair dvijottamaḥ // Hbhv_8.347 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6712: stotrair japaiś ca devāgre yaḥ stauti madhusūdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6718: mugdha-vākyair na hi tathā vibudhānāṃ jagat-pitā // Hbhv_8.350 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6730: prītim āyāti deveśo yuga-koṭi-śatāni ca // Hbhv_8.354 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6732: snāne yat stotra-māhātmyaṃ likhitaṃ lekhyam agrataḥ /

GR14hbhvil_u:6737: rogo vānyo na sā jihvā yā na stauti harer guṇān // Hbhv_8.356 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6739: praṇamed atha sāṣṭāṅgaṃ tan-mudrāṃ ca pradarśayet /

GR14hbhvil_u:6746: śiro mat-pādayoḥ kṛtvā bāhubhyāṃ ca parasparam /

GR14hbhvil_u:6749: dorbhyāṃ padbhyāṃ ca jānubhyām urasā śirasā dṛśā /

GR14hbhvil_u:6754: garudaṃ dakṣine kṛtvā kuryāt tat-pṛṣṭhato budhaḥ /

GR14hbhvil_u:6770: reṇu-saṅkhyaṃ vaset svarge manvantara-śataṃ naraḥ // Hbhv_8.366 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6773: sa yāṃ gatim avāpnoti na tāṃ kratu-śatair api /

GR14hbhvil_u:6776: bhūmim āpīḍya jānubhyāṃ śira āropya vai bhuvi /

GR14hbhvil_u:6792: ye namanti narā nityaṃ na hi paśyanti te yamam // Hbhv_8.374 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6793: ye janā jagatāṃ nāthaṃ nityaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ dvijāḥ /

GR14hbhvil_u:6827: aho bhāgyam aho bhāgyam aho bhāgyaṃ nṝṇām idam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6828: yeṣāṃ hari-padābjāgre śiro nyastaṃ yathā tathā // Hbhv_8.384 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6831: praṇāmaṃ ye prakurvanti teṣām api namo namaḥ // Hbhv_8.385 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6834: praṇāmaṃ ye prakurvanti teṣām api namo namaḥ // Hbhv_8.386 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6838: sakṛd vā na named yas tu viṣṇave sarma-kāriṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:6839: śavoparaṃ vijānīyāt kadācid api nālapet // Hbhv_8.387 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6842: akṛtvā tat-praṇāmādi yānti te narakaukasaḥ // Hbhv_8.388 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6845: janma-prabhṛti yat kiñcit pumān vai dharmam ācaret /
