GR14hbhvil_u:6848: vastra-prāvṛta-dehas tu yo naraḥ praṇameta mām /
GR14hbhvil_u:6849: śvitrī sa jāyate mūrkhah sapta janmāni bhāminī // Hbhv_8.390 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6854: sakṛd bhūmau nipatito na śaktaḥ praṇamen muhuḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6858: tataḥ pradakṣināṃ kuryād bhaktyā bhagavato hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6859: nāmāni kīrtayan śaktau tāṃ ca sāṣṭāṅga-vandanām // Hbhv_8.393 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6862: ekāṃ cāṇḍyāṃ ravau sapta tisro dadyād vināyake /
GR14hbhvil_u:6863: catasraḥ keśave dadyāt śive tv ardha-pradakṣinām // Hbhv_8.394 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6867: na te yama-puraṃ yānti yānti puṇya-kṛtāṃ gatim // Hbhv_8.395 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6869: daśāśvamedhasya phalaṃ prāpnuyān nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_8.396 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6871: viṣṇor vimānaṃ yaḥ kuryāt sakṛd bhaktyā pradakṣiṇām /
GR14hbhvil_u:6874: catur-vāraṃ bhramībhis tu jagat sarvaṃ carācaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:6875: krāntaṃ bhavati viprāgrya tat tīrtha-gamanādhikam // Hbhv_8.398 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6877: pradakṣiṇāṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt hariṃ bhaktyā samanvitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6881: kṛtena yat phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ tac chṛṇuṣva nṛpātmaja /
GR14hbhvil_u:6882: pṛthvī-pradakṣiṇa-phalaṃ yat tat prāpya hariṃ vrajet // Hbhv_8.400 ///
GR14hbhvil_u:6884: evaṃ kṛtvā tu kṛṣṇasya yaḥ kuryād dviḥ pradakṣiṇām /
GR14hbhvil_u:6886: paṭhan nāma-sahasraṃ tu nāmāny evātha kevalam // Hbhv_8.401 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6889: tad evāvartanaṃ tasya punar nāvartate bhave // Hbhv_8.402 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6895: te'pi yanti paraṃ sthānam sarva-lokottamottamam // Hbhv_8.404 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6897: tat khyātaṃ yat su-dharmasya pūrvasmin gṛdhra-janmani /
GR14hbhvil_u:6902: akāle darśanaṃ viṣṇor hanti puṇyaṃ purā-kṛtam // Hbhv_8.406 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6907: pradakṣiṇāṃ na kartavyaṃ vimukhatvāc ca kāraṇāt // Hbhv_8.408 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6910: tribhir mantraiḥ sva-karmāṇi sarvāṇy ātmānam apy atha // Hbhv_8.409 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6912: itaḥ pūrvaṃ prāṇa-buddhi-dharmādhikārato jāgrat-svapna-suṣupty-avasthāsu manasā vācā
GR14hbhvil_u:6913: karmaṇā hastābhyāṃ padbhyām udareṇa śiśnā yat smṛtaṃ yad uktaṃ yat kṛtaṃ tat sarvaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:6914: śrī-kṛṣṇārpaṇaṃ bhavatu svāhā māṃ madīyaṃ ca sakalaṃ haraye samarpayāmīti /
GR14hbhvil_u:6919: virāgī cet karma-phale na kiñcid api kārayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:6920: arpayet sva-kṛtaṃ karma prīyatām iti me hariḥ // Hbhv_8.411 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6923: karoti satataṃ buddhyā brahmārpaṇam idaṃ param // Hbhv_8.412 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6924: yad vā phalānāṃ sannyāsaṃ prakuryāt parameśvare /
GR14hbhvil_u:6925: karmaṇām etad apy āhur brahmārpaṇam anuttamam // Hbhv_8.413 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6930: tvat-prasādād idaṃ toyaṃ pādyaṃ te'stu janārdana // Hbhv_8.415 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6934: harer nivedayet tāni tat sarvaṃ tv akṣayaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_8.416 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6937: viṣṇu-bhakty-arthino dhanyās tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ // Hbhv_8.417 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6940: tat-kṛpāpekṣako nityam i ty ātmānaṃ samarpayet // Hbhv_8.418 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6942: saty api bhedāpagame nātha tavāhaṃ na māmakīnas tvam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6943: sāmudro hi taraṅgaḥ kvacana samudro na tāraṅgaḥ // Hbhv_8.419 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6947: īkṣā trayī naya-damau vividhā ca vārtā /
GR14hbhvil_u:6948: manye tad etad akhilaṃ nigamasya satyaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:6958: mūlaṃ lekhyena vidhinā sadaiva japa-mālayā // Hbhv_8.422 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6960: prāṇāyāmāṃś ca kṛtvā trīn dadyāt kṛṣṇa-kare jalam // Hbhv_8.423 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6963: siddhir bhavatu me deva tvat-prasādāt tvayi sthite // Hbhv_8.424 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6967: arpitaṃ taṃ ca sañcintya svīkṛtaṃ prabhuṇākhilam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6968: punaḥ stutvā yathā-śakti praṇamya prārthayed idam // Hbhv_8. 426 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6971: yat pūjitaṃ mayā deva paripūrṇaṃ tad astu me // Hbhv_8.427 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6973: yad dattaṃ bhakti-mātreṇa patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ jalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6974: āveditaṃ nivedyaṃ tu tad gṛhāṇānukampayā // Hbhv_8.428 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6976: kriyā-mantra-vihīnaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // Hbhv_8.429 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6978: ajñānād athavā jñānād aśubhaṃ yan mayā kṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:6979: kṣantum arhasi tat sarvaṃ dāsyenaiva gṛhāṇa mām // Hbhv_8.430 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6980: sthitiḥ sevā gatir yātrā smṛtiś cintā stutir vacaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:6981: bhūyāt sarvātmanā viṣṇo madīyaṃ tvayi ceṣṭitam // Hbhv_8.431 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6983: kṛṣṇa rāma mukunda vāmana vāsudeva jagad-guro /
GR14hbhvil_u:6984: matsya kacchapa nārasiṃha varāha rāghava pāhi mām // Hbhv_8.432 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6986: devakī-suta dehi me tava pāda-bhaktim acalām // Hbhv_8.433 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6988: nātha yoni-sahasreṣu yeṣu yeṣu vrajāmy aham /
GR14hbhvil_u:6989: teṣu teṣv acyutā bhaktir acyute'stu sadā tvayi // Hbhv_8.434 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6991: tvām anusmarataḥ sā me hṛdayān nāpasarpatu // Hbhv_8.435 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6995: jātasya me bhavatu keśava te prasādāt
GR14hbhvil_u:6996: tvayy eva bhaktir atulāvyabhicāriṇī ca // Hbhv_8.436 //
GR14hbhvil_u:6998: yuvatīnāṃ yathā yūni yūnāṃ ca yuvatau yathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7002: sakāku kīrtayan ślokān uttamān sāmpradāyikān // Hbhv_8.438 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7005: dāso 'ham iti māṃ matvā kṣamasva madhusūdana // Hbhv_8.439 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7007: pratijñā tava govinda na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:7008: iti saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya prāṇān saṃdhārayāmy aham // Hbhv_8.440 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7011: yānair vā pādukair vāpi gamanaṃ bhagavad-gṛhe /
GR14hbhvil_u:7016: śayanaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ cāpi mithyā-bhāṣaṇam eva ca // Hbhv_8.443 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7017: uccair bhāṣā mitho jalpo rodanāni ca vigrahaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7018: nigrahānugrahau caiva nṛṣu ca krūra-bhāṣaṇam // Hbhv_8.444 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7026: aparādhās tathā viṣṇor dvātriṃśat parikīrtitāḥ // Hbhv_8.448 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7029: vaiṣṇavena sadā te tu varjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ // Hbhv_8.449 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7030: ye vai na varjayanty etān aparādhān mayoditān /
GR14hbhvil_u:7033: dhvāntāgāre hareḥ sparśaḥ paraṃ sukṛta-nāśanaḥ // Hbhv_8.451 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7034: tathaiva vidhim ullaṅghya sahasā sparśanaṃ hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7039: śrāddhādikam akṛtvā ca navānnasya ca bhakṣaṇam // Hbhv_8.454 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7041: akarmaṇy aprasūnena pūjanaṃ ca hares tathā // Hbhv_8. 455 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7042: akṛtvā danta-kāṣṭhaṃ ca kṛtvā nidhūvanaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7043: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalāṃ dīpaṃ tathā mṛtakam eva ca // Hbhv_8.456 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7044: raktaṃ nīlam adhautaṃ ca pārakyaṃ malinaṃ paṭam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7046: krodhaṃ kṛtvā śmaśānaṃ ca gatvā bhuktāpy ajīrṇa-yuk /
GR14hbhvil_u:7048: tathā kusumbha-śākaṃ ca tailābhyaṅgaṃ vidhāya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:7049: hareḥ sparśo hareḥ karma-karaṇaṃ pātakāvaham // Hbhv_8.459 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7051: mama śāstraṃ bahiṣkṛtya asmākaṃ yaḥ prapadyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:7052: muktvā ca mama śāstrāṇi śāstram anyat prabhāṣase // Hbhv_8.460 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7053: madyapas tu samāsādya praviśed bhavanaṃ mama // Hbhv_8.461 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7054: yo me kusumbha-śākena prāpaṇaṃ kurute naraḥ // Hbhv_8.462 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7056: mama dṛṣṭer abhimukhaṃ tāmbūlaṃ carvayet tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7057: kurūvakaḥ palāśasthaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kuryān mamārcanam // Hbhv_8.463 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7058: mamārcām āsure kāle yaḥ karoti vimūḍha-dhīḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7059: pīṭhāsanopaviṣṭo yaḥ pūjayed vā nirāsanaḥ // Hbhv_8.464 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7060: vāma-hastena māṃ dhṛtvā snāpayed vā vimūḍha-dhīḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7061: pūjā paryuṣitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ ṣṭhīvanaṃ garva-kalpanam // Hbhv_8.465 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7063: yācitaiḥ patra-puṣpādyair yaḥ karoti mamārcanam // Hbhv_8.466 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7065: avaiṣṇavasya pakvānnaṃ yo mahyaṃ vinivedayet // Hbhv_8.467 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7066: avaiṣṇaveṣu paśyatsu mama pūjāṃ karoti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7067: apūjayitvā vighneśaṃ sambhāṣya ca kapālinam // Hbhv_8.468 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7068: naraḥ pūjāṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt snapanaṃ ca nakhāmbhasā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7069: amaunī dharma-liptāṅgo mama pūjāṃ karoti yaḥ // Hbhv_8.469 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7072: tatrāpi sarvathā kṛṣṇa-nirmālyaṃ tu na laṅghayet // Hbhv_8.470 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7073: tathā ca nārasiṃhe śantanuṃ prati nārada-vākyam -
GR14hbhvil_u:7074: ataḥ paraṃ tu nirmālyaṃ na laṅghaya mahīpate /
GR14hbhvil_u:7077: nānā-devasya nirmālyam upayuñjīta na kvacit // Hbhv_8.472 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7079: āpādy api ca kaṣṭāyāṃ deveśa-śapathaṃ naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7080: na karoti hi yo brahmaṃs tasya tuṣyati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_8.473 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7081: na dhārayati nirmālyam anya-deva-dhṛtaṃ tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7082: bhuṅkte na cānya-naivedyaṃ tasya tuṣyati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_8.474 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7085: saṃvatsarasya madhye tu tīrthe śaukarake mama /
GR14hbhvil_u:7086: kṛtopavāsaḥ snānena gaṅgāyāṃ śuddhim āpnuyāt // Hbhv_8. 475 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7087: mathurāyāṃ tathāpy evaṃ sāparādhaḥ śuci bhavet // Hbhv_8. 476 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7088: anayos tīrthayor ekaṃ yaḥ seveta sukṛtī naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7091: ahany ahani yo martyo gītādhyāyaṃ paṭhet tu vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:7092: dvātriṃśad-aparādhāṃs tu kṣamate tasya keśavaḥ // Hbhv_8. 478 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7097: dvādaśyāṃ jāgare viṣṇor yaḥ paṭhet tulasī-stavam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7099: yaḥ karoti hareḥ pūjāṃ kṛṣṇa-śatrāṅkito naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7103: mahā-prasāda ity uktvā śeṣaṃ śirasi dhārayet // Hbhv_8.482 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7106: ambarīṣa harer lagnaṃ nīraṃ puṣpaṃ vilepanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7107: bhaktyā na dhatte śirasā śvapacād adhiko hi saḥ // Hbhv_8.483 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7110: kṛṣṇottīrṇaṃ tu nirmālyaṃ yasyāṅgaṃ spṛśate mune /
GR14hbhvil_u:7111: sarva-rogair tathā pāpair mukto bhavati nārada // Hbhv_8.484 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7113: duritāni vinaśyanti vyādhayo yānti khaṇḍaśaḥ // Hbhv_8.485 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7114: mukhe śirasi dehe tu viṣṇūttirnaṃ tu yo vahet /
GR14hbhvil_u:7115: tulasīṃ muni-śārdūla na tasya spṛśate kaliḥ // Hbhv_8.486 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7117: viṣṇu-mūrti-sthitaṃ puṣpaṃ śirasā yo vahen naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7120: yo vahet śirasā nityaṃ tulasīṃ viṣṇu-sevitāṃ // Hbhv_8.488 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7122: tulasīṃ dhārayed yo vai tasya puṇyam anantakam // Hbhv_8.489 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7124: na sa lipyati pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā // Hbhv_8.490 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7126: viṣṇoḥ śiraḥ-paribhraṣṭam bhaktyā yas tulasīṃ vahet /
GR14hbhvil_u:7127: sidhyānti sarva-kāryāṇi manasā cintitāni ca // Hbhv_8.491 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7129: pramārjayati yo deham tulasyā vaiṣṇavo naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7130: sarva-tīrtha-mayaṃ dehaṃ tat-kṣanāt dvija jāyate // Hbhv_8.492 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7133: nirmālyaṃ tu vahed yas tu koṭi-tīrtha-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_8.493 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7138: kautukaṃ śṛṇu me devi viṣṇor nirmālya-vahninā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7143: ucchista-bhojino dāsās tava māyāṃ jayema hi // Hbhv_8.496 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7146: viṣṇu-bhakti-ratā ye vai te tu tyājyaḥ su-durataḥ // Hbhv_8.497 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7148: visarjanaṃ tu cet kāryaṃ visṛjya-varaṇāni tat /
GR14hbhvil_u:7149: deve tan-mudrayā prārthya devaṃ hṛdi visarjayet // Hbhv_8.498 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7152: sa lakṣmīko mama svāntaṃ viśa viśrānti-hetave // Hbhv_8.499 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7153: prārthyaivaṃ pāduke dattvā saṅgam udvāsayed dharim /
GR14hbhvil_u:7154: prāṇāyāmaṃ ṣaḍ-aṅgaṃ ca kṛtvā mudrāṃ visarjanīm // Hbhv_8.500 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7157: aṅgaṃ bhaktes tu tan-niṣṭhair nyāsādīn antareṣyate // Hbhv_8.501 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7159: kāmyatvenāpi gehe tu prāyo nityatayā matā // Hbhv_8.502 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7164: sita-jātyāś ca kusumaih pūjayet tad-anantaram // Hbhv_8.504 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7167: padma-sūtrasya varttyā ca ghṛta-dhūpena cāpy atha /
GR14hbhvil_u:7169: kṛtvemaṃ mucyate rogī rogāt śīghram asaṃśayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7170: duḥkhārto mucyate duḥkhād baddho mucyeta bandhanāt // Hbhv_8.507 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7171: rāja-grastaś ca mucyeta tathā rāja-bhayān naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7180: mahā-prasāda-jātārhaḥ sadyaḥ syād adhamo 'py aham // Hbhv_9.1 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7185: śaŚkhodakaṃ harer bhaktir nirmālyaṃ pādayor jalaṃ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7188: śaŚkha-sthitaṃ tu yat toyaṃ bhrāmitaṃ keśavopari /
GR14hbhvil_u:7189: vandate śirasā nityaṃ gaŚgā-snānena tasya kim // Hbhv_9.4 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7190: na dāho na klamo nārtir narakāgni-bhayaṃ na hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:7192: na grahā na ca kuṣmāñḍāḥ piśācoraga-rakṣasāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7193: dṛṣṭvā śaŚkhodakaṃ mūrdhni vidravanti diśo daśa // Hbhv_9.6 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7195: kṛtvā mūrdhany avāpnoti muktiṃ viṣñoḥ prasādataḥ // Hbhv_9.7 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7197: prokṣayed vaiṣñavo yas tu nāśubhaṃ tad-gṛhe bhavet // Hbhv_9.8 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7199: tiṣṭhate muni-śārdūla vardhante tatra sampadaḥ // Hbhv_9.9 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7205: śudhyate nātra sandehas tathā śaŚkhodakena hi // Hbhv_9.11 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7213: svayaṃ bhakty-abhivandyādau pṚtvā śirasi dhārayet // Hbhv_9.13 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7215: likhito hy adhunā pāne viśeṣo likhyate kiyān // Hbhv_9.14 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7221: lokasya dvāram ārcayat pavitraṃ jyotiṣmat vibhrājamānaṃ mahas tad amṛtasya dhārā bahudhā dohamānaṃ carañaṃ loke sudhitaṃ dadhatu // Hbhv_9.16 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7226: tad evaṣṭa-gunaṃ pāpaṃ bhumau bindu-nipatanat // Hbhv_9.18 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7229: hareḥ snānāvaśeṣas tu jalaṃ yasyodare sthitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7233: pañca-gavya-sahasrais tu sevitaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam // Hbhv_9.20 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7235: nityaṃ yadi pibet puñyaṃ śālagrāma-śilā-jalam // Hbhv_9.21 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7237: mātuḥ stanyaṃ punar naiva na pibed bhakti-bhāŚ naraḥ // Hbhv_9.22 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7239: dahanti narakān sarvān garbha-vāsaṃ ca dāruñam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7240: pṚtaṃ yais tu sadā nityaṃ śālagrāma-śilā-jalam // Hbhv_9.23 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7247: dhṛte śirasi pṚte ca sarvās tusyanti devatāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7248: prāyaścittaṃ tu pāpānāṃ kalau pādodakaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_9.26 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7250: tribhiḥ sārasvataṃ toyaṃ saptāhena tu nārmadam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7251: sadyaḥ punāti gāŚgeyaṃ darśanād eva yāmunam // Hbhv_9.27 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7253: punāti smarañād eva kalau pādodakaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_9.28 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7255: arcitaiḥ koṭibhir liŚgair nityaṃ yat kriyate phalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7256: tat phalaṃ śata-sahasraṃ pite pādodake hareḥ // Hbhv_9.29 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7258: spṛṣṭvā pādodakaṃ viṣñoḥ sadā śudhyati mānavaḥ // Hbhv_9.30 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7260: dehe pādodakaṃ tasya na prayāti yamālayam // Hbhv_9.31 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7261: na dānaṃ na havir yeṣāṃ svādhyāyo na surārcanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7262: te 'pi pādodakaṃ pṚtvā prayanti paramāṃ gatim // Hbhv_9.32 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7264: nityaṃ ca puṣkaraṃ tasya yasya pādodakaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_9.33 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7267: māgha-māse prayāge tu snānaṃ kiṃ kariṣyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:7268: prayāgaṃ satataṃ tasya yasya pādodakaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_9.35 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7269: prabodha-vāsare prāpte mathurāyāṃ ca tasya kim /
GR14hbhvil_u:7270: nityaṃ ca yāmunaṃ snānaṃ yasya pādodakaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_9.36 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7271: kasyām uttara-vāhinyāṃ gaŚgāyāṃ tu mṛtasya kim /
GR14hbhvil_u:7272: yasya pādodakaṃ viṣñor mukhe caivāvatiṣṭhate // Hbhv_9.37 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7275: anarghaṃ ratnam utsṛjya loṣṭraṃ vāñchati durmatiḥ // Hbhv_9.38 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7276: kurukṣetra-samo deśo binduḥ pādodakaṃ mataḥ // Hbhv_9.39 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7277: pated yatrākṣayaṃ puñyaṃ nityaṃ bhavati tad-gṛhe /
GR14hbhvil_u:7278: gayā-piñḍa-samaṃ puñyaṃ putrāñām api jāyate // Hbhv_9.40 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7280: nāsurāñāṃ bhayaṃ tasya preta-janyaṃ ca rākṣasam // Hbhv_9.41 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7281: na rogasya bhayaṃ caiva nāsti vighna-kṛtaṃ bhayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7282: na duṣṭā naiva ghorākṣāḥ svāpadottha-bhayaṃ na hi // Hbhv_9.42 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7283: grahāḥ pṚdāṃ na kurvanti caurā naśyanti dāruñāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7284: kiṃ tasya tṚrtha-gamane devarṣṚñāṃ ca darśane // Hbhv_9.43 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7286: prṚto bhavati mārtañḍaḥ prṚto bhavati keśavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7287: brahmā bhavati su-prṚtaḥ prṚto bhavati saŚkaraḥ // Hbhv_9.44 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7289: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra devo janardanaḥ // Hbhv_9.45 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7291: prāyaścittaṃ yadi prāptaṃ kṛcchraṃ vā tv agha-marṣañam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7292: so 'pi pādodakaṃ pṚtvā śuddhiṃ prāpnoti tat-kṣañāt // Hbhv_9.46 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7293: aśaucaṃ naiva vidyeta sūtake mṛtake 'pi ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:7294: yeṣāṃ pādodakaṃ mūrdhni prāśanaṃ ye ca kurvate // Hbhv_9.47 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7296: so 'pi sad-gatim āpnoti sad-ācārair bahiṣkṛtaḥ // Hbhv_9.48 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7297: apeyaṃ pibate yas tu bhuŚkte yaś cāpy abhojanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7298: agamyāgamanā ye vai pāpācārāś ca ye narāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7299: te 'pi pūjyā bhavanty āśu sadyaḥ pādāmbu-sevanāt // Hbhv_9.49 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7301: apavitraṃ yad-annaṃ syāt pānṚyaṃ cāpi pāpinām /
GR14hbhvil_u:7302: bhuktvā pṚtvā viśuddhaḥ syāt pṚtvā pādodakaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_9.50 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7305: kāya-śuddhir bhavaty āśu pṚtvā pādodakaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_9.51 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7308: dṛṣṭi-pūtaṃ tu yat toyaṃ viṣñunā prabhaviṣñunā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7309: tad vai pāpa-haraṃ putra kiṃ punaḥ pādayor jalam // Hbhv_9.53 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7311: dhārāyāmi pibāmy adya māhātmyaṃ viditaṃ mama // Hbhv_9.54 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7312: priyas tvam agrajaḥ putras tad-arthaṃ gaditaṃ mayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7313: rahasyaṃ me tv anarhasya na vaktavyaṃ kadācana // Hbhv_9.55 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7314: dhārayasva sadā mūrdhni prāśanaṃ kuru nityaśaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7327: pṛthūdakasya tṚrthasya ācānto labhate phalam // Hbhv_9.61 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7329: sarasvatyāṃ gayāyāṃ ca gatvā yat prāpnuyāt phalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7330: tat phalaṃ labhate śreṣṭhaṃ mūrdhni pādāmbu-dhārañāt // Hbhv_9.62 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7334: sthānaṃ naivāsti pāpasya dehināṃ deha-madhyataḥ // Hbhv_9.63 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7336: pādodaṃ viṣñu-naivedyam udare yasya tiṣṭhati // Hbhv_9.64 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7337: nāśrayaṃ labhate pāpaṃ svayam eva vinaśyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:7339: hareḥ pādodakaṃ pṚtvā mucyate nātra saṃsayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7340: śirasā tiṣṭhate yeṣāṃ nityaṃ pādodakaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_9.66 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7342: ayam eva paro dharma idam eva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7343: idam eva paraṃ tṚrthaṃ viṣñu-pādāmbu yat pibet // Hbhv_9.67 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7345: vilayaṃ yānti pāpāni pṚte pādodake hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7348: pṚte pādodake viṣñor yadi prāñair vimucyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:7349: hatvā yama-bhaṭān sarvān vaiṣñavaṃ lokam āpnuyāt // Hbhv_9.69 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7352: pṚtaṃ yena sadā viṣñoḥ śālagrāma-śilā-jalam // Hbhv_9.70 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7354: pañca-gavya-sahasrais tu prāśitaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam // Hbhv_9.71 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7355: prāyaścitte samutpanne kiṃ dānaiḥ kim upoṣañaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7356: cāndrāyañaiś ca tṚrthaiś ca pṚtvā pādodakaṃ śuci // Hbhv_9.72 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7358: hari-pādodakaṃ yas tu kṣaña-mātraṃ ca dhārayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:7359: sa snātaḥ sarva-tṚrthesu viṣñoḥ priyataras tathā // Hbhv_9.73 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7364: divyaṃ vimānam āruhya munim enam athābravṚt // Hbhv_9.75 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7365: hari-pādodakaṃ yasmān mayi tvaṃ kṣiptavān mune /
GR14hbhvil_u:7366: prāpito 'smi tvayā tasmāt tad viṣñoḥ paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_9.76 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7368: pādaṃ pūrvaṃ kila spṛṣṭvā gaŚgābhūt smartṛ-mokṣa-dā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7369: viṣñoḥ sadyas tu sat-saŚgi pādāmbu katham Ṛḍyate // Hbhv_9.77 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7373: sarvāŚgaiḥ sarvathā dhāryaṃ pādyaṃ śuci-padaḥ sadā // Hbhv_9.79 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7375: sa pibaty amṛtaṃ nityaṃ māse māse tu devatāḥ // Hbhv_9.80 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7376: māhātmyam iyad ity asya vaktā yo 'pi sa nirbhayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7377: nanv anargha-mañer mūlyaṃ kalpayann agham aśnute // Hbhv_9.81 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7379: sa brahmacārṚ sa vratṚ āśramṚ ca sadā-śuciḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7380: viṣñu-pādodakaṃ yasya mukhe śirasi vigrahe // Hbhv_9.82 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7385: siñcayen mūrdhni bhaktānāṃ sarva-tṚrtha-mayaṃ hi tat // Hbhv_9.84 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7387: likhituṃ śaknuyat ko hi sindhūrmṚn gañayann api // Hbhv_9.85 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7389: śaŚkhe kṛtvā vaiṣñavebhyo dattvā prāgvat pibet svayam // Hbhv_9.86 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7393: yo dadyāt tulasṚ-miśraṃ cāndrāyaña-śataṃ labhet // Hbhv_9.87 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7394: gṛhṚtvā kṛṣña-pādāmbu śaŚkhe kṛtvā tu vaiṣñavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7395: yo vahet śirasā nityaṃ sa munis tapasottamaḥ // Hbhv_9.88 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7398: hatyā-koṭi-vināśaṃ ca kurute nātra saṃsayaḥ // Hbhv_9.89 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7401: ye pibanti punas teṣāṃ stanya-pānaṃ na vidyate // Hbhv_9.90 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7403: sarva-tṚrtha-mayaṃ pṚtvā kuryād ācamanaṃ na hi // Hbhv_9.91 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7406: ācamati ca yo mohād brahma-hā sa nigadyate // Hbhv_9.92 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7414: ya ācamati saṃmohād brahma-hā sa nigadyate // Hbhv_9.94 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7420: śaŚkham abhyarcitaṃ paśyet tasya lakṣmṚr na durlabhā // Hbhv_9.96 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7422: purato vāsudevasya tasya śrṚḥ sarvato-mukhṚ // Hbhv_9.97 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7427: stutvā bhagavatṚṃ tāṃ ca prañamet prārhtya dañḍavat // Hbhv_9.99 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7430: bhaktyā dattaṃ mayā devi arghyaṃ gṛhña namo 'stu te // Hbhv_9.100 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7432: nirmitā tvaṃ purā devair arcitā tvaṃ surāsuraiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7433: tulasṚ hara me pāpaṃ pūjāṃ gṛhña namo 'stu te // Hbhv_9.101 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7436: ādhi-vyādhi-haro nityaṃ tulasṚ tvaṃ namo 'stu te // Hbhv_9.102 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7438: śrṚyaṃ dehi yaśo dehi kṚrtim āyus tathā sukham /
GR14hbhvil_u:7439: balaṃ puṣṭiṃ tathā dharmaṃ tulasṚ tvaṃ prasṚda me // Hbhv_9.103 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7445: nyastā tac-carañe vimukti-phaladā tasyai tulasyai namaḥ // Hbhv_9.104 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7447: lobhāt kūrditum icchāmi kṣudras tat kṣamyatāṃ tvayā // Hbhv_9.105 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7451: yat phalaṃ saŚgame proktaṃ tulasṚ-pūjanena tat // Hbhv_9.107 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7454: khagendra bhavate nṛñāṃ tulasṚ-pūjanena tat // Hbhv_9.107 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7456: yat phalaṃ vihitaṃ devais tulasṚ-pūjanena tat // Hbhv_9.108 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7459: strṚñāṃ ca puruṣāñāṃ ca pūjiteṣṭaṃ dadāti hi // Hbhv_9.109 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7460: tulasṚ ropitā siktā dṛṣṭā spṛṣṭā ca pāvayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:7464: na teṣāṃ duritaṃ kiñcid akṣṚñam avaśiṣyate // Hbhv_9.111 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7466: pūjyamānā ca tulasṚ yasya veśmani tiṣṭhati /
GR14hbhvil_u:7467: tasya sarvāñi śreyāṃsi vardhante 'har-ahar dvijāḥ // Hbhv_9.112 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7469: pakṣe pakṣe tu samprāpte dvādaśyāṃ vaiśya-sattama /
GR14hbhvil_u:7472: ananya-manasā nityaṃ tulasṚṃ stauti yo naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7479: tulasṚ-kānane nityaṃ kalau tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_9.116 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7481: ropitā yaiś ca vidhinā samprāptaṃ paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_9.117 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7482: na dhātrṚ sa-phalā yatra na viṣñus tulasṚ-vanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7483: tat śmaśāna-samaṃ sthānaṃ santi yatra na vaiṣñavāḥ // Hbhv_9.118 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7484: keśavārthe kalau ye tu ropayantṚha bhū-tale /
GR14hbhvil_u:7485: kiṃ kariṣyaty asantuṣṭo yamo 'pi saha kiŚkaraiḥ // Hbhv_9.119 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7489: vāpayet tulasṚṃ puñyāṃ tat tṚrthaṃ cakra-pāñinaḥ // Hbhv_9.121 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7494: diśo daśa ca pūtāḥ syur bhūta-grāmāś catur-vidhāḥ // Hbhv_9.123 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7496: tatra śrāddhaṃ pradātavyam pitṄñāṃ tṛpti-hetave // Hbhv_9.124 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7498: piñḍa-dānaṃ kṛtaṃ tatra pitṄñāṃ dattam akṣayam // Hbhv_9.125 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7500: dṛṣṭā spṛṣṭā tathā dhyātā kṚrtitā namitā śrutā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7501: ropitā sevitā nityaṃ pūjitā tulasṚ śubhā // Hbhv_9.126 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7502: navadhā tulasṚṃ nityaṃ ye bhajanti dine dine /
GR14hbhvil_u:7503: yuga-koṭi-sahasrāñi te vasanti harer gṛhe // Hbhv_9.127 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7505: tāvat koṭi-sahasraṃ tu tanoti sukṛtaṃ kalau // Hbhv_9.128 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7507: ropitā tulasṚ pumbhir vardhate vasudhā-tale // Hbhv_9.129 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7508: kule teṣāṃ tu ye jātā ye bhaviṣyanti ye mṛtaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7509: ākalpaṃ yuga-sāhasraṃ teṣāṃ vāso harer gṛhe // Hbhv_9.130 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7512: keśavārthe kalau ye ca ropayantṚha bhū-tale // Hbhv_9.131 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7513: snāne dāne tathā dhyāne prāśane keśavārcane /
GR14hbhvil_u:7514: tulasṚ dahate pāpaṃ ropañe kṚrtane kalau // Hbhv_9.132 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7517: tulasṚ-vana-pālā ye te tyājyā dūrato bhaṭāḥ // Hbhv_9.133 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7524: tulasṚ-kānanaṃ vaiśya gṛhe yasmiṃs tu tiṣṭhate /
GR14hbhvil_u:7525: tad-gṛhaṃ tṚrthṚ-bhūtaṃ hi no yānti yama-kiŚkarāḥ // Hbhv_9.136 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7527: vasanti deva-loke tu tulasṚṃ ropayanti ye // Hbhv_9.137 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7529: prayānti garuḍārūḍhās tat padaṃ cakra-pāñinaḥ // Hbhv_9.138 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7530: darśanaṃ narmadāyās tu gaŚgā-snānaṃ viśāṃ vara /
GR14hbhvil_u:7531: tulasṚ-dala-saṃsparsaḥ samam etat trayaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_9.139 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7532: ropañāt pālanāt sekād darśanāt sparśanān nṛñām /
GR14hbhvil_u:7535: yat phalaṃ hi tad ekena tulasṚ-vitapena tu // Hbhv_9.141 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7537: yugāyuta-daśaikaṃ sa ropako ramate divi // Hbhv_9.142 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7542: tulasṚ harati kṣipraṃ rogān iva harṚtakṚ // Hbhv_9.144 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7545: tad-gṛhe yama-dūtāś ca dūrato varjayanti hi // Hbhv_9.145 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7546: tulasyās tarpañaṃ ye ca pitṄn uddiśya mānavāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7547: kurvanti teṣāṃ pitaras tṛptā varṣayutaṃ jalaiḥ // Hbhv_9.146 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7549: śuśrūṣito haris tais tu nātra kāryā vicārañā // Hbhv_9.147 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7553: tathā lakṣmy-aikyam āpannā tulasṚ bhoga-vigrahā // Hbhv_9.149 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7554: aparaṃ sthāvaraṃ rūpaṃ bhuvi loka-hitāya vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:7555: spṛṣṭā dṛṣṭā rakṣitā ca mahā-pātaka-nāśinṚ // Hbhv_9.150 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7560: śobhate rāghavas tatra sṚtayā sahitaṃ svayam // Hbhv_9.152 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7562: krośa-mātraṃ bhavaty eva gāŚgeyasyaiva pāthasaḥ // Hbhv_9.153 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7564: na teṣāṃ naraka-kleśah prayānti paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_9.154 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7567: aho-rātra-kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tat-kṣañāt praharanti te // Hbhv_9.155 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7570: muktis tena bhaved dattā prāñināṃ vinatā-suta // Hbhv_9.156 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7571: tulasṚ vāpitā yena puñyārāme vane gṛhe /
GR14hbhvil_u:7572: pakṣṚndra tena satyoktaṃ lokāḥ sapta pratiṣṭhitāḥ // Hbhv_9.157 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7573: tulasṚ-kānane yas tu muhūrtam api viśramet /
GR14hbhvil_u:7574: janma-koṭi-kṛtāt pāpān mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_9.158 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7579: api me'kṣata-patraikaṃ kaścid dhanyo 'rpayed iti // Hbhv_9.160 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7582: tathā tulasyā bhaktiś ca hari-kṚrti-pravaktari // Hbhv_9.161 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7584: purāña-paṭhanaṃ yatra tatra sannihito hariḥ // Hbhv_9.162 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7587: teṣāṃ puñya-phalaṃ vakṣye vadatas tvaṃ niśāmaya // Hbhv_9.163 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7591: tāvatṚr brahma-hatyā hi chinnatty eva na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_9.165 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7594: kañṭakāvarañaṃ vāpi vṛtiṃ kāṣṭhaiḥ karoti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7595: tulasyāḥ śṛñu rājendra tasya puñya-phalaṃ mahat // Hbhv_9.167 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7597: kula-traya-yutas tāvat tiṣṭhed brahma-pade yugam // Hbhv_9.168 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7599: kula-trayeña sahito viṣñoḥ sārūpyatāṃ vrajet // Hbhv_9.169 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7605: tat phalaṃ koṭi-guñitaṃ ropayitvā hareḥ priyām // Hbhv_9.171 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7606: tulasṚṃ ye prayacchanti surāñām arcanāya vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:7607: ropayanti śucau deśe teṣāṃ loko 'kṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_9.172 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7608: ropitāṃ tulasṚṃ dṛṣṭvā nareña bhuvi bhūmipa /
GR14hbhvil_u:7609: vivarña-vadano bhūtvā tal-lipiṃ mārjayed yamaḥ // Hbhv_9.173 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7610: tulasṚti ca yo brūyāt tri-kālaṃ vadane yadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:7611: nityaṃ sa go-sahasrasya phalam āpnoti bhūsura // Hbhv_9.174 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7612: tena dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ gayāśire /
GR14hbhvil_u:7613: tapas taptaṃ khaga-śreṣṭha tulasṚ yena ropitā // Hbhv_9.175 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7615: tulasṚ dahate pāpaṃ yugāntāgnir ivākhilam // Hbhv_9.176 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7617: labhate cākṣayaṃ sthānaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha vaiṣñavaḥ // Hbhv_9.177 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7619: tulasṚ-kānane śrāddhaṃ pitṄñāṃ kurute tu yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7620: gayā-śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ tena bhāṣitaṃ viṣñunā purā // Hbhv_9.178 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7622: sarvathā muni-śārdūla brahmahā puñya-bhāg bhavet // Hbhv_9.179 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7625: śravañena mahābhāga tulasṚ cātipuñyadā // Hbhv_9.180 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7626: prasaŚgāt śrṚ-tulasyā hi mṛdaḥ kāṣṭhasya cādhunā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7627: māhātmyaṃ likhyate kṛṣñe arpitasya dalasya ca // Hbhv_9.181 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7630: bhūgatais tulasṚ-mūlair mṛttikā sparśitā tu yā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7631: tṚrtha-koṭi-samā jñeyā dhāryā yatnena sā gṛhe // Hbhv_9.182 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7633: sarvadā tiṣṭhate dehe devatā na sa mānuṣaḥ // Hbhv_9.183 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7635: yamena nekṣituṃ śakto yuktaḥ pāpa-śatair api // Hbhv_9.184 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7637: vighnāni tasya naśyanti sānukūlā grahās tathā // Hbhv_9.185 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7638: tulasṚ-mṛttikā yatra kāṣṭhaṃ patraṃ ca veśmani /
GR14hbhvil_u:7639: tiṣṭhate muni-śārdūla niścalaṃ vaiṣñavaṃ padam // Hbhv_9.186 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7645: tasya tuṣṭo varān kāmān pradadāti janārdanaḥ // Hbhv_9.188 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7648: gaŚgodbhavā ca mṛl-lekhā nayaty acyuta-rūpatām // Hbhv_9.189 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7651: bhavate naiva pāpaṃ tad-gṛhe saŚkramate kalau // Hbhv_9.190 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7654: tulasṚ-sambhavaṃ mūlaṃ pāvanaṃ mṛttikādy api // Hbhv_9.191 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7656: lave lave bhavet puñyam agniṣṭoma-śatodbhavam // Hbhv_9.192 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7658: meru-tulyaṃ bhaved annaṃ tad dattaṃ keśavāya hi // Hbhv_9.193 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7660: na teṣāṃ punar āvṛttir viṣñu-lokāt kathañcana // Hbhv_9.194 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7663: tṚrthaṃ yadi na samprāptaṃ smṛtir vā kṚrtanam hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7664: tulasṚ-kāṣṭha-dagdhasya mṛtasya na punar bhavaḥ // Hbhv_9.196 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7665: yady ekaṃ tulasṚ-kāṣṭhaṃ madhye kāṣṭha-cayasya hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:7666: daha-kāle bhaven muktih pāpa-koṭi-yutasya ca // Hbhv_9.197 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7668: dahyante te janā loke tulasṚ-kāṣṭha-vahninā // Hbhv_9.198 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7671: kañṭha-mālāṃ ca yatnena kṛtaṃ tasyākṣayaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_9.199 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7674: yasya nābhi-sthitaṃ patraṃ mukhe śirasi karñayoḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7675: tulasṚ-sambhavaṃ nityaṃ tṚrthais tasya makhaiś ca kim // Hbhv_9.200 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7677: śatrughnaṃ ca supuñyaṃ ca śrṚ-karaṃ roga-nāśanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7678: kṛtvā dharmam avāpnoti śirasā tulasṚ-dalam // Hbhv_9.201 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7679: yaḥ kaścid vaiṣñavo loke mithyācāro 'py anāśramṚ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7680: punāti sakalān lokān śirasā tulasṚṃ vahan // Hbhv_9.202 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7682: karñena dhārayed yas tu tulasṚṃ satataṃ naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7683: tat-kāṣṭhaṃ vāpi rājendra tasya nāsty upapātakam // Hbhv_9.203 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7685: kasmād iti na jānṚmas tulasyā hi priyo hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7689: karoti dharma-kāryāñi phalam āpnoti cākṣayam // Hbhv_9.205 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7691: mukhe tu tulasṚ-patram dṛṣṭvā śirasi karñayoḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7692: kurute bhaskaris tasya duṣkṛtasya tu mārjanam // Hbhv_9.206 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7693: tri-kālaṃ vinatā-putra prāśayet tulasṚṃ yadi viśiṣyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:7699: pāpo 'pi sad-gatiṃ prāpta ity etad api viśrutam // Hbhv_9.209 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7700: tathā ca skānde śrṚ-brahma nāradaṃ prati kathite amṛta-saroddhare lubdhakopākhyānānte yamadūtan prati śrṚ-viṣñudūtanaṃ vacanaṃ-
GR14hbhvil_u:7704: vilayaṃ yānti pāpāni kiṃ punar viṣñu-pūjanāt // Hbhv_9.211 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7706: hitvā tu ratna-jātāni gṛhñāti tulasṚ-dalam // Hbhv_9.212 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7708: paścād diṣṭāntam āpanno bhasmṚbhūtaṃ kalevaram // Hbhv_9.213 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7710: tathā ca tulasṚ-patram prāśitaṃ sarva-kāma-dam // Hbhv_9.214 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7712: prāśitaṃ tulasṚ-patraṃ yathā dahati pātakam // Hbhv_9.215 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7713: yathā bhakti-rato nityaṃ naro dahati pātakam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7714: tulasṚ-bhakṣañāt tat tad dahate pāpa-sañcayam // Hbhv_9.216 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7716: na tulyaṃ jāyate puñyaṃ tulasṚ-patra-bhakṣañāt // Hbhv_9.217 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7718: tulasṚ-bhakṣañān mucyet śrutam etat purā hareḥ // Hbhv_9.218 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7720: yāvan na tulasṚ-patraṃ mukhe śirasi tiṣṭhati // Hbhv_9.219 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7722: smṛtā saŚkṚrtitā dhyātā prāśitā sarva-kāma-dā // Hbhv_9.220 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7724: dhātrṚ-phalaṃ ca tulasṚ mṛtyu-kāle bhaved yadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:7725: mukhe yasya śire dehe durgatir nāsti tasya vai // Hbhv_9.221 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7726: yukto yadi mahā-pāpaiḥ sukṛtaṃ nārjitaṃ kvacit /
GR14hbhvil_u:7727: tathāpi dṚyate mokṣas tulasṚ bhakṣitā yadi // Hbhv_9.222 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7729: samprāpto mat-padaṃ nūnaṃ kṛtvā prāñasya saṃkṣayam // Hbhv_9.223 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7732: prāśayed yadi viprendra aśvamedhāṣṭakaṃ labhet // Hbhv_9.224 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7741: tathāpi vaiṣñavais tan na grāhyaṃ kṛṣñārpañaṃ vinā // Hbhv_9.227 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7743: saŚkṚrtyamānaṃ dhātryāś ca māhātmyaṃ likhyate 'dhunā // Hbhv_9.228 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7746: puṣpe puṣpe 'śvamedhasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // Hbhv_9.229 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7748: dhātrṚ-cchāyāṃ tu saṃspṛśya kuryāt piñḍaṃ tu yo mune /
GR14hbhvil_u:7749: muktiṃ prayānti pitaraḥ prasādān mādhavasya ca // Hbhv_9.230 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7750: mūrdhni ghrāñe mukhe caiva dehe ca muni-sattama /
GR14hbhvil_u:7751: dhatte dhātrṚ-phalaṃ yas tu sa mahātmā su-durlabhaḥ // Hbhv_9.231 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7754: yaḥ kaścid vaiṣñavo loke dhatte dhātrṚ-phalaṃ mune /
GR14hbhvil_u:7755: priyo bhavati devānāṃ manuṣyāñāṃ tu kā kathā // Hbhv_9.233 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7756: yaḥ kaścid vaiṣñavo loke mithyācāro 'pi duṣṭa-dhṚḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7759: tasya nārāyaño devo varam ekaṃ prayacchati // Hbhv_9.235 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7761: yaśaḥ śriyam avāpnoti prasādāc cakra-pāñinaḥ // Hbhv_9.236 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7763: saphalaṃ jṚvitaṃ tasya tritayaṃ yasya veśmani // Hbhv_9.237 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7765: pibate vahate yas tu tṚrtha-koṭi-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_9.238 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7767: dhātrṚ-phalaiś ca viprendra gāŚgeyaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam // Hbhv_9.239 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7771: dhātrṚ-phalāni tulasṚ hy anta-kāle bhaved yadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:7772: mukhe caiva śirasy aŚge pātakaṃ nāsti tasya vai // Hbhv_9.241 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7773: kṛtvā tu bhagavat-pūjāṃ na tṚrthaṃ snānam ācaret /
GR14hbhvil_u:7777: na snāyād utsave tṚrthe māŚgalyaṃ vinivartya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:7781: cāñḍālān patitān vāpi spṛṣṭvā na snānam ācaret // Hbhv_9.244 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7783: utsaveṣu ca sarveṣu spṛṣṭāspṛṣṭir na vidyate // Hbhv_9.245 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7785: śāstrābhyāsaṃ dvijaḥ śaktyā kuryād vipro viśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_9.246 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7788: ekena vikalaḥ kāño dvābhyām andhaḥ prakṚrtitaḥ // Hbhv_9.247 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7790: yo 'nyatra kurute yatnaṃ anādhṚtya śrutiṃ dvijaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7791: sa samūḍho na sambhāṣyo veda-bāhyo dvijātibhiḥ // Hbhv_9.248 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7792: na veda-patha-mātreña santusyed esa vai dvijaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7793: yathoktācāra-hinas tu paŚke gaur iva sidati // Hbhv_9.249 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7794: yo 'dhṚtya vidhivad vedaṃ vedārthaṃ na vicārayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:7795: sa cāndhaḥ śūdra-kalpas tu padārthaṃ na prapadyate // Hbhv_9.250 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7797: samarpya tac ca kṛṣñāya yateta nija-vṛttaye // Hbhv_9.251 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7798: vṛttau satyāṃ ca śṛñuyāt sādhūn saŚgatya sat-kathām // Hbhv_9.252 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7801: satyānrtābhyām api vā na sva-vṛttyā kadācana // Hbhv_9.253 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7802: ṛtam uñcha-śilaṃ proktaṃ amṛtaṃ syād ayācitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7803: mṛtaṃ tu nityaṃ yācñā syāt pramṛtaṃ karṣañaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_9.254 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7804: satyānṛtaṃ tu vāñijyaṃ śva-vṛttir nṚca-sevanam // Hbhv_9.255 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7806: nitarāṃ nindyate sadbhir vaiṣñavasya viśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_9.256 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7808: sevā śva-vṛttir yair uktā na samyak tair udāhṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7809: svacchanda-caritaḥ kva śvā vikrṚtāsuḥ kva sevakaḥ // Hbhv_9.257 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7811: teṣāṃ durātmanām annaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyañaṃ caret // Hbhv_9.258 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7813: tathaiva grāhyāgrāhyāñi jānṚyāc chāstrato budhaḥ // Hbhv_9.259 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7816: pratigraheña yal labdhaṃ yajyataḥ śiṣyatas tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7817: gunānvitebhyo viprasya śuklaṃ tat tri-vidhaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_9.260 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7818: yuddhopakārāl labdhaṃ ca dañḍāc ca vyavahārataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7819: kṣatriyasya dhanaṃ śuklaṃ tri-vidhaṃ parikṚrtitam // Hbhv_9.261 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7821: dvija-śuśrūṣayā labdhaṃ śuklaṃ śūdrasya kṚrtitam // Hbhv_9.262 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7822: kramāgataṃ prṚti-dānaṃ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7823: aviśeṣena sarveṣāṃ dhanaṃ śuklaṃ prakṚrtitam // Hbhv_9.263 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7826: nādyāc chūdrasya vipro 'nnaṃ mohād vā yadi kāmataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7827: na śūdra-yoniṃ vrajati yas tu bhuŚkte hy anāpadi // Hbhv_9.264 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7828: duṣkṛtaṃ hi manuṣyasya sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7829: yo yasyānnaṃ samaśnāti sa tasyāśnāti kilbiṣam // Hbhv_9.265 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7830: ārdhikaḥ kula-mitraś ca sva-gopālaś ca nāpitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7831: ete śūdreṣu bhojyānnā dattvā svalpa-pañaṃ budhaiḥ // Hbhv_9.266 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7832: pāyasaṃ sneha-pakvaṃ yad go-rasaṃ caiva śaktavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7833: piñyākaṃ caiva tailaṃ ca śūdrād grāhyaṃ tathaiva ca // Hbhv_9.267 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7835: go-rasaṃ caiva śaktūṃś ca taila-piñyākam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:7836: apūpān bhakṣayec chūdrāt yat kiñcit payasā kṛtam // Hbhv_9.268 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7838: sva-sutāyāś ca yo bhuŚkte sa bhuŚkte pṛthivṚ-malam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7839: narendra-bhavane bhuktvā viṣṭhāyāṃ jāyate kṛmiḥ // Hbhv_9.269 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7843: abhyudyatāni tv etāni grāhyāñy api nikṛṣṭataḥ // Hbhv_9.271 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7845: agrāhyād api tad-grāhyaṃ yac ca goṣṭha-gataṃ payaḥ // Hbhv_9.272 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7846: pānṚyaṃ pāyasaṃ bhakṣyaṃ ghṛtaṃ lavañam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:7847: hasta-dattaṃ na gṛhñṚyāt tulyaṃ go-māṃsa-bhakṣañaiḥ // Hbhv_9.273 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7850: pratyakṣe api tu grāhye niṣedhas tv anya-gocaraḥ // Hbhv_9.274 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7852: bhoktā tad viṭ-samaṃ bhuŚkte dātā ca narakaṃ vrajet // Hbhv_9.275 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7854: proṣyān vārdhūṣikāṃś caiva viprān śūdravad ācaret // Hbhv_9.276 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7856: tṛñaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ prakāśaṃ vai harer budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7857: dharmārthaṃ kevalaṃ vipra hy anyathā patito bhavet // Hbhv_9.277 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7859: kṣudhārthair nānyathā vipra dharma-vidbhir iti sthitiḥ // Hbhv_9.278 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7860: vaiṣñavānāṃ hi bhoktavyaṃ prārthyānnaṃ vaiṣñavaiḥ sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7861: avaiṣñavānām annaṃ tu parivarjyam amedhyavat // Hbhv_9.279 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7867: yācayed annam amṛtaṃ tad-abhāve jalaṃ pibet // Hbhv_9.281 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7870: ānakhāt śodhayet pāpaṃ tuṣāgniḥ kanakaṃ yathā // Hbhv_9.282 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7873: śuddhaṃ viṣñu-paraṃ cittaṃ śuddham ekādaśṚ-vratam // Hbhv_9.283 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7874: avaiṣñava-gṛhe bhuktvā pṚtvā vā jānato 'pi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:7875: śuddhiś cāndrāyañe prokta iṣṭāpūrtaṃ vṛthā sadā // Hbhv_9.284 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7877: keśavārcā gṛhe yasya na tiṣṭhati mahṚ-pate /
GR14hbhvil_u:7878: tasyānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyam abhakṣyeña samaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_9.285 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7880: viśvastasyādiśanty asmin kāle 'pi kṛtino japam // Hbhv_9.286 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7882: madhyāhne snānataḥ pūrvaṃ puṣpādy āhṛtya vā svayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7883: bhṛtyādinā vā sampādya kuryān madhyāhnikṚḥ kriyāḥ // Hbhv_9.287 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7884: snānāśaktau ca madhyāhne snānam ācārya māntrikam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7885: yathoktaṃ bhagavat-pūjāṃ śaktaś cet prāgvad ācaret // Hbhv_9.288 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7888: vaiśvadevādikaṃ daivaṃ karma paitraṃ ca sādhayet // Hbhv_9.289 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7889: tad uktaṃ ṣaṣṭhe dina-vibhāge tu kuryāt pañca mahā-makhān /
GR14hbhvil_u:7890: daivo homena yajñaḥ syāt bhautas tu bali-dānatah // Hbhv_9.290 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7892: kiñcid anna-pradānād vā tarpañād vā catur-vidhaḥ // Hbhv_9.291 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7897: akṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahā-yajñān dvijottamaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7898: bhuñjṚta cet su-mūḍhātmā tiryag-yoniṃ sa gacchati // Hbhv_9.293 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7901: tac-cheṣeñaiva kurvṚta śrāddhaṃ bhāgavato narah // Hbhv_9.294 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7904: pitṛ-pāko na dātavyo yāvat piñḍān na nirvapet // Hbhv_9.295 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7909: pitṛbhyaś cāpi tad deyam tad ānantyāya kalpate // Hbhv_9.297 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7912: pūjāyām āsa deveśaṃ tac-cheṣeña pitāmahān // Hbhv_9.298 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7919: devān pitṄn samuddiśya yad viṣñor viniveditam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7920: tān uddiśya tathā kuryāt pradānaṃ tasya caiva hi // Hbhv_9.300 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7921: prayānti tṛptim atulāṃ sodakena tu tena vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:7924: devānāṃ ca pitṄñāṃ ca jāyate tṛpti-rakṣayā // Hbhv_9.302 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7925: evaṃ kṛte mahṚ-pala mā bhavet saṃśayaḥ kvacit // Hbhv_9.303 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7930: viṣñor naivedya-śeṣaṃ tu tasmād deyaṃ dvijātmanām /
GR14hbhvil_u:7931: piñḍe caiva viśeṣena pitṄñāṃ tṛptim icchatā // Hbhv_9.305 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7933: pitṄn uddiśya yaiḥ pūjā keśavasya kṛtā naraih /
GR14hbhvil_u:7934: tyaktvā te nārakṚṃ pṚḍāṃ muktiṃ yānti mahā-mune // Hbhv_9.306 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7935: dhanyās te mānavā loke kali-kāle viśeṣatah /
GR14hbhvil_u:7936: ye kurvanti harer nityaṃ pitr-arthaṃ pūjanaṃ mune // Hbhv_9.307 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7937: kiṃ dattair bahubhir piñḍair gayā-śrāddhādibhir mune /
GR14hbhvil_u:7938: yair arcito harir bhaktyā pitr-arthaṃ ca dine dine // Hbhv_9.308 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7939: yam uddiśya hareḥ pūjā kriyate muni-puŚgava /
GR14hbhvil_u:7940: uddhṛtya narakāvāsāt taṃ nayet paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_9.309 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7941: yo dadāti hareḥ sthānaṃ pitṄn uddiśya nārada /
GR14hbhvil_u:7942: kartavyaṃ hi pitṄñāṃ yat tat kṛtaṃ tena bho dvija // Hbhv_9.310 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7952: tasmād vidhvaṃso viṣñūpāhṛtaṃ bhakṣayeyuḥ // Hbhv_9.311 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7957: mamāpi hṛdaya-sthasya pitṄñāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_9.313 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7959: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca yat kiñcid anivedyāgra-bhoktari /
GR14hbhvil_u:7960: na deyaṃ pitṛ-devebhyaḥ prāyaścittṚ yato bhavet // Hbhv_9.314 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7961: svargādau kathito devair agra-bhug bhagavān hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7962: yajña-bhāga-bhujo devās tatas tena prakalpitāḥ // Hbhv_9.315 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7964: yas tu vidyā-vinirmuktaṃ mūrkhaṃ matvā tu vaiṣñavam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7965: vedavidbhyo 'vadād vipraḥ śrāddhaṃ tad rākṣasaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_9.316 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7966: siktha-mātraṃ tu yad bhuŚkte jalaṃ gañḍūṣa-mātrakam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7967: tad-annaṃ meruñā tulyaṃ taj jalaṃ sāgaropamam // Hbhv_9.317 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7969: śaŚkhāŚkita-tanur vipro bhuŚkte yasya ca veśmani /
GR14hbhvil_u:7970: tad-annaṃ svayam aśnāti pitṛbhiḥ saha keśavaḥ // Hbhv_9.318 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7975: niveśayen naro mohād anya-paŚktau hareḥ priyam /
GR14hbhvil_u:7976: sa paten niraye ghore paŚkti-bhedṚ narādhamaḥ // Hbhv_9.320 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7978: niveditaṃ yad anyasmai tad ucchiṣṭaṃ hi kathyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:7979: ataḥ kathañcid api tan na śrṚ-bhagavate'rpayet // Hbhv_9.321 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7981: api dṚpāvalokaṃ me nopayuñjyān niveditam // Hbhv_9.322 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7983: pitṛ-śeṣaṃ tu you dadyād dharaye paramātmane /
GR14hbhvil_u:7984: retodāḥ pitaras tasya bhavanti kleśa-bhāginaḥ // Hbhv_9.323 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7986: hari-śeṣaṃ havir dadyāt pitṄñām akṣayaṃ bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:7987: na punaḥ pitṛ-śeṣaṃ tu harer brahmādi-sad-guroḥ // Hbhv_9.324 //
GR14hbhvil_u:7989: dakṣādayaś ca pitaro bhṛtyā indrādayaḥ surāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7990: atas tad-bhakta-śeṣaṃ tu viṣñor naiva nivedayet // Hbhv_9.325 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:7991: evam āvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā vaiṣñavebhyo vibhajya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:7997: harer niveditaṃ kiñccin na dadyāt karhicid budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:7998: abhaktebhyaḥ saśalyebhyo yad davan niraye vrajet // Hbhv_9.328 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8001: naivedyaṃ vā mahābhāga tasya tuṣyati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_9.329 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:8003: na cāsamarpya govinde kiñcid bhuñjṚta vaiṣñavaḥ // Hbhv_9.330 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8007: śvāna-viṣṭhā-samaṃ cānnaṃ nṚraṃ ca surayā samam // Hbhv_9.331 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8010: bhuŚkte sa yāti narakaṃ śūkareṣv iha jāyate // Hbhv_9.332 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8012: eka-kālaṃ dvikālaṃ vā tri-kālaṃ pūjayed dharim /
GR14hbhvil_u:8013: apūjya bhojanaṃ kurvan narakāñi vrajen naraḥ // Hbhv_9.333 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8015: prātar madhyandinaṃ sāyaṃ viṣñu-pūjā smṛtā budhaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8016: aśakto vistareñaiva prātaḥ sampūjya keśavam // Hbhv_9.334 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8017: madhyāhne caiva sāyaṃ ca puṣpāñjalim api kṣipet /
GR14hbhvil_u:8018: madhyāhne vā vistareña saṃkṣepeñāthavā harim // Hbhv_9.335 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8019: sambhojya bhojanaṃ kuryād anyathā narakaṃ vrajet // Hbhv_9.336 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8022: na tv evāpūjya bhuñjṚta bhagavantaṃ janārdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8023: na tat svayaṃ samaśnṚyāt yad viṣñau na nivedayet // Hbhv_9.337 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8025: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyam anna-pānādyam auṣadham /
GR14hbhvil_u:8026: anivedya ca bhuñjṚta yad āhārāya kalpitam // Hbhv_9.338 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8027: anivedyaṃ tu bhuñjānaḥ prāyaścittṚ bhaven naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8028: tasmāt sarvaṃ nivedyaiva viṣñor bhuñjṚta sarvadā // Hbhv_9.339 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8030: ambarṚṣa gṛhe pakvaṃ yad abhṚṣṭaṃ sadātmanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8031: anivedya harer bhuñjan sapta-kalpāni nārakṚ // Hbhv_9.340 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8033: avaiṣñavānāṃ yac cānnaṃ patitānāṃ tathaiva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:8034: anarpitaṃ tathā viṣñau śva-māṃsa-sadṛśaṃ bhavet // Hbhv_9.341 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8036: anivedya tu yo bhuŚkte haraye paramātmane /
GR14hbhvil_u:8037: majjanti pitaras tasya narake śāśvatṚḥ samāḥ // Hbhv_9.342 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8039: ambarṚṣa navaṃ vastraṃ phalam annaṃ rasādikam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8040: kṛtvā viṣñūpabhuktaṃ tu sadā sevyaṃ hi vaiṣñavaiḥ // Hbhv_9.343 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8043: dattvā tu devadevāya tac-cheṣāñy upabhuñjate // Hbhv_9.344 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8045: pādodakaṃ piben nityaṃ naivedyaṃ bhakṣayed dhareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8046: śeṣāś ca mastake dhāryā iti vedānuśāsanam // Hbhv_9.345 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8048: udvāsya devaṃ sve dhāmni tan niveditam agrataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8051: niveditaṃ tad-bhaktāya dadyād bhuñjṚta vā svayam // Hbhv_9.347 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8054: nivedya kṛṣñāya vidhivad annaṃ bhuñjṚta tat svayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8055: athavā sātvate dadyād yadi labhyate bhaktitaḥ // Hbhv_9.348 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8063: tulasṚṃ cātra nikṣipya ślokān saŚkṚrtayed imān // Hbhv_9.351 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8065: siddhādyāś ca hares tasya vayam ucchiṣṭa-bhojinaḥ // Hbhv_9.352 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8070: yo bālya-lṚlayā tāṃs tān pūtanādṚn apātayat // Hbhv_9.354 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8073: ucchiṣṭa-bhojino dāsās tava māyāṃ jayemahi // Hbhv_9.355 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8075: pañca prāñāhutṚḥ kṛtvā bhuñjṚta purataḥ prabhoḥ // Hbhv_9.356 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8078: praśasta-ratna-pāñis tu bhuñjṚta prayato gṛhṚ // Hbhv_9.357 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8082: prāŚ-mukhodaŚ-mukho vāpi na caivānya-manā naraḥ // Hbhv_9.359 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8083: dattvā tu bhaktaṃ śiṣyebhyaḥ kṣudhitebhyas tathā gṛhṚ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8089: aśnṚyāt tan-mayo bhūtvā pūrvaṃ tu madhuraṃ rasam // Hbhv_9.362 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8091: prāg dravaṃ puruṣo 'śnṚyān madhye kaṭhināśanam // Hbhv_9.363 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8092: ante punar dravāśṚ tu balārogye na muñcati /
GR14hbhvil_u:8095: yathāvat punar ācāmet pāñṚ prakṣālya mūlataḥ // Hbhv_9.365 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8097: abhṚṣṭa-devatānāṃ tu kurvṚta smarañaṃ naraḥ // Hbhv_9.366 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8101: yacchantv arogo mama cāstu dehe // Hbhv_9.367 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8110: āsṚnaḥ svāsane siddhe bhūmyāṃ pādau nidhāya ca // Hbhv_9.370 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8112: śriyaṃ pratyaŚ-mukho bhuŚkte ṛtaṃ bhuŚkte udaŚ-mukhaḥ // Hbhv_9.371 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8113: pañcārdro bhojanaṃ kuryād bhūmau pātraṃ nidhāya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:8114: upavāsena tat tulyaṃ manur āha prajāpatiḥ // Hbhv_9.372 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8115: upalipte śucau deśe pādau prakṣālya vai karau /
GR14hbhvil_u:8120: apānāya tato hutvā vyānāya tad-anantaram // Hbhv_9.375 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8122: vijñāya tattvam eteṣāṃ juhuyād ātmani dvijāḥ // Hbhv_9.376 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8123: śeṣam annaṃ yathākāmaṃ bhuñjṚta vyañjanair yutam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8124: dhyātvā tan-manasā devam ātmānaṃ vai prajāpatim // Hbhv_9.377 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8125: amṛtāpidhānam asṚty upariṣṭād apaḥ pibet // Hbhv_9.378 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8127: yad bhuŚkte veṣṭita-śirā yac ca bhuŚkte vidiŚ-mukhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8128: sopānatkaś ca yad bhuŚkte sarvaṃ vidyāt tad āsuram // Hbhv_9.379 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8130: na ca bhinnāsana-gato na yāne saṃsthito 'pi vā // Hbhv_9.380 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8131: na bhinna-bhājane caiva na bhūmyāṃ na ca pāñiṣu /
GR14hbhvil_u:8133: apuñyaṃ loka-vidviṣṭaṃ tasmāt tat parivarjayet // Hbhv_9.381 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8135: na vāma-hastenoddhṛtya pibed vaktreña vā jalam // Hbhv_9.382 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8138: abhojyaṃ tad bhaved annaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyañaṃ caret // Hbhv_9.383 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8140: bhuñjṚtānnaṃ ca tac-citto hy antarjāsu sadā naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8144: dakṣiñaṃ tu parityajya vāme nṚraṃ nighāpayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:8145: abhojyaṃ tad bhaved annaṃ pānṚyaṃ ca surā-samam // Hbhv_9.385 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8146: tṛpto dadyād dhi tad-annaṃ śeṣaṃ durgata-tṛptaye // Hbhv_9.386 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8147: samyag ācamya dakṣāŚghrer aŚguṣṭhe vāri nikṣipet // Hbhv_9.387 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8149: sannikṛṣṭair vṛtaḥ śiṣṭair japed anna-pater manūn /
GR14hbhvil_u:8150: annapate'nnasya no dehi // Hbhv_9.388 // ity ādi /
GR14hbhvil_u:8152: śiṣṭair iṣṭair japed divyaṃ bhagavan nāma-maŚgalam // Hbhv_9.389 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8155: yo mamaivārcanaṃ kṛtvā tatra prāpañam uttamam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8156: śeṣam annaṃ śam aśnāti tataḥ saukhyataraṃ nu kim // Hbhv_9.390 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8159: sevitaṃ tena niyataṃ puroḍāśo mahādhiyā // Hbhv_9.391 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8169: ṣaḍbhir māsopavāsais tu yat phalaṃ parikṚrtitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8170: viṣñor naivedya-śeṣe yat phalaṃ tad bhuñjatāṃ kalau // Hbhv_9.394 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8173: koṭiṃ makhasya labhate phalaṃ śata-sahasraśaḥ // Hbhv_9.395 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8175: bhoktavyaṃ viṣñu-naivedyaṃ nātra kāryā vicārañā // Hbhv_9.396 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8180: tat phalaṃ prāpyate nūnaṃ viṣñor naivedya-bhakṣañāt // Hbhv_9.398 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8181: hṛdi rūpaṃ mukhe nāma naivedyam udare hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8182: pādodakaṃ ca nirmālyaṃ mastake yasya so 'cyutaḥ // Hbhv_9.399 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8187: tat phalaṃ prāpyate pumbhir viṣñor naivedya-bhakṣañāt // Hbhv_9.401 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8188: tulasyāś ca rajo-juṣṭaṃ naivedyasya ca bhakṣañam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8189: nirmālyaṃ ca dhṛtaṃ yena mahā-pātaka-nāśanam // Hbhv_9.402 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8192: brahmavan nirvikāraṃ hi yathā viṣñus tathaiva tat // Hbhv_9.403 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8193: vikāraṃ ye prakurvanti bhakṣañe tad dvijātayaḥ // Hbhv_9.404 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8195: nirayaṃ yānti te viprā yasmān nāvartate punaḥ // Hbhv_9.405 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8197: navam annaṃ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ nivedya madhusūdane /
GR14hbhvil_u:8198: paścād bhuŚkte svayaṃ yaś ca tasya tuṣyati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_9.406 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8200: mukundāśana-śeṣaṃ tu yo hi bhuŚkte dine dine /
GR14hbhvil_u:8201: sikthe sikthe bhavet puñyaṃ cāndrāyaña-śatādhikam // Hbhv_9.407 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8204: tat phalaṃ prāpyate pumbhir viṣñor naivedya-bhakṣañāt // Hbhv_9.408 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:8205: tato yathoktam ācamya tāmbūlādi vibhajya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:8206: mahā-prasādaṃ dāsyena gṛhñṚyāt prayataḥ svayam // Hbhv_9.409 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8208: kāmaṃ ca dāsye na tu kāma-kāmyayā
GR14hbhvil_u:8210: naivedya-bhakṣañe yac ca nirmālya-grahañe ca yat /
GR14hbhvil_u:8211: māhātmyam ādau likhitaṃ jñeyaṃ sarvam ihāpi tat // Hbhv_9.411 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8217: kathañcid āśrayād yeṣāṃ śvāpi tad-gandha-bhāg bhavet // Hbhv_10.1 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8224: viṣṇur eva hi yasyaiṣa devatā vaiṣṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_10.4 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8227: śaiveṣv api ca kṛṣṇasya bhaktāḥ santi tathā tathā // Hbhv_10.5 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8231: nopāsate mahīpāla te vai bhāgavatā narāḥ // Hbhv_10.6 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8232: prāṇātyaye na cāśnanti dinaṃ prāpya harer narāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8233: kurvanti jāgaraṃ rātrau sadā bhāgavatā hi te // Hbhv_10.7 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8235: alpāṃ tu sādhayed yas tu sa vai bhāgavato naraḥ // Hbhv_10.8 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8236: bhaktir na vicyutā yeṣāṃ na cyutāni vratāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:8237: supriyaḥ śrīpatir yeṣāṃ te syur bhāgavatā narāḥ // Hbhv_10.9 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8238: karmiṣu bhagavad-arpaṇādinā tad-ājñā-buddhyā vā bhakti-hetuḥ sadācāra-paratā /
GR14hbhvil_u:8239: dharmārthaṃ jīvitaṃ yeṣāṃ santānārthaṃ ca maithunam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8240: pacanaṃ vipramukhyārthaṃ jñeyās te vaiṣṇavā narāḥ // Hbhv_10.10 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8241: adhvagaṃ tu pathi śrāntaṃ kāle'tra gṛham āgatam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8242: yo 'tithiṃ pūjayed bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaḥ sa na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.11 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8244: śucayas tyakta-rāgā ye sadā bhāgavatā hi te // Hbhv_10.12 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8246: jīvitaṃ yasya dharmārthaṃ dharmo hary-artham eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:8247: aho-rātrāṇi puṇyārthaṃ taṃ manye vaiṣṇavaṃ bhuvi // Hbhv_10.13 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8250: prīto bhavati yo dṛṣṭvā vaiṣṇavo 'sau prakīrtitaḥ // Hbhv_10.14 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8254: bhagavad-dharma-niratās te narā vaiṣṇavā nṛpa // Hbhv_10.15 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8266: kāmair ahata-dhīr dānto mṛduḥ śucir akiñcanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8267: anīho mita-bhuk śāntaḥ sthiro mac-charaṇo muniḥ // Hbhv_10.19 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8269: amānī māna-daḥ kalyo maitraḥ kāruṇikaḥ kaviḥ // Hbhv_10.20 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8273: na harati na hanti kiñcid uccaiḥ
GR14hbhvil_u:8278: bhūtāni bhagavaty ātmany eṣa bhāgavatottamaḥ // Hbhv_10.22 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8279: na yasya svaḥ para iti vitteṣv ātmani vā bhidā /
GR14hbhvil_u:8280: sarva-bhūta-samaḥ śāntaḥ sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ // Hbhv_10.23 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8282: jñātvājñātvātha ye vai māṃ yāvān yaś cāsmi yādṛśaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8283: bhajanty ananya-bhāvena te me bhakta-tamā matāḥ // Hbhv_10.24 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8286: prema-maitrī-kṛpopekṣā yaḥ karoti sa madhyamaḥ // Hbhv_10.25 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8287: arcāyām eva haraye pūjāṃ yaḥ śraddhayehate /
GR14hbhvil_u:8288: na tad-bhakteṣu cānyeṣu sa bhaktaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_10.26 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8291: gṛhītvāpīndriyair arthān yo na dveṣṭi na hṛṣyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:8292: viṣṇor māyām idaṃ paśyan sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ // Hbhv_10.27 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8295: sajjate 'sminn aham-bhāvo dehe vai sa hareḥ priyaḥ // Hbhv_10.28 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8297: bhakti-niṣṭhāpakā jātās tato hy uttamatoditā // Hbhv_10.29 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8300: śive ca parameśāne viṣṇau ca paramātmani /
GR14hbhvil_u:8301: samabuddhyā pravarttante te vai bhāgavatottamāḥ // Hbhv_10.30 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8305: yeṣāṃ bhāgavataṃ śāstraṃ sadā tiṣṭhati sannidhau /
GR14hbhvil_u:8306: pūjayanti ca ye nityaṃ te syur bhāgavatā narāḥ // Hbhv_10.32 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8307: yeṣāṃ bhāgavataṃ śāstraṃ jīvitād adhikaṃ bhavet /
GR14hbhvil_u:8308: mahā-bhāgavatāḥ śreṣṭhā viṣṇunā kathitā narāḥ // Hbhv_10.33 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8310: viṣṇu-bhaktam athāyātaṃ yo dṛṣṭvā sumukhaḥ priyaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8311: praṇāmādi karoty eva vāsudeve yathā tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:8312: sa vai bhakta iti jñeyaḥ sa punāti jagat trayam // Hbhv_10.34 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8314: praṇāma-pūrvakaṃ kṣāntvā yo vaded vaiṣṇavo hi saḥ // Hbhv_10.35 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8316: viṣṇu-bhaktasya satataṃ sa vai bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_10.36 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8319: vaiṣṇaveṣu kṛtātmatvān mahā-bhāgavato hi saḥ // Hbhv_10.37 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8322: tat-kāṣṭhāṅkita-karṇā ye te vai bhāgavatottamāḥ // Hbhv_10.38 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8323: tulasī-gandham āghrāya santoṣaṃ kurvate tu ye /
GR14hbhvil_u:8324: tan-mūlam ṛddhūtā yaiś ca te vai bhāgavatottamāḥ // Hbhv_10.39 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8328: tad-bhakta-viṣṇu-bhaktāś ca te vai bhāgavatottamāḥ // Hbhv_10.40 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8330: mat-kathāṃ kurute yas tu mat-kathāṃ ca śṛṇoti yaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8331: hṛṣyate mat-kathāyāṃ ca sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ // Hbhv_10.41 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8333: mad-āśrayāḥ kathā mṛṣṭāḥ śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:8334: tapanti vividhās tāpā naitān mad-gata-cetasaḥ // Hbhv_10.42 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8342: hari-nāma-parā ye ca te vai bhāgavatottamāḥ // Hbhv_10.45 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8362: vasati sadā hṛdi tasya vāsudevaḥ // Hbhv_10.50 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8376: lava-nimiṣārdham api yaḥ sa vaiṣṇavāgryaḥ // Hbhv_10.53 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8382: ye'rcayanti sadā viṣṇuṃ yajñeśaṃ varadaṃ harim /
GR14hbhvil_u:8383: dehinaḥ puṇya-karmāṇaḥ sadā bhāgavatā hi te // Hbhv_10.55 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8386: pratimāṃ ca harer nityaṃ pūjayet pratayāmavān // Hbhv_10.56 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8387: viṣṇu-bhaktaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ karmaṇā manasā girā /
GR14hbhvil_u:8388: nārāyaṇa-paro nityaṃ bhūpa bhāgavato hi saḥ // Hbhv_10.57 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8395: ekāntena sadā viṣṇau yasmād deve parāyaṇāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8399: jñātvājñātvātha ye vai mām yāvān yaś cāsmi yādṛśaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8400: bhajanty ananya-bhāvena te vai bhāgavatā matāḥ // Hbhv_10.60 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8406: ājñāyaivaṃ guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān /
GR14hbhvil_u:8407: dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajeta sa tu sattamaḥ // Hbhv_10.62 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8409: sarva-dharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
GR14hbhvil_u:8410: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ // Hbhv_10.63 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8413: na jahāti matiṃ loke vede ca pariniṣṭhitām // Hbhv_10.64 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8420: saṅgas teṣv atha te prārthyaḥ saṅga-doṣa-harā hi te // Hbhv_10.66 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8424: na vicyutā ca bhaktir vai sa vai bhāgavato naraḥ // Hbhv_10.67 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8426: nānyatra ramate cittaṃ sa vai bhāgavato naraḥ // Hbhv_10.68 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8432: na prīti-yuktā yāvad-arthāś ca loke // Hbhv_10.69 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8434: uttamā madhyamā cāsau kaniṣṭhā ceti bhedataḥ // Hbhv_10.70 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8438: bhūtāni bhagavaty ātmany eṣa bhāgavatottamaḥ // Hbhv_10.71 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8440: bhāvayanti ca tāny asminn ity arthaḥ sammataḥ satām // Hbhv_10.72 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8442: mayy ananyena bhāvena bhaktiṃ kurvanti ye dṛḍhām /
GR14hbhvil_u:8452: prema-maitrī-kṛpopekṣā yaḥ karoti sa madhyamaḥ // Hbhv_10.75 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8455: arcāyām eva haraye pūjāṃ yaḥ śraddhayehate /
GR14hbhvil_u:8456: na tad-bhakteṣu cānyeṣu sa bhaktaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_10.76 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8457: śraddhayā pūjanaṃ prema-bodhakaṃ bhakta ity api /
GR14hbhvil_u:8458: lakṣaṇāni ca yāny agre bhakter lekhyāni tāny api // Hbhv_10.77 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8459: vandanādīni vidyante yeṣu bhāgavatā hi te /
GR14hbhvil_u:8461: ūhyāni lakṣaṇāny evaṃ vivecyāni parāṇy api // Hbhv_10.79 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8463: divyā hi maṇayo vyaktaṃ na varterann itas tataḥ // Hbhv_10.80 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8465: jāyamānaṃ hi puruṣaṃ yaṃ paśyen madhusūdanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8466: sāttvikas tu sa vijñeyo bhaven mokṣe ca niścitaḥ // Hbhv_10.81 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8467: evaṃ saṅkṣipya likhitād vaiṣṇavānāṃ tu lakṣaṇāt /
GR14hbhvil_u:8468: māhātmyam api vijñeyaṃ likhyate'nyac ca tat kiyat // Hbhv_10.82 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8471: kalau bhāgavataṃ nāma yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:8472: jananī putriṇī tena pitṝṇāṃ tu dhurandharaḥ // Hbhv_10.83 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8473: kalau bhāgavataṃ nāma durlabhaṃ naiva labhyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:8475: yasya bhāgavataṃ cihnaṃ dṛśyate tu harir mune /
GR14hbhvil_u:8476: gīyate ca kalau devā jñeyās te nāsti saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.85 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8478: samīpe tiṣṭhate yasya ha anta-kāle'pi vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8479: gacchate paramaṃ sthānaṃ yadyapi brahmahā bhavet // Hbhv_10.86 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8484: indro maheśvaro brahmā paraṃ brahma tadaiva hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:8485: śvapaco 'pi bhavaty eva yadā tuṣṭā'si keśava // Hbhv_10.88 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8487: tadaivācyuta yānty ete yadaiva tvaṃ parāṅmukhaḥ // Hbhv_10.89 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8488: sa kartā sarva-dharmāṇāṃ bhakto yas tava keśava /
GR14hbhvil_u:8489: sa kartā sarva-pāpānāṃ yo na bhaktas tavācyuta // Hbhv_10.90 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8490: dharmo bhavaty adharmo 'pi kṛto bhaktais tavācyuta /
GR14hbhvil_u:8491: pāpaṃ bhavati dharmo 'pi tavābhaktaiḥ kṛto hareḥ // Hbhv_10.91 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8493: sadā tiṣṭhati bhaktas te brahmahāpi viśudhyati // Hbhv_10.92 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8494: niścalā tvayi bhaktir yā saiva muktir janārdana /
GR14hbhvil_u:8495: muktā eva hi bhaktās te tava viṣṇo yato hare // Hbhv_10.93 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8499: bhagavān eva sarvatra bhūtānāṃ kṛpayā hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8500: rakṣaṇāya caran lokān bhakta-rūpeṇa nārada // Hbhv_10.95 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8502: yas tu viṣṇu-paro nityaṃ dṛḍha-bhaktir jitendriyaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8503: sva-gṛhe'pi vasan yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_10.96 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8505: nāsau tat-phalam āpnoti tad-bhaktair yad avāpyate // Hbhv_10.97 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8507: sarvatra vaiṣṇavāḥ pūjyāḥ svarge martye rasātale /
GR14hbhvil_u:8510: dahyante nātra sandeho vaiṣṇavānāṃ mahātmanām // Hbhv_10.99 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8512: nārmadaṃ yāmunaṃ caiva kiṃ punaḥ pādayor jalam // Hbhv_10.100 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8514: vinā tīrtha-sahasreṇa snāto bhavati mānavaḥ // Hbhv_10.101 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8517: yāvat kule bhakti-yuktaḥ suto naiva prajāyate // Hbhv_10.102 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8518: sa eva jñānavān loke yogināṃ prathamo hi saḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8519: mahā-kratūnām āhartā hari-bhakti-yuto hi yaḥ // Hbhv_10.103 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8521: na cyavante hi yad-bhaktyā mahatyāṃ pralayāpadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:8522: ato 'cyuto 'khile loke sa ekaḥ sarvago 'vyayaḥ // Hbhv_10.104 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8523: na tasmād bhagavad-bhaktād bhetavyaṃ kenacit kvacit /
GR14hbhvil_u:8524: niyataṃ viṣṇu-bhaktā yena te syuḥ para-tāpinaḥ // Hbhv_10.105 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8526: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā yadi vetaraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8529: gopī-candana-liptāṅgo dṛṣṭaś ced tad-aghaṃ kutaḥ // Hbhv_10.107 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8532: bhaktā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ durgāṇy atitaranti te // Hbhv_10.108 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8534: śayanād utthito yas tu kīrtayen madhusūdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8535: kīrtanāt tasya pāpāni nāśam āyānty aśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_10.109 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8542: nityaṃ ye prātar utthāya vaiṣṇavānāṃ tu kīrtanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8543: kurvanti te bhāgavatāḥ kṛṣṇa-tulyāḥ kalau bale // Hbhv_10.111 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8547: dhunvan vasaty atra janasya yan na tat
GR14hbhvil_u:8551: na tebhyo vidyate tīrtham adhikaṃ rāja-sattama // Hbhv_10.113 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8555: tatra sannihito viṣṇur nṛpate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.115 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8556: na gandhair na tathā toyair na puṣpaiś ca manoharaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8557: sānnidhyaṃ kurute devo yatra santi na vaiṣṇavāḥ // Hbhv_10.116 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8559: nityam ārādhyamāno 'pi tatra viṣṇur na tṛpyati // Hbhv_10.117 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8561: punanti sakalān lokāṃs tat tīrtham adhikaṃ tataḥ // Hbhv_10.118 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8562: śūdraṃ vā bhagavad-bhaktaṃ niṣādaṃ śvapacaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:8563: vīkṣataṃ jāti-sāmānyāt sa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam // Hbhv_10.119 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8565: prasāda-sumukho viṣṇus tenaiva syān na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.120 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8568: te'pi yānti paraṃ dhāma nārāyaṇa-parāśrayāḥ // Hbhv_10.121 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8569: lipyante na ca pāpena vaiṣṇavā viṣṇu-tat-parāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8570: punanti sakalān lokān sahasrāṃśur ivoditaḥ // Hbhv_10.122 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8572: dāso 'haṃ vāsudevasya sarvān lokān samuddharet // Hbhv_10.123 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8573: sa yāti viṣṇu-sālokyaṃ puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8574: kiṃ punas tad-gata-prāṇāḥ puruṣāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ // Hbhv_10.124 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8575: smṛtaḥ sambhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottamāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8579: yasya sandarśanād eva bhasmībhavati pātakam // Hbhv_10.126 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8581: na me priyaś caturvedī mad-bhaktaḥ śvapacaḥ priyaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8582: tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hy aham // Hbhv_10.127 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8584: sabhartṛkā vā vidhavā viṣṇu-bhaktiṃ karoti yā /
GR14hbhvil_u:8585: samuddharati cātmānaṃ kulam ekottaraṃ śatam // Hbhv_10.128 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8588: mleccha-tulyāḥ kulīnās te ye na bhaktā janārdane // Hbhv_10.129 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8591: punanti vaiṣṇavāḥ sarve sarva-devam idaṃ jagat /
GR14hbhvil_u:8592: mad-bhakto durlabho yasya sa eva mama durlabhaḥ // Hbhv_10.130 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8593: tat-paro durlabho nāsti satyaṃ satyaṃ dhanañjaya /
GR14hbhvil_u:8594: jagatāṃ guravo bhaktā bhaktānāṃ guravo vayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8595: sarvatra guravo bhaktā vayaṃ ca guravo yathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:8596: asmākaṃ bāndhavā bhaktā bhaktānāṃ bāndhavā vayam // Hbhv_10.131 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8597: asmākaṃ guravo bhaktā bhaktānāṃ guravo vayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8598: mad-bhaktā yatra gacchanti tatra gacchāmi pārthiva /
GR14hbhvil_u:8599: bhaktānām anugacchanti muktayaḥ śrutibhiḥ saha // Hbhv_10.132 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8600: ye me bhakta-janāḥ pārtha na me bhaktāś ca te janāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8601: mad-bhaktānāṃ ca ye bhaktās te me bhaktatamā matāḥ // Hbhv_10.133 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8602: ye kecit prāṇino bhaktā mad-arthe tyakta-bāndhavāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8603: teṣām ahaṃ parikrīto nānya-krīto dhanañjaya // Hbhv_10.134 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8604: eṣāṃ bhakṣyaṃ sunirṇītaṃ śrūyatāṃ niścitaṃ mama /
GR14hbhvil_u:8605: ucchiṣṭam avaśiṣṭaṃ ca bhaktānāṃ bhojana-dvayam // Hbhv_10.135 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8607: kurvanti me yathā prītiṃ na tathā veda-pāragāḥ // Hbhv_10.136 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8610: tad eva pālayiṣyāmi majjano nānṛtaṃ vadet // Hbhv_10.137 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8611: mama janma kule yasya tat kulaṃ mokṣagāmi vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:8612: mayi tuṣṭe muni-śreṣṭha kim asādhyaṃ jagat-traye // Hbhv_10.138 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8613: mayi bhakti-paro yas tu mad-yājī mat-kathā-paraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8614: mad-dhyānī sva-kulaṃ sarvaṃ nayaty acyuta-rūpatām // Hbhv_10.139 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8616: man-manāḥ sva-kulaṃ sarvaṃ nayaty acyuta-rūpatām // Hbhv_10.140 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8621: hari-dhyāna-parāṇāṃ tu kaḥ samarthaḥ prabādhitum // Hbhv_10.142 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8622: hari-bhakti-paro yatra tatra brahmā hariḥ śivaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8623: tatra devāś ca siddhādyā nityaṃ tiṣṭhanti sattamāḥ // Hbhv_10.143 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8624: nimiṣaṃ nimṣārdhaṃ vā yatra tiṣṭhanti sattamāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8625: tatraiva sarva-śreyāṃsi tat tīrthaṃ tat tapo-vanam // Hbhv_10.144 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8628: vadanti satataṃ te māṃ gatāsūyā adāmbhikāḥ // Hbhv_10.145 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8630: mat-kathā-śravaṇāsaktā vahanti satataṃ hi mām // Hbhv_10.146 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8633: īkṣitā api gacchanti pāpino 'pi parāṃ gatim // Hbhv_10.147 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8635: ripavas taṃ na hiṃsanti na bādhante grahāś ca tam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8636: rākṣasāś ca na cekṣante naraṃ viṣṇu-parāyaṇam // Hbhv_10.148 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8637: bhaktir dṛḍhā bhaved yasya deva-deve janārdane /
GR14hbhvil_u:8638: śreyāṃsi tasya sidhyanti bhaktimanto 'dhikās tataḥ // Hbhv_10.149 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8640: adyāpi ca muni-śreṣṭha brahmādyā api devatāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8644: hari-bhakti-parāṇāṃ vai sampadyante na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.151 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8649: caṇḍālā api vai śreṣṭhā hari-bhakti-parāyaṇāḥ // Hbhv_10.153 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8652: namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo yat-saṅgān mukti-bhāg naraḥ // Hbhv_10.154 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8654: durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā tebhyo nityaṃ namo namaḥ // Hbhv_10.155 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8656: yasmān muktiḥ karasthaiva yoginām api durlabhā // Hbhv_10.156 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8659: vāsudeva-parā martyāḥ kṛtārthā nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.157 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8660: asty antar durlabhā proktā hari-bhaktiḥ kalau yuge /
GR14hbhvil_u:8661: hari-bhakti-ratānāṃ vai pāpa-bandho na jāyate // Hbhv_10.158 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8663: hari-bhakti-rataiḥ sārdhaṃ kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm // Hbhv_10.159 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8666: śuśrūṣur vāpi mahatāṃ sa vandyo 'smābhir uttamaḥ // Hbhv_10.160 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8669: puṣṇanti svāny apatyāni tathāham api padmaja // Hbhv_10.161 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8671: mad-bhaktānāṃ vinodārthaṃ karomi vividhāḥ kriyāḥ // Hbhv_10.162 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8673: na vayaṃ yamaṃ yama-lokaṃ na na dūtān ghora-darśanāt /
GR14hbhvil_u:8674: paśyanti vaiṣṇavā nūnaṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ mayoditam // Hbhv_10.163 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8675: śvapākam iva nekṣeta loke vipram avaiṣṇavam /
GR14hbhvil_u:8677: na śūdrā bhagavad-bhaktās te tu bhāvanā matāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8678: sarva-varṇeṣu te śūdrā ye na bhaktā janārdana // Hbhv_10.165 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8679: viṣṇu-bhaktasya ye dāsā vaiṣṇavānna-bhujaś ca ye /
GR14hbhvil_u:8680: te'pi kratu-bhujāṃ gvaiśya gatiṃ yānti nirākulāḥ // Hbhv_10.166 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8686: ārtānām ārtihantāro darśanād eva sādhavaḥ // Hbhv_10.168 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8688: na karma-bandhanaṃ janma vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca vidyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:8689: viṣṇor anucaratvaṃ hi mokṣayāhur manīṣiṇaḥ // Hbhv_10.169 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8694: bhaktāḥ punanti kṛṣṇasya sākṣād api ca pukkaśam // Hbhv_10.171 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8696: viṣṇor bhaktaṃ samāśritya naro nārhati yātanām // Hbhv_10.172 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8698: yasmin deśe marau taj-jño nāsti sajjana-pādapaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8699: saphalaḥ śītalac-chāyo na tatra divasaṃ vaset // Hbhv_10.173 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8701: yā hi svaira-kathās teṣām upadeśā bhavanti te // Hbhv_10.174 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8706: ekāntinas tu puruṣā gacchanti paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_10.176 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8708: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananyabhāk /
GR14hbhvil_u:8709: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ // Hbhv_10.177 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8711: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati // Hbhv_10.178 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8712: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8713: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim /
GR14hbhvil_u:8714: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā // Hbhv_10.179 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8717: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ // Hbhv_10.180 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8719: yeṣāṃ saṃsmaraṇāt puṃsāṃ sadyaḥ śuddhyanti vai gṛhāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8729: yeṣām ahaṃ priya ātmā sutaś ca
GR14hbhvil_u:8730: sakhā guruḥ suhṛdo daivam iṣṭam // Hbhv_10.183 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8734: sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimany api nātha mā bhūt
GR14hbhvil_u:8735: kiṃ tv antakāsi-lulitāt patatāṃ vimānāt // Hbhv_10.184 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8738: viriñcatām eti tataḥ paraṃ hi mām /
GR14hbhvil_u:8748: teṣāṃ ye kecanehante śreyo vai manujādayaḥ // Hbhv_10.187 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8750: mumukṣūṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaścin mucyeta sidhyati // Hbhv_10.188 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8752: sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahāmune // Hbhv_10.189 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8765: prāṇaṃ punāti sa kulaṃ na tu bhūrimānaḥ // Hbhv_10.192 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8772: ahaṃ bhakta-parādhīno hy asvatantra iva dvija /
GR14hbhvil_u:8774: nāham ātmānam āśāse mad-bhaktaiḥ sādhubhir vinā /
GR14hbhvil_u:8775: śriyaṃ cātyantikīṃ brahman yeṣāṃ gatir ahaṃ parā // Hbhv_10.195 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8776: ye dārāgāra-putrāpta- prāṇān vittam imaṃ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:8777: hitvā māṃ śaraṇaṃ yātāḥ kathaṃ tāṃs tyaktum utsahe // Hbhv_10.196 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8779: vaśe kurvanti māṃ bhaktyā sat-striyaḥ sat-patiṃ yathā // Hbhv_10.197 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8780: sādhavo hṛdayaṃ mahyaṃ sādhūnāṃ hṛdayaṃ tv aham /
GR14hbhvil_u:8781: mad-anyat te na jānanti nāhaṃ tebhyo manāg api // Hbhv_10.198 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8783: duṣkaraḥ ko nu sādhūnāṃ dustyajo vā mahātmanām /
GR14hbhvil_u:8784: yaiḥ saṅgṛhīto bhagavān sātvatām ṛṣabho hariḥ // Hbhv_10.199 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8786: tasya tīrtha-padaḥ kiṃ vā dāsānām avaśiṣyate // Hbhv_10.200 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8788: tathā na te mādhava tāvakāḥ kvacid
GR14hbhvil_u:8794: jñānināṃ cātma-bhūtānāṃ yathā bhaktimatām iha // Hbhv_10.202 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8797: upekṣyaiḥ kiṃ dhana-stambhair asadbhir asad-āśrayaiḥ // Hbhv_10.203 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8799: na hy am-mayāni tīrthāni na devā mṛc-chilā-mayāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8800: te punanty uru-kālena darśanād eva sādhavaḥ // Hbhv_10.204 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8802: nāgnir na sūryo na ca candra-tārakā
GR14hbhvil_u:8803: na bhūr jalaṃ khaṃ śvasano 'tha vāṅ manaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8809: janeṣv abhijñeṣu sa eva go-kharaḥ // Hbhv_10.206 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8812: ta uta padākramanty avigaṇayya śiro nirṛteḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8813: parivayase paśūn iva girā vibudhān api tāṃs
GR14hbhvil_u:8814: tvayi kṛta-sauhṛdāḥ khalu punanti na ye vimukhāḥ // Hbhv_10.207 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8816: bhūtānāṃ deva-caritaṃ duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:8817: sukhāyaiva hi sādhūnāṃ tvādṛśām acyutātmanām // Hbhv_10.208 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8818: bhajanti ye yathā devān devā api tathaiva tān /
GR14hbhvil_u:8822: sādhūnāṃ sama-cittānāṃ buddheḥ param upeyuṣām // Hbhv_10.210 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8823: evam etān mayā diṣṭān anutiṣṭhanti me pathaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8824: kṣemaṃ vindanti mat-sthānaṃ yad brahma paramaṃ viduḥ // Hbhv_10.211 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8826: santo brahma-vidaḥ śāntā nor dṛḍhevāpsu majjatām // Hbhv_10.212 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8827: annaṃ hi prāṇināṃ prāṇā ārtānāṃ śaraṇaṃ tv aham /
GR14hbhvil_u:8828: dharmā vittaṃ nṝṇāṃ pretya santo 'rvāg-bibhyato 'raṇam // Hbhv_10.213 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8829: santo diśanti cakṣūṃṣi bahir arkaḥ samutthitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:8830: devatā bāndhavāḥ santaḥ santa ātmāham eva ca // Hbhv_10.214 //
GR14hbhvil_u:8832: na kiñcit sādhavo dhīrā bhaktā hy ekāntino mama /

GR14hbhvil_u:9304: śloka-pādaṃ paṭhed yas tu go-sahasra-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_10.372 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9305: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca yoginām api durlabham /
GR14hbhvil_u:9306: viprendra vaiṣṇavaṃ śāstraṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca kā kathā // Hbhv_10.373 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9308: mama śāstrāṇi ye nityaṃ pūjayanti paṭhanti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:9309: te narāḥ kuru-śārdūla mamātithyaṃ gatāḥ sadā // Hbhv_10.374 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9311: cintayāmi na sandeho naraṃ taṃ cātmavat sadā // Hbhv_10.375 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9314: jīvitād adhikaṃ yeṣāṃ śāstraṃ bhāgavataṃ kalau /
GR14hbhvil_u:9315: na teṣāṃ bhavati kleśo yāmyaḥ kalpa-śatair api // Hbhv_10.376 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9316: dhārayanti gṛhe nityaṃ śāstraṃ bhāgavataṃ hi ye /
GR14hbhvil_u:9317: āsphoṭayanti valganti teṣāṃ prītāḥ pitāmahāḥ // Hbhv_10.377 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9318: yāvad dināni viprarṣe śāstraṃ bhāgavataṃ gṛhe /
GR14hbhvil_u:9319: tāvat pibanti pitaraḥ kṣīraṃ sarpir madhūdakam // Hbhv_10.378 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9320: ye'rcayanti sadā gehe śāstraṃ bhāgavataṃ narāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9321: prīṇitās taiś ca vibudhā yāvad āhūta-samplavam // Hbhv_10.379 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9322: yaccanti vaiṣṇave bhaktyā śāstraṃ bhāgavataṃ hi ye /
GR14hbhvil_u:9324: ślokārdhaṃ śloka-pādaṃ vā varaṃ bhāgavataṃ gṛhe /
GR14hbhvil_u:9325: śataśo 'tha sahasraiś ca kim anyaiḥ śāstra-saṅgrahaiḥ // Hbhv_10.381 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9326: na yasya tiṣṭhate gehe śāstraṃ bhāgavataṃ kalau /
GR14hbhvil_u:9327: na tasya punar āvṛttir yāmyāt pāśāt kadācana // Hbhv_10.382 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9328: kathaṃ sa vaiṣṇavo jñeyaḥ śāstraṃ bhāgavataṃ kalau /
GR14hbhvil_u:9329: gṛhe na tiṣṭhate yasya sa vipraḥ śvapacādhamaḥ // Hbhv_10.383 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9330: yatra yatra bhaved vipra śāstraṃ bhāgavataṃ kalau /
GR14hbhvil_u:9331: tatra tatra harir yāti tridaśaiḥ saha nārada // Hbhv_10.384 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9333: yatra bhāgavataṃ śāstraṃ tiṣṭhate muni-sattama // Hbhv_10.385 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9334: tatra sarvāṇi tīrthāni sarve yajñāḥ sudakṣiṇāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9335: yatra bhāgavataṃ śāstraṃ pūjitaṃ tiṣṭhate gṛhe // Hbhv_10.386 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9337: nityaṃ bhāgavataṃ yas tu purāṇaṃ paṭhate naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9338: pratyakṣaraṃ bhavet tasya kapilā-dānajaṃ phalam // Hbhv_10.387 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9340: paṭhet śṛṇoti vā bhaktyā go-sahasraṃ phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_10.388 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9341: yaḥ paṭhet prayato nityaṃ ślokaṃ bhāgavataṃ mune /
GR14hbhvil_u:9344: yo hi bhāgavate śāstre vighnam ācarate pumān /
GR14hbhvil_u:9345: nābhinandati duṣṭātmā kulānāṃ pātayec chatam // Hbhv_10.390 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9349: ślokaṃ bhāgavataṃ vāpi ślokardha-pādam eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:9350: likhitaṃ tiṣṭhate yasya gṛhe tasya sadā hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9351: vasate nātra sandeho deva-devo janārdanaḥ // Hbhv_10.392 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9354: kula-koṭi-śatair yuktaḥ krīḍate yogibhiḥ saha // Hbhv_10.393 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9363: vedyaṃ vāstavam atra vastu śivadaṃ tāpa-trayonmūlanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9364: śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-muni-kṛte kiṃ vā parair īśvaraḥ
GR14hbhvil_u:9365: sadyo hṛdy avarudhyate 'tra kṛtibhiḥ śuśrūṣubhis tat-kṣaṇāt // Hbhv_10.396 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9369: tad idaṃ grāhayām āsasutam ātmavatāṃ varam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9381: gṛhīta-cetā rājarṣe ākhyānaṃ yad adhītavān // Hbhv_10.402 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9382: rājante tāvad anyāni purāṇāni satāṃ gaṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:9385: rājante tāvad anyāni purāṇāni satāṃ gaṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:9388: tad-rasāmṛta-tṛptasya nānyatra syād ratiḥ kvacit // Hbhv_10.405 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9389: nimna-gānāṃ yathā gaṅgā devānām acyuto yathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:9390: vaiṣṇavānāṃ yathā śambhuḥ purāṇānām idaṃ tathā // Hbhv_10.406 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9391: śrīmad-bhāgavataṃ purāṇam amalaṃ yad vaiṣṇavānāṃ priyaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:9392: yasmin pāramahaṃsyam ekam amalaṃ jñānaṃ paraṃ gīyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:9394: tac chṛṇvan su-paṭhan vicāraṇa-paro bhaktyā vimucyen naraḥ // Hbhv_10.407 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9399: muhur aho rasikā bhuvi bhāvukāḥ // Hbhv_10.408 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9404: taṃ vyāsa-sūnum upayāmi guruṃ munīnām // Hbhv_10.409 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9407: vaiṣṇavaṃ guruvad bhaktyā pūjayej jñāna-dāyakam // Hbhv_10.410 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9409: vaiṣṇavaṃ jñāna-vaktāraṃ yo vidyād viṣṇuvad gurum /
GR14hbhvil_u:9410: pūjayed vāṅ-manaḥ-kāyaiḥ sa śāstrajñaḥ sa vaiṣṇavaḥ // Hbhv_10.411 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9411: śloka-pādasya vaktāpi yaḥ pūjyaḥ sa sadaiva hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:9412: kiṃ punar bhagavad-viṣṇoḥ svarūpaṃ vitanoti yaḥ // Hbhv_10.412 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9415: jñānasya sādhanaṃ śāstraṃ śāstraṃ ca guru-vaktṛgam // Hbhv_10.413 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9416: brahma prāptir ato hetor gurv-adhīnā sadaiva hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:9417: hetunānena vai viprā gurur gurutaraḥ smṛtaḥ // Hbhv_10.414 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9418: yasmād devo jagannāthaḥ kṛtvā maryamayīṃ tanum /
GR14hbhvil_u:9419: magnān uddharate lokān kāruṇyāc chāstra-pāṇinā // Hbhv_10.415 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9423: śāntidaṃ ca mahārthaṃ ca vakti yaḥ sa jagad-guruḥ // Hbhv_10.417 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9428: viprendra nāsti sandeho ye śṛṇvanti hareḥ kathām // Hbhv_10.418 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9431: na tathā pāraṇaṃ nṝṇāṃ nārāyaṇa-kathā yathā // Hbhv_10.419 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9434: śṛṇvatāṃ vadatāṃ caiva tad-bhaktānāṃ viśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_10.420 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9437: hṛdy antaḥstho hy abhadrāṇi vidhunoti suhṛt-satām // Hbhv_10.421 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9439: śuddhir nṛṇāṃ na tu tatheḍya durāśayānāṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:9444: naiṣātiduḥsahā kṣun māṃ tyaktodam api bādhate /
GR14hbhvil_u:9454: caritaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ nityaṃ śrotavyaṃ sādhu-buddhinā // Hbhv_10.426 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9459: notpādayed yadi ratiṃ śrama eva hi kevalam // Hbhv_10.428 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9466: āyur harati vai puṃsām udyann astaṃ ca yann asau /
GR14hbhvil_u:9475: tat tatyaje ñcchinad idaṃ vayunena yena /
GR14hbhvil_u:9477: yāvad gadāgraja-kathāsu ratiṃ na kuryāt // Hbhv_10.432 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9480: karṇa-pīyūṣam āsādya tyajanty anya-spṛhāṃ janāḥ // Hbhv_10.433 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9483: mad-vārtā-yāta-yāmānāṃ na bandhāya gṛhā matāḥ // Hbhv_10.434 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9485: dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣāṇāṃ yad iṣṭaṃ ca nṝṇām iha /
GR14hbhvil_u:9486: tat sarvaṃ labhate vatsa kathāṃ śrutvā hareḥ sadā // Hbhv_10.435 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9493: nityaṃ kṛṣṇa-kathā yasya prāṇād api garīyasī /
GR14hbhvil_u:9494: na tasya durlabhaṃ kiñcid iha loke paratra ca // Hbhv_10.437 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9499: ko nirvṛto hari-kathāsu ratiṃ na kuryāt // Hbhv_10.438 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9503: na parilaṣanti kecid apavargam apīśvara te
GR14hbhvil_u:9521: ye śṛṇvanti kathāṃ viṣṇor ye paṭhanti hareḥ kathām /
GR14hbhvil_u:9522: kalāyutaṃ nāvalokyaṃ gatās te brahma śāśvatam // Hbhv_10.443 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9524: tasya na cyavate lakṣmīs tat-padaṃ ca kare sthitam // Hbhv_10.444 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9531: yatra yatra mahī-pāla vaiṣṇavī vartate kathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:9532: tatra tatra harir yāti gaur yathā suta-vatsalā // Hbhv_10.446 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9536: mat-kathā-prīta-manasaṃ nāham tyakṣyāmi taṃ naram // Hbhv_10.447 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9541: ye prāyaśo ñjita jito 'py asi tais tri-lokyām // Hbhv_10.448 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9544: kiṃ vānyad arpita-bhayaṃ bhruva unnayais te /
GR14hbhvil_u:9554: yac-chṛṇvatāṃ rasa-jñānāṃ svādu svādu pade pade // Hbhv_10.451 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9563: mano na tṛpyaty api śṛṇvatāṃ naḥ
GR14hbhvil_u:9567: ko nu tṛpyeta śṛṇvānaḥ śruta-jño nitya-nūtanaḥ // Hbhv_10.454 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9569: na kāmaye nātha tad apy ahaṃ kvacin
GR14hbhvil_u:9572: vidhatsva karṇāyutam eṣa me varaḥ // Hbhv_10.455 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9573: ataeva niścayoktaṃ pādme vaiśākha-māhātmye [PadmaP 5.85.41] ambarīṣaṃ prati śrī-nāradena --
GR14hbhvil_u:9580: guṇa-karmāśrayāḥ pumbhiḥ saṃsevyās tā bubhūṣubhiḥ // Hbhv_10.457 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9585: śrūyād amuṣya padayor anuvṛttim icchan // Hbhv_10.458 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9588: tad aśrutiṃ ca vaimukhyaṃ tasyāṃ tṛptim api tyajet // Hbhv_10.459 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9591: hitvā śṛṇvanty asad-gāthāḥ purīṣam iva viḍ-bhujaḥ // Hbhv_10.460 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9595: yās tu śrutā hata-bhagair nṛbhir ātta-sārās
GR14hbhvil_u:9596: tāṃs tān kṣipanty aśaraṇeṣu tamaḥsu hanta // Hbhv_10.461 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9598: vācyamānaṃ tu ye śāstraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ puruṣādhamāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9599: na śṛṇvanti muni-śreṣṭha teṣāṃ svāmī sadā yamaḥ // Hbhv_10.462 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9600: na śṛṇvanti na hṛṣyanti vaiṣṇavīṃ prāpya ye kathām /
GR14hbhvil_u:9601: dhama āyur yaśo dharmaḥ santānaś caiva naśyati // Hbhv_10.463 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9602: na śṛṇoti harer yas tu kathāṃ pāpa-praṇāśinīm /
GR14hbhvil_u:9603: acirād eva devarṣe samūlaṃ tu vinaśyati // Hbhv_10.464 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9638: sureśa-loko 'pi na vai sa sevyatām // Hbhv_10.471 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9641: muhus tad-rasikān pṛcchen mitho moda-vivṛddhaye // Hbhv_10.471 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9646: striyā viṭānām iva sādhu vārtā // Hbhv_10.473 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9649: api cakruḥ pravacanam ekaṃ śuśrūṣavo 'pare // Hbhv_10.474 // iti /
GR14hbhvil_u:9651: tathā vaiṣṇava-dharmāṃś ca kriyamānām api svayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9654: avaśyaṃ kathayed vidvān anyathā doṣa-bhāg bhavet // Hbhv_10.476 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9657: kalau bhāgavato bhūtvā puṇyaṃ yāti śatābdikam // Hbhv_10.477 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9659: vaiṣṇave vaiṣṇavaṃ dharmaṃ yo dadāti dvijottamaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9662: ajñānāya ca yo jñānaṃ dadyād dharmopadeśanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9663: kṛtsnāṃ vā pṛthivīṃ dadyāt tena tulyaṃ hi tat smṛtam // Hbhv_10.479 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9665: tat kathāṃ śrāvayed yas tu tad-bhaktān mānavottamaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9666: go-dāna-phalam āpnoti sa naras tena karmaṇā // Hbhv_10.480 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9669: api devās tam arcanti bhava-bandha-vidārakam // Hbhv_10.481 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9677: vyañjitāḥ katicin mukhyā likhyante'tra pare'pi te // Hbhv_10.483 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9679: tathāpi yatnād ekatra saṅgṛhyante samādhanāḥ // Hbhv_10.484 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9681: adya prabhṛti kartavyaṃ yan mayā kṛṣṇa tac chṛṇu /
