GR14hbhvil_u:9682: ekādaśyāṃ na bhoktavyaṃ kartavyo jāgaraḥ sadā // Hbhv_10.485 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9684: palārdhenāpi biddhaṃ tu bhoktavyaṃ vāsarāntare // Hbhv_10.486 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9686: bhaktir bhāgavatī kāryā prāṇair api dhanair api // Hbhv_10.487 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9687: nityaṃ nāma-sahasraṃ tu paṭhanīyaṃ tava priyam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9688: pūjā tu tulasī-patrair mayā kāryā sadaiva hi // Hbhv_10.488 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9690: nṛtya-gītaṃ prakartavyaṃ samprāpte jāgare tava // Hbhv_10.489 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9692: kariṣyāmi tavāgre ca guṇānāṃ tava kīrtanam // Hbhv_10.490 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9695: nityaṃ pādodakaṃ mūrdhnā mayā dhāryaṃ prayatnataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9697: nirmālyaṃ śirasā dhāryaṃ tvadīyaṃ sādaraṃ mayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:9698: tava dattvā yad iṣṭaṃ tu bhakṣaṇīyaṃ mudā mayā // Hbhv_10.493 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9699: tathā tathā prakartavyaṃ tava tuṣṭiḥ prajāyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:9700: satyam etan mayā kṛṣṇa tavāgre parikīrtanam // Hbhv_10.494 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9705: hariḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhagavān āsta īśvaraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9706: iti bhūtāni manasā kāmais taiḥ sādhu mānayet // Hbhv_10.496 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9708: ye vai bhagavatā proktā upāyā hy ātma-labdhaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:9709: añjaḥ puṃsām aviduṣāṃ viddhi bhāgavatān hi tān // Hbhv_10.497 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9711: sarvato manaso 'saṅgam ādau saṅgaṃ ca sādhuṣu /
GR14hbhvil_u:9712: dayāṃ maitrīṃ praśrayaṃ ca bhūteṣv addhā yathocitam // Hbhv_10.498 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9713: śaucaṃ tapas titikṣāṃ ca maunaṃ svādhyāyam ārjavam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9714: brahma-caryam ahiṃsāṃ ca samatvaṃ dvandva-saṃjñayoḥ // Hbhv_10.499 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9717: śraddhāṃ bhāgavate śāstre 'nindām anyatra cāpi hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:9718: mano-vāk-karma-daṇḍaṃ ca satyaṃ śama-damāv api // Hbhv_10.501 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9721: iṣṭaṃ dattaṃ tapo japtaṃ vṛttaṃ yac cātmanaḥ priyam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9722: dārān sutān gṛhān prāṇān yat parasmai nivedanam // Hbhv_10.503 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9724: paricaryāṃ cobhayatra mahatsu nṛṣu sādhuṣu // Hbhv_10.504 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9726: mitho ratir mithas tuṣṭir nivṛttir mitha ātmanaḥ // Hbhv_10.505 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9739: gṛha-śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mahyaṃ dāsa-vad yad amāyayā // Hbhv_10.511 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9741: api dīpāvalokaṃ me nopayuñjyān niveditam // Hbhv_10.512 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9742: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāti-priyam ātmanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9743: tat tan nivedayen mahyaṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate // Hbhv_10.513 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9746: pariniṣṭhā ca pūjāyāṃ stutibhiḥ stavanaṃ mama // Hbhv_10.514 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9750: mayy arpaṇaṃ ca manasaḥ sarva-kāma-vivarjanam // Hbhv_10.516 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9752: iṣṭaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ mad-arthaṃ yad vrataṃ tapaḥ // Hbhv_10.517 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9754: kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi mad-arthaṃ śanakaiḥ smaran /
GR14hbhvil_u:9756: deśān puṇyān āśrayeta mad-bhaktaiḥ sādhubhiḥ śritān /
GR14hbhvil_u:9760: mām eva sarva-bhūteṣu bahir antar apāvṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9761: īkṣetātmani cātmānaṃ yathā kham amalāśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.521 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9765: vāsudeve bhagavati yayā saṃlabhyate ratiḥ // Hbhv_10.522 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9768: sadyaḥ punāti sad-dharmo deva-viśva-druho 'pi hi // Hbhv_10.523 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9770: yān āsthāya naro rājan na pramādyeta karhicit /
GR14hbhvil_u:9771: dhāvan nimīlya vā netre na skhalen na pated iha // Hbhv_10.524 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9773: iti bhāgavatān dharmān śikṣan bhaktyā tad-utthayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:9774: nārāyaṇa-paro māyām añjas tarati dustarām // Hbhv_10.525 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9779: na hy aṅgopakrame dhvaṃso mad-dharmasyoddhavāṇv api
GR14hbhvil_u:9780: mayā vyavasitaḥ samyaṅ nirguṇatvād anāśiṣaḥ // Hbhv_10.527 // iti
GR14hbhvil_u:9781: alābhe sat-sabhāyās tu śuśrūṣuṃ ca nijālaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:9782: devālaye vā śāstrajñaḥ kīrtayed bhagavat-kathām // Hbhv_10.528 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9784: uktaṃ ca skānde śrī-bhagavatā arjunaṃ prati -
GR14hbhvil_u:9785: mat-kathā kurute yas tu vaiṣṇavānāṃ sadāgrataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9786: iha bhogān avāpnoti tathā mokṣaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.529 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9788: idaṃ hi puṃsas tapasaḥ śrutasya vā
GR14hbhvil_u:9798: anyatra ceha ca śrutāni gṛṇan manuṣyo
GR14hbhvil_u:9809: bhuvi grṇanti te bhuridā janāḥ // Hbhv_10.534 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9810: kirtane'py atra taj jñeyaṃ māhātmyaṃ śravaṇe'sya yat /
GR14hbhvil_u:9811: sidhyati śravaṇam nūnaṃ kīrtanāt svayam eva hi // Hbhv_10.535 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9813: satām ādhunikānāṃ ca kathāṃ bandhuṣu kīrtayet // Hbhv_10.536 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9821: prasāde yasya duṣṭo 'pi bhagavad-bhaktimān bhavet // Hbhv_11.1 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9823: yātrāṃ kṛtvā dvijaḥ sandhyām upāsīta yathā-vidhi // Hbhv_11.2 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9825: dinānta-sandhyāṃ sūryeṇa pūrvā mṛkṣair yutāṃ budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9826: upatiṣṭhed yathānyāyaṃ samyag ācamya pārthiva // Hbhv_11.3 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9829: upatiṣṭhanti vai sandhyāṃ ye na pūrvāṃ na paścimām /
GR14hbhvil_u:9830: vrajanti te durātmānas tāmisraṃ narakaṃ nṛpa // Hbhv_11.5 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9833: nirvartya pūrvavat kuryād bhaktyā bhagavad-arcanam // Hbhv_11.6 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9835: patet karma na pātitya-doṣa-śaṅkā kathañcana // Hbhv_11.7 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9838: mat-karma kurvatāṃ puṃsāṃ kriyā-lopo bhaved yadi /
GR14hbhvil_u:9839: teṣāṃ karmāṇi kurvanti tisraḥ koṭyo maharṣayaḥ // Hbhv_11.8 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9841: smaranti mama nāmāni ye tyaktvā karma cākhilam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9842: teṣāṃ karmāṇi kurvanti ṛṣayo bhagavat-parāḥ // Hbhv_11.9 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9847: pātityaṃ na bhavaty eva lekhanīyaṃ tad-agrataḥ // Hbhv_11.11 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9848: kiṃcid dhyānādi-bhedena trisandhyaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak /
GR14hbhvil_u:9854: punnāgair nāga-vṛkṣaiś ca panasaiś caiva kāñcanaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9855: bakulaiś caiva bilvaiś ca vanyaiḥ kurvakair api // Hbhv_11.14 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9863: devāsuraiś ca siddhaiś ca gandharvair apsaro-gaṇaiḥ // Hbhv_11.18 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9865: brahmarṣibhiḥ stūyamānaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ caiva śuci-smitam // Hbhv_11.19 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9873: dugdhaṃ ca dadhi-khaṇḍena sahitaṃ saṃnivedayet // Hbhv_11.23 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9875: evaṃ samarcayed bhaktyā japan mantraṃ samāhitaḥ // Hbhv_11.24 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9888: dadyād grāsaṃ sakhīnāṃ ca gopīnāṃ vijitendriyaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9899: rājate tu payaḥ śuddhaṃ pakvaṃ pātre nivedayet // Hbhv_11.36 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9900: evam abhyarcya manasā japen mantraṃ samāhitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9902: eṣa nitya-kramaḥ proktaḥ kṛṣṇa-mantrasya sūribhiḥ // Hbhv_11.37 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9904: manasā vā samabhyarcya triṣu sandhyāsu saṃyamī /
GR14hbhvil_u:9906: asāmarthye japen mantraṃ nityam aṣṭa-śataṃ tathā // Hbhv_11.38 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9910: gīta-nṛtyādikaṃ bhaktyā vidhāya prārthayet prabhum // Hbhv_11.39 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9913: āgaccha śayana-sthānaṃ priyābhiḥ saha keśava // Hbhv_11.40 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9916: ānīya devaṃ tatratyān upacārān prakalpayet // Hbhv_11.41 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9920: tat-prītyai sarva-karmāṇi tat phalaṃ vārpayet kṛtī // Hbhv_11.43 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9928: sādhu vāsādhu vā karma yad yad ācaritaṃ mayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:9929: tat sarvaṃ bhagavan viṣṇo gṛhāṇārādhanaṃ param // Hbhv_11.45 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9932: divā ca rātrau ca yathā ca gacchatā /
GR14hbhvil_u:9933: yad asti kiṃcit sukṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GR14hbhvil_u:9937: rāddhaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ puṃsāṃ mat-prītis tattvavin-matam // Hbhv_11.47 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9939: ittham ārādhayen nityaṃ bhagavantaṃ yathā vidhi /
GR14hbhvil_u:9947: kuryān na ced adho yāti bhaktyā kurvann api dvija // Hbhv_11.50 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9949: yatnāt siddhair nijaiḥ śuddhair dravyair dhanyo 'rcayet prabhum /
GR14hbhvil_u:9950: pūjā-dravyāṇy aśaktaś ced dahyād īkṣeta vārcanam // Hbhv_11.51 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9954: yo dātuṃ naiva śaknoti kuryād arcana-darśanam // Hbhv_11.52 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9956: naikaṃ ca yasya vidyeta so 'dho yāty eva nānyathā // Hbhv_11.53 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9958: yas tu bhaktyā prayatnena svayaṃ sampādya cākhilam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9959: sādhanaṃ cārcayed vidvān samagraṃ labhate phalam // Hbhv_11.54 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9960: yo 'rcayed vidhivad bhaktyā parānītaiś ca sādhanaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9961: pūjā-phalārdham eva syān na samagraṃ phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_11.55 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9963: dharmoddeśena yo dravyam aparaṃ yācate naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9964: tat-puṇya-karmajaṃ tasya dhanadas tv āpnuyāt phalam // Hbhv_11.56 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9967: pūjitaṃ pūjyamānaṃ ca ye paśyanti janārdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:9968: kapilā-śata-dānasya nityaṃ bhavati tat phalam // Hbhv_11.57 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9970: pūjitaṃ pūjyamānaṃ vā yo paśyed bhaktito harim /
GR14hbhvil_u:9971: śraddhayā modayed yas tu so 'pi yāga-phalaṃ labhet // Hbhv_11.58 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9972: sampūjyamānaṃ vidhinā yaḥ paśyet śraddhayā harim /
GR14hbhvil_u:9973: so 'pi yāga-phalaṃ kṛtsnaṃ prāpnuyāt nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.59 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9979: yāvad rūpaṃ na paśyanti keśavasya mahātmanaḥ // Hbhv_11.61 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9981: pūjyamānaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ ye na paśyanti vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:9982: teṣāṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ daiteyāyopatiṣṭhati // Hbhv_11.62 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9985: na paśyanti janā gatvā te daṇḍyā yama-kiṅkaraiḥ // Hbhv_11.63 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9988: viṣṇum uddiśya yat kiñcid viṣṇu-bhaktāya dīyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:9989: dānaṃ tad vimalaṃ proktaṃ kevalaṃ mokṣa-sādhanam // Hbhv_11.64 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9991: yat kiñcid deyam īśānam uddiśya brāhmaṇāya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:9992: prabhave viṣṇave cātha tad ananta-phalaṃ smṛtam // Hbhv_11.65 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9997: akṣayaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣas tatra dattaṃ na naśyati // Hbhv_11.67 //
GR14hbhvil_u:9998: yathā kathañcid yad dattaṃ devadeve janārdane /
GR14hbhvil_u:9999: avināśi tu tad viddhi pātram eko janārdanaḥ // Hbhv_11.68 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10001: sāmānya-bhaktyā yad dattaṃ tad dhi padbhyāṃ pratīcchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:10004: yad eva dīyate kiñcit tad evākṣayam ucyate // Hbhv_11.70 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10006: mūrdhnā pratīcchate dattam akāmena dvijottamāḥ // Hbhv_11.71 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10008: brahmā yad ṛṣayaś caiva svayaṃ paśupatiś ca yat /
GR14hbhvil_u:10010: nāgāḥ suvarṇāḥ gandharvāḥ siddhā rājarṣayas tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10011: havyaṃ kravyaṃ ca satataṃ vidhi-yuktaṃ prabhuñjate /
GR14hbhvil_u:10012: kṛtsnaṃ tu tasya devasya caraṇāv upatiṣṭhati // Hbhv_11.73 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10014: tāḥ sarvāḥ śirasā devaḥ pratigṛhṇāti vai svayam // Hbhv_11.74 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10016: ekām api naro dhenuṃ sa-vatsāṃ vidhi-pūrvakam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10019: yo gāṃ payasvinīṃ viṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇa-varṇāṃ prayacchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:10020: aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpya hariṃ vrajet // Hbhv_11.76 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10022: gavāṃ sahasra-dānasya prāpyaṃ divyaṃ vrajet // Hbhv_11.77 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10024: gavāṃ lokam avāpnoti dhenuṃ dattvā payasvinīm /
GR14hbhvil_u:10026: dattvā gāṃ madhuparkāya mahat phalam avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_11.78 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10027: jalāśayaṃ tathā kṛtvā sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate // Hbhv_11.79 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10028: sa-puṣpaiḥ saphalair vṛkṣair yutaṃ kṛtvā jalāśayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10030: śvedadvīpam avāpnoti punar nāvartate tataḥ // Hbhv_11.80 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10031: devāgre kārayed yas tu ramyām āpaṇa-vīthikām /
GR14hbhvil_u:10032: rājā bhavati lokeṣu vijitārir mahāśayāḥ // Hbhv_11.81 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10033: nagaraṃ ca tathā kṛtvā sāmrājyam adhigacchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:10034: śivikāṃ ye prayacchanti te prayānty amarāvatīm // Hbhv_11.82 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10036: kavīndra-dānāc chakrasya cirāl lokācyuto naraḥ // Hbhv_11.83 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10037: rājā bhavati dharmātmā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivī-patiḥ // Hbhv_11.84 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10040: pustakāṃś ca tathaivānyān yaḥ pradadyān naras tv iha /
GR14hbhvil_u:10041: sārasvatam avāpnoti lokaṃ kālaṃ tathā bahum // Hbhv_11.86 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10042: svabhṛtaṃ vācakaṃ kṛtvā devāgāre naraḥ sadā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10045: mānuṣyam āsādya tathā khyāta-śabdaś ca jāyate // Hbhv_11.88 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10047: kūṭāgāraṃ tathā dattvā nagarādhipatir bhavet // Hbhv_11.89 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10048: dattvā tu deva-karmārthaṃ navāṃ vedīṃ dṛḍhāṃ śubhām /
GR14hbhvil_u:10049: pārthivatvam avāpnoti vedī hi pṛthivī yataḥ // Hbhv_11.90 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10050: toraṇaṃ kārayed yas tu devadevālaye naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10051: lokeṣu tasya dvārāṇi bhavanti vivṛtāni vai // Hbhv_11.91 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10053: dadyād vā vādya-bhāṇḍāni gaṇeśatvam avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_11.92 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10054: yaḥ kumbhaṃ deva-karmārthaṃ naro dadyān navaṃ śubham /
GR14hbhvil_u:10055: vāruṇaṃ lokam āpnoti sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate // Hbhv_11.93 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10056: caturaḥ kalasān dadyād yas tu deva-gṛhe naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10057: catuḥ-samudra-valayāṃ sa hi bhuṅkte vasundharām // Hbhv_11.94 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10059: rājā bhavati dharmātmā bhūtale nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.95 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10060: vāridhānīṃ tathā dattvā vāruṇaṃ lokam aśnute /
GR14hbhvil_u:10062: mātrāṃ tu paricaryārthaṃ nivedya haraye tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10065: mālyādhāraṃ tathā dattvā dhūpādhāraṃ tathaiva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:10066: gandhādhāraṃ tathā pātraṃ kāmānāṃ pātratāṃ vrajet // Hbhv_11.98 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10067: saumdrajāni pātrāṇi dattvā vai taijasāni vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10068: pātraṃ bhavati kāmānāṃ vidyānāṃ ca dhanasya ca // Hbhv_11.99 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10072: rūpyado rūpam āpnoti viśeṣād bhuvi durlabham // Hbhv_11.101 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10077: vāruṇaṃ lokam āpnoti dattvā vastuṃ dvijottamāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10078: avipradānāc ca tathā tam enaṃ lokam aśnute // Hbhv_11.104 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10079: uṣṭraṃ vā gardabhaṃ vāpi kharaṃ vā yaḥ prayacchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:10080: alakāṃ sa samāsādya yakṣendraiḥ saha modate // Hbhv_11.105 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10082: agniṣṭomam avāpnoti subhagaś ca tathā bhavet // Hbhv_11.106 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10083: dāsaṃ dattvā sukhe loke neṣṭa-bhraṣṭo vijāyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:10084: dāsīṃ dattvā tathā viprā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Hbhv_11.107 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10087: nṛtyaṃ dattvā tathāpnoti rudra-lokam asaṃśayam // Hbhv_11.109 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10089: gītaṃ dattvā tathāpnoti brahma-lokam asaṃśayam // Hbhv_11.110 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10090: dundubhiṃ ye prayacchanti kīrtimanto bhavanti te // Hbhv_11.111 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10091: dattvā dhānyāni bījāni śasyāni vividhāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:10092: rūpakāni ca tāny eva prāpnuyāt sura-pūjyatām // Hbhv_11.112 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10093: dattvā śākāni ramyāni viśokas tv abhijāyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:10094: dattvā ca vyañjanārthāya tathopakaraṇāni ca // Hbhv_11.113 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10101: kūrca-prasādhanaṃ kṛtvā paraṃ maṅgalam aśnute // Hbhv_11.116 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10102: vismāpanīyaṃ yat kiñcid dattvātyantaṃ sukhaṃ labhet // Hbhv_11.117 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10104: upacāra-prayoge prāk tatra tatra vyalekhi tat // Hbhv_11.118 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10112: prayojayed aracanājñām upacārāṃs tu ṣoḍaśa // Hbhv_11.121 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10114: gandhādayo nivedyāntā upacārā daśa kramāt // Hbhv_11.122 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10116: saparyās trividhāḥ proktās tāsām ekāṃ samācaret // Hbhv_11.123 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10119: snānaṃ vāso bhūṣaṇaṃ ca gandhaḥ puṣpaṃ ca dhūpakaḥ // Hbhv_11.124 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10120: pradīpaś caiva naivedyaṃ puṣpāñjalir ataḥ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:10121: pradakṣiṇaṃ namaskāro visargaś caiva ṣoḍaśa // Hbhv_11.125 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10127: āsanaṃ danta-kāṣṭhaṃ ca pādyārghyācamanāny api // Hbhv_11.128 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10130: kṣīreṇa dadhnā haviṣā madhunā sitayā tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10131: mantra-pūtaiḥ punar vārbhir aṅga-vāso 'tha vāsasī // Hbhv_11.130 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10133: bhūṣaṇaṃ kusumaṃ dhūpo dīpo dṛṣṭy-apasāraṇam // Hbhv_11.131 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10139: siṃhāsanopaveśaś ca pādyādyaiḥ punar arcanam // Hbhv_11.134 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10153: nitya-karmādikaṃ tat tat śrī-kṛṣṇasyāpi kārayet // Hbhv_11.141 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10155: sarvaṃ tat tac ca jānīyāl loka-rīty-anusārataḥ // Hbhv_11.142 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10157: bhaktenārcyo yathā-labdhais tair antar-bhāvitair api // Hbhv_11.143 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10161: dravyāṇām apy abhāve tu puṣpākṣata-yavaiḥ kriyāḥ // Hbhv_11.144 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10164: upacāreṣu dravyeṣu yat kiñcid duṣkaraṃ budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10165: tat sarvaṃ manasā buddhyā puṣpa-kṣepeṇa kalpayet // Hbhv_11.146 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10167: yad asampannam eteṣāṃ manasā tu prakalpayet // Hbhv_11.147 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10169: yad yan nyūnaṃ bhavaty eva rāmārādhana-sādhanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10173: bhaktasya ca yathā-labdhair hṛdi bhāvena caiva hi // Hbhv_11.149 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10174: tato 'nujñāṃ prabhoḥ prārthya daṇḍavat taṃ praṇamya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:10175: sāyaṃ bhuktvā yathānyāyaṃ sukhaṃ svapyāt prabhuṃ smaret // Hbhv_11.150 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10180: kṣīrābdhi-madhye yaḥ śete sa māṃ rakṣatu mādhavaḥ // Hbhv_11.151 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10182: sarvātmā sarva-śaktiś ca pātu māṃ garuḍa-dhvajaḥ // Hbhv_11.152 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10183: iti rakṣāṃ puraskṛtya svaped viṣṇum anusmaran // Hbhv_11.153 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10185: adbhiḥ śauca-vidhiṃ vidhāya caraṇau prakṣāly copaspṛśed
GR14hbhvil_u:10188: vastreṇāṅghri-yugaṃ pramṛjyaa śayanaṃ tv āpādya sadyaḥ svapet // Hbhv_11.154 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10191: śayane yaḥ smaren nityaṃ duḥsvapnas tasya naśyati // Hbhv_11.155 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10194: sarvadā brahmacārīha vijñeyaḥ sa gṛhāśramī // Hbhv_11.156 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10196: putra-dās tāsu yā yugmā ayugmāḥ kanyakā-pradāḥ // Hbhv_11.157 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10197: tyaktvā candramasaṃ duṣṭaṃ maghāṃ mūlaṃ vihāya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:10201: kṛta-pādādi-śaucaś ca bhuktvā sāyaṃ tato gṛhī /
GR14hbhvil_u:10202: gacchec chayyām asphuṭitām eka-dāru-mayīṃ nṛpa // Hbhv_11.159 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10203: nāviśālāṃ na vai bhagnāṃ nāsamāṃ malināṃ na ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:10204: na ca jantu-mayīṃ śayyām adhitiṣṭhed anāstṛtām // Hbhv_11.160 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10205: prācyāṃ diśi śiraḥ śastaṃ yāmyāyām athavā nṛpa /
GR14hbhvil_u:10206: sadaiva svapataḥ puṃso viparītaṃ tu rogadam // Hbhv_11.161 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10208: punnāmarkṣe śubhe kāle jyeṣṭha-yugmāsu rātriṣu // Hbhv_11.162 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10209: nāsnātāṃ tu striyaṃ gacchen nāturāṃ na rajasvalām /
GR14hbhvil_u:10210: nāniṣṭāṃ na prakupitāṃ nāpraśastāṃ na gurviṇīm // Hbhv_11.163 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10212: kṣut-kṣāmām atibhuktāṃ vā svayaṃ caibhir guṇair yutaḥ // Hbhv_11.164 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10214: sakāmaḥ sānurāgaś ca vyavāyaṃ puruṣo vrajet // Hbhv_11.165 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10216: parvāṇy etāni rājendra ravi-saṅkrāntir eva ca // Hbhv_11.166 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10218: viṇ-mūtra-bhojanaṃ nāma prayāti narakaṃ nṛpa // Hbhv_11.167 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10220: deva-dvija-gurūṇāṃ ca vyavāyī nāśramī bhavet // Hbhv_11.168 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10224: gacched vyavāyaṃ matimān na mūtroccāra-pīḍitaḥ // Hbhv_11.170 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10226: kim u vācāsthi-bandho 'pi nāsti teṣu vyavāyinām // Hbhv_11.171 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10227: mṛto narakam abhyeti hīyate cātra cāyuṣaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10229: iti matvā sva-dāreṣu ṛtumatsu budho vrajet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10232: teṣāṃ bhakty-upayogitvaṃ na syād yadyapi karmaṇām /
GR14hbhvil_u:10233: tathāpi kṛta ullekho gṛhiṣv āvaśyakaṃ tataḥ // Hbhv_11.174 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10234: itthaṃ hi prātaru tthānāt pratyahaṃ śayanāvadhi /
GR14hbhvil_u:10235: śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ pūjayan siddha-sarvārtho 'sya priyo bhavet // Hbhv_11.175 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10238: na viṣṇv-ārādhanāt puṇyaṃ vidyate karma vaidikam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10239: tasmād anādi-madhyāntaṃ nityam ārādhayed dharim // Hbhv_11.176 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10241: ye'rcayiṣyanti māṃ bhaktyā nityaṃ kali-yuge dvijāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10242: vidhinā veda-dṛṣṭena te gamiṣyanti tat-padam // Hbhv_11.177 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10244: śrī-viṣṇor arcanaṃ ye tu prakurvanti narā bhuvi /
GR14hbhvil_u:10245: te yānti śāśvataṃ viṣṇor ānandaṃ paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_11.178 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10249: tathā bhavanti devarṣe kriyā-yoga-ratā yathā // Hbhv_11.179 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10251: tuṣṭir me sambhavet pumbhir bhaktimadbhir amatsaraiḥ // Hbhv_11.180 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10253: dhyāyanti ye ca māṃ nityaṃ teṣāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ kriyā matāḥ // Hbhv_11.181 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10254: kriyā-hīnasya devarṣe tathā dhyānaṃ na muktidam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10255: na tathā māṃ vidur viprā dhyāninas tattvato vinā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10256: kriyā-yoga-ratāḥ samyag labhante māṃ samādhinā // Hbhv_11.182 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10257: yathā hi kāmadaṃ nṝṇāṃ mama tuṣṭi-karaṃ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:10259: saṃvatsareṇa yat puṇyaṃ labhante dhyānino mama /
GR14hbhvil_u:10260: prāpyante tad ihaikāhāt kriyā-yoga-parair naraiḥ // Hbhv_11.184 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10262: na karma-sadṛśaṃ dhyānaṃ na karma-sadṛśaṃ phalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10263: na karma-sadṛśas tyāgo na karma-sadṛśaṃ tapaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10264: na karma-sadṛśaṃ puṇyaṃ na karma-sadṛśī gatiḥ // Hbhv_11.185 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10267: bhaktyā saṃpūjito viṣṇuḥ pradadāti manoratham // Hbhv_11.186 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10268: tasmād viprāḥ sadā bhaktiḥ kartavyā cakra-pāṇinaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10269: janenāpi jagannāthaḥ pūjitaḥ kleśahā bhavet // Hbhv_11.187 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10272: viphalā nānya-karmeva kṛpāluḥ ko nv ataḥ paraḥ // Hbhv_11.188 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10274: sa samārādhito devo mukti-kṛt syād yathā tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10275: anicchayāpi huta-bhuk saṃspṛṣṭo dahati dvija // Hbhv_11.189 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10277: medhāvī matimān prājño bhavaty ārādhanād dhareḥ // Hbhv_11.190 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10279: viśiṣṭaḥ sarva-dharmāc ca dharmo viṣṇv-arcanaṃ nṝṇām /
GR14hbhvil_u:10280: sarva-yajña-tapo-homas tīrtha-snānaiś ca yat phalam // Hbhv_11.191 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10281: tat phalaṃ koṭi-guṇitaṃ viṣṇuṃ sampūjya cāpnuyāt /
GR14hbhvil_u:10284: yaḥ pradadyad dvijendraya sarvaṃ bhumiṃ sa-sagaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:10285: arcayed yaḥ sakṛd viṣṇuṃ tat phalaṃ labhate naraḥ // Hbhv_11.193 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10286: masardham api yo viṣṇuṃ nairantaryena pūjayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10287: puruṣottamaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇu-bhakto na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.194 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10289: vasu-pūrṇa-mahi-datur yat punyaṃ tad avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_11.195 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10290: prātar utthaya yo viṣṇuṃ satataṃ paripūjayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10292: yo viṣṇuṃ prayato bhūtvā sayaṃkale samarcayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10293: gavaṃ medhasya yajñasya phalam āpnoti durlabham // Hbhv_11.197 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10294: evaṃ sarvāsu velāsu avelāsu ca keśavam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10295: sampūjayan naro bhaktyā sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_11.198 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10297: dhanyaḥ saḥ kṛta-kṛtyaś ca viṣṇu-lokam avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_11.199 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10299: dīkṣā-mātreṇa kṛṣṇasya narā mokṣaṃ labhanti vai /
GR14hbhvil_u:10300: kiṃ punar ye sadā bhaktyā pūjayanty acyutaṃ naraḥ // Hbhv_11.200 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10303: pūjanaṃ vāsudevasya tārakaṃ vādibhiḥ smrtam // Hbhv_11.201 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10304: sa nāma sukṛti loke kulaṃ tena hy alaṅkṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10305: ādhāraḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ yena viṣṇuḥ prasaditaḥ // Hbhv_11.202 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10306: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva śubhānām api karmaṇām /
GR14hbhvil_u:10307: tad viśiṣṭa-phalaṃ nṝṇāṃ sadaivārādhanaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_11.203 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10308: kalau kali-malākrāntā na jānanti hariṃ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:10309: ye'rcayanti tam īśānaṃ kṛta-kṛtyas ta eva hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:10310: nāsti śreyottamaṃ nṝṇāṃ viṣṇor ārādhanat param // Hbhv_11.204 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10311: yuge'smin tamase tasmāt satataṃ harim arcayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10313: arcitaḥ sarva-devāḥ syur yataḥ sarva-gato hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10315: keśave keśi-kaṃsa-ghne na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ // Hbhv_11.206 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10317: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yat surair api pūjitam // Hbhv_11.207 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10319: sākṣād bhagavato nityaṃ pūjanaṃ janmanaḥ phalam // Hbhv_11.208 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10321: asāre khalu saṃsāre sāram etan nirūpitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10324: yatra viṣṇu-kathā nityaṃ yatra tiṣṭhanti vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10325: kali-bāhyā narās te vai ye'rcayanti sadā harim // Hbhv_11.210 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10327: harer ārādhanaṃ puṃsāṃ kiṃ kiṃ na kurute bata /
GR14hbhvil_u:10329: haraty aghaṃ dhvamsayati vyādhīn ādhīn nirasyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:10330: dharmaṃ vivardhayet kṣipraṃ prayacchanti mano-ratham // Hbhv_11.212 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10331: ata eva skānde dhruvaṃ prati markaṇḍeyasya vacanaṃ ---
GR14hbhvil_u:10333: sa prāpnoti paraṃ sthānaṃ satyam etan mayoditam // Hbhv_11.213 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10335: yasyāntaḥ sarvam evedaṃ yasya nānto mahātmanaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10336: tam ārādhaya govindaṃ sthānam āgryaṃ yad icchasi // Hbhv_11.214 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10338: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma yo 'sau sasvata-pūruṣaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10339: tam ārādhya hariṃ yāti muktim apy ati-durlabham // Hbhv_11.215 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10341: aindram indraḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ yam ārādhya jagat-patim /
GR14hbhvil_u:10342: prāpa yajña-patiṃ viṣṇuṃ tam ārādhaya su-vrata // Hbhv_11.216 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10344: prāpnoty ārādhite viṣṇau manasā yad yad icchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:10345: trailokyāntar-gataṃ sthānaṃ kim u sarvottamottamam // Hbhv_11.217 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10346: yan yan kāmayate kāmān nārī vā puruṣo 'pi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10347: tan samāpnoti vipulān samārādhya janārdanam // Hbhv_11.218 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10349: ārādhyaiva naro viṣṇuṃ manasā yad yad icchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:10350: phalaṃ prāpnoty avihataṃ bhūri svalpam athāpi vā // Hbhv_11.219 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10354: na hi samprāpyate śreṣṭhaṃ tasmād ārādhayācyutam // Hbhv_11.220 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10357: prāpnoty ārādhite viṣṇau nirvāṇam api cottamam // Hbhv_11.221 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10362: tam ārādhaya govindaṃ sthānam agryaṃ yadīcchasi // Hbhv_11.223 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10364: yas tu sampūjayen nityaṃ narasiṃha nareśvara /
GR14hbhvil_u:10365: sa svarga-mokṣa-bhāgī syān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Hbhv_11.224 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10370: kiṃ tvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśa-nāśanaḥ // Hbhv_11.226 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10371: udakenāpy alābhe tu dravyāṇāṃ pūjitaḥ prabhuḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10372: yo dadāti svakaṃ lokaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na pūjitaḥ // Hbhv_11.227 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10374: smaranān mukti-do nṛṇāṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na pūjitaḥ // Hbhv_11.228 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10376: yatra pūjā-paro viṣṇos tatra vighno na bādhate /
GR14hbhvil_u:10377: rājā ca taskaraś cāpi vyādhayaś ca na santi hi // Hbhv_11.229 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10378: pretāḥ piśācāḥ kuṣmāṇḍā grahā bālagrahās tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10379: ḍākinyo rākṣasāś caiva na bādhante'cyutarcakam // Hbhv_11.230 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10381: patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalair vārcya pūjā-rahitam acyutam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10385: labhante paramaṃ sthānaṃ kim u śuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ // Hbhv_11.232 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10386: muhūrtaṃ vā muhūrtārdhaṃ yas tiṣṭhed dhari-mandire /
GR14hbhvil_u:10387: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ kim u śuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ // Hbhv_11.233 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10389: avaśenāpi yat karma kṛtaṃ tu su-mahat phalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10390: dadāti nṝṇāṃ rājendra kiṃ punaḥ samyag-arcanā // Hbhv_11.234 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10392: samparkād yadi vā mohād yas tu pūjayate harim /
GR14hbhvil_u:10393: sarva-pāpa-vinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_11.235 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10395: paraṃ mokṣaṃ labhec caiva pūjyamāne janārdane // Hbhv_11.236 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10397: hari-pūjā-parāṇāṃ tu sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.237 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10398: sarva-tīrthāni yajñāś ca sāṅgā vedāś ca sattamāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10401: satyaṃ vacmi hitaṃ vacmi sāraṃ vacmi punaḥ punaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10404: akāmād api ye viṣṇoḥ sakṛt pūjāṃ prakurvate na teṣām /
GR14hbhvil_u:10405: bhava-bandhas tu kadācid api jāyate // Hbhv_11.240 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10409: te vandyās te prapūjyāś ca namaskāryā viśeṣataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10411: ye yajanti spṛhā-śūnyā hariṃ vā haram eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10412: ta eva bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ punanti vibudha-rṣabhāḥ // Hbhv_11.241 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10414: mad-bhakto yo mad-arcāṃ ca karoti vidhi-dṛṣṭaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:10415: tasyāntarāyaḥ svapne'pi na bhavaty abhayo hi saḥ // Hbhv_11.242 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10418: sa dadyād īpsitaṃ sarvaṃ bhaktyā sampūjito 'jitaḥ // Hbhv_11.245 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10419: narake'pi ciraṃ magnāḥ pūrvajā ye kula-dvaye /
GR14hbhvil_u:10420: tatraiva yānti te svargaṃ yadārceta sūto harim // Hbhv_11.246 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10422: anārādhya hariṃ bhaktyā ko lokān prāpnuyād budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10423: ārādhite harau kāmāḥ sarve kara-tala-sthitāḥ // Hbhv_11.247 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10425: so 'pi dhanyatamo loke yo 'rcayed acutyaṃ sakṛt /
GR14hbhvil_u:10426: kiṃ punaḥ śraddhayā yuktaḥ sa-puṣpaiḥ prativāsaram // Hbhv_11.248 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10427: vaiṣṇavān api ye nityaṃ prapaśyanty arcayanti ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:10428: te'pi viṣṇu-padaṃ yānti kiṃ punar viṣṇu-sevakāḥ // Hbhv_11.249 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10429: sa yogī sa viśuddhātmā sa śāntaḥ sa mahā-matiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10430: sa śuddhaḥ sa ca sampūrṇaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ seveta yo naraḥ // Hbhv_11.250 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10436: manuṣyam iva taṃ draṣṭuṃ vyavahartuṃ ca bandhuvat // Hbhv_11.252 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10439: tathā na spṛśato rāmopāsakaṃ vidhi-pūrvakam // Hbhv_11.253 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10441: evaṃ satata-yuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate /
GR14hbhvil_u:10442: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yoga-vittamāḥ // Hbhv_11.254 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10444: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate /
GR14hbhvil_u:10445: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ // Hbhv_11.255 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10463: arcann ubhayataḥ siddhiṃ matto vindaty abhīpsitām // Hbhv_11.259 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10466: bhakti-yogaṃ sa labhata evaṃ yaḥ pūjayeta mām // Hbhv_11.260 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10469: vikrīṇīte svam ātmānaṃ bhaktebhyo bhakta-vatsalaḥ // Hbhv_11.261 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10473: yo nārcayati deveśaṃ taṃ vidyād brahma-ghātakam // Hbhv_11.262 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10475: hari-pūjā-vidhānaṃ tu yasya veśmani no dvijaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10476: śmaśāna-sadṛśaṃ vidyān na kadāpi viśec ca tat // Hbhv_11.263 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10478: puṣpair vā yadi vā patraih phalair vā yadi vāmbubhiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10479: yaṣṭavyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣas tyaktvā kārya-śatāni ca // Hbhv_11.264 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10482: pūjayed deva-deveśaṃ dravyaṃ sampādya yatnataḥ // Hbhv_11.265 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10485: varaṃ prāṇasya vā tyāgaḥ śiraso vāpi karttanam // Hbhv_11.266 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10488: pūjāṅgānāṃ ca māhātmyaṃ yad yad vilikhitaṃ purā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10489: tat sarvam iha pūjāyāṃ paryavasyati hi svataḥ // Hbhv_11.268 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10491: kīṭena kati saṅgrāhyāḥ prabhāvam śrī-harer vinā // Hbhv_11.269 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10493: tan-māhātmyaṃ ca vikhyātaṃ saṅkṣepenātra likhyate // Hbhv_11.270 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10506: śrī-pūrvo narasiṃho dvir jayād uttaratas tu saḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10510: puruṣaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca tathā saṅkarṣaṇaṃ vibhum /
GR14hbhvil_u:10511: pradyumnam aniruddhaṃ ca kramād abdeṣu kīrtayet // Hbhv_11.274 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10513: madhavaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ tathā vai bhoga-sayinam // Hbhv_11.275 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10516: viṣṇuṃ ca madhu-hantāraṃ tathā devaṃ trivikramam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10517: vāmanaṃ śrīdharaṃ caiva hṛṣīkeśaṃ tathāiva ca // Hbhv_11.277 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10519: nārāyaṇaṃ mādhavaṃ ca govindaṃ ca tathā kramāt // Hbhv_11.278 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10521: pradyumnam aniruddhaṃ ca pakṣayoḥ kṛṣṇa-śuklayoḥ // Hbhv_11.279 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10522: sarvaḥ śarvaḥ sivaḥ sthāṇur bhūtādir nidhir avyayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10523: adityādiṣu vareṣu kramād evam anusmaret // Hbhv_11.280 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10525: bhūta-bhṛd bhūta-kṛd bhavo bhūtātmā bhūta-bhavanaḥ // Hbhv_11.281 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10527: sad-bhavo bhavano bharta prabhavaḥ prabhur isvaraḥ // Hbhv_11.282 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10529: agrahyaḥ sasvato dhata kṛṣṇaś caitany anusmaret /
GR14hbhvil_u:10531: brahmāṇaṃ śrī-patiṃ viṣṇuṃ kapilaṃ śrīdharaṃ prabhum /
GR14hbhvil_u:10533: bhūdharaṃ gadinaṃ devaṃ saṅkhinaṃ padminaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10534: cakriṇaṃ ca mahārāja prathamādiṣu saṃsmaret // Hbhv_11.285 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10535: sarvaṃ vā sarvadā nāma deva-devasya yādava // Hbhv_11.286 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10542: kāmaḥ kāma-pradaḥ kāntaḥ kāma-pālas tathā hariḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10543: ānando mādhavaś caiva kāma-saṃsiddhaye japet // Hbhv_11.288 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10544: rāmaḥ paraśurāmaś ca nṛsiṃho viṣṇur eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:10545: vikramaś caivam ādīni japyāny ari-jigīṣubhiḥ // Hbhv_11.289 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10547: dāmodaraṃ bandha-gato nityam eva japen naraḥ // Hbhv_11.290 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10548: keśavaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣam aniśaṃ hi tathā japet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10549: netra-bādhāsu sarvāsu hṛṣīkeśaṃ bhayeṣu ca // Hbhv_11.291 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10552: cakriṇaṃ gadinaṃ caiva śārṅgiṇaṃ khaḍginaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10553: kṣemārthī pravasan nityaṃ dikṣu pracyādiṣu smaret // Hbhv_11.293 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10554: ajitaṃ cādhipaṃ caiva sarvaṃ sarveśvaraṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10555: saṃsmaret puruṣo bhaktyā vyavahāreṣu sarvadā // Hbhv_11.294 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10567: vāmanaṃ khaḍginaṃ caiva duṣṭa-svapne sadā smaret // Hbhv_11.300 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10570: jagat-patim apatyārthaṃ stuvān bhaktyā na sīdati /
GR14hbhvil_u:10571: śrīśaṃ sarvābhyudayike karmany āśu prakīrtayet // Hbhv_11.302 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10572: ariṣṭeṣu hy aśeṣeṣu viśokaṃ ca sadā japet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10576: yathābhirocate nāma tat sarvārtheṣu kīrtayet // Hbhv_11.303 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10578: sarvāṇy etāni nāmāni parasya brahmaṇo hareḥ // Hbhv_11.304 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10579: evaṃ viṣṇu-dharmottare ca mārkaṇḍeya-vajra-saṃvāde kiṃ ca-
GR14hbhvil_u:10580: kūrmaṃ varāhaṃ matsyaṃ vā jala-prataraṇe smaret /
GR14hbhvil_u:10581: bhrājiṣṇum agni-janane japen nāma tv akhaṇḍitam // Hbhv_11.306 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10585: uttarānāṃ vāṇijyārthī rāmam abhyudaye nṛpa // Hbhv_11.308 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10586: maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ viṣṇum maṅgalyeṣu ca kīrtayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10587: uttiṣṭhan kīrtayed viṣṇum prasvapan madhavaṃ naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10588: bhojane caiva govindaṃ sarvatra madhusūdanam // Hbhv_11.309 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10590: auṣadhe cintayed viṣṇum bhojane ca janārdanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10591: śayane padmanābhaṃ ca maithune ca prajāpatim // Hbhv_11.310 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10594: jala-madhye ca vārāhaṃ pāvake jalaśāyinam // Hbhv_11.311 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10597: māyāsu vāmanaṃ devaṃ sarva-kāryeṣu mādhavam // Hbhv_11.312 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10599: kīrtayed vāsudevaṃ ca anukteṣv api yādava /
GR14hbhvil_u:10600: kāryārambhe tathā rājan yatheṣṭaṃ nāma kīrtayet // Hbhv_11.313 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10608: aho su-nirmala yūyam rāgo hi hari-kīrtane /
GR14hbhvil_u:10609: avidhūya tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ nṛṇām udeti sūryavat // Hbhv_11.315 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10611: pāpānalasya dīptasya mā kurvantu bhayaṃ narāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10614: pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃha-trastair mṛgair iva // Hbhv_11.317 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10617: yasmin nyasta-matir na yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yac-cintane
GR14hbhvil_u:10619: muktiṃ cetasi yaḥ sthito 'mala-dhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadāty avyayaḥ
GR14hbhvil_u:10620: kiṃ citraṃ yad-aghaṃ prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite // Hbhv_11.319 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10622: sāyaṃ prātas tathā kṛtvā deva-devasya kīrtanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10630: govindeti tathā proktaṃ bhaktyā vā bhakti-varjitaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10632: govinda-nāmnā yaḥ kaścin naro bhavati bhū-tale /
GR14hbhvil_u:10633: kīrtanād eva tasyāpi pāpaṃ yāti sahasradhā // Hbhv_11.323 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10639: ekam eva harer nāma sarva-pāpa-vināśanam // Hbhv_11.325 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10644: na mama paṭa-lipiṃ viśanti martyāḥ // Hbhv_11.326 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10651: tathā dahati govinda-nāma vyājād apīritam // Hbhv_11.328 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10659: yad vyājahāra vivaśo nāma svasty-ayanaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_11.331 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10662: sarveṣām apy aghavatām idam eva suniṣkṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10663: nāma-vyāharaṇaṃ viṣṇor yatas tad-viṣayā matiḥ // Hbhv_11.333 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10669: sāṅketyaṃ pārihāsyaṃ vā stobhaṃ helanam eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10671: patitaḥ skhalito bhagnaḥ sandaṣṭas tapta āhataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10672: harir ity avaśenāha pumān nārhati yātanāḥ // Hbhv_11.336 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10675: saṅkīrtitam aghaṃ puṃso dahed edho yathānalaḥ // Hbhv_11.337 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10678: śvādaḥ pulkasako vāpi śuddhyeran yasya kīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.338 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10680: vartamānaṃ tu yat pāpaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yad bhaviṣyati /
GR14hbhvil_u:10681: tat sarvaṃ nirdahaty āśu govindānala-kīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.339 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10682: sadā droha-paro yas tu sajjanānāṃ mahī-tale /
GR14hbhvil_u:10683: jāyate pāvano dhanyo harer nāmānukīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.340 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10685: vasanti yāni koṭis tu pāvanāni mahītale /
GR14hbhvil_u:10686: na tāni tat-tulāṃ yānti kṛṣṇa-nāmānukīrtane // Hbhv_11.341 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10689: tāvat kartuṃ na śaknoti pātakaṃ pātakī janaḥ // Hbhv_11.342 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10691: svādo 'pi na hi śaknoti kartuṃ pāpāni yatnataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10692: tāvantī yāvatī śaktir viṣṇor nāmno 'subha-kṣaye // Hbhv_11.343 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10694: tan nāsti karmajaṃ loke vāg-jaṃ mānasam eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10695: yan na kṣapayate pāpaṃ kalau govinda-kīrtanam // Hbhv_11.344 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10698: śāntyai kaler aghaughasya nāma-saṅkīrtanaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_11.345 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10702: pāpaṃ nihaty āśu kim atra citram // Hbhv_11.346 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10713: govindeti mudā yuktaḥ kīrtayed yas tv ananya-dhīḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10714: pāvanena ca dhanyena teneyaṃ pṛthivī dhṛtā // Hbhv_11.349 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10716: na caivam ekaṃ vaktāraṃ jihvā rakṣati vaiṣṇavī /
GR14hbhvil_u:10717: āśrāvya bhagavat-khyātiṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ punāti hi // Hbhv_11.350 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10719: yan-nāma gṛhṇann akhilan śrotṝn ātmānam eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:10720: sadyaḥ punāti kiṃ bhūyas tasya spṛṣṭaḥ padā hi te // Hbhv_11.351 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10723: ye nṛsiṃha bhavan-nāma gāyanty uccair mudānvitāḥ // Hbhv_11.352 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10727: naśyanti sakalā rogāḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmy aham // Hbhv_11.353 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10729: na sāmba vyādhijaṃ duḥkhaṃ heyaṃ nānyauṣadhair api /
GR14hbhvil_u:10730: hari-nāmauṣadhaṃ pītvā vyādhis tyājyo na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.354 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10733: tadaiva vilayaṃ yānti tam anantaṃ namāmy aham // Hbhv_11.355 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10736: nārāyaṇeti saṅkīrtya nirāṭaṅko bhaven naraḥ // Hbhv_11.356 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10756: dakinyo vidravanti sma ye tathānye ca siṃhakaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10760: viyogaṃ śīghram āpnoti sarvānarthair na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.363 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10769: hari-nāma-parā ye ca ghore kali-yuge narāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10770: ta eva kṛta-kṛtyāś ca na kalir bādhate hi tān // Hbhv_11.366 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10772: itīrayanti te nityaṃ na hi tān bādhate kaliḥ // Hbhv_11.367 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10775: kurvanti tān nara-vyāghra na kalir bādhate narān // Hbhv_11.368 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10778: yathā yathā harer nāma kīrtayanti sma nārakāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10779: tathā tathā harau bhaktim udvahanto divaṃ yayuḥ // Hbhv_11.369 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10782: muktiḥ sañjāyate tasmān nāma-saṅkīrtanād dhareḥ // Hbhv_11.370 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10787: na yat punaḥ karmasu sajjate mano
GR14hbhvil_u:10791: patan skhalan vā vivaśo gṛṇan pumān /
GR14hbhvil_u:10793: prāpnoti yakṣyanti na taṃ kalau janāḥ // Hbhv_11.372 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10801: mama nāmāni loke'smin śraddhayā yas tu kīrtayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10802: tasyāparādha-koṭis tu kṣamāmy eva na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.375 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10807: sarvaṃ karoti niśchidram anusaṅkīrtanaṃ tava // Hbhv_11.376 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10810: nyūnaṃ sampūrṇatām eti sadyo vande tam acyutam // Hbhv_11.377 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10814: adhītas tena yenoktaṃ harir ity akṣara-dvayam // Hbhv_11.378 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10816: mā ṛco mā yajus tāta mā sāma paṭha kiṃcana /
GR14hbhvil_u:10817: govindeti harer nāma geyaṃ gāyasva nityaśaḥ // Hbhv_11.379 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10823: kurukṣetreṇa kiṃ tasya kiṃ kasya puskareṇa vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10824: jihvāgre vasate yasya harir ity akṣara-dvayam // Hbhv_11.381 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10827: tani sarvāṇy avāpnoti viṣṇor nāmānukīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.382 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10829: viśrutāṇi bahūny eva tīrthāni bahudhāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:10835: govinda govinda iti sphutaṃ raṭa // Hbhv_11.384 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10843: bhava-hetūni tāny eva harer nāma tu muktidam // Hbhv_11.386 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10846: prātar utthāya bhūpāla kuru govinda-kīrtanam // Hbhv_11.387 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10847: kiṃ kariṣyati sāṅkhyena kiṃ yogair nara-nāyaka /
GR14hbhvil_u:10848: muktim icchasi rājendra kuru govinda-kīrtanam // Hbhv_11.388 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10853: tepus tapas te juhuvur sasnur aryā
GR14hbhvil_u:10854: brahmānūcur nāma gṛhṇanti ye te // Hbhv_11.389 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10858: adhyātma-mūlam etad dhi viṣṇor nāmānukīrtanam // Hbhv_11.390 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10860: hṛdi kṛtvā tathā kāmam abhīṣṭaṃ dvija-puṅgavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10861: ekaṃ nāma japed yas tu śataṃ kāmān avāpnuyāt // Hbhv_11.391 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10867: kṛtārthās te'pi manujās tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ // Hbhv_11.393 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10869: te dhanyās te kṛtārthāś ca tair eva sukṛtaṃ kṛtam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10870: tair āptaṃ janmanaḥ prāpyaṃ ye kāle kīrtayanti mām // Hbhv_11.394 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10873: kalau yuge harer nāma te kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.395 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10879: kalau yuge viśeṣeṇa viṣṇu-prītyai samācaret // Hbhv_11.397 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10885: ākṛṣya hariṇā sarvāḥ sthāpitāḥ sveṣu nāmasu // Hbhv_11.399 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10886: vāto 'py ato harer nāmna ugrāṇām api duḥsahaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10887: sarveṣāṃ pāpa-rāśīnāṃ yathaiva tamasāṃ raviḥ // Hbhv_11.400 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10890: yac cābhirucitaṃ nāma tat sarvārtheṣu yojayet // Hbhv_11.401 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10900: itīrayanti ye nityaṃ te vai sarvatra vanditāḥ // Hbhv_11.403 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10902: svapan bhuñjan vrajaṃs tiṣṭhaṃś ca vadaṃs tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10903: ye vadanti harer nāma tebhyo nityaṃ namo namaḥ // Hbhv_11.404 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10905: strī śūdraḥ pukkaśo vāpi ye cānye pāpa-yonayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10906: kīrtayanti hariṃ bhaktyā tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ // Hbhv_11.405 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10912: sukhena yāṃ gatiṃ yānti na tāṃ sarve'pi dhārmikāḥ // Hbhv_11.407 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10915: na deśa-niyamas tasmin na kāla-niyamas tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10916: nocchiṣṭhādau niṣedho 'sti śrī-harer nāmni lubdhaka // Hbhv_11.408 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10920: nāśaucaṃ kīrtane tasya sa pavitra-karo yataḥ // Hbhv_11.409 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10923: kintu svatantram evaitan nāma kāmita-kāmadam // Hbhv_11.410 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10926: paraṃ saṅkīrtanād eva rāma rāmeti mucyate // Hbhv_11.411 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10928: na deśa-niyamo rājan na kāla-niyamas tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10929: vidyate nātra sandeho viṣṇor nāmānukīrtane // Hbhv_11.412 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10930: kālo 'sti dāne yajñe ca sthāne kālo 'sti saj-jape /
GR14hbhvil_u:10931: viṣṇu-saṅkīrtane kālo nāsty atra pṛthivī-tale // Hbhv_11.413 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10934: yogināṃ nṛpa nirṇītaṃ harer nāmānukīrtanam // Hbhv_11.414 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10938: satataṃ kīrtayed bhūmi yāti mallayatāṃ sa hi // Hbhv_11.415 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10940: kiṃ kariṣyati sāṅkhyena kiṃ yogair nara-nāyaka /
GR14hbhvil_u:10941: muktim icchasi rājendra kuru govinda-kīrtanam // Hbhv_11.416 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10943: sakṛd uccāritaṃ yena harir ity akṣara-dvayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10944: baddhaḥ parikaras tena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // Hbhv_11.417 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10946: apy anya-citto 'śuddho vā yaḥ sadā kīrtayed dharim /
GR14hbhvil_u:10947: so 'pi doṣa-kṣayān muktiṃ labhec cedi-patir yathā // Hbhv_11.418 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10949: sakṛd uccārayed yas tu nārāyaṇam atandritaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:10953: sa śuddho muktim āpnoti harer nāmānukīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.420 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10956: mucyate nātra sandeho viṣṇor nāmānukīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.421 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10958: yathā kathañcit yan nāsti kīrtite vā śrute'pi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:10959: pāpino 'pi viśuddhāḥ syuḥ śuddhā mokṣam avāpnuyuḥ // Hbhv_11.422 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10969: āpannaḥ saṃsṛtiṃ ghorāṃ yan-nāma vivaśo gṛṇan /
GR14hbhvil_u:10970: tataḥ sadyo vimucyeta yad bibheti svayaṃ bhayam // Hbhv_11.425 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10975: saṃyānty apāvṛtāmṛtaṃ tam ajaṃ prapadye // Hbhv_11.426 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10982: uktaṃ ca laiṅge śrī-nāradaṃ prati śrī-śivena-
GR14hbhvil_u:10983: vrajaṃs tiṣṭhan svapann aśnan śvasan vākya-prapūraṇe /
GR14hbhvil_u:10985: kṛtvā svarūpatāṃ yāti bhakti-yuktaṃ paraṃ vrajet // Hbhv_11.428 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10988: aśnāti surayā pakvaṃ maraṇe harim uccaran // Hbhv_11.429 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10992: jihvāgre vartate yasya harir ity akṣara-dvayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:10993: viṣṇor lokam avāpnoti punar āvṛtti-durlabham // Hbhv_11.431 //
GR14hbhvil_u:10995: yatra tatra sthito vāpi kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti kīrtayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:10996: sarva-pāpa-viśuddhātmā sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim // Hbhv_11.432 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11004: samuccāryānta-kāle'gād dhāma tat paramaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_11.434 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11006: ajāmilo 'py agād dhāma kim uta śraddhayā gṛṇan // Hbhv_11.435 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11009: ajāmilo 'py agād dhāma kim uta śraddhayā gṛṇan // Hbhv_11.436 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11014: nūnaṃ prayānti sadanaṃ madhu-ghātinas te // Hbhv_11.437 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11017: tan-muktaḥ padam āpnoti viṣṇor eva na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.438 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11020: nāma-saṅkīrtanaṃ kṛtvā yānti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // Hbhv_11.439 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11023: kaler doṣa-nidhe rājann asti hy eko mahān guṇaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11024: kīrtanād eva kṛṣṇasya mukta-saṅgaḥ paraṃ vrajet // Hbhv_11.440 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11026: yad icchasi paraṃ jñānaṃ jñānād yat paramaṃ padam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11031: mukto jāyeta niyataṃ mahā-viṣṇuḥ prasīdati // Hbhv_11.442 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11034: karoti satataṃ viprās tasya prīto hy adhokṣajaḥ // Hbhv_11.443 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11037: yaḥ karoti mahābhāga tasya tuṣyati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_11.444 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11040: yad abhyarcya hariṃ bhaktyā kṛte kratu-śatair api /
GR14hbhvil_u:11041: phalaṃ prāpnoty avikalaṃ kalau govinda-kīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.445 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11043: gītvā ca mama nāmāni vicaren mama sannidhau /
GR14hbhvil_u:11044: idaṃ bravīmi te satyaṃ krīto 'haṃ tasya cārjuna // Hbhv_11.446 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11045: gītvā ca mama nāmāni vicaren mama sannidhau /
GR14hbhvil_u:11046: iti bravīmi te satyaṃ krīto 'haṃ tasya cārjuna // Hbhv_11.447 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11048: evaṃ ca śrutvā ca mama nāmāni ity ādi // Hbhv_11.448 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11050: jitaṃ tena jitaṃ tena jitaṃ teneti niścitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11051: jihvāgre vartate yasya harir ity akṣara-dvayam // Hbhv_11.449 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11055: idam eva hi māṅgalyam etad eva dhanārjanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11056: jīvitasya phalaṃ caitad yad dāmodara-kīrtanam // Hbhv_11.450 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11060: sakṛd api parigītaṃ śraddhayā helayā vā
GR14hbhvil_u:11063: etad eva paraṃ jñānam etad eva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11064: etad eva paraṃ tattvaṃ vāsudevasya kīrtanam // Hbhv_11.452 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11067: oṣṭha-spandana-mātreṇa kīrtanaṃ tu tato varam // Hbhv_11.453 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11070: tan-mukhe hari-nāmāni sadā tiṣṭhanti bhārata // Hbhv_11.454 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11072: yad abhyarcya hariṃ bhaktyā kṛte kratu-śatair api /
GR14hbhvil_u:11073: phalaṃ prāpnoty avikalaṃ kalau govinda-kīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.455 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11075: dhyāyan kṛte yajan yajñais tretāyāṃ dvāpare'rcayan /
GR14hbhvil_u:11076: yad āpnoti tad āpnoti kalau saṅkīrtya keśavam // Hbhv_11.456 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11078: kṛte yad dhyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ yajato makhaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11079: dvāpare paricaryāyāṃ kalau tad dhari-kīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.457 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11082: yajñaiḥ saṅkīrtana-prāyair yajanti hi su-medhasaḥ // Hbhv_11.458 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11084: mahā-bhāgavatā nityaṃ kalau kurvanti kīrtanam // Hbhv_11.459 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11086: harer nāmaiva nāmaiva nāmaiva mama jīvanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11087: kalau nāsty eva nāsty eva nāsty eva gatir anyathā // Hbhv_11.460 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11089: sakṛd uccārayanty eva harer nāma cid-ātmakam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11090: phalaṃ nāsya kṣamo vaktuṃ sahasra-vadano vidhiḥ // Hbhv_11.461 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11093: prītir me manaso nityaṃ rāma-nāma-viśaṅkayā // Hbhv_11.462 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11095: īśo 'haṃ sarva-jagatāṃ nāmnāṃ viṣṇor hi jāpakaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11096: satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmy eṣa harer nāma gatir nṝṇām // Hbhv_11.463 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11098: śraddhayā helayā nāma raṭanti mama jantavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11099: teṣāṃ nāma sadā pārtha vartate hṛdaye mama // Hbhv_11.464 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11100: na nāma sadṛśaṃ jñānaṃ na nāma sadṛśaṃ vratam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11101: na nāma sadṛśaṃ dhyānaṃ na nāma sadṛśaṃ phalam // Hbhv_11.465 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11102: na nāma sadṛśas tyāgo na nāma sadṛśaḥ śamaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11103: na nāma sadṛśaṃ puṇyaṃ na nāma sadṛśī gatiḥ // Hbhv_11.466 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11105: nāmaiva paramā muktir nāmaiva paramā gatiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11106: nāmaiva paramā śāntir nāmaiva paramā sthitiḥ // Hbhv_11.467 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11107: nāmaiva paramā bhaktir nāmaiva paramā matiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11108: nāmaiva paramā prītir nāmaiva paramā smṛtiḥ // Hbhv_11.468 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11109: nāmaiva kāraṇaṃ jantor nāmaiva prabhur eva ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:11110: nāmaiva paramārādhyo nāmaiva paramo guruḥ // Hbhv_11.469 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11112: nāma-yuktān janān dṛṣṭvā snigdho bhavati yo naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11113: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ viṣṇunā saha modate // Hbhv_11.470 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11117: śravaṇasyāpi māhātmyam īṣad bhedād vilikhyate // Hbhv_11.472 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11128: kvāstīha janma japatāṃ kva kṛtānta-bhītiḥ // Hbhv_11.474 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11131: nopasarpanti tān vipra yamadūtāś ca dāruṇāḥ // Hbhv_11.475 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11134: kva japo vāsudeveti mukti-bījam anuttamam // Hbhv_11.476 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11142: te sa-bhāgyā manuṣyeṣu kṛtārthā nṛpa niścitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11143: smaranti ye smārayanti harer nāma kalau yuge // Hbhv_11.478 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11146: sadyo naśyati pāpaugho namas tasmai cid-ātmane // Hbhv_11.479 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11149: muktir bhavati jātūnāṃ brahmādīnāṃ sudurlabhā // Hbhv_11.480 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11152: viśuddhaḥ paśyati vyaktam avyaktam api keśavam // Hbhv_11.481 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11153: tad asya nāma jīvasya patitasya bhavāmbudhau /
GR14hbhvil_u:11156: harer nāma paraṃ japyaṃ dhyeyaṃ geyaṃ nirantaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:11157: kīrtanīyaṃ ca bahudhā nirvṛtīr bahudhecchatā // Hbhv_11.483 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11161: pāvanatvaṃ prapadyante kathaṃ stoṣyāmi khinna-dhīḥ // Hbhv_11.484 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11164: dahaty enāṃsi sarvāṇi prasaṅgāt kim u bhaktitaḥ // Hbhv_11.485 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11171: śrīman-nāmnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ māhātmyeṣu sameṣv api /
GR14hbhvil_u:11175: sahasra-nāmnāṃ puṇyānāṃ trir-āvṛttyā tu yat phalam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11176: ekāvṛttyā tu kṛṣṇasya nāmaikaṃ tat prayacchati // Hbhv_11.488 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11178: kṛṣṇasya prāṇa-bhūtaḥ san kṛṣṇaṃ sārathim āptavān // Hbhv_11.489 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11182: tatra guhyāni nāmāni bhaviṣyanti mama priye /
GR14hbhvil_u:11183: puṇyāni ca pavitrāṇi saṃsāra-cchedanāni ca // Hbhv_11.491 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11186: atītāḥ puruṣāḥ sapta bhaviṣāś ca caturdaśa /
GR14hbhvil_u:11187: naras tārayate sarvān kalau kṛṣṇeti kīrtanāt // Hbhv_11.492 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11188: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti svapan jāgrad vrajaṃs tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11189: yo jalpati kalau nityaṃ kṛṣṇa-rūpī bhaved dhi saḥ // Hbhv_11.493 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11191: hanan brāhmaṇam atyantaṃ kāmato vā surāṃ piban /
GR14hbhvil_u:11192: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇety aho-rātraṃ saṅkīrtya śucitām iyāt // Hbhv_11.494 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11194: kṛṣṇeti maṅgalaṃ nāma yasya vāci pravartate /
GR14hbhvil_u:11197: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11198: jalaṃ bhittvā yathā padmaṃ narakād uddharāmy aham // Hbhv_11.496 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11201: kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ mantraṃ śrutvā mukto bhaven naraḥ // Hbhv_11.497 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11203: nāmnāṃ mukhyataraṃ nāma kṛṣṇākhyaṃ me parantapa /
GR14hbhvil_u:11204: prāyaścittam aśeṣāṇāṃ pāpānāṃ mocakaṃ param // Hbhv_11.498 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11206: yatra yatra sthito vāpi kṛṣṇa-kṛṣṇeti kīrtayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:11207: sarva-pāpa-viśuddhātmā sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim // Hbhv_11.499 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11209: ballavī-kānta kiṃ tais tair upāyaiḥ kṛṣṇa-nāma te /
GR14hbhvil_u:11210: kintu jihvāgragaṃ jāgran nirundhe hi mahā-bhayam // Hbhv_11.500 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11212: satyaṃ bravīmi te śambho gopanīyam idaṃ mama /
GR14hbhvil_u:11221: pūrṇaḥ śuddho nitya-mukto bhinnatvān nāma-nāminoḥ // Hbhv_11.503 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11233: nāmni saṅkīrtite viṣṇor yasya puṃso na jāyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:11234: saroma-pulakaṃ gātraṃ sa bhavet kuliśopamaḥ // Hbhv_11.506 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11238: sā hānis tan mahac chidraṃ sa mohaḥ sa ca vibhramaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11239: yan-muhūrtaṃ kṣaṇaṃ vāpi vāsudevo na cintyate // Hbhv_11.508 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11241: avamatya ca ye yānti bhagavat-kīrtanaṃ narāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11242: te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ tena pāpena karmaṇā // Hbhv_11.509 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11244: om āsya jānanto nāma cid viviktan
GR14hbhvil_u:11245: mahas te viṣṇo sumatiṃ bhajāmahe // Hbhv_11.510 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11246: oṃ tat sat oṃ padaṃ devasya namasā
GR14hbhvil_u:11250: oṃ tam u stotāraḥ pūrvaṃ yathāvida
GR14hbhvil_u:11253: mahas te viṣṇo sumatiṃ bhajāmahe // Hbhv_11.512 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11256: kalpayanty artha-vādaṃ ye yānti ghora-yātanām // Hbhv_11.513 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11259: artha-vādaṃ harer nāmni sambhāvayati yo naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11260: sa pāpiṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ niraye patanti sphuṭam // Hbhv_11.514 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11264: yo mānuṣas tam iha duḥkha-caye kṣipāmi
GR14hbhvil_u:11268: ye'rthavāda iti brūyur na teṣāṃ niraya-kṣayaḥ // Hbhv_11.516 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11271: yata uktaṃ pādme śrī-nāradaṃ prati sanat-kumāreṇa -
GR14hbhvil_u:11273: harer apy aparādhān yaḥ kuryād dvipada-pāṃsavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11274: nāmāśrayaḥ kadācit syāt taraty eva sa nāmataḥ // Hbhv_11.519 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11275: nāmno 'pi sarva-suhṛdo hy aparādhāt pataty adhaḥ // Hbhv_11.520 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11278: satāṃ nindā nāmnaḥ paramam aparādhaṃ vitanute
GR14hbhvil_u:11279: yataḥ khyātiṃ yātaṃ katham u sahate tad-vigarhām /
GR14hbhvil_u:11281: dhiyā bhinnaṃ paśyet sa khalu hari-nāmāhita-karaḥ // Hbhv_11.521 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11285: na vidyate tasya yamair hi śuddhiḥ // Hbhv_11.522 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11293: sadā saṅkīrtayan nāma tad-eka-śaraṇo bhavet // Hbhv_11.525 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11298: nāmaikaṃ yasya vāci smaraṇa-patha-gataṃ śrotra-mūlaṃ gataṃ vā
GR14hbhvil_u:11299: śuddhaṃ vāśuddha-varṇaṃ vyavahita-rahitaṃ tārayaty eva satyam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11301: nikṣiptaṃ syān na phala-janakaṃ śīghram evātra vipra // Hbhv_11.527 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11303: mahminām api yan-nāmnaḥ pāraṃ gantum anīśvaraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11304: manavo 'pi munīdrāś ca kathaṃ kṣuṇṇa-dhīr bhaje // Hbhv_11.528 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11306: itthaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇa-pādābje bhaktiḥ kāryā sadā budhaiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11307: sā ca tasya prasādena mahā-puṇyāt prajāyate // Hbhv_11.529 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11310: na hy apuṇyavatāṃ loke mūḍhānāṃ kuṭilātmanām /
GR14hbhvil_u:11311: bhaktir bhavati govinde smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ tathā // Hbhv_11.530 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11313: nimiṣaṃ nimiṣārdhaṃ vā martyānām iha nārada /
GR14hbhvil_u:11317: narāṇāṃ kṣīṇa-pāpānāṃ kṛṣṇe bhaktiḥ prajāyate // Hbhv_11.532 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11320: vaiṣṇavatvaṃ labhed dhīmān sarva-pāpa-kṣaye sati // Hbhv_11.533 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11323: teṣāṃ bhaktir bhavec chuddhā deva-deve janārdane // Hbhv_11.534 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11325: sulabhāḥ sarva-yajñāś ca viṣṇu-bhaktiḥ sudurlabhā // Hbhv_11.535 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11327: gaṅgāyāṃ maraṇaṃ caiva dṛḍhā bhaktiś ca keśave /
GR14hbhvil_u:11328: brahma-vidyā-prabodhaś ca nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // Hbhv_11.536 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11331: yajñaiś ca vividhaiḥ samyag bhaktir bhavati keśave // Hbhv_11.537 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11333: divasaṃ divasārdhaṃ vā muhūrtaṃ caikam eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11334: nāśāc cāśeṣa-pāpasya bhaktir bhavati keśave // Hbhv_11.538 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11336: jantoḥ kaluṣa-hīnasya bhaktir bhavati keśave // Hbhv_11.539 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11339: śreyobhir vividhaiś cānyaiḥ kṛṣṇe bhaktir hi sādhyate // Hbhv_11.540 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11341: yeṣāṃ tv anta-gataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇya-karmaṇām /
GR14hbhvil_u:11342: te dvandva-moha-nirmuktā bhajante māṃ dṛḍhavratāḥ // Hbhv_11.541 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11344: rājan patir gurur alaṃ bhavatāṃ yadūnāṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:11345: daivaṃ priyaḥ kula-patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaro vaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11346: astv evam aṅga bhagavān bhajatāṃ mukundo
GR14hbhvil_u:11347: muktiṃ dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti-yogam // Hbhv_11.542 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11352: yat-prabhāveṇa lolo 'yaṃ kīṭo 'py uddhartum icchati // Hbhv_11.546 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11354: tatrādau bhaktimataḥ kathañcid āpatite'pi pāpe prāyaścittāntara-nirasanatvam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11357: pāpāni bhagavad-bhaktis tathā dahati tat-kṣaṇāt // Hbhv_11.547 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11360: aghaṃ dhunvanti kārtsnyena nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ // Hbhv_11.548 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11363: tathā mad-viṣayā bhaktir uddhavaināṃsi kṛtsnaśaḥ // Hbhv_11.549 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11370: mad-bhaktiṃ vahatāṃ puṃsām iha loke pare'pi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11371: nāśubhaṃ vidyate kiñcit kula-koṭiṃ nayed ditam // Hbhv_11.551 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11375: prāyaḥ pragalbhayā bhaktyā viṣayair nābhibhūyate // Hbhv_11.552 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11378: tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11379: mat-kathā-śravaṇādau vā śraddhā yāvan na jāyate // Hbhv_11.553 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11383: yatra kva vābhadram abhūd amuṣya kiṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:11386: lekhyaṃ ca tat-tad-vacanair etat sudṛḍhatām iyāt // Hbhv_11.555 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11389: sa vai puṃsāṃ paro dharmo yato bhaktir adhokṣaje /
GR14hbhvil_u:11393: mad-bhaktyāpetam ātmānaṃ na samyak prapunāti hi // Hbhv_11.557 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11395: bhaktiḥ punāti man-niṣṭhā śvapākān api sambhavāt // Hbhv_11.558 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11397: etāvān eva loke'smin puṃsāṃ dharmaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11400: kiṃ tasya bahubhiḥ mantraiḥ śāstraiḥ kiṃ bahu-vistaraiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11401: vājapeya-sahasraiḥ kiṃ bhaktir yasya janārdane // Hbhv_11.560 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11412: granthiṃ vibhetsyasi mamāham iti prarūḍham // Hbhv_11.562 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11417: sroto-gaṇās tam araṇaṃ bhaja vāsudevam // Hbhv_11.563 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11421: sadṛśo 'sti śivaḥ panthā yogināṃ brahma-siddhaye // Hbhv_11.564 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11423: sadhrīcīno hy ayaṃ loke panthāḥ kṣemo 'kuto-bhayaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11426: na hy ato 'nyaḥ śivaḥ panthā viśataḥ saṃsṛtāv iha /
GR14hbhvil_u:11427: vāsudeve bhagavati bhakti-yogo yato bhavet // Hbhv_11.566 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11428: bhagavān brahma kārtsnyena trir anvīkṣya manīṣayā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11429: tad adhyavasyat kūṭa-stho ratir ātmany ato bhavet // Hbhv_11.567 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11432: tathā samasta-siddhīnāṃ jīvanaṃ bhaktir iṣyate // Hbhv_11.568 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11434: tathā bhaktiṃ samāśritya sarve jīvanti dhārmikāḥ // Hbhv_11.569 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11437: īpsitāṃ bhagavad-bhaktyā labhate paramāṃ gatim // Hbhv_11.570 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11439: apatyaṃ draviṇaṃ dārā hārā harmyaṃ hayā gajāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11440: sukhāni svarga-mokṣau ca na dūre hari-bhaktitaḥ // Hbhv_11.571 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11443: janayaty āśu vairāgyaṃ jñānaṃ ca yad ahaitukam // Hbhv_11.572 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11445: yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat /
GR14hbhvil_u:11446: yogena dāma-dharmeṇa śreyobhir itarair api // Hbhv_11.573 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11448: svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati // Hbhv_11.574 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11451: tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena yajeta puruṣaṃ param // Hbhv_11.575 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11455: jarayaty āśu yā koṣaṃ nigīrṇam analo yathā // Hbhv_11.576 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11457: yasyām eva kavaya ātmānam avirataṃ vividha-vṛjina-saṃsāra-paritāpopatapyamānam anusavanaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:11458: snāpayantas tayaiva parayā nirvṛtyā hy apavargam ātyantikaṃ parama-puruṣārtham api
GR14hbhvil_u:11459: svayam āsāditaṃ no evādriyante bhagavadīyatvenaiva parisamāpta-sarvārthāḥ // Hbhv_11.577 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11461: naivecchaty āśiṣaḥ kvāpi brahmarṣir mokṣam apy uta /
GR14hbhvil_u:11462: bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati labdhavān puruṣe'vyaye // Hbhv_11.578 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11477: dharmārtha-kāmaiḥ kiṃ tasya muktis tasya kare sthitā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11478: samasta-jagatāṃ mūle yasya bhaktiḥ sthitā tvayi // Hbhv_11.582 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11483: muktau kim arthaṃ kriyate prayatnaḥ // Hbhv_11.583 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11485: ātmārāmāś ca munayo nirgranthā apy urukrame /
GR14hbhvil_u:11486: kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktim itthambhūta-guṇo hariḥ // Hbhv_11.584 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11490: te yānti niyataṃ sthānaṃ yatra yogeśvaro hariḥ // Hbhv_11.585 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11493: sva-gṛhe'pi vasan yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_11.586 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11496: dūre yamā hy upari naḥ spṛhaṇīya-śīlāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11506: sva-bhakta-vatsalo devo bhaktyā tuṣyati nānyathā // Hbhv_11.589 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11509: prīṇanāya mukundasya na vṛttaṃ na bahu-jñatā // Hbhv_11.590 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11510: na dānaṃ na tapo nejyā na śaucaṃ na vratāni ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:11511: prīyate'malayā bhaktyā harir anyad viḍambanam // Hbhv_11.591 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11518: vyādhasyācaraṇaṃ dhruvasya ca vayo vidyā gajendrasya kā
GR14hbhvil_u:11519: kubjāyāḥ kim u nāma rūpam adhikaṃ kiṃ tat sudāmno dhanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11520: vaṃśaḥ ko vidurasya yādavapater ugrasya kiṃ pauruṣaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:11521: bhaktyā tuṣyati kevalaṃ na ca guṇair bhakti-priyo mādhavaḥ // Hbhv_11.593 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11523: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati /
GR14hbhvil_u:11524: tad ahaṃ bhaktyupahṛtam aśnāmi prayatātmanaḥ // Hbhv_11.594 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11526: na janma nūnaṃ mahato na saubhagaṃ
GR14hbhvil_u:11527: na vāṅ na buddhir nākṛtis toṣa-hetuḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11528: tair yad visṛṣṭān api no vanaukasaś
GR14hbhvil_u:11532: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna /
GR14hbhvil_u:11533: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa // Hbhv_11.596 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11536: dhmātaṃ punaḥ svaṃ bhajate ca rūpam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11541: sarvotpatty-apyayaṃ brahma kāraṇaṃ mopayāti saḥ // Hbhv_11.598 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11544: bhuktiṃ muktiṃ harir dadyāt arcito 'nyatra sevinām /
GR14hbhvil_u:11545: bhaktiṃ ca dadāty eṣa yato vaśya-karī hareḥ // Hbhv_11.599 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11549: sādhyate sādhu-puruṣaiḥ svayaṃ jānāti tad bhavān // Hbhv_11.600 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11551: na sādhayati māṃ yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma uddhava /
GR14hbhvil_u:11552: na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo yathā bhaktir mamorjitā // Hbhv_11.601 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11554: mad-bhaktyāpetam ātmānaṃ na samyak prapunāti hi // Hbhv_11.602 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11558: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ // Hbhv_11.603 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11561: necchanti sevayā pūrṇāḥ kuto 'nyat kāla-viplutam // Hbhv_11.604 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11563: māhātmyaṃ yac ca bhagavad-bhaktānāṃ likhitaṃ purā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11564: tad-bhakter api vijñeyaṃ teṣāṃ bhaktyaiva tattvataḥ // Hbhv_11.605 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11566: draṣṭavyam iha māhātmyaṃ teṣāṃ bhakty-aṅgatā yataḥ // Hbhv_11.606 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11568: yāvaj jano bhajati no bhuvi viṣṇu-bhakti-
GR14hbhvil_u:11579: catvāro jajñire varṇā guṇair viprādayaḥ pṛthak // Hbhv_11.609 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11580: ya evaṃ puruṣaṃ sākṣād ātma-prabhavam īśvaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:11581: na bhajanty avajānanti sthānād bhraṣṭāḥ patanty adhaḥ // Hbhv_11.610 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11583: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11585: nityatvaṃ yad yad aṅgānāṃ bhakter vilikhitaṃ purā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11586: tena tenaiva nityatvam asyāṃ saṃsādhitaṃ param // Hbhv_11.612 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11593: sattva evaika-manaso vṛttiḥ svābhāvikī tu yā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11594: animittā bhāgavatī bhaktiḥ siddher garīyasī // Hbhv_11.614 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11597: devatāyāṃ ca mantre ca tathā mantra-prade gurau /
GR14hbhvil_u:11598: bhaktir aṣṭa-vidhā yasya tasya kṛṣṇaḥ prasīdati // Hbhv_11.615 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11600: sumanā arcayen nityaṃ tad-arthe dambha-varjanam // Hbhv_11.616 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11603: bhaktir aṣṭa-vidhā hy eṣā yasmin mlecche'pi vartate /
GR14hbhvil_u:11604: sa muniḥ satya-vādī ca kīrtimān sa bhaven naraḥ // Hbhv_11.618 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11605: bhaktir aṣṭa-vidhā hy eṣā yasmin mlecche'pi vartate /
GR14hbhvil_u:11606: sa muniḥ satyavādī ca kīrtimān sa bhaven naraḥ // Hbhv_11.619 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11609: arcanaṃ vandanaṃ dāsyaṃ sakhyam ātma-nivedanam // Hbhv_11.620 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11610: iti puṃsārpitā viṣṇau bhaktiś cen nava-lakṣaṇā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11611: kriyeta bhagavaty addhā tan manye'dhītam uttamam // Hbhv_11.621 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11613: śravaṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ cāsya smaraṇaṃ mahatāṃ gateḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11617: paricaryā namaskāraḥ prema svātmārpaṇaṃ harau // Hbhv_11.622 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11619: ādyaṃ tu vaiṣṇavaṃ proktaṃ śaṅkha-cakrāṅkanaṃ hareḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11621: arcanaṃ ca japo dhyānaṃ tan-nāma-smaraṇaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11622: kīrtanaṃ śravaṇaṃ caiva vandanaṃ pāda-sevanam // Hbhv_11.624 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11624: tadīyānāṃ ca sevāṃ ca dvādaśī-vrata-niṣṭhitam // Hbhv_11.625 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11630: āghrāṇaṃ dhūpa-śeṣāder nirmālyasya ca dhāraṇam // Hbhv_11.627 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11636: tāni jñeyāni sarvāṇi bhakter vai lakṣaṇāṃ na hi // Hbhv_11.630 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11637: teṣu jñeyāni gauṇāni mukhyāni ca vivekibhiḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11638: bahiraṅgāntaraṅgāṇi prema-siddhau ca tāni yat // Hbhv_11.631 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11640: muktā-phalādi-granthebhyo jñeyās tal likhanair alam // Hbhv_11.632 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11641: prema-bhaktau ca siddhāyāṃ sarve'rthāḥ sevakāḥ svayam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11642: bhagavāṃś cātivaśyaḥ syāl likhyate'syāḥ sulakṣaṇam // Hbhv_11.633 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11649: prema-bhakteś ca māhātmyaṃ bhakter māhātmyataḥ param /
GR14hbhvil_u:11650: siddham eva yato bhakteḥ phalaṃ premaiva niścitam // Hbhv_11.635 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11652: kiyanty ullikhatā tasyā mahimaiva vilikhyate // Hbhv_11.636 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11677: bhaktyā sañjātayā bhaktyā bibhraty utpulakāṃ tanum // Hbhv_11.642 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11681: bhavanti tūṣṇīṃ param etya nirvṛtāḥ // Hbhv_11.643 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11683: kathaṃ vinā roma-harṣaṃ dravatā cetasā vinā
GR14hbhvil_u:11693: sarva-dharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
GR14hbhvil_u:11694: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ // Hbhv_11.647 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11697: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca śrotavyaṃ śrutam eva ca // Hbhv_11.648 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11698: mām ekam eva śaraṇam ātmānaṃ sarva-dehinām /
GR14hbhvil_u:11699: yāhi sarvātma-bhāvena mayā syā hy akuto-bhayaḥ // Hbhv_11.649 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11703: yair āśrito na govindas tair ātmā vañcitaś ciram // Hbhv_11.650 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11705: bhramadbhiḥ puruṣaiḥ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ janma-paryayāt // Hbhv_11.651 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11706: tad apy aphalatāṃ jātaṃ teṣām ātmābhimāninām /
GR14hbhvil_u:11710: sakṛd eva prapanno yas tavāsmīti ca yācate /
GR14hbhvil_u:11711: abhayaṃ sarvadā tasmai dadāmy etad vrataṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_11.653 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11714: iti yaḥ śaraṇaṃ prāptas taṃ kleśād uddharāmy aham // Hbhv_11.654 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11718: ye cānye dhana-dāra-putra-niratāḥ sarvādhamās te'pi hi
GR14hbhvil_u:11721: na hi nārāyaṇaṃ nāma narāḥ saṃśritya śaunaka /
GR14hbhvil_u:11722: prāpnuvanty aśubhaa satyam idam uktaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Hbhv_11.656 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11725: śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāto govindaḥ nāvasīdati // Hbhv_11.657 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11727: sthitaḥ priyahite jiṣṇoḥ sa eva puruṣarṣabha /
GR14hbhvil_u:11728: rājaṃs tava ca durdharṣo vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣottamaḥ // Hbhv_11.658 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11729: ya enaṃ saṃśrayantīha bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ harim /
GR14hbhvil_u:11730: te tarantīha durgāṇi na me'trāsti vicāraṇā // Hbhv_11.659 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11732: śārīrā mānasā divyā vaiyāse ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11733: bhautikāś ca kathaṃ kleśā bādhante hari-saṃśrayam // Hbhv_11.660 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11738: te dharma-rāja-karaṇaṃ na viśanti dhīrāḥ // Hbhv_11.661 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11745: ye hariṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti te kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_11.663 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11747: karmaṇā manasā vācā ye'cyutaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11748: na samartho yamas teṣāṃ te mukti-phala-bhāginaḥ // Hbhv_11.664 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11753: padaṃ padaṃ yad vipadāṃ na teṣām // Hbhv_11.665 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11764: yair āśritas tīrtha-padaś caraṇo vyasanātyayaḥ // Hbhv_11.668 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11772: nāyaṃ kiṅkaro nāyaṃ ṛṇī ca rājan /
GR14hbhvil_u:11781: vācā hṛdā ca tanvāpi kṛṣṇaikāśrayaṇaṃ hi yat // Hbhv_11.672 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11785: tyaktvānyaṃ vai na jānāmi na bhajāmi smarāmi na // Hbhv_11.673 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11786: na namāmi na ca staumi na paśyāmi sva-cakṣuṣā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11787: na spṛhāmi na gāyāmi na vā yāmi hariṃ vinā // Hbhv_11.674 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11790: prāyaḥ sakhya-prakāre tat paryavasyed vicārataḥ // Hbhv_11.675 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11796: tavāsmīti vadan vācā tathaiva manasā vidan /
GR14hbhvil_u:11797: tat-sthānam āśritas tanvā modate śaraṇāgataḥ // Hbhv_11.677 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11799: kaḥ paṇḍitas tvad aparaṃ śaraṇaṃ samīyād
GR14hbhvil_u:11802: ātmanam apy upacayāpacayau na yasya // Hbhv_11.678 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11807: kaṃ vā dayāluṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajema // Hbhv_11.679 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11814: dvikālaṃ ca namet sandhyām agnīn upacaret tathā // Hbhv_11.681 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11816: gāruḍāni ca ratnāni vibhṛyāt prayato naraḥ // Hbhv_11.682 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11818: kiṃcit parasvaṃ na haret nālpam apy apriyaṃ vadet // Hbhv_11.683 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11819: priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyān nānya-doṣān udīrayet
GR14hbhvil_u:11820: nānya-striyaṃ tathā vairaṃ rocayet puruṣarṣabha // Hbhv_11.684 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11821: na duṣṭaṃ yānam ārohet kula-cchāyāṃ na saṃśrayet // Hbhv_11.685 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11825: budho maitrīṃ na kurvīta naikaḥ panthānam āśrayet // Hbhv_11.687 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11827: pradīptaṃ veśma na viśen nārohec chikharaṃ taroḥ // Hbhv_11.688 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11828: na kuryād danta-saṅgharṣaṃ kuṣṇīyāc ca na nāsikām /
GR14hbhvil_u:11830: noccair haset sa-śabdaṃ ca na muñcet pavanaṃ budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11831: nakhān na khādayec chindyān na tṛṇaṃ na mahīṃ likhet // Hbhv_11.690 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11832: na śmaśru bhakṣayel loṣṭaṃ na mūdnīyād vicakṣaṇaḥ // Hbhv_11.691 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11833: jyotīṃṣy amedhya-śastāni nābhivīkṣeta ca prabho // Hbhv_11.692 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11834: na huṅkuryāc chavaṃ gandhaṃ śava-gandho hi somajaḥ // Hbhv_11.693 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11838: naikaḥ śūnyāṭavīṃ gacchet tathā śūnya-gṛhe vaset // Hbhv_11.695 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11841: nānārthānāśrayet kāṃścin na jihmaṃ rocayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_11.697 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11842: upasarpen na vai vyālaṃ ciraṃ tiṣṭhen na cotthitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11846: na seveta tathā śayyāṃ vyāyāmaṃ ca nareśvara // Hbhv_11.699 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11847: daṃṣṭriṇaḥ śṛṅgiṇaś caiva prājño dūreṇa varjayet // Hbhv_11.700 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11848: avaśyāyaṃ ca rājendra puro vātātapau tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11849: na snāyān na svapen nagno na caivopaspṛśed budhaḥ // Hbhv_11.701 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11850: mukta-kacchaś ca nācāmed devādy-arcāṃ ca varjayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:11853: na ca nirdhūnayet keśān nācāmec caiva cotthitaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11854: pādena nākramet pādaṃ na pūjyābhimukhaṃ nayet // Hbhv_11.703 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11856: maṅgalya-pūjyāṃś ca tathā viparītān na dakṣiṇām // Hbhv_11.704 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11859: tiṣṭhan na mūtrayet tadvat pathiṣv api na mūtrayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:11862: bali-maṅgala-japyādau na home na mahājane // Hbhv_11.707 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11863: yoṣito nāvamanyeta na cāsāṃ viśvased budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11864: na caiverṣyur bhavet tāsu nādhikuryāt kadācana // Hbhv_11.708 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11866: na niṣkrāmed gṛhāt prājñaḥ sadācāra-paro naraḥ // Hbhv_11.709 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11868: anadhyāyaṃ budhaḥ kuryād uparāgādike tathā // Hbhv_11.710 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11870: śarīra-trāṇa-kāmo vai sopānatkaḥ sadā vrajet // Hbhv_11.711 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11871: nordhvaṃ na tiryag-dūraṃ vā nirīkṣan paryaṭed budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11872: yuga-mātraṃ mahī-pṛṣṭhaṃ naro gacched vilokayan // Hbhv_11.712 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11874: priyam uktaṃ hitaṃ naitad iti matvā na tad vadet /
GR14hbhvil_u:11875: śreyas tad-rahitaṃ vācyaṃ yadyapy atyanta-vipriyam // Hbhv_11.713 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11876: prāṇinām upakārāya yad eveha paratra ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:11877: karmaṇā manasā vācā tad eva matimān bhajet // Hbhv_11.714 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11879: asāv aham iti brūyād dvijo vai hy abhivādane /
GR14hbhvil_u:11880: śrāddhaṃ vrataṃ tathā dānaṃ devatābhyarcanaṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11881: yajñaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ caiva kurvantaṃ nābhivādayet // Hbhv_11.715 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11882: tathā snānaṃ prakurvantaṃ dhāvantam aśuciṃ tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11885: kṛte'bhivādane yas tu na kuryāt prativādanam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11886: nābhivādyaḥ sa vijñeyo yathā śūdras tathaiva saḥ // Hbhv_11.717 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11890: asac-chāstram asad-vādam asat-sevāṃ ca putraka // Hbhv_11.718 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11892: pūrvāhna eva kāryāṇi devatānāṃ ca tarpaṇam // Hbhv_11.719 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11893: udakyā darśanaṃ sparśaṃ varjeta sambhāṣaṇaṃ tathā // Hbhv_11.720 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11894: na cābhīkṣṇaṃ śiraḥ-snānaṃ kuryān niṣkāraṇaṃ naraḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11895: śiraḥ-snātaś ca tailena nāṅgaṃ kiṃcid api spṛśet // Hbhv_11.721 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11896: panthā deyo brāhmaṇānāṃ rājo duḥkhāturasya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:11899: puṃścalyāḥ kṛta-vairasya bālasya patitasya ca // Hbhv_11.723 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11901: upavītam alaṅkāraṃ kavalaṃ caiva varjayet // Hbhv_11.724 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11902: na kṣipta-bāhu-jaṅghaś ca prājñas tiṣṭhet kadācana /
GR14hbhvil_u:11903: na cāpi vikṣipet pādau vāsasā na ca dhūnayet // Hbhv_11.725 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11905: nyūnāṅgānadhamāṃś caiva nopahāsen na dūṣayet // Hbhv_11.726 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11907: nānulepanam ādadyād asnātaḥ snātakī kvacit // Hbhv_11.727 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11908: na cāpi rakta-vāsāḥ syāc citra-vāsa-dharo 'pi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11909: kṣura-karmaṇi cānte ca strī-sambhoge ca putraka /
GR14hbhvil_u:11910: snāyīta celavān prājñaḥ kaṭa-bhūmim upetya ca // Hbhv_11.728 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11911: yugapaj jalam agniṃ ca bibhṛyān na vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11912: nācakṣīta dhayantīṃ gāṃ jalaṃ nāñjalinā pibet // Hbhv_11.729 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11913: śauca-kāleṣu sarveṣu guruṣv alpeṣu vā punaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11914: na vilambeta śaucārthaṃ na mukhenānalaṃ dhamet // Hbhv_11.730 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11916: ajāśvau muhato medhyau na gor vatsasya cānanam // Hbhv_11.731 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11919: spṛṣṭvā snāyīta śaucārthaṃ tathaiva mṛta-hāriṇaḥ // Hbhv_11.732 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11920: nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sa-snehaṃ snātaḥ śudhyati mānavaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11921: ācamyaiva tu nisnehaṃ gām ālabhyārkam īkṣya vā // Hbhv_11.733 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11922: na cālapej janaṃ dviṣṭaṃ vīra-hīnāṃ tathā striyam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11928: etad eva hi kartavyaṃ prājñaiḥ śodhanam ātmanaḥ // Hbhv_11.736 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11930: yac cāpi kurvato nātmā jugupsām eti putraka /
GR14hbhvil_u:11931: tat kartavyam aśaṅkena yan na gopyaṃ mahājane // Hbhv_11.737 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11933: upāsate na ye pūrvāṃ dvijāḥ sandhyāṃ na paścimām /
GR14hbhvil_u:11934: sarvāms tān dhārmiko rājā śūdra-karmaṇi yojayet // Hbhv_11.738 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11936: ucchiṣṭotsarjanaṃ bhūpa sadā kāryā hitaiṣiṇā // Hbhv_11.739 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11937: ucchiṣṭau na spṛśec chīrṣaṃ sarve prāṇās tad-āśrayāḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11938: keśa-grāhān prahārāṃś ca śirasy etāni varjayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:11939: na pāṇibhyām ubhābhyāṃ tu kaṇḍūyāj jātu vai śiraḥ // Hbhv_11.740 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11941: suvāsinīr gurviṇīś ca vṛddhaṃ bālāturau tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11942: bhojayet saṃskṛtānn eva prathamaṃ caramaṃ gṛhī // Hbhv_11.741 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11943: aghaṃ sa kevalaṃ bhuṅkte vṛddhe go-vāhanādike /
GR14hbhvil_u:11944: yo bhuṅkte pāṇḍava-śreṣṭha prekṣatām apradāya ca // Hbhv_11.742 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11945: varjayed dadhi-śaktuṃ ca rātrau dhānāś ca vāsare // Hbhv_11.743 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11947: srajaś ca nāvakarṣeta na bahir dhārayeta ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:11948: gṛhe pārāvatā dhanyāḥ śukāś ca saha-sārikāḥ // Hbhv_11.744 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11950: tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā śākaṃ mūlaṃ vā jalam eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11952: na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇīyān na śūdrāt patitād api /
GR14hbhvil_u:11953: nānyasmād yācakatvaṃ ca ninditād varjayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_11.746 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11954: nityaṃ yācanako na syāt punas tatraiva yācayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:11955: prāṇān apaharaty eṣa yācakas tasya durmatiḥ // Hbhv_11.747 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11957: brahmasvaṃ ca nāpahared āpady api kadācana // Hbhv_11.748 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11958: na viṣaṃ viṣam ity āhur brahmasvaṃ viṣam ucyate /
GR14hbhvil_u:11959: devasvaṃ vāpi yatnena sadā pariharet tataḥ // Hbhv_11.749 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11960: na dharmasyāpadeśena pāpaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caret /
GR14hbhvil_u:11962: pretyeha cedṛśo vipro garhyeta brahma-vādibhiḥ // Hbhv_11.750 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11967: muktvā samudrayor deśaṃ nānyatra nivased dvijaḥ // Hbhv_11.752 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11968: kṛṣṇo vā yatra carati mṛgo nityaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11969: puṇyāś ca viśrutā nadyas tatra vā nivased dvijaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11974: para-kṣetre carantīṃ gāṃ na cācakṣīta kasyacit // Hbhv_11.754 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11976: parasmai kathayed vidvān śaśinaṃ vā kathaṃcana /
GR14hbhvil_u:11977: tithiṃ pakṣasya na brūyān nakṣatrāṇi vinirdiśet // Hbhv_11.755 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11979: nindayed yo gurūn devān vedaṃ vā sopabṛṃhitam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11980: kalpa-koṭi-śataṃ sāgraṃ raurave pacyate naraḥ // Hbhv_11.756 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11981: tūṣṇīm āsīta nindāyāṃ na brūyāt kiṃcid uttaram /
GR14hbhvil_u:11982: karṇau pidhāya gantavyaṃ na cainam avalokayet // Hbhv_11.757 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11983: varjayed rahasyaṃ ca pareṣāṃ gūhayed budhaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:11984: vivādaṃ svajanaiḥ sārdhaṃ na kuryād vai kadācana // Hbhv_11.758 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11985: na pāpaṃ pāpinaṃ brūyād apāpaṃ vā dvijottamāḥ // Hbhv_11.759 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11986: nekṣetodyantam ādityaṃ śaśinaṃ vā nimittataḥ // Hbhv_11.760 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11987: āstaṃ yāntaṃ na vāristhaṃ nopasṛṣṭaṃ na madhyagam /
GR14hbhvil_u:11988: tirohitaṃ vāsasā vā na darśāntara-gāminam // Hbhv_11.761 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11989: nagnāṃ striyaṃ pumāṃsaṃ vā purīṣaṃ mūtram eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11991: na mukta-bandhanāṃ gāṃ vā nonmattaṃ mattam eva vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:11992: spṛśen na bhojane patnīṃ nainām īkṣeta mehatīm // Hbhv_11.763 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11993: kṣubantīṃ jṛmbhamāṇāṃ vā nāsanasthāṃ yathā sukham /
GR14hbhvil_u:11994: nodake cātmano rūpaṃ nakulaṃ śvabhram eva vā // Hbhv_11.764 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11995: na śūdrāya matiṃ dadyāt kṛṣaraṃ pāyasaṃ dadhi /
GR14hbhvil_u:11996: nocchiṣṭaṃ vā ghṛta-madhu na ca kṛṣṇājinaṃ haviḥ // Hbhv_11.765 //
GR14hbhvil_u:11997: na kuryāt kasyacit pīḍāṃ sutaṃ śiṣyaṃ ca tāḍayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:11999: na ca śiṣyānnaṃ satkuryān nātmānaṃ śaṃsayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_11.766 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12000: na nadīṃ ca nadīṃ brūyāt parvateṣu na parvatam /
GR14hbhvil_u:12001: āvaset tena naivāpi yas tyajet sahavāsinam // Hbhv_11.767 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12003: romāṇi ca rahasyāni svāni khāni na ca spṛśet // Hbhv_11.768 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12005: nābhihanyāj jalaṃ padbhyāṃ pāṇinā na kadācana // Hbhv_11.769 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12006: na ghātayed iṣṭakābhiḥ phalāni na phalena ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:12007: na mleccha-bhāṣaṇaṃ śikṣen na karṣec ca padāsanam // Hbhv_11.770 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12008: notsaṅge bhakṣayed bhakṣyān gāṃ ca saṃveśayen na hi /
GR14hbhvil_u:12009: nākṣaiḥ krīḍen na dhāveta strībhir vādaṃ ca cācaret // Hbhv_11.771 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12010: na dantair nakha-lomāni chindyāt suptaṃ na bodhayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12011: na bālātapam āsevet preta-dhūmaṃ vivarjayet // Hbhv_11.772 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12012: naikaḥ supyāt śūnya-gṛhe svayaṃ nopānahau haret /
GR14hbhvil_u:12013: nākāraṇād vā niṣṭhīven na bāhubhyāṃ nadīṃ taret // Hbhv_11.773 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12015: nāgnau pratāpayet pādau na kāṃsye dhārayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_11.774 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12016: nābhipratārayed devān brāhmaṇān gām athāpi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:12018: na caivānnaṃ padā vāpi na deva-pratimāṃ spṛśet // Hbhv_11.775 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12020: caityaṃ bṛhmaṃ naiva chindyān nāpsu ṣṭhīvanam utsṛjet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12021: na cāgniṃ laṅghayed dhīmān nopadadhyād adhaḥ kvacit // Hbhv_11.776 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12022: na cainaṃ pādataḥ kuryāt tila-baddhaṃ niśi tyajet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12023: na kūpam avaroheta nācakṣītāśuciḥ kvacit // Hbhv_11.777 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12024: agnau na prakṣiped agniṃ nādbhiḥ praśamayet tathā /
GR14hbhvil_u:12025: suhṛn-maraṇam ārtiṃ vā na svayaṃ śrāvayet parān /
GR14hbhvil_u:12026: apaṇyam atha paṇyaṃ vā vikrayaṃ na prayojayet // Hbhv_11.778 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12027: puṇya-sthānodaka-sthāne sīmāntaṃ vā kṛṣen na tu /
GR14hbhvil_u:12029: parasparaṃ paśūn vyālān pakṣiṇo na ca yodhayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12030: kārayitvā sva-karmāṇi kārūn vidvān na vañcayet // Hbhv_11.780 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12031: bahir gandhaṃ ca kudvāra-praveśaṃ ca vivarjayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12032: naikaś caret sabhāṃ vipraḥ samavāyaṃ ca varjayet // Hbhv_11.781 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12033: na vījayed vā vastreṇa na devāyatane svapet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12035: nākrāmet kāmataś chāyāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gavām api /
GR14hbhvil_u:12036: svāntu nākrāmayec chāyaṃ patitādyair na rogibhiḥ // Hbhv_11.783 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12037: nāśnīyāt payasā takraṃ na bījāny upabījayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12038: vivatsāyāś ca goḥ kṣīram auṣṭraṃ vā nirdaśasya ca /
GR14hbhvil_u:12039: āvikaṃ sandhinī-kṣīram apeyaṃ manur abravīt // Hbhv_11.784 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12040: hanta-kāram athāgryaṃ vā bhikṣāṃ vā śaktito dvijaḥ /
GR14hbhvil_u:12041: dadyād atithaye nityaṃ budhyeta parameśvaram // Hbhv_11.785 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12042: bhikṣām āhur grāsa-mātram agryaṃ tasmāc caturguṇam /
GR14hbhvil_u:12043: puṣkalaṃ hanta-kāraṃ tu tac caturguṇam iṣyate // Hbhv_11.786 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12045: bhojanaṃ hanta-kāraṃ vā agryaṃ bhikṣām athāpi vā /
GR14hbhvil_u:12046: adattvā tu na bhoktavyaṃ yathā-vibhavam ātmanaḥ // Hbhv_11.787 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12050: dātuḥ śrāddha-phalaṃ nāsti bhoktā kilbiṣa-bhug bhavet // Hbhv_11.788 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12055: niṣṭhīvanaṃ ca śleṣmāṇaṃ gṛhād dūre vinikṣipet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12057: anuddhṛtya ca tat-kartur enasaḥ syāt turīya-bhāk // Hbhv_11.791 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12059: yas tu pāṇi-tale bhuṅkte yas tu phutkāra-saṃyutam /
GR14hbhvil_u:12060: prasṛtāṅgulibhir yas tu tasya go-māṃsavac ca tat // Hbhv_11.792 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12063: tayor dugdhaṃ na hotavyaṃ na pātavyaṃ kadācana // Hbhv_11.793 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12064: ajā gāvo mahiṣyaś ca yāmedhyam api bhakṣayet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12065: havye kavye ca tad-dugdhaṃ gomayaṃ ca vivarjayet // Hbhv_11.794 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12070: pratyakṣe api te grāhye niṣedhas tv anya-gocaraḥ // Hbhv_11.796 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12073: kārpāsaṃ danta-kāṣṭhaṃ ca śakrād api haret śriyam // Hbhv_11.797 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12075: kapilāyāḥ payaḥ pītvā śūdras tu narakaṃ vrajet /
GR14hbhvil_u:12076: homa-śeṣaṃ pibed vipro vipraḥ syād anyathā paśuḥ // Hbhv_11.798 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12078: yad atra likhitaṃ kiñcit tat kṣantavyaṃ mahātmabhiḥ // Hbhv_11.799 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12079: ācārāś cedṛśāḥ santi pare'pi bahulāḥ satām /
GR14hbhvil_u:12080: te loka-śāstrato jñeyā apekṣyā yadi vaiṣṇavaiḥ // Hbhv_11.800 //
GR14hbhvil_u:12081: nityatvam eṣāṃ māhātmyam apy atra likhitāt purā /
GR14hbhvil_u:12082: sad-ācārasya nityatvān māhātmyāc ca susidhyati // Hbhv_11.801 //
